1a1(1): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyib 'dul ba'i ga pa zhugs s+ho// 
1b1(1): das rgyal bu nor bzengs kyis yid 'phrog ma khrid de glang ba
1b2(1): khyim gyi grong khyed du song nas/ rngod pa de yang grong khyer ma rogacig tu
3a1(1): / byas nas skur lhags so// rgyal po chen po la blon po rnams kyis gsol ba/ wA ci'i slar rlu nga dpung
3a2(1): mas shing gan gyi mthu skyed par mdzad/ ga sang shA'i yulan badzin gyis dz+ra ba ji snying mchis pa thams cad dgug tu gas / 
3a3(1): ze'i mdunan 'don gyis bsams pa/ gzhon du bsad pa'i thabs bya bar dus ni 'di yin no// snyam nas des rgyal po la gsol pa/ lA
3a4(1): de lta bus ni dbab par rngo mi thogs/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ji ltar byang nyid kho na 'gro 'am/ mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ ci'i slad
3a5(1): dulta nyid gshegs/ gzhon nu nor bzangs 'di ni/ dngal bab cing mthurgyal snyoms pa dang ldan pa lags pas/ dpag 'di rnaMs
3a6(1): dang lhan cig dbyer gsol/ rgyal pos spras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o// zhes de nas rgyal pos gzhon nu bkug nas sgob/ gnon
3b1(1): nud mag dang / lhan cig tu dang la ri bor ba rnams thob shin/ lU bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gnon du na
3b2(1): bzungs kyis rgyal po las gzhan nas brgyan mo rnams kyi nang du song ste/ yid 'phrog pa
3b3(1): mthong bya / des thams cad brjed par 'gyur / de nas yang rgyal ngos pa nga
3b4(1): de mthong ma thag tu thams cad brjed par 'gyur ro// de nas mdun du
3b5(1): 'don gyis rgyal bo la smras pa/ lha gzhon nu nor bzangs na
3b6(1): 'phrog ma la lhag par chags pas mchi/ rngo mi thog gi/ 
3b7(1): dmag sngogs la/ gzhon nu'i brgyan mo rnams kyi nang nas byung ba dang ci
4a1(1): nas kyang yid 'phrog ma'i drung du mi 'gro bar bral byung btang bar bgyi'o// rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag
4a2(1): dpung ga tsigs sta gon gyis shig/ blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas dpung gi tshogs glang po po che dang rta dang / dpung du chung phun sum tshogs pa/ tshogs chas
4a3(1): go mtshon rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa dag sta gon byas so// de nas gzhon nu phyir byung ba dang / sgo ba gzhon nu dpung gi tsho gas sta gor byas kyi song shig/ des smras pa/ lnga
4a4(1): yid 'phrog ma la bltas te/ mchi bar bar bgyi'o// rgyal po sa smras pa gzhon nu thogs par 'gyur gyis ma lta zhig/ yab gal te de ltar na ma la lhas te mchi'o/ 
4a5(1): gzhonu ma la ltos shig/ des yid 'phrog ma'i gtsug gi nor bu khyer nas me'i drung du song ste/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ yum bdag ri 'or ba rnams 'beb
4a6(1): su mtshos lags kyis/ gtsug gi nor bu 'di khyod kyis shin tu dben par spros la/ yid 'phrog ma gum pa la thug pa ma lags par ji ltar gyur kyang ma sbal cig ces
4a7(1): de skad ma la bsgo nas/ mchi phyag byas te dmag dpung gi tshogs dang / rol mo'i sna tshogs dang / chas te rang gi yul 'das nas/ ri 'or de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na
4b1(1): shing ldan pa zhig gi drung du btab ste 'dug go// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang / 'khor
4b2(1): gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang / 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / lam de nas gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin kyi mdun sar
4b3(1): chas so// de lam de nas chas pa na/ nam mkha'i lam la thogs par gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis lam 'di nas lan mang po zhig du song na bdag gi
4b4(1): bzhon pa lan 'ga' yang thogs par ma gyur na/ gang gi nad ltar thogs pa 'di la rgyu ci yid skab pa las/ des gzhon nu nor bzangs mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems
4b5(1): te/ 'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/ dmag la chas pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi 'di'i grogs byas te/ ri 'or ba 'di rnams srog chags 'ga' la
4b6(1): yang gnod par mi 'gyur bar dbab bo snyam du bsams nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len la smras pa/ lnga len tshur shog/ khyod kyis gzhonu nor bzangs ri 'or ba
4b7(1): 'di rnams dang / yul ma bgye bar srog chags 'ga' la yang / gnod pa mi bya bar phob shig/ gnod sbyin gyi sde po na chen po lnga len gyis bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po
5a1(1): ts+tshaH/ chen po rnam thos kyi bu las mnyan nas lha'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/ shing ta las chang tsam gyi skyes pa dang / 
5a2(1): ri'i tshad tsam gyi glang po che dang / glang po che'i tshad tsam gyi shing rta rnams sprul to// de nas ral gri dang / khro ba dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung dang / 'khor lo dang / 
5a3(1): mdung thung dang / mda' dang / dgra sta la sogs ste/ mtshon cha'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sil dkrol gyi sgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin pas 'jigs pa chen
5a4(1): po ston cing / lnga len mthu chen po'i tshigs rnams dang / ri 'or phyin pa dang / glang po che dang / rta dang shing rta'i sgra dang / sil khrol gyis tshogs dang / gnod sbyin
5a5(1): rnams kyi rang gyi mthus ra ba dag ral par gyur to// de nas ri bor na gnas pa de rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs de dang / ra ba dag ral pa mthong nas mchog
5a6(1): tu ngo mtshar skyes te dris pa/ dpung gi tshogs 'di gang nas 'ongs/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ myur du sgo phye shig/ gzhon nor ba zangs 'di'i mchug gnas
5a7(1): 'ongs te/ dpung gi tshogs 'di ni de'i yin no// gal te myur du ma phye na/ thams cad med par 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis bdag cag rnams rgyal la mi
5b1(1): ldog ste/ gzhon nu blo dang ldan la min/ rgyal po gno nu'i tshogs rnams kyis/ bdag cag 'jigs shing sgrags gyur mod/ ces smras nas/ 
5b2(1): rnams kyis sgo phye ste/ de nas rgyal mtshan dang / bdan bsgreng nas/ bum pa gang ba dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis gzhon nor bzangs su'o// 
5b3(1): des kyang dbugs phyung nas de rnams 'drang ba las sna tshogs skos te/ dbyang thang bcad gte'u yang bzung ngo // de nas ri bor ba de rnams cham du phab nas/ 
5b4(1): gzhonu nor bzangs slar log go// rgyal po nor can gyis de nyid kyi nub ma'i rmi lam na/ bya rgod cig 'ongs te rgyal po'i lho dral nas rgyu ma bzangs te/ grong khyer
5b5(1): te thams cad kyis mtha' bskor ba dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi khyim du 'ongs par mthong ngo // mthong nas de nas rgyal po 'jigs skag mi dga' zhing spu zing zhes byed
5b6(1): nas myur ba myur langs te mal chen po la 'dug nas lag pa 'gram pa las gtad de bzhin 'di las bdag cag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/ 
5b7(1): srog gi bar chad du ma 'gyur grang snyam nas sems khongs chud cing 'dug pa las/ de rnams langs rmi lam bram ze 'dun na 'don la smras pa dang / 
6a1(1): de bsams pa las rmi lam de lta bu mthong na ni gdon mi za bar/ gzhon nus ri bor ba rnams pham par byas kyi log zhig tu bstan par bya'o snyam nas smras
6a2(1): bya/ lha khyod kyis rmi lam drug sdig pa ni/ bzang po ma yin lags te/ gdon mi tshul bar gzhi 'di las lha'i rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/ sku tshe'i bar rlung du 'gyur lags
6a3(1): so/ 'on kyang 'di'i bzlog pa'i thabs mchis te/ de yang bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig las mthong ngo // bzlog pa'i thabs de yin/ lnga skyed mos tshal du brjid dbyibs lags
6a4(1): patshad la bab pa bgyis la garas rdo thal gyis byugs ste/ legs par bstan nas/ ri dgas phra mo mang gi khrag gis bka' la/ de nas lhas khrus la gshegs pa na/ rdzing de la them smras
6a5(1): gcig las 'jug par bgyi'o// gcig las zhugs nas gnyis pa la 'dzeg par gyi'o// gaN+DIs pa la zhugs nas gsum pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o// gsum pa la zhugs nas
6a6(1): bzhi pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o// de nas bram ze rigs byed dang / rigs byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi sa lnga'i zhabs lces pa ljags la mi ma yin pa'i tshil gyi bdug pa bdug go
6a7(1): de ltar na lha'i sngon sdig byang zhing yur ring por rgyal srid skyong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal pos smras de dag thams cad ni nus na 'di ltar mi ma yin pa'i tshil 'di ni shin tu dkon no// 'dunan
6a8(1): 'dron gyis smras pa thamong pa gang lags pa de dkon lags sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de ci lta bu zhig yin/ mdun 'doran gyis sbas pa/ lha'i ming 'phrog ma
6a9(1): 'di mi 'amachi ma lags sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ mdun na 'don 'di la gzhon nu'i srog 'dug gis de ltar ma smra zhig/ des smras pa/ lha khyim gyi phyir ni dga' ba' na
6b1(1): / grong nal phyir mi khyim pa dang // yul ljongs spyir ni thong rdal/ bdag gi phyir dris pa / zhes gyi ma byas m+b+ha ma/ zhes
6b2(1): rgyal po bdag nyid brtan gyur nas/ gzhon nA nI ldan de la n-i/ kun gzhi gsul bar byed krung gis/ yid 'phrog 'di ni rnam par mdzod/ bdag nyid la
6b3(1): gdon par chags pa ni mi byed pa// ci yang med pas nges khas blangs so// de ras 'dun na 'don gyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bya bar brtsams ste// rdzing brkos nas rdo thal
6b4(1): gyis byugs shing legs par stan nas// ri dgas phra mo rnams kyi khrag sogs pa 'azhugs so// sbyor ba de nor bzangs kyis btsun mo'i skye bos shes/ 
6b5(1): rnams dga' ba dang / meng pa byes de zang col brgyang gzugs bun sum stobs pa yin pasan pad bya dang / ninA rar ba dngas mas
6b6(1): gra pa 'dabar smod par 'gyur na/ nas d+hernam sa rab tu dga' bar byed pa de dag yid 'phrog mas mthang ras dris pas/ khyod cag rje'i phyir lhag
6b7(1): par dga'aci cim na gzham zhig gis yid 'phrog ma lo ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par sba ba dang / yid 'phrog ma sdug bsngal ba dang / 
6b8(1): yid mi bde ba skyes nas/ sanor nu nor bzangs kyi mgan ba der song ste/ rkang pa gnyis la bzhugs nas sing rje skad du bcom
6b9(1): drung ngus dor dang la bus sbas pa dang / de sbas pagal chede ldan lags par rtogs shig bdag gis kyang
8a1(1): gsad par bgyis// gang na lug gnyis phan tshun nas// / rdung bar byed pa mthong na ni// de gnyis rang re bcag brjod dang // lam ni rnyed par
8a2(1): 'gyur lags so// 'jigs che skyed mchog thogs pa yi// lcags kyi skyes pa gnyis mthong nas// de gnyis las ni gcig brdegs dang // lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so// 
8a3(1): srin po lcags kyi chu can zhig kha 'dzums gdang pa bgyid gzigs na// de tshe de'i dang bral ba la// phur pa dag gis gdab par mdzod// de bzhin khron pa klong dag khyil// drug cu'i
8a4(1): khru can la khyod mchongs// skra mig seng ge'i ltar ser zhing // mi zad bsnyen par dga' ba'i// gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dag/ gzhu ni bkang ste bsad mdzod la// chu srin 'dzin khris gang ba'i
8a5(1): chu bo mang po rgal mdzod cig nang ga phye ma lab gdungs dang // sna tshogs dud mo pa dang // sbrul can 'od ma can gyi klung // nang gnan ni srin mo khro// phye ma le ba dang mi ma yin// gdungs
8a6(1): pan ni 'dzin khri mang // sna tshogs can na 'dod sbyar gzugs// dud mor mi'am ci'i bran// dgod pa na ni mi 'am ci// gna' ma sbrum can sbrul can na// 'od ma can klung shal ma la// 
8a7(1): nang ga la ni brtan byar bya// phye ma la ba la rtul phor bya// gdung bar 'dzin khra bcing ngo // sna tshogs can du klu sna tshogs// dud mo can du yin bde bas// dgod byed du ni mi smra ba'i// 
8a8(1): sbyor ba'i kun tu brgal bar mdzad// sbrul can du ni sprul bdug gi/ sngags kyi sbyor dang 'od ma can// klung du mtshon rnon gda' ba'i// sbyor ba'i kun tu rgal ba'i mdzod// chu rnams
8b1(1): rgal nas bcad gnas ni// gnod sbyin lnga brgya yod pa de// rnams la sran tshugs gnom mdzod cig/ de nas ni mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang mchis so// zhes gsung zhig/ drang srong de
8b2(1): la yid 'phrog ma'i de skad ces smras nas// rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos btugs te song ngo // ci tsam na gzho nu nor bzangs kyi ri 'or de pha ba nas skyes khyer te glang po'i grong khyer du 'ongs
8b3(1): so// zhes rgyal pos thos nas// mchog tu dga' ba skyes so// de nas gnonu ngal sos nas pa'i drung du song ste/ phyag byas mdun du 'dug pa dang / rgyal pos mchog tu dga'
8b4(1): bar 'gyur ba'i gtam byas nas smras pa/ gnonu khyod bde bar 'ongs sam/ lha khyod kyi bka' drin gyis ra 'or babab ste ste'u bzung nas sna bo skos lags te dpyad dang skyes kyang
8b5(1): 'di dag lags kyis phyag mdzad du bzhug tu gsol// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu legs par byas kyis bzhes so// de nas gzhonus pa la phyag byas nas chas pa dang / rgyal
8b6(1): po'i smras pa/ gzhon skyes la lhan cig kho nar longs spyod kyis 'dug shig/ lha bdag gis yid 'asrog ma mthong nas yun ring du zhig legs pas mchi'o lags so// 
8b7(1): gzhon deng 'gro shol lo song song shig/ de gal chung zhing 'di skad ces smras so// ya ba nges par deng nyid bdag mchi lags so// rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de
8b8(1): nas ge no nu rang gi khyim du song bas// btsun mo pho brang gi sgo dpal kyang stong par mthong nas/ de sems khongs su chung bzhin du zhugs na/ yid 'phrog mo mthong nas snying
9a1(1): stor ste/ phan tshun du rgyu zhing / yid 'phrog ma zhes sgra byung ngo // ci tsam na btsun mo rnams tshogs nas/ btsun mo de rnams kyi gtam klur
9a2(1): bskur ba dang / de'i snying la gzug rngus zug pas yang nas yang du dris pas/ de rnams kyis ci ltar gyur pa smras so// de mya ngan las yid klong bar gyur te/ bud med de rnam
9a3(1): kyis smras pa/ lha btsun mo'i 'khor 'di ni/ de bas bud med shin tu khyad par 'phags pa dag mchis nas/ ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ des snying rje med cing byas pa chud
9a4(1): son pa thob nas ma'i drung du song ste/ rkang pa la gdugs nas smras pa/ yum yid bzhin yon tan ldan gyur cig/ gzugs mdzes phun sum tshogs pa yi/ yid 'phros
9a5(1): ma ni mi 'da' na// bdag gi yid 'phrog gang du mchis/ yid kyis rab tu rgyugs snyam na'ang// bdag gi yid ni kun tu rmongs// de dag bral bar gyur pa yis// 
9a6(1): snying ni shin tu gdugs pa nyid// bdag gi yid du che zhing yid 'phrog la// yid du 'thad cing yid la dga' ba yi// bdag nyid sdug bsngal 'di ni gang gnas mchi
9a7(1): des smras pa bu yid 'phrog ma sdug bsngal mi zad pa nyam nga bar gyur nas kho mos btang ngo // yum ji ltar gyur pa/ des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad rgyas par smras pa dang / 
9a8(1): des pa snying rje med cing byas pa mi bzo ba yin no zhes smras nas smras pa/ yum gung du mchis pa/ shul ni gang nas nges smras pa gang du yid 'phrog song ba yi/ lam
9b1(1): de ring drang srong dang / seng ge dag gis brtag brten cing / chos kyi rgyal po gnas pa yin/ de ying 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi bzad par nyams thag cing snying
9b2(1): rje'i skad du bla zhing smre sngags 'don pa/ yid bzhin yon tan ldan gyur pa'i// yid 'phrog ma ni mi 'da' na// zhes bya ba nas bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di ni gang nas 'ongs
9b3(1): zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin no// de nas mas smras pa/ bu btsur mo'i 'khor 'di ni de bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i bud med dge yod na/ ci'i phyir mya ngar byed
9b4(1): gzhon sa smras pa/ yum de ma rnyed par bdag dga' bar ga la 'gyur/ des de dbugs phyung yang 'on kyang mya ngan gyis gdungs nas de'i khungs tshol zhing phan tshun du btsal
9b5(1): bar brtsams te/ de'i blo skyes pa/ gang kho nas thob pa de nyid la re shig dri'o snyam nas des sngon pa spar le ba can gyi drung du song ste dris pa khyed kyis yid 'phrog ma gang nas
9b6(1): rnyed des smras pa/ ri bo che ge mo'i ngos la drang srong zhig gnas te/ de'i bsti gnas na tshangs pa 'du ba zhes bgyi ba'i rdzing mchis te/ der khrus la zhugs pa las/ drang
9b7(1): srong gi bstan nas rnyed do// des bsams pa/ da ni drang srong du song dang / de las khungs phyin par 'gyur ro snyam mo// rgyal pos gnon ni yid 'brog ma dang bral ba
9b8(1): shin tu yid blong ba'i gtam thos so// de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ gnonu khyod yid blong du ci yod/ da ni de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i chung ma sbyin no// des sna
10a1(1): pa/ yab bdag ni de ma lags pa'i tshis brang gi 'khor dang mchis par rngo mi thogs so// rgyal pos de la len du ma smras kyang ma zlogs so/ 
10a2(1): de nas rgyal pos grong khyer gyi sgo dang / ra ba'i khar ci nas kyang gzhon phyir mi tshor bar bya ba'i phyir skyes bu srungs mngag bkod do// de nas gzhonu ni mtshan thogs thag/ 
10a3(1): mi nyal bar gyur to// lnga po 'di dag ni mtshan mo cung zad nyal gyi phal cher mi nyal te/ lnga gang zhe na skyes bu bud med la chags pas sems bcings pa dang / bud med skyes
10a4(1): pa chags pa dang / srog chags dur ba dang / chom rkun pa'i rab bgo ba dang / dge slong brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// zhes gsungs so// de nas gzhonu 'di
10a5(1): snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag sgo nas song la rgyal po'i sgo srungs kyi srungs ma gtum po dag yod do// de rnams kyis bdag chad par gcod pa 'am/ srog dang bral bar byed
10a6(1): par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas kyang bdag srungs ma med pa'i lam nas 'gro po snyam du/ de mtshan mo langs te ud pa la sngon po'i rtsibs mgo bcings pa'i 'phreng ba rgyal mtshan la
10a7(1): btags nas gang nas gang na srungs ma'i mi med pa de nas babs pa na/ zla ba shar to// de nas des zla ba la bltas nas/ yid 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i smre sngags 'di lta bu
10a8(1): dag 'don par byed de/ zla nya rgyu skar rgyal po mtshan mo gsal mdzad kyi/ khyod kyi snar ma'i mig du sdug pa sde dpon bzang // bdag gi sdug pa ud pal lta bu'i mig
10b1(1): yid 'brog ces bgyi khyod kyis sbrengs gzigs lags sam/ zhes smras na/ sngon gyi dga' ba nyams su myong ba dran ning song ba las/ ri dgas ma nig mthong nas de la yang
10b2(1): smras pa/ kye ma ri dgas mo khyod rtsa chu lo ma za// khyod ni legs kyu bde spyod bdag ni rngon pa min// ri dgas mo ltar mig kyus rings pas gzugs bzang ba// bdag gi
10b3(1): yid 'phrog ces bya khyod gyis mthong gyur tam/ de de nas song ste phyogs gzhan du phyin pa dang / tshal me tog 'bras bus mdzes par byas pa'i snying po la bung ba dag longs spyod pa/ 
10b4(1): mthong nas/ de nas bung ba bzhin la smras pa/ sbrang rtsi'i bung ba ri bo blon thir lta bu'i mdog/ smyug ma'i dbugs dang pad+ma dag la gnas 'cha' ba/ skra'i cho gas ring kha dog
10b5(1): bung ba ltar gnag pa/ bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam// phyogs de nas kyang song ba dang / sbrul zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang smras pa/ kye ma
10b6(1): sbrul nag shing lo lta bur lce g.yo zhing / mig dang kha'i nang nas dud pa'i tshogs 'byin pa// khyod kyi gdug pa'i me dang 'dod chags mer mi tshungs/ bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya
10b7(1): khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/ de nas kyang phyogs gzhan zhig du son pa dang / tshal gzhan zhig na/ khu byug sgra 'byin pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang khu dbyug de la yang smras
10b8(1): pa/ kye ma khu dbyug tshal mchog ljon shing la gnas pa/ 'dab chags tshogs kyi rgyal po yid 'phrog pa/ ut+pal sngon po lta bur dri zhim mdzes pa'i mig/ bdag gi yid 'phro
11a1(1): ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam/ phyogs de nas kyang song ba dang / shing mya ngan tsha' zhes bya ba me tog thams cad rgyas pa zhig mthong nas/ 
11a2(1): ming gi rnam grangs bkra shis zhes brjod pa/ ljon pa rnams kyi rgyal po cher gyur pa// yid 'phrog mya ngan gyis ni glong ba dang / thal mo sbyar na khyod kyis mya ngan sengs/ de de ltar
11a3(1): yid blong bzhin rim gyis/ drang srong de'i bsti gnas su phyin nas des drang srong de la dul ba dang bcas pas phyag byas nas/ smras pa/ bzo 'phags gos su shing shun dang
11a4(1): ni g.yang bzhi rnams// rtsa ba myu gu rgyu ru bil ba ka bde gsol/ drang srong mgos bdud phyag 'tshal bdag gi yid 'phrog ma khyod kyis gzigs sam/ khyod kyis
11a5(1): bdag la myur du gsungs/ do nas drang srong des gnonu nor bzangs la/ byon pa legs so zhes bya ba dang / stan gting ba la stsogs pa sngar bya ba'i yang dag pa'i
11a6(1): dga' bar byas nas smras pa/ sprin ma 'jam pa'i sman btsugs mthon 'bring bzhin legs mthong na dga' ba'i gzugs 'chang ba/ bzhin ras zla ba nya 'dra ud
11a7(1): la sngon po lta bu'i mig de bdag gis mthong // dpon khyod bag rkyongs bzhugs te rtsa ba 'bras bu sna tshogs gsol mdzod cig slad kyis bde blag byin 'gyur 'di la
11a8(1): bdag gi yid la the tsom yongs ma mchis// smin ma bzangs mos 'di skad tshig smras te/ gzhonu khyod la sred pas bag mi bde/ nags khrod gnas pa 'ang
11b1(1): sdug bsngal chen po ste// gshegs par gyur na nges par bdag bzhag mthong // des sor thubargya 'di byin nas smras pa/ lam yangs la dgrod dka' bas nyon mongs
11b2(1): par 'gyur gyis sar log shig/ gal te bzlog kyang 'dug tu ma btum na/ de lam bstan dra'i rigs so// des yang 'di skad ces bstan te/ byang phyogs log
11b3(1): na ri nag po gsum yod do// de dag rgal ba dang / ri bor rgyal po gangs can zhes bya ba yod de phyogs de na/ sman 'di dag blangs par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ shin tu'o// 
11b4(1): ma 'dzag ces bya ba'i sman yod de/ de mar las bcos nas btung bar bya'o// des na skom pa dang bekres pa med cing dran pa dang mthu stobs 'phel bar gyur/ spre'u zhig
11b5(1): kyang bkri bar bya gsang sngags kyang bslab par bya// gzhu mda' dang bcas pa dang nor bu 'od dang ldan pa dang / dug gsod pa sman dug sel ba dang / lcags kyi phur pa gsu
11b6(1): dang ldan pa/ pi wang yang bcang bar bya'o// ri'i rgyal po gangs can gyi byang phyogs na/ ri'i phur pa'i rtse yod do// de nas lam chu sgra can dang / seng ge can dang / rgyud gci
11b7(1): pa dang / rdo rje can dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can dang / phur pa'i dbyibs dang / sa srung bu'i dbyibs dang / mi g.yo ba dang / rab grol lo// khyod kyis ri de
11b8(1): dag rgal dgos te/ de la ri bo seng ljang can la ni/ phu ba nas 'jug rgyud gcig pa dang / phur pa'i dbye bas la yang phug pas 'jug/ rdo rje can la ni bya'i rgyal pos 'jug
12a1(1): ste/ thabs 'di dag gis ri bo de rnams rgal bar bya'o// 'phrul 'khor ra gdong can dang / lug lta bu dang / skyes bu srin pos ser skya'i gzugs can
12a2(1): dag gzhom par bya'o// phug na sbrul kha chu'i rgyun chen po'i shugs kyis rgyug pa zhig mchis te/ de ni zho shas gzhom par bya'o// yang na sbrul ni nag po zhig/ phug na phyed 'jug
12a3(1): mthong nas ni// bdag gi slad du gzhu gdungs la// mda' yis bsnun te bsad par gyis// gang na lugs gnyis phan tshun nas// gdung bar byed pa mthong ba ni// de gnyis
12a4(1): ra re bcag mdzod dang // lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lagaso// 'jigs pa chen po mtshon thogs pa'i// lcags kyi skyes bu gnyis mthong nas/ de gnyis las gcig brdegs
12a5(1): pa dang // lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so// srin mo lcags kyi chu can zhig/ kha 'dzums mdangs pa bgyid gzigs nas// de'i tshe de'i dpral ba la// phur pa gang gis gdab
12a6(1): par mdzod// de bzhin khron pa glong khrag khyil// drug cu'i khru can la khyod chongs// skra mig seng ge ltar ser zhing // mi bzang bsnyen par dga' ba'i// gnod sbyin dang ni srin
12a7(1): po dag/ gzhu bkang ste ni bas mdzod la// chu srin 'dzin 'khris gang ba'i// chu bo mang po rgal mdzod cig/ nang ga phye ma leb gdungs dang // sna tshogs dud me rgod pa dang // sbrul
12a8(1): can 'od ma can gyi klung // nang gnan ni srin mo khros// phye ma leb gdung mi ma yin// gdugs pa na ni 'jim khri mang // sna tshogs can na 'dod dgur gzugs// dung mor mi
12b1(1): ci'i bran/ dgod pa na ni mi 'am ci// mnga' ma sbrul can na// 'dod ma can klung shal ma yi// mngag la ni bstan par bya// phye ma le ba la rdul 'phor bya// gdung bar 'dzin khrig
12b2(1): bcing ngo // sna tshogs can du klu sna tshogs// dud mi can du yid ni 'debs// dgod byed du ni mi smra ba'i// sbyor bar kun du rgal bar mdzod// sbrul can na ni sbrul gdug gi
12b3(1): sngags kyi sbyor dang 'od ma can// klung du mtshon rnon gdab pa'i// sbyor bas kun tu rgal bar mdzad/ chu bo rnams rgal nas gcan pa'i gnas na gnod sbyin lnga brgya yod pa de rnam
12b4(1): la sran tshugs te gzhom par mdzod cig/ de nas ni mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang mchis so// zhes gsungs shig/ de nas gzhon nor bzangs kyis ji skad bstan pa'i sman dang / 
12b5(1): gsang sngags dang / sman dug gyi sbyor ba rnams btsal ba'i phyir/ drang srong de'i rkang pa la lan mang du phyag byas nas song ngo // de nas des spre'u ma gtogs ji skad bstan pa thams
12b6(1): cad sta gon byas nas/ de nas de rnams khyer te yang drang srong de'i drung du song ba dang / des de la spre'u byin nas smras pa/ gnon 'bad pa 'dis ci bya// yid 'phrog ma ni ci zhig dgos/ 
12b7(1): khyod ni gcig pu grogs med pa// lus gdon za bar 'gyur gyis mthong / gnon nus smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag ni gded za bar mchi'o// ci'i slad du zhe na/ mkha' la zla ba rgyu
12b8(1): ba grogs shing bka' la mchis// mche ba'i mthu stobs ldan pa'i ririgs gtso bo dang // me yis nags sreg pa na grogs shig ga la mchis// bdag lta bu la grogs pa
13a1(1): / mthu ldan ci na ga 'tshal// kye ci rgya mtshor chur 'jug par mi bgyi'am// ci lags sbrul gyis zin ces gsol bar mi bgyi'am/ 
13a2(1): sems can srungs can gyi bsnyen brtson 'grus cher brtsams te// gal te 'bad de ma rung 'di la nges pa med// de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs yid 'phrog ma'i brten pa'i rnam
13a3(1): pa sna tshogs dbacas te/ rim gyis ri dang chu bo dang / phug dang g.yang sa las stsogs pa'i sman dang / gsang sngags dang / smon dang dug sel gyi sbyor bas rgyal bar byas nas/ 
13a4(1): mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i grong khyer dang / nye ba zhig du son pa dang / gno nus grong khyer dpal dang ldan pa/ bskyed mos tshal gyi tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / 
13a5(1): ldan pas mdzes par byas pa/ bya sna tshogs kyis snyan pa/ rdzing bu dang mtshe'u ring po dang gru bzhi dang / mi 'am ci mo rnams kyis bskor ba de la/ mi 'am ci mo rnams chu len du 'ongs
13a6(1): pa mthong nas de nas zho nu nor bzangs kyis de rnams la smras pa/ chu mang pos ci zhig bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i sras mo yid 'phrog ma zhes bgyi ba
13a7(1): zhig mchis te/ de mi lag tu son par gyur pas de'i mi'i dri shal ba legs so// zhi nu nor bzangs kyis dris pa/ ci bum pa 'di dag thams cad kyis dus gcig tu de'i steng nas
13a8(1): sngags sam/ 'on te rim gyis de rnams kyis smras pa/ rim gyis so// des bsams pa thabs 'di bzangs ste/ sor gdub kyi rgya 'di dgos bum pa gcig gi nang du
13b1(1): zhugs so snyam nas/ des mi'am ci mo gcig gis bum par mchor bar bcug nas/ mi 'am ci mo de la smras pa/ khyod kyis bum pa 'dis thog mar yid 'phrog mal khrus
13b2(1): byos shig/ des bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar 'di la dgos pa ci zhig yod par 'gyur ro// snyam nas/ de nas des bum pa de thog ma yid 'phrog ma'i spyi bor blugs pa
13b3(1): las ci tsam na sor gdub gyi rgya bar du lhung ba dang / yid 'phrog ma'i de 'phrigs so// de nas mi 'am ci mo la dris pa 'dir mi 'ga' zhig ma 'ongs sam/ des smras pa mchis
13b4(1): so// song la de dben pa zhig du zhog shig/ des de nang du khrid nas dben pa zhig go// de nas yid 'phrog ma'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ yab gal te bdag gi
13b5(1): khyim tha ba bgyid pa/ gnonu nor bzangs des mchis nas de la khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi/ des smras pa/ 'di ma yin te/ cir yang mi 'kho bas/ ngas de dum bu brgyar byas la phyogs
13b6(1): bzhir gtor te btang ngo // yid 'brog mas smras pa/ yab mir gyur pas 'dir ga la mchis/ bdag nyid de skad mchi bar gsal so// de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon
13b7(1): pa kun nas bkris dpa' bral te/ kun nas bkris pa dang / bral nas smras pa/ gal te gnonu de 'ongs nas/ ngas khyod rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la nor dang ye
13b8(1): byang mang po dang mi'am ci mo stong gis yongs su bskor te/ de la chung ma'i don du sbyin no// de nas yid 'phrog ma dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rab tu dga' bas/ 
14a1(1): \u0f7f/ gzhon nor bzangs lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la bstan to// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas/ gzhon
14a2(1): nu nor bzangs gzugs mdzes pa lta na sdug pa kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa mthong ngo // mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar tu gyur to// de nas de bgom par 'dod nas/ 
14a3(1): gser gyi dadong po bdun dang / shing ta la bdun dang / rnga bo che bdun dang / pha ge bdun btsugs so// gzhon nor bzangs ni byang chub sems dpa' yin la// byang chub sems
14a4(1): rnams ni bzo gnas dang / las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa yin no// lha rnams kyang de dag la bgegs med par bya ba'i brtson par byed do// de nas byang chub sems
14a5(1): sems dpa' gar dang klu dang pi wang dang / khar rnga dang / shin tu sgra snyan dang / pi wang rgyad gsum pa dang / rdza rnga la sogs pa lnga rnams kyis sgrubs pa'i sil snyan
14a6(1): rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra'i khyad par ni kun nas 'bud cing mi'am ci stong phrag du mas ni yongs su bskor nas/ ral gri ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dre bar thogs te/ 
14a7(1): mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mthong nas gser gyi sdong po'i drung du song nas chu shing la gcod pa bzhin du sdong po de dum bur bcod par brtsams te/ de nas de til gyi 'bru tsam
14a8(1): du blags so// mnga' ni shing ta la bdun dang / rnga bdun dang / phag bdun gtsang mar phyung ste/ ri bzhin du mi g.yo bar gnas so// de nas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha
14b1(1): rnams dang / mi 'am ci brgya stong phrag du mas/ a la la zhes ca co dang gna'i sgra chen po phyung ngo // mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas mthong nas shin du ngo mtshar du gyur to// 
14b2(1): de nas mi 'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma 'dra bar shes dag stong gi dbus su yid 'phrog mya ban ga nas/ gnon nor bzangs la smras pa/ gzhon nu tshur yid 'phro ga ma ngo shes par
14b3(1): bgyis shig/ de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis de ngo shes par bya ba'i phyir/ tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smras pa/ ji ltar khyod ni ljon pa'i bu yin la// kho bo'i sdug
14b4(1): pa yid 'phrog yin zhe na/ bden pa 'di yis myur ba kho nar ni/ yid 'phrog gom pas myur du 'gro bar shog/ de nas de de ma thag tu gom pas song ba dang / mi 'am ci rnams
14b5(1): kyis smras pa/ lha gzhon nor bzangs 'di ni stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa shin tu tshogs pa legs te/ yid 'phrog ma dang thag ring bas lags na/ ci'i
14b6(1): slad du 'di la tho ba tsam 'di la yid 'phrog ma stsol cig/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi'am ci'i tshogs kyis rjes su sngags pa dang / mi'am ci rnams kyi 'dun nas gzhon
14b7(1): nor bzangs la rjes su bkur bsti chen po byas/ yid 'phrog ma lha'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan te/ lag pa g.yon pas gser gyi bya ma bum lag pa g.yas par bzung nas
14b8(1): gzhonu nor bzangs kyi drung du song ste smras pa/ gzhon nu yid 'phrog ma 'di mi 'am ci mo stong gi yongs su bskor te kho bos khyod kyis chung ma'i phyir byin gyis/ mi rnams ni ngo bo
15a1(1): rtag pa ma yin gyis// ji ltar 'dir mdor cig/ yab bzag zhin 'tshal zhes gnon nor bzangs kyis/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa las mnyam
15a2(1): nas/ ma'am ci'i gnas kyi khang pa na yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig skyes pa med par sil snyan rnams kyi rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do// de dus gzhan
15a3(1): zhig na rang gi yul dran nas/ pha ma dang / bral ba la byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur nas/ yid 'phrog ma la smras pa/ pha ma dang bral ba las byung sdug bsngal
15a4(1): gyis non par gyur to// de nas yid 'phrog ma'i de ltar gyur pa bdag la rgyas par smras pas/ des smras pa gzhon nu dang ldan pa cig seng la mi rnams ni sla bar byed pa yin gyis// 
15a5(1): khyod kyi ba ga yod par gyis shig/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon phas nor bu dang / mu tig dang / gser la sogs pa mang du brdzangs te gtang nas/ de yid 'phrog ma dang / 
15a6(1): lhan cig tu steng gi nam mkha'i lam la/ mi 'am ci'i shugs kyis chas pa na/ rim gyis glang po'i khyim gi grong khyer du phyin to// de nas glang po'i khyim grong khyer rdo ba dang / gseg
15a7(1): ma dang / gyo mo rnams la nas/ can dan gyi chu chag chag btab/ dar gyi rgyan 'phyang dbyangs/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan btsugs/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por bshams/ me tog
15a8(1): rnam pa sna tshogs bkram ste dga' dga' ltar byas so// de nas gnon ma'i gtso bo stong phrag du ma'i yongs su bskor cing / yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig du glang po'i khyim gyi sbyor ba
15b1(1): grong khyer du zhugs so// de nas lam gyis dub pa'i ngal sos nas/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs ngag khyer te/ pha'i drung du song nas rgyal po'i stan gyi glo zhig du 'dug ste/ 
15b2(1): 'am ci'i grong khyer du song ba dang / 'ongs pa rnams rgyas par smras pa/ de nas rgyal po nar can gyis 'di ni shin tu stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnod pa can no zhes bya bar
15b3(1): rig nas/ rgyal por 'di dbang skur bas/ dbang bskur to/ gnon nor bzangs kyis bsams pa/ gang bdag yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tshogs pa dang / rgyal srid kyi dang
15b4(1): bskur ba thob par gyur pa 'di ni/ sngon byas pa'i rgyu khyad par gyis yin gyis/ ma la ra yang bdag gis sbyin pa dag ni btang / bsod nams ni bya'o snyam nas/ des glang po'i khyi
15b5(1): gyi grong khyer du/ lo bcu gnyis su gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas so// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gzhon nor bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa re/ gzhan zhig yin snyam
15b6(1): na/ khyod kyis de ltar me lha ste/ nga zhing de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rgyal po nor bzangs zhes bya bar gyur to// yid 'phrog ma'i phyir stobs dang
15b7(1): brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnod pa bstan nas/ lo bcu gnyis su gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa des nga bla na med pa'i byang chub ma thob mod kyi/ 'on kyang sbyin pa de
15b8(1): dang / brtson 'grus de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang
16a1(1): / dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa dag btang / bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po
16a2(1): sngon byung ba thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal gyi grong khyer na/ rgyal po thams cad kyi bzhes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / 
16a3(1): bde ba dang / le legs pa skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / khrag khrug dang / dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan
16a4(1): zhig na/ btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u gzugs bzung po mdzes pa lta na sdug pa/ pags pa gser 'dra ba mgo
16a5(1): gdugs lhar 'dug pa/ dpung pa ring ba dang / dpral ba'i dbyibs che ba smin ma 'jar ba/ sna'i gzengs mtho ba zhes bya ba nas gnas lnga la bya ba'i bar gor ma bzhin no// 
16a6(1): gnonu thams cad sgrol ba dang bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan pa dang / zhugs snying rje can bdag nyid chen po chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu
16a7(1): rnams la byams pa thams cad sbyin pa/ thams cad gtong ba/ chags pa med par gtong ba/ gtong ba chen po la zhugs pa yin no// de'i gtong ba chen po thos nas/ dpag
16a8(1): chad brgya nas kyang don du gnyer ba'i skye bo 'ong / thams cad kyang yid re ba rdzogs par byas gtong ngo // de nas re shig na/ byang chub sems dpa' shing rta dang / nor bu dang / 
16b1(1): gser dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya dang / lcags pa dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / in+d+ra nI las 'bar bar byas pa/ tsan+dan mchog gi snying po las bsgrubs pa/ seng ge dang
16b2(1): stag dang / gung gi pags pas g.yogs pa/ rta rlung gi shugs ltar 'gyogs pa/ gser dang dngul gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra khrol ba bzhi dang ldan pa mchog gi nang du zhugs nas
16b3(1): grong khyer dam pa nas bskyed mos tshal du mngon du song ngo // de nas bram ze bde byed dang / rigs byed kyi yan lag shes par kha gcig gis thams cad sgrol mngon du bsdu nas smras
16b4(1): pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig/ ya smras pa/ khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du/ thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags/ bram ze rnams la shing rta 'di/ 
16b5(1): khyod kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i rigs// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol// shing na de las myur du myur bar bab ste/ snying dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / 
16b6(1): rab tu dga' ba dang / bram ze de dag la shing rta de byin nas smras pa/ bdag gi ji ltar bram ze la// mchog tu dga' ba'i shing rta gtang // de bzhin bdag gis sring pa gsum/ 
16b7(1): btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog/ 'dul ba gzhi// / bam po bzhi bcu drug pa// / de nas dus
16b8(1): gzhan nigan/ glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba/ me tog ku mud ta dang / kha ba dang / dngul dang / sprin dkar po lta bu'i mdog can/ bdun legs par
17a1(1): gnas shing / rkang legs par gnas pa/ glang po ches bsrungs kyi bu ltar 'gying zhing 'gro ba/ rang bzhin gyi mtshon mchog gis brgyan pa/ 
17a2(1): mthong na bkra shis pa la gzhon nas shin tu sdug pa'i dran dang mdza' shes dang / g.yog rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing zla ba rgyu skar gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bzhin du/ 
17a3(1): sos ka'i dus la bab pas shing rnams mi tog kha 'bus shing / ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skyugs dang / khur byug dang / shang shar te'u sgra byin
17a4(1): pa'i nags tshal gyi sar song ba dang / de nas phyir rgol bas spang pa'i bram ze kha cig gzhonu thams cad sgrol gyi drung du rings par 'ongs nas/ rgyul sras gzhon khyod rgyal bar
17a5(1): gyur cig ces smras nas/ yang smras pa/ lha mir lhar bcas 'jig rten du/ khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags// khyod kyi glang po mchog 'di ni// bdag cag rnams la
17a6(1): ba'i rigs// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i mchog de las myur ba myur bar babs nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis
17a7(1): de dag la glang po chen po mchog de byin nas smras pa/ bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la/ ma chog tu dga' bas glang chen btang / de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/ gtang nas/ 
17a8(1): byang chub mchog reg shog/ rgyal ba thams cad bzhes gnyen gyis khyod kyis sras thams cad sgrol gyis/ glang po'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba/ phyir rgol bas spang ba'i
17b1(1): bram ze rnams la byin no zhes thos so// thos nas rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen tu zos 'khrugs nas gnon thams cad sgrol bkug ste/ smras pa/ gnon nu khyod nga'i yul
17b2(1): ma 'dug par song shig/ de nas gzhon thams cad sgrol pas spangs pa dang / bsams pa bdag gis byang chub kyi phyir 'bad par byas pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad rjes su
17b3(1): bzung ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi po tshe gos pas/ glang po cher po de yang bang ste/ debs khyim na gnas pas ni// ci nus par ni ston pa btang // bka' thub gnas su brten nas
17b4(1): nges pa mchog dag bya ba yin// bslangs nas mi sbyin zhes bya ba'i// tshig ni smra bar mi phod kyis// de bas bdag gi khyim spangs te// bka' gru ba gnas su rab tu 'gro/ byang chub
17b5(1): sems dpa' de ltar snying la mna' mtho bcad nas// chung ma rgyags sbyin ma'i drung du song ste// de dag rgyas par smras so// de nas rgyags sbyin ma'i thos ma thag tu sdug po dang bral ba'o
17b6(1): dgos pa'i snying gis/ thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' la spros pa/ rje'i sras gal te dewAn/ bdag kyang dka' thub kyi gnas su mchis ste/ bdag ni rje'i sras dang bral
17b7(1): nas skad cig tsam yang 'tsho bar rngom grogs lcags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nam mkha' zla ba'i stongs par gyung ba dang / ji ltar sa ni lo tog gi skyongs dang // pad+ma chu yis spangs
17b8(1): par gyur pa ltar// bud med khyim thab kyis stongs de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa'i smras pa/ bdag cag thar gdon mi za bar gyur te/ 'di ni 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin yin no// 
18a1(1): khyod ni za ba dang btung ba dang / mal cha dang / bgo ba mchog la goms pas shin tu skyid pa yin/ dka' thub kyi nags na ni rtsa ba ma gting bar
18a2(1): ninyal/ rtsa ba dang me tog 'bras bu za/ rtsa ba dang / zug rdo dang rtsa dang / tsher mas gang ba'i sa la rgyu/ yang dang yang du za cig pa la ni sten/ bdag nyid skye bo thams cad la ni
18a3(1): sten dgos// blo bur du 'ongs pa thams cad mchod pa la ni 'bad/ dgos la de na yang nga gdon mi za bar ci nus kyis sbyin pa gtong ste/ de la khyod kyis cung zad kyang mi 'gyod
18a4(1): par bya dgos so// de bas re shig da rung yang legs par soms shig/ rgyags sbyin mas smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag ngo thog gis rje su sgrub legs so// byang chub sems
18a5(1): dpas smras pa/ gal te de ltar na dam bcas pa de'i khyod kyis dran byos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song nas/ mgo' bos phyag byas te/ yab cig bdag gi
18a6(1): sbyin par glang chen stsal/ nongs pa gang lags bdag la bzod pa gsol/ bdag ni grong nas dgon par mchis lags kyis/ mi'i dbang po'i phyag mdzod stongs ma gyur/ 
18a7(1): de nas rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis dbugs kyis rnangs te skad 'dar 'dar por smras pa/ bu sbyin pa'i blor 'or la 'du ga cig/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 
18a8(1): sa ni ro dang bcas pa yang // gal te ldog par gyur gdor yis// sa bdag bdag ni sbyin pa la// sems ni ldog par mi bgyid do// zhes smras nas song ngo // dengs zu dang du
18b1(1): mo dang chung ma dang / lhan cig shing rta'i nang du zhugs te grong khyer dam pa de nas byung nas/ pho brang 'khor gyi mi mya ngan byed pa brgya stong rje su 'brang zhing song so// de nas mi zhig gis
18b2(1): ngu zhing spyi sngags 'dor pa'i sgra yang thos// skye bo'i tshogs chen po grong khyer gyi sgor byung ba yang mthong nas// mi zhig la dris pa/ kye nang rje skye bo'i tshogs chen pos cho ngas 'debs
18b3(1): pa 'di ci las gyur/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci mi shes sam/ 'di ltar mi'i dbang po nyid kyi glang po che ba bzang / brtan pa'i ngang tshul rab tu sbyin la dpa' ba 'di nas
18b4(1): spyugs// de ni bu dang chung ma mar bcas te/ nags mthar chas pa la/ pho brang 'khor rnams 'dus shing shin tu snying rjes cho nges 'debs/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer
18b5(1): dam pa de nas byung ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams la ci/ rings par mngon du song nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag slar dengs shig slar dengs shig/ 'di ltar shin tu yun ring po nas sdug pa
18b6(1): dang 'grogs pas yang 'jug du gdon mi za bar bral ba'i mtha' can du gyur te/ gnyen pa'i skye bo dang / grogs pa ni lam ka'i ngal bso ba'i sti gnas kyi shing dang 'dra bas gdon mi
18b7(1): ba bar sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten kun na skye bo dbang med de/ mdza' bo rnams dang 'bral bar gyur pas smras pa/ khyed kyis sa stengs 'bad pa
18b8(1): thams cad kyis/ zhi phyir blo gros mi g.yo brtan par gyis// de nas dpeg tshang gsum 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas bram ze zhig mngon du 'ongs te smras pa/ 
19a1(1): kye rgyal rigs gzhon bdag ni khyod kyi yon tan thos nas/ 'di nas dpag tshad gsum rgya tsam gyi yul nas 'dir mchis lags kyis khyod kyi shing
19a2(1): mchog 'dis bdag gang la 'bras bu mchis par bgyi rigs so// de nas rgyags sbyin ma bzod pa skyes nas/ tshig brlang po bram ze de la smras pa/ e ma'o na gas na'ang mi
19a3(1): dbang sras la slob pa dang / bram ze 'di ni shin tu rtse ba med pa'i blo// mau dbang sros po mi dbang dpal las nyams gyur pa/ 'di la 'di ni snying rje cig kyang mi skyes 'am/ 
19a4(1): byang chub sems dpa'i smras pa/ khyod kyi bram ze la ma skyo shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyugs sbyin ma gal te/ nor 'dod len pa 'di dag med gyur na/ kun sbyin med par mi gang
19a5(1): zhig gis sa steng byang chub ga la tho ba/ sbyin pa la sogs pha rol phyin drug tshul gyis yon tan mchog can gyi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kun khyen nyid mchog rtag
19a6(1): tu thob par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' bas yang / rta dang ldan pa'i shing rta de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa/ zam ze ser sna dri ma sel byed pa/ 
19a7(1): shing rta rab tu byin pa 'di yis 'dir// bdag ni drang srong che mchog gis bskor ba'i// za ge med chos kyi shing rta cher bskor shog/ de nas thams cad sgrol gyi snying rab tu dga'
19a8(1): bas shing rta'i mchog de yang bram ze la byin nas/ gnonu nag po phrag pa la khyer/ rgyags sbyin ma ni gzho nu ma dri ba can khyer nas/ dka' thub kyi nags logs su rma
19b1(1): pa dang / rim gyis dka' grub kyi gnas su phyin to// de nas thams cad sgrol bka' thub 'tshal der rang gi snying mgu byed pa'i brtul shugs blangs te gnas so// ji tsam na rgyag
19b2(1): sbyin ma rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu'i phyir dka' thub kyi gnas nas song ba dang / bram ze nig thams cad sgrol gyi drung du song nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon khyod rgyal bar gyur cig
19b3(1): bdag cag sgrol ba ma mchis pas/ spu shug lhan cig 'khyam bgyid na/ de'i don du byis pa gnyis/ khyod kyis bdag la byin pa'i rigs/ de skad ces smras pa dang / de nas
19b4(1): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol bu sdug pa btong ba la/ cung zhig sems shing 'dug pa dang / de nas bram ze des byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ kye rgyal
19b5(1): rigs gzhon bdag gis khyod kyis thams cad ster ba'o// zhes thos na 'di ltar khyod la bdag gis bslangs pa de la/ ci zhig dbang du yod de khyod ni kun ster snying rje'i bdag nyid
19b6(1): can du sa stengs grags/ ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du/ khyod kyis rtag tu bya ba'i rigs/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems thams cad sgrol gyis/ bram ze de
19b7(1): la smras/ kye bram ze chen po// rang gi srog ni gtong ba la'am// lan 'ga' dpyod pa ma myong na/ rang gi bu ni btang ba la/ bdag blo gzhan du gyur ci smras/ bram ze re lta
19b8(1): mod kyi/ bdag gi nags su skyed pa skyed pa'i/ bus pa 'di gnyis yongs spangs na// ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa// 'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mo// gzhon shin tu
20a1(1): gartse med pas// bus pa btang la bdag min zhes/ kha cig bdag la phyar 'ongs kyis/ bram ze bdag ni khrid na legs// de nas zam
20a2(1): ze des thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes/ sa 'di thams cad du yon tan grags pa/ srog chags thams cad la snying / 
20a3(1): brtse bas byams par zhugs pa sbyin pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti spos kyi glang po lta bu/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang blo bur ba'i skye bo la mchod pa byed pa/ 
20a4(1): skye bo bkren pa dang 'phongs pa dang / mgon med pa dang / lhogs pa yongs su sdud pa/ thams cad kyi yid la re ba med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ mthong mngon yod
20a5(1): khyod kyis bdag 'ongs pa nom pa med pa'am/ lam gyi dub pa 'bras bu med pa'am/ mthong ba don med pa 'am/ re ba dang yun ring po nas brnag pa brnag pa'i 'bras bu med
20a6(1): par bya ba gang yin pa de ni cha ma yin te/ khyod kyis med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gis/ kho bo'i yid la re ba kun tu rtog pa'i rta btab na myur ldog par 'gyur ro// de bas na khyod
20a7(1): kyis bdag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas nas btab pa rigs so// ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu gter gos su gyom ning gza' mig mtshungs med pa/ ri bo cho ga
20a8(1): rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ri sdong can// grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa la stsal byas kyang / mched bzang khyod dang tshungs par gtong phong yod ma yin// de rnams byang chub
20b1(1): sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis/ bram ze'i tshig de thos nas/ bu la chags pa slong bas 'di dag sems par byed de/ gal te re shig pu gnyis so// bram ze
20b2(1): 'di la byin na ni/ bral ba las byung ba sdug bsngal dag bdag dang rgyags sbyin thob par 'gyur/ 'on te 'dil ma byin na// brtul shugs las kyang nyams 'gyur
20b3(1): zhing / bram ze 'di ni ci bcad de// ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'gro// gnyis na bu bran nyam thag pa'i// mya ngan sa steng bdag gi blang // de bzhin ma byas dam bcas pa// 
20b4(1): zhig cing brtul shugs nyams par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis sdug pa'i bu gnyis nges par btang bar chad nas smras pa/ kye kho bos/ 
20b5(1): bka' spyad brgya yis 'jig rten sdug bsngal gyi// rgya mtsho chen po so sor 'jigs par byed// gti mi dpogs par rab tu bying ba dag/ pha rol rgal phyir lam gyi zam
20b6(1): stegs bca'// zla ba dri med nye ba'i bzhin ras can// ma zhum kha nas de skad tshig smras nas// mchi ma brlan chus mig ni gong gyur pa'i// byis pa gnyis po bram ze byin
20b7(1): yang smras// bu 'di byin pa'i 'bras bu ni// rgya chen bdag gis thob gyur nas// des ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las// 'jig rten rnams ni bsgral bar bya// byis pa gnan
20b8(1): ngag byin ma thag tus 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos pa des/ nags tshal den gnas pa'i dka' thub can rnams spangs nas phan tshun sbas pa/ sa ni mi bzang g.yos gyur pa/ 
21a1(1): @##/ 'di ni su'i mthu 'dra ba// shin tu gsal bar shes par bya// de na gnas 'dzag dang / rus gcig pa rgan po thub can ltas shes pa mkhas pa gzhan zhig ma
21a2(1): pa des/ drang srong de rnams la don de go bar byas pa/ sa ni mi bzad g.yos gyur pa// 'di ni sa'i mthu ltas yin// gang gi mthu ni 'di 'dra ba// shin tu gsal bar ngas bshad bya// de na gnas 'dzag dang rus gcig
21a3(1): pa rgan po thub can ltas shes pa la// mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod pa des/ drang srong de rnams don dgo bar byas pa/ gdon mi za bar dka' thub kyi gnas na 'dug pa'i bu byis pa 'bras dang / 
21a4(1): chu mthu ba yid du 'ong ba dang / mig du sdug par byed pa gnyis/ thams cad stsol gyis skye bo sdug bsngal gyis nyams thag pa yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir spangs te/ de nas g.yos
21a5(1): par gyur to// de nas byis pa gzhon nu de gnyis kyi phas snying nas yongs su gtang ba'i blo rigs nas/ snying rje skad du ngu zhing thal mo gnyis sbyar nas/ thams cad
21a6(1): sgrol gyi rkang pa gnyis la btugs te smras pa/ yab cig yum ni ma mchis par/ khyod ni bdag cag stug bzhed pa// re shig de ni mthong gyur nas/ 
21a7(1): des bdag cag sbal du gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid la bcags pa'i sdug bsngal gyis ngoms bzang gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag bzhin pas de gnyis
21a8(1): 'khrung nas smras pa/ bu dag di'i steng du mi sdug min// steng rje snying rje med min te// 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir// yon tan mthong nas gtang
21b1(1): ba yin/ ce nas nga yis byang chub la tsha// / ne ba rang gis thab nas ni// sdug bsngal rgyal tshal gnas pa'i// rten med 'jig rten rnams bskal lo// 
21b2(1): de nas byis pa gzhon nu de dag gis pas snying nas yongs su gtang ba'i blo rigs nas/ ba'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas snying rje rje skad du sra phab pa'i
21b3(1): tshig gis dal gyis smras pa// gal te khyod kyis thag bkum nas// mal bdag cag gnyis kyis phyin// khyod kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces// yab cig khyod
21b4(1): kyis gsung du gsol// yab gzhan yang byis par gyur pas blan med pa khyod la nongs pa bgyis pa gang // gal te la lar thugs la mi 'bab tshig 'ga' sbas pa 'am/ 
21b5(1): gus par ma na par yongs su gnyis pa nyid du bgyis// de ni byis pa'i nongs pa lags zhes bzod nga mdzad da gas pa// de sad ces smras nas/ pal phyag 'tshal nyel na
21b6(1): gsum du bskor ba byas nas// mig mchi mas gang bzhin ma la sbas par yid la chags pas yang dang yang phyir lta zhing bsti gnas de nas byung ste song ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa'
21b7(1): sems dpa' byis pa gzhon nu'i tshig shin tu snying rjer rung ba de dag gis snying po blang nas/ yid kyi byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/ dka' thub
21b8(1): kyi tshal gyi la ma'i skyil bur zhugs sa/ bris pa gan nu dag dang mthag tu
23a1(1): nas/ byis pa de gnyis de la byin// de dag rjes yi rangs rigs// de skad ces smras pa dang // rgyags sbyin ma ri dgas mo// 
23a2(1): dug can gyis phog pa bzhin du sa la sgyel nas// nya chu'i nang nas phyung ba bzhin de ni 'gre ldog par byed/ krung krung bu stor ba bzhin du ni snying rje rje skad du du/ ba be'u shi
23a3(1): ba bzhin du ni 'ba' sgra sna tshogs mthon cing smras pa/ pad+ma gno nu lta bu'i byang ba can// lag pa pad+ma 'dab ltar gzhon sha can// bdag gi bu gnyis sdug bsngal ma
23a4(1): myong ba// 'gro ba gang du song nas sdug bsngal gyur// ri dgas lta bur drang zhing ri dwags mig/ ri dgas lhan cig bsti gnas dga' dga' na// de ring bdag gi bu
23a5(1): gnyis ji lta bu/ gzhan gyi dbang gis skye zhing sdug bsngal gyur// mig ni mchi mas gang ba'i mig gis ni// snying rjes du ba'i shin tu sdug bsngal ba// de ring
23a6(1): bdag gis legs par mthong bas na// skye bo bsnyen pa'i nang nas sdug pa'i mtsho// de gnyis bdag gi pang nas bskyed bskyed pa'i// zas su rtsa ba me tog 'bras
23a7(1): bu za// bzod dang gnas pas bla mar rtag dga' ba// bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo// de gnyis me dang nye du bral ba dang // rtsa lag rnams
23a8(1): kyis gzu lum spangs pa las// skye bo sdig can ngan dang phrad gyur nas/ bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo// skom zhing bkres pas bdag nyid rtag gdungs
23b1(1): na/ de gnyis su yid dbang gis 'gro bar 'gyur// bran du gyur par gdon mi za bar ni// de gnyis nyam thag sdug bsngal yongasu gzir// bdag gis nges par
23b2(1): tsher ma'i gzhan dag tu// srog chags sdug pa brgyad dang bral ba yi// sdig las shin tu mi bzang 'dir byas pa// des na ba be'u med bzhin cho nges 'debs// 
23b3(1): bden tshig gang gis bdag ni rtag tu yang // sems can kun la yid ches mnyam gyur pa// bden tshig des ni bdag gi bu gnyis po// bran du gyur pa la/ 
23b4(1): ni thar par shog/ rgyags sbyin mas byis pa gzhon nu de dag gis bskyed cing bsrungs pa'i shing gang yin pa de dag lo ma thib po 'dug par mthong nas/ snying du sdug
23b5(1): nas khyud smras pa/ byis pas bil ba chung ngus chus cus pa// lo ma rnams las thigs 'dzag pa yi/ ljon shing rnams ni sems dang bcas pa bzhin/ byis pa
23b6(1): nu zho ma blud lta bur yang / byis pa gzhonu de gnyis dang rtse rtse ba'i ri dgas kyi phru gu bsti gnas nas 'dug pa rnams mthong nas mi dga' ste/ snying rje rje skad kyi tshig gis dal bu
23b7(1): smras pa/ de'i ne'u li thong nas 'dod pa gang / gnasu sa tshigs ma tshon cing tshol byed par / rigs phru gu rgyu ba 'di dag kyang / bdag gi sdug bsngal mi chung gzhan yin no// 
23b8(1): de nas bus byis pa gno nu dag lam gang nas dong ba'i lam der rjes bcad pa dang / byis pa gzhonu de gnyis kyi rjes drang por ma byung gyi gya gyus gang bar mthong nas/ lhag par
25a1(1): ma byed cing / dam chos dga' bar 'dod dam// de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol snying rje dang ldan pa'i snying gis/ rgyag
25a2(1): sbyin ma las rtag par brtsams pa dang / de nas rgyags sbyin mas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ bdag nyid bdag la g.yar ngan med// de bzhin bdag la lham lags// 
25a3(1): gcig pu ci ltar bzhugs 'gyur zhes// de ltar khyod sred g.yar ngan bgyid// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/ go 'phangs mi zad mya ngan med pa
25a4(1): tshogs bdag la// sa stengs 'dir ni rgyags sbyin mya ngan bya mi dgos/ khyod ni mya ngan med par bram ze'i rjes su 'brongs// bdag ni ri dgas 'chi ba bzhin du bsti gnas
25a5(1): then// de skad ces smras nas/ dga' ba dang mgu ba dang / yid rab tu dga' bas bsams pa/ sbyin pa 'di ni nags tshal 'dir// bdag gi sbyin pa tha ma yin/ 
25a6(1): bdag gi sbyin pa tha ma yin// rgyags sbyin 'di yang yongs btang nas// yongs su bzung ba med par 'gyur// snyam du rig nas/ rgyags sbyin ma lag pa nas bzung
25a7(1): ste/ bram ze de la smras pa/ bdag gi mchis 'brang sdug pa 'di// snying nas snying nye bsgo ba nyan// ya rabs tshul tsan snyan par smra// bram ze'i mchog khyod pa zhes
25a8(1): sugs so// de nas mche ba bzang po'i/ chung ma byang chub 'dod phyir bdang // tshul gruni ji lta bar// sa ni rnam pa drug tu g.yas// de nas rgyags sbyin ma bram zeg
25b1(1): dbang du gyur te/ khyod dang bu dang bu mo dang // bral ba'i sdug bsngal nyams thag nas// dbugs pa rtsegs pas sgra sngar po// sngags bzhin 'di skad ces smras so// bdag
25b2(1): gis tshe rabs snga ma la// ji 'dra ba'i las ngan byas// de nas babe'u shi ba bzhin// skye bo med pa'i nags nang du// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i cha byang
25b3(1): mi snang bar byas te/ rang bzhin gyi cha byad du byas/ rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/ skal bzang bdag ni bram ze ma yin mi yang ma yin gyis// bdag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin
25b4(1): lha min 'joms byed de/ khyod kyi 'dul ba mchog tu gyur pa 'di yis bdag mgu yis// bdag las dam pa gang zhig 'dod pa de 'dir smra bar bgyi/ de nas de'i tshig gi
25b5(1): rgyags sbyin ma yid bde ba skyes nas// rgya byin la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ sbyar stong ldan pa bdag gi bu// bran gyur pa las mthar mdzad cing // mes ma'i
25b6(1): drung du phyin par yang / sum cu rtsa sum bdag pos mdzad// de skad ces smras nas/ yang dbang po chen po bsti gnas su zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste
25b7(1): rgyags spyir ma lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ bdag gis khyod la rgyags sbyin 'di// g.yog gi phyir ni sbyin par byas/ khyod kyi
25b8(1): sula'angam byin cig/ zhag pa byin na smad par 'gyur// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin gyis/ bram ze khye'u dang bu mo khyer ba de/ ji ltar grong khyer gnang yin no snyam nas
29a1(1): / par ni sbyin pa dang / 'on te gnas su song na ni/ nges pa yi ni mchog bya'o// yab gal te sbyin pa dag btang / bsod nams dag ni bgyir
29a2(1): ma mchis na/ dka' thub gi gnas su brten par bgyi'o// gzhon de bzhin du bgyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyags sbyin ma'i drug du song ste smras pa/ rgyags sbyin ma bdag
29a3(1): ni dka' thub kyi nag su phyin gyis/ khyod khyim na bag yod pas gnas shig/ des smras pa rje'i sras dang thabs gcig tu dka' thub kyi nags su gnas par bgyi'o// rgyags sbyin ma byang
29a4(1): chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa la dga' bas/ gal te khyod 'ga' zhig spang na sbyin par 'gyur ro// rje'i sras gal te khyod kyis btang na sul du gsol/ byang chub sems dpas smras/ 
29a5(1): pa/ khyod kyis dam bcas pa 'di dran par byos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ba'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te smras pa/ yab cig bdag gis sbyin skad glang chen btang / 
29a6(1): nongs pa gang byas pa bdag bzod par gsol/ bdag gis grong nas dgon par mchis lags kyis/ mi dbang khyed kyis phyag mdzod stongs ma gyur// de nas rgyal po bu dang
29a7(1): bral ba'i blas mchims brnags nas smras pa/ bu sbyin dang / dka' thub kyi nags su glo gros 'di zhig shig/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sa ni ri dang bcas par
29b1(1): yang / gal te ldog par 'gyur mda' yi/ sa bdag bdag ni sbyin pa las/ sems ni ldog par mi 'gyur ro// zhes smras nas/ song ste byang chub sems dpa' bu dang / 
29b2(1): bu mo dang chung ma dang / lha cig shing rta mchog gi nang du zhugs nas dka' thub kyi nags su chas so// de nas bram ze'i rigs byed de/ rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis thams cad
29b3(1): sgrol stsal nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gnas gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig/ khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du/ thams cad gtong shes rnam par grags/ bram ze dag la shing rta 'di/ 
29b4(1): khyod kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i rigs/ de skad ces smras pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de de/ las babs nas dga' ba dang 'gu ba dang rab tu dga'i snying gis/ brab
29b5(1): ze de dag la shing rta'i cho ga de stan nas smras pa/ ji ltar bdag rab dga' bas deng / bram ze rnams la shing rta btang / de bzhin bdag gis srid bsum/ btang byang
29b6(1): chub mchog reg shog/ rta la zhen nas/ rgyags sbyid dang lhan cig dong ba dang / de nas bram ze rigs byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis/ thams cad sgrol ba sus
29b7(1): nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig/ khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du/ thams cad btong nas rnam par grags/ khyod kyis sbyin par btang ba'i rig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub dab 'tha
30a1(1): cad sgrol rta las babs nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i snying gis bram ze de rnams la lan smras pa/ ji ltar bdag rab tu
30a2(1): dga' bas dang // bram ze rnams la rta btang ba// de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum// btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ni nag po khrid
30a3(1): rgyags sbyin ma'i ni dra ba can khrid de rkang pas dong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gangs ri'i sul/ me tog dang 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum pa zhig tu song song ste/ byang chub sem
30a4(1): dpa' ni bsam gtan byed do// rgyags sbyin ma ni 'bras bus snyen bkur byed do// ri 'or gzhan zhig na bram ze zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs ste/ de de
30a5(1): dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyo bar byed de/ de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u mtshan dang ldan pa zhig btsas
30a6(1): pa/ ngan to rare zhes sgra byin pas/ de'i ming ngan tor zhes bya gyur to// ri 'or gzhan zhig na bram ze rigs byed bzhi shes bya ba zhig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs
30a7(1): te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod pa las/ ci tsam na bu mo bzang mo mdzes palta na sdug pa zhig bcas ces/ bsrings bskyed chen mor
30a8(1): gyur ba dang / bram ze des bdag gi bu mo 'di byang gzugs sam/ rigs sam/ bze'i 'am nor gyi phyir ni sul yang mi sbyin no// 'on kyang su zhig bdag las rig byed pa ni
30b1(1): glog pa zhig yod na/ bdag gis de la 'di sbyin par bya'o// zhes dam bca' byas so// de nas ngan to res gsang tshig 'chol bas smras pa/ mkhan po'i na pas la bkur sti
30b2(1): bgyid par 'tshal lags so// ci'i phyir rigs byed glag pa'i slad du'o// de bzhin du bgyis shig/ de de nas rig byed klag par brtsams pa las/ de yid gzungs pa'i rang bzhin
30b3(1): can ni g.yin pas/ des ring por ma lor par rig byed rnam pa bani la byang chub par gyur to// bram ze khye'u bdag gi bu mo 'di rigs sam/ zhes bya bar rgyas par sbyar te/ bram ze khye
30b4(1): 'dis bdag las rig byed byang bar byas pa yin no// 'di mtshan ngan pa bco brgyad dang ldan te/ gal te 'dis bu mo ma 'dod na ni legs so snyam nas/ des de la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u
30b5(1): bdag gis bu mo 'di/ byad gzugs sam/ rigs sam/ bzo'i 'am nor gyi phyir ni su'i yin mi sbyin te/ 'on kyang su zhig bdag las rigs pa ni klog pa zhig yod na/ bdag gis
30b6(1): de la 'di sbyin par bya'o// zhes dam bcas pa las/ bdag las khyod kyi rig byed bzhi byang bar byas pa/ khyod bu mo 'di chung mar byin no// des smras pa/ bkra shis par gyur cig
30b7(1): blang bar bgyi'o// zhes des de la dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar btang nas smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u chung ma khrid la rang gi khyim du song shig/ des chung ma de khrid de rang gi khyim du song
30b8(1): ba dang / des de la smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag ni shin tu bzhon pas las bgyid rngo mi thog gis/ bdag la bgol ba stsol cig/ des de la smras pa/ bzang mo kho bo la bgol ba ga la yod
31a1(1): des smras pa/ rje'i sras thams cad ces bgyi ba'i grong rdal na/ rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba sras thams cad sgrol zhes
31a2(1): bgyi ba de gang cung zad ci slong ba de thams cad stsal cing // de la bdag gi bgol ba slongs shig/ bzang mo gal te de lta na lhan cig tu 'dong ngo // de nas ngan to re thams cad
31a3(1): sgrol gyi grong rdal du phyin nas dris pa/ gnon thams cad sgrol gang na/ de dag gis smras pa/ dka' thub kyi nags na gnas so// / 'dul ba ga ni
31a4(1): bam po bzhi bcu bdun pa/ de nas ngan to'i chung ma dang / lhan cig dka' thub kyi nags su song ste/ de'i tshe rgyags sbyin ma tog
31a5(1): rang 'bras bu'i phyir song ngo // de nas bram ze ngan te re rgyags sbyin me tog dang / 'bras bu'i phyir song ngo // de nas bram ze ngan tog dang / 'bras bu'i phyir song ba dang / thams
31a6(1): cad sgrol gyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa dang / chu gter gos su gyom ning gza' mig mtshungs med pa/ ri bo mchog rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ri stod can/ grong khyer grong rdal bcas
31a7(1): pa'i sel btsal byas kyang / mche bzang khyod dang mtshungs par gtong po ma sbyin// bdag cag bkod pa ma mchis pas/ spang shugs lhan cig 'khyam bgyid na/ 
31a8(1): khyod kyis rje su rtsi bgyis te/ bdag la bkod ba stsal ba'i rigs// kho bo la bkod pa gal yong/ de dang bcang mi ring ba zhig na/ nag po dra ba can rtse zhing 'dug pa dang / 
31b1(1): des smras pa/ byis pa gnon 'o ni dag byin cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' bu sdug pa yongs su gtong ba la/ yud tsam zhig sems
31b2(1): par gyur to// de nas bram ze des thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu kho bos khyod thams cad gtong ba'o zhes thos nas/ de'i phyir kho bos
31b3(1): khyod la slong na 'di la khyod kyis dpyad du ci zhig yod/ snying rje yi ni bdag nyid khyod// thams cad gtong bar sa stengs grags/ ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du/ 
31b4(1): khyod kyis sa srengs bya ba'i rigs/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bram ze de la 'di skad ces smras so// rang gi srog ni gtong ba la 'ang / 
31b5(1): bdag gis res 'ga' yang ma spyad na// rang gi bu ni btang la/ bdag blo gzhan gyur smos ci dgos// bram ze chen po de lta mod kyi/ bdag gis nags su
31b6(1): bskyed bskyed pa'i/ bu ca 'di gnyis yongs spangs na// ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa/ 'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mod/ gnon shin tu brtse med pas/ bus
31b7(1): pa btang la bdag min zhes/ kha cig bdag la phyir 'ong gis// bram ze bdag ni khrid na lags/ de nas bram ze des/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces
31b8(1): sbas so// kye rgyal ba'i rigs gzhon nu rgyal po'i rigs su skyes pa// sa 'di thams cad du yon tan grags pa/ srog chags thams cad la snying rtse ba'o// 
32a1(1): byams par zhugs pa/ sbyin pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur bsti spos kyi glang po lta bu dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rma
32a2(1): bur ba dang / skye bo bla ma la mchod pa/ bkren pa dang mgon med pa dang / 'phongs pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa/ thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed
32a3(1): pa mthong ni don yod pa khyod kyis/ bdag 'ongs pa nom pa med pa 'am/ lam gyis dub pa'am/ 'bras bu med pa 'am lam mthong ba don med pa 'am/ 
32a4(1): re ba dang yun ring po nas brnag pa brnag pa'i 'dod pa/ 'bru 'bras med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni cha ma yin te/ khyod kyi med do// zhes bya ba'i tshig
32a5(1): gyi kho bo yid la re ba kun tu rtog pa'i rta bta ba na myur du ldeg par 'gyur ro// de bas na khyod kyis bdag gir re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ btang ba'i rigs so// 
32a6(1): byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bram ze gal te de ltar na yongs su btang ngo // bus pa gzhon dag btang ma thag tu stong sum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam
32a7(1): pa drug bcu g.yos so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin gyis bsams pa/ rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam nas
32a8(1): sang gi mo zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur te/ lam bkag nas 'dug pa dang / de nas rgyags sbyin ma'i smras pa/ ringadags rgyal ba'i chung ma sreg skrag ma/ khyod ci
32b1(1): lam ba kag 'dug par byed/ gal te bdag ni mi 'phyo bden zhe na/ lam las zung de myur du 'gro bar gyis/ khyod kyang ridags rgyal po'i chung ma la/ bdag kyang mi'i dpa
32b2(1): lo seng ge yi/ btsun ma yin pas chos kyis spun gyur gyis/ ridags rgyal po'i chung mis bdag lam phye/ de skad ces smras pa dang / ridags kyi rgyal me de lam de nas
32b3(1): logs shig tu song ngo // de nas rgyags sbyin ma bsti gnas gang nas pa der song ba dang / nag po dang dra ba can gang na yang ma mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste
32b4(1): smras pa/ rjes sras bus pa gzhon gnyis gang na mchis/ byang chub sems dpa'i smras pa/ kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig/ re bas yang dag 'ongs gyur nas// bus pa
32b5(1): de gnyis de la byin// de dag rje su yid rang rigs/ de brgyal nas sa la 'gyel pa dang // de la chu mang pos btang nas rtas ste smras pa/ rje'i sras bus pa gzhonu dka'
32b6(1): grub kyi nags nas bskrun pa bde ba'i bdag nyid can de dag khyod kyis ci'i slad du yongs su spangs/ de nas byang chub sems dpas rang gi lus las gla gos phung de rgyags sbyin
32b7(1): ma la smras pa/ cing gnyis la byams pa med snga ma 'am/ nga 'i ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas gas te/ khrag byung ba la ltos/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis
32b8(1): bsams pa/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa la dga' bas/ gal te 'ga' zhig gis rgyags sbyin ma bslangs te/ de la de byin na/ g.yog
34a1(1): dus na// rgyal po thams cad sgyum nas bya bar gyur pa gang gis bu dang rlung ma yongs su gtang ba / gzhan nig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi ldan/ 
34a2(1): 'on kyang nga zhing de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya ba der gyur pa to// des den bu dang chung ma yongs su btang ngo // rgyal po ngas bu dang chung ma yongs su btang bas des bla na med pa
34a3(1): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob po snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/ 'on kyang sbyin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no// 
34a4(1): rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba
34a5(1): wA ra Na si zhes bya ba'i grong khyer du/ rgyal po tshangs pa sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de/ 'byor pa rgyas pa dang / zhes bya ba nas/ chos bzhin gyi rgyal srid byed do// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 
34a6(1): tsa tsam na las mkhan dag gis/ wA ra Na sir lo bcu gnyis su char me babs so zhes lung bstan to// de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis rang gi yul du dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ nga'i yul na gnas
34a7(1): pa'i shes ldan grong khyer bdag non cig/ lhas mkhan dag gi sAlo bcu gnyis su char mo bab par lung bstan gyis/ khyed cig las gang dgal lo bcu gnyis smra bzang ba med pa de rnams na
34a8(1): 'dug shig/ gzhan rnams ni bza' ba dang bdung ba ma nga'i yul du dang shig/ le legs par gyur pa dang / sngar yang zhugs shig da'i tshe wAr Sha so grong khyer khyim bdag dum byed ces
34b1(1): bya ba/ phyag pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba/ yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas so// 
34b2(1): des mngon par bkug ste smras pa/ kye nang rje bang ba bdag 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas pa lo bcu gnyis kyi rgyags grub pa yod dam/ 'on te med/ des smras pa/ jo bo mchis so// 
34b3(1): nas khyim bdag dum byed 'khor dang bcas pa'i ni 'dug go// skye bo'i tshogs gzhan ni/ bza' ba dang btung ba med pa'i yul du dong ngo // / sangs rgyas 'byung ba med
34b4(1): pa na/ 'jig rten du sangs rgyas dman pa dang rdal ba la snying brtse ba can/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon nas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ ci tsam
34b5(1): na wA ra NA si'i de'i phyogs gcig du rang sangs rgyas lnga rgya gnas so// phyogs gzhan nig du yang rangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas so// phyogs der sangs rgyas lnga rgya po dag snga dronam thabs
34b6(1): bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ khyim bdag 'dum byed gang na ba der song ste/ lhags pa dang khyimo 'dum byed la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag khyod gyis rab tu
34b7(1): byung ba lnga brgya la lo bcu gnyis su bsod snyoms 'bul nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag re shig mngal la rma ste/ bgyi'o// des man kug ste smras pa/ kye nang rje
34b8(1): bdag la khar dang bcas pa dang / rab tu byung ba lnga brgya pa 'o rnams kyi lo bcu gnyis kyi rgyas thub par med dam/ des smras pa/ rje bo mchis so// de nas rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya
35a1(1): po de rnams la mkhas blangs so// ci tsam na phyi dro'i dus su rang sangs rgyas lnga rgya po gzhan yang lhags nas khyim bdag 'dum byed la khyim bdag ra
35a2(1): sangs rgyas lnga rgya po 'di dag la khyod kyis lo bcu gnyis su bsod snyoms dbul bar nus sam/ zhes bslangs pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed bdag la g.yar gyis
35a3(1): blangs pa lags nas/ yangs bslangs ci 'tshal/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag de dag kyang gzhan la/ bdag kyang gzhan yin no// des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag
35a4(1): gal te de ltar/ re shig mngan la rmas te/ bgyi'o// des mngan bkug nas smras pa/ kye ma nang rje bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rab tu byung ba stong gi lo bcu gnyis kyi rgyags
35a5(1): grub par yod dam des smras pa/ jo bo mchis so// de nas khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de rnams la mkhas blangs nas/ zhus pa/ khyed cag gi dus gang lags/ de rnam
35a6(1): kyis smras pa/ gung tshigs ma yol ba'o// de nas khyim bdag 'dum byed kyis/ sbyin pa'i khang pa brtsigs nas sbyin pa'i zhal ta pa'i ming dag kyang skos/ dus chod
35a7(1): brjod pa dag bskos te des nyi ma re re zhing rang sangs rgyas stong la/ bsod snyoms 'bul du bcug go// mu ge de yang tshung mar kho nar bar chad nas de nas khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas rnams
35a8(1): la zhus pa/ 'phags pa dag lhas nar 'bebs par 'gyur ro// bdag gis sa bon stsal tam/ thob shig/ de dag gis sa bon btab po// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong
35b1(1): ba ni/ 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas/ des bsams pa/ 'jig rten na g.yon gnas gang ji stong pa de rnams kyi mchog ni rangs rgyas rnams yin la/ spyir bdag gang ji snyed pa de rnams kyi mchog ni khyim
35b2(1): bdag 'dum byed yin gyis/ bdag gis 'di dag gi grogs bya'o snyam nas/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ dbang po chen po'i char phab pa dang / lo tog de rnams slu bar skyes so// de nas
35b3(1): skye bo'i tshigs de rnams kyis/ rang sangs rgyas rnams la nus pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gi le tog skrun pa gang lags pa de dag/ sku bar skyes par gyur na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ 
35b4(1): de rnams kyis smras pa/ ma bcad pa sbyar cig/ de rnams kyis skun cing / de rnams kyis snyan pa las/ me tog dang / 'bras bu rdza ma'i tshad tsam chags so// de rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas
35b5(1): de dag la rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa ma bcad cig dang / rang nyid smin nasags par 'gyur ro// ci tsam na de rnams smin nas gas pa dang / gang gis sa bon ji lta bu btab pa
35b6(1): de'i kho na lta bu sha stag gis gang bar gyur to// de nas mu ge rgyun chad de lo legs par gyur nas/ yul phyogs sna tshogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang srog chags gang dag mu ges 'jig
35b7(1): skra gnas dong ba rnams kyang yul wA ra NA sir 'ongs so// de nas mu ge rgyan chad de la legs par gyur nas/ khyim bdag 'dum byed kyis/ de nas rang sangs rgyas stong la gcong zhing bsod nams
35b8(1): pa'i b.ra' ba dang bca' ba sna tshogs dang / tshong ma ro dang ldan pa rnams kyis tshim par byas te/ tshigs su bcang de smras pa/ rdo ldan mkhas pas nor dang ring / dad par shes pa brnyed nas ni
36a1(1): skyes bu de'i sa rtag par yang // 'dod chags bral la yon 'bul lo// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan pa'i/ 
36a2(1): gnas brtan gang gis bshos gsol ba// de'i rigs dang bde bar 'phel// de ltar tshul khrims pur tshogs pa'i/ yon gnas dag la yon phul na// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol/ 
36a3(1): tu/ bde bdag tu 'gyur ba nyid// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag 'dum byed ces bya bar gyur pa gang gis mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byang na/ rang sangs rgyas spyong la
36a4(1): bsod snyoms sbyar cing de'i grogs lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byas pa/ de gzhan nos yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khyim
36a5(1): bdag 'dum byed ces bya ba der gyur te/ nga nyid kyis de na/ mu ge lo bcu gnyis su byung ba na/ rang sangs rgyas stong la bsod snyoms sbyar bas/ nga'i grogs lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya
36a6(1): byin gyis byas so// rgyal po chen po de'i sbyin pa'am sbyin pa'i bgo 'ga' des bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi la mi d+ha ste/ 'od kyang
36a7(1): nga'i sbyin pa ni bla ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin/ sdom la/ sprin shugs dbang po sbrul mgo gnyis/ de bzhin du sngags
36a8(1): ne tse dang // ston mo rus rbas sde bzangs dang / ded dpon tshogs su sdus pa yin// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don tu gnyer ba
36b1(1): phyir sems can rnams rjes su bzung bar byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba'i 'jam+bu'i gling gi don mthun nor tshol ba rab tu mang po dag cig rgya mtsho'i grub
36b2(1): bsgrubs te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i 'jug par 'dod nas/ de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa 'di lta ste/ gcig la gcig
36b3(1): papan thogs par mngon pa med kyi ma la bdag cag nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na dgos pa rgyal gyi cha spyad dag khyer te/ rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o// zhes de ltar
36b4(1): chas bcad nas nor tshol ba rnams so so phongs pa na dgos pa nal gyi chad kha cig gis ni shing shal ma li'i spang le ba/ gcig gis ni ra skye nangs tshangs can/ kha cig gis ni sku
36b5(1): ba bskur pas/ kha gcig ni ra skyal khyer te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so// de rnams rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su phyin pa dang / chu srin nya'i rigs kyis rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bshig go// 
36b6(1): gru bo che bshig pa dang / de rnams rgyal ba re re la zhon te/ chu ji lta ba bzhin du khyer te/ dong ba las de rnams kyis las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i rlung byang
36b7(1): phyogs nas langs te/ des lho phyogs kyi 'gram du khyer ba dang / de na bud med gzugs bzang mo mdzes pa lta na sdug pa dag yod do// de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// 
36b8(1): jo bo dag chur spyon bzhin bzangs dag chur byon/ bdag cag jo bo ma mchis pa rnams kyi rje'o dang / khyim bdab ma mchis pa rnams kyi khyim btab dang / gnas ma mchis pa
37a1(1): / rnams kyi gnas dang / gling ma mchis pa de rnams kyi gling dang / mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon dang / skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi
37a2(1): skyabs dang / brten ma mchis pa rnams kyi rten mdzod cig/ 'di dag ni khyed kyis zas kyi khang pa dang // skom gyi khang pa dang / gos kyi khang pa dang / gnas mal gyi
37a3(1): khang pa dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshal dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rdzing dang / 'dzam+bu'i gling gi rin po che rab tu mang po 'di
37a4(1): lta ste/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baiDUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / gser dang / rdo'i snying po dang / sdug dang / pad+ma ra ga dang / dung dang / 
37a5(1): dung g.yas su khyil ba pha dag lags kyis khyed chur spyon/ bdag cag lhan cig cing mo bgyi/ dga' bar bgyi/ dga' mgur spyod par bgyi'o// khyed cag las su
37a6(1): yang smos kyang lho phyogs kyi lam du ma bzhud cig/ de dag bud de rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de dag de rnams dang / 
37a7(1): lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod pa las bu po dang / bu mo dag bcas so// de nas tshang pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ 
37a8(1): ci'i phyir bud med 'di dag gis lho phyogs kyi lam lhag par srungs par sems/ mal bdag gis bud med lhan cig nyal ba de mal du nyid log par rig nas/ bags
37b1(1): gis ngal bus mal nas babasal/ lho phyogs kyi lam tu 'gro bo snyam nas/ dade ltar nges par byas nas/ bud med gang dang / lhan cig nyal ba de nyid kyi log byar nas/ 
37b2(1): bags kyis ral+la bus mal nas ba bas te/ ral gri rnon po mtshon du thogs nas lde phyogs kyi lam du song ba dang / des de na skye bo'i tshogs chen po rmi sngags 'don pa'i sgra
37b3(1): sgra kyi hud ma dang / kye hud pa dang / kyi hud srong mo dang / kyi hud spun/ kyi hud 'jam bu gling bkra bas spangs sam/ 'di ltar 'dzam+bu'i gling na re skyid ces sgra 'byin pa dag
37b4(1): thos so// thos nas kyang de 'jigs par 'gyur/ spyi bung zhes bya bar 'gyur to// de nas tshod pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can des 'jigs pa dang / skye bur zhes byed pa de shin
37b5(1): tu legs par rtsal nas/ lho phyogs kyi lam kho na yi rjes su song ba dang / des de na lcags kyi khar chen po mthong zhing rgya che ba zhig mthong nas/ des grong khyer de'i mtha' kho
37b6(1): ra khor yug du skor na/ ci nas kyang sgo cung zad cig rnyed grang snyam nas// des grong khyer de'i mtha' 'khor ra 'khor yug du bskor ba dang / chung ngu na byil pa 'am/ sbrul 'dzu
37b7(1): ba'i sgo tsam yang ma rnyed do// den shing sha ri sha zhes bya ba sbom la ring ba zhig mthong nas/ de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis/ shing shi risha de las bags kyis dal sa
37b8(1): dal bus 'dzegs pa las// skye bo'i tshogs chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag ci'i phyir/ kyi hur ma/ kyi hung pa/ kyi chung sring mo/ kyi dung srun
38a1(1): kyi bung mdzam+bu gling bkra bas spangs sam/ 'di ltar mdzam+bu gling na re shig skyid ces shin tu smre sngags 'don/ de rnams kyis smras
38a2(1): pa/ rje nang rje bdag cag 'dzam+bu gling don mthun nor tshol ba rab tu mang po bdag cag mtsho'i gru ba che// sgrubs te/ rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par 'dod pa las/ bdag
38a3(1): cag 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa rnams 'di lta ste/ gcig la gcig phan thogs par mngon pa med kyis
38a4(1): ma la bdag cag nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na dgos pa rgyal gyi cha byad dag khyer te/ rgyal mtshan chen por 'jug par bya'o zhes de ltar chas bcad nas/ 
38a5(1): nor tshol ba rnams so sor 'phongs pa na dgos pa rgyal gyi cha spyad/ kha cig gis shing shal ma la'i le ba/ kha cig gi ni ras kyi skye nang tshangs can/ kha cig gis ni
38a6(1): skye brgyus pa/ kha cig gis ra rkyal khyer te/ rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so// bdag cag rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su phyin pa dang / chu srin nya'i rigs kyi gru po
38a7(1): che bshig go// gru bo che bzhi gnas bdag cag rgyal ba re la non te/ chu rdelba ba bzhim byer te dong ba las/ bdag cag go las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i
38a8(1): rlung byang phyogs nas langs te/ des bdag gi lho phyogs kyi 'gram du khyer ba dang / de na bud med gzugs bzang po mdzes pa lnga na sdug pa dag yod de/ de dag gi
38b1(1): 'di skad ces smras so// jo bo dag chur byon/ bzhin bzangs dag chur byon/ bdag cag rdza bo ma mchis pa rnams kyi jo bo dang / khyim btab ma mchis pa rnam
38b2(1): kyi khyim btab dang / gnas ma mchis pa rnams kyi gnas dang / gling ma mchis pa rnams kyi gling dang / mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon dang / skyabs ma mchi
38b3(1): pa rnams kyi skyabs dang / rten ma mchis pa rnams kyi rten mdzod cing // 'di dag ni khyed kyi zas kyi kha ra pa dang / skom gyi khang pa dang / gos kyi khang po dang / gnas
38b4(1): mal gyi khang po dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshal dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rdzing dang / 'dzam+bu gling gi rin po che rab
38b5(1): tu mang po la 'di lta ste/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / gser dang rdo'i snying po dang / sdug dang / pad+ma
38b6(1): ra ga dang / dud g.yos su khyil ba dag lags kyis khyed tshur byon/ bdag cag dang lhan cig rtsed mo bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid dga' mgur spyod par bgyi'o// 
38b7(1): khyed bdag las su yang smos kyang lde phyogs kyi lam du ma nung cig/ bdag cag bud med de dag dang / lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur
40a1(1): ste/ bdag cag pha rol tu bkri zhing legs pa dang / bde bar 'jam+bu gling du phyin par mdzad du gsol/ zhes smras shim de
40a2(1): tshong ba mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po des smras pa shin tu legs par bzung ste/ chub par byas nas/ babs kyis dal bus ngal
40a3(1): bus shing shi ri sha las g.yas phyogs kyi lam de nyid du song ste/ bud med gang dang lhan cig nyal ba de mal na gnyid kyis log par rig nas/ bdag cag dal
