146b1(1): gsal// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung snga dro/ na bza' ba sham thabs bsnams lhung bzed dang chos gos bsdams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing
146b2(1): dge slong gi dge 'dun mdun bdar te/ rgyal po kri kri'i rkang pa gang na bar gshegs te/ byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po kri kris
146b3(1): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs zin par rig nas/ gtsang zhing gsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba rnams kyis rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim pa
146b4(1): byas te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srang gis gsol zin nas/ phyag byas te lhung bzed gyur pa rig nas/ stan ches dma' zhig pa langs te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
146b5(1): sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa thabs gcig la bdag gis dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos dang bsod snyor/ 
146b6(1): dang gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams dbul zhing bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du gtsug lag khang lnga brgya tsam gcig khri dang khri'u dang / stan nang tshangs can
146b7(1): dang / gor bu lnga brgya tsam dbul zhing / 'bras sbubs su smin pa de lta bu 'dis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid lags ra/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ 
146b8(1): rgyal po chen po ji tsam sems/ mngon par dad par byas pa de tsam gyis byas zin gyis mchog go// lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la
147a1(1): rtul ba gro gros 'di skad ces gsal te// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcigs zhes bya ba ras/ bdag la gnang bar mdzad dug nam
147a2(1): rgyal po chen po gang ma bzhin du'o// la gnyis lar gsum du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ong srung gis rgyal ba kri kI la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal ba
147a3(1): ji tsam gyis sems can mngon par dad par byas zin mchog go// de res yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la rgyal po kri kris 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
147a4(1): bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas pa dper na da ltar bdag 'dra ba dga' lta mchis lags sam/ rgyal po chen po khyod nyid kyi yul na/ be'i gling dring gi zhes bya ba'i grong yod de/ 
147a5(1): der rdza mkhan dga' skyong zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad par zhes bya ba gnas so// zhes bya ba'i gong ma bzhin du'o// des pa ma lang ba gnyis gso zhing dus su nga la yang bsan/ 
147a6(1): snyoms kyis stobs par byed do// rgyal po chen po dus gcig gis ni/ be'i b+hing dring gi ljongs kyi grang brdal na/ nye bar ston cing bzhugs nas/ snga dro sham thabs bsdams te/ lhung bzed dang
147a7(1): chos gos bsdams nas/ be'i b+h+ring dring gi ljongs kyi grong rdal du bsod snyoms bzhugs te/ ngas be gling dring gir bsod snyoms sbyin ning / rdza mkhar dga' sbrang khyim gang ra ba der gshegs
147a8(1): ba dang / da'i tshe rdza ma khang dga' srung dgas pa ni ga la phye lags su sang nas/ ngas rdza mkhan dag 'a byung gis sgo 'phar rim gyis dal bus brdungs pa las/ rdza mkhan dga' stong gi ma
147b1(1): la mas ga shA smra gas pa 'dus na pams smra/ la su gyur nas 'ad sa 'jum/ da gnyis
147b2(1): sangs 'di ska sa smras ka ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di sru ma min/ bsang rnams band do// de gnyis kyis 'di sad ces smras/ 'phags pa nang dun
147b3(1): cig/ bzhir bzangs dge nang du ban cig/ khyod la rim gro bgyid pa ni/ slar rol tu mchis kyis/ phru ba nas par dran dang rje'u sran tshad mchis kyis nyid kyis bzhes te/ longs spyad du
147b4(1): gsal/ rgyal po chen po nges byang gi sgra mi snyan gyis dus byin gyis brlabs nas/ phru ba na zad dron dang rje'u na sran tsho dang nyid kyis blangs nas longs spyod do// de nas phyi zhig na rdza mkhan dga'
147b5(1): spyod 'ongs nas/ phru ba na zar dron dang rje'u sran tshad yod ba zos par mthong nas/ pa dang ma la 'di skad ces smraso// yab yub phrub na zad dran dang / rde'u na srad tshad su zhig gis 'tshal lags/ 
147b6(1): de gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smra so// dga' skyong 'di nas phyir byung ba na/ bdag cag gis sgo 'phar la brdungs pa'i sgra zhig thos so// thos nas kyang 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa 'di su
147b7(1): zhig sgo 'phar la gdung / des 'di skad ces gsungs so// de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yin te/ bsod snyoms rnyed do// de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gson/ 
147b8(1): to// 'dags pa nang du byin cig/ bzhin bzangs nang du byed cig/ khyod la rim gro bgyid pa ni pha rol tu mchis kyis/ phru ba na zad dron dang / rje'u na srad tshad mchis kyis nyid kyis
148a1(1): rnams ma snang du ga sul/ des de da pangs spyang par grupa dngas rdzam kha ga 'gyung 'di snyam du sems te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma
148a2(1): gis bdag gis khyim du shin du bgi phab cing / 'dris par gyur pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa lags par rnyed do// skam nas dge' ba dang / rab tu dga' bas skyil mo krung bcas te nag
148a3(1): 'dun 'das par byas so// zla ba phyed kyi bar du yang de'i lhan cig ldan pa'i dga' ba lus mi 'dor zhing / de rtag tu lus la bar chad med par 'dug go// 'od skar sangs rgyas rnams kyi
148a4(1): sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyis lha'i thus nag bdun gyis bar du/ pha ma gnyis kyi phra ba'i zar drod dang / rje'u sran tshod kyang de bzhin du 'dug go// rgyal po chen po dus gcig na/ da pe'i b+hi
148a5(1): dring gi ljongs kyi grang brdal du nye bar bsten te/ dbyar gnas par dam bzhes pa dang / nga'i gtsug lag khang du char 'babs pa'i lhas thog mar char phab par gyur to// de'i tshe rdza mkhan dga' skyong gi
148a6(1): las byed pa'i khang pa rtsa sar pas g.yogs so// de'i nabs 'bring byed pa'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyod cagadeng la rdza mkhan dga' stong lngas byed pa'i
148a7(1): g.yogs shing / btsun pa dka' bzhin 'tshal nas dge slong rnams kyi sang las mnyan nas/ rdza mkhan dga' sbyong gi las byed pa'i g.yogs pa che bar byed pa ni/ de'i tshe rdza mkhan dga'
148a8(1): srung dgas pa dga' la phyir ba dus ngo // rdza ma khar dag 'a byung gib dang ma gnyis kyis las byed pa'i g.yags mchu ba'i sgo bris sa// thos nas kyang 'di stod ces smras/ 'phags 'dis
148b1(1): rlig padi bzangs 'di su las byed pa'i khang pa'i g.yogs ma nA/ de rnams kyis 'di skad ces skyes// 'a bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nabs 'bring ba'i dge slong dag/ 
148b2(1): yin te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gtsug lag khang du/ char 'bebs pa'i lha'i thog mar char phab pas/ kho bo cog gis 'di bshus la de g.yogs so// de rnam
148b3(1): la bdag cag gis 'di skad ces smraso// khyed cag rim gro bgyid pa ni slar rol du mchis kyis/ 'phags pa dag bsdoms shig/ bzhin bzangs dag bsdoms shig/ de rnams kyis las
148b4(1): byed pa'i khang pa de shes so// de nas rdza mkhan dga' skyong 'di snyam du sems te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 'od srung gi khyim du bag phab cing / 'dris par gyur pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa leg
148b5(1): par rnyed ces bya ba nas/ zhag bdun zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus/ rdza mkhan dga' skyeng gis pa ma'i
148b6(1): dbyar gyi gnos der las byed pa'i khang par char pa'i thigs pa cig kyang ma bab po// rgyal po chen po khyod ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zla ba gsum na bza' chos gos
148b7(1): dge bas snyoms dang gzims cha dang / s+yAd spyad kyi rkyen skar gyi la byed rnams dbul nam gnang ngam/ zhes khyod kyis sems gnad du gyur gyi/ dga' stong ni las byed pa'i g.yogs ma
148b8(1): kyang sems go na dum gyur to// bcun pa rdzi ma 'a dga'i myong gis rdo rje'i rigs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rnam par shin tu bag bcing 'dres par byung lagoso// de nas yang
149a1(1): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rgyal po kI kri'i sbyin pa de la yid rang bar mdzad de/ sbyin sreg mchog sbyin rnams kyi mchog/ sdeb sbyor mchog ni nyi ma'i lha/ mi'i mchog ni
149a2(1): rgyal po ste/ rgya mtsho chu bo rnams kyi mchog/ zla ba rgyu skar rnams kyi gtso/ nyi mi snang byed rnaMs kyi gtso/ steng dang 'og dang thang gar yong / 'gro ba'i 'gro ba ji snyed pa/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// smra
149a3(1): ba'i mchog ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/ de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs gis/ rgyal 'i bo kr-i kri la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ 
149a4(1): yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te gshegaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas/ ring por ma lon par rgyal po kri kros mi
149a5(1): zhig la smras pa/ kA ye nang rje khyod song la sbubs su smin pa'i 'bras shing rta lnga brgya tsam khong la rdza mkhan dga' skyong gang na bder song ste phyin pa dang / 'di skad ces nges pa dga' skyong rgyal po kri kri khyod
149a6(1): la dbub su srin po'i 'bras kyis bkang po'i shing rta lnga brgya rtsam po// 'dis khyod kyi pham long ba gnyis gas pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la dras dus su bsod
149a7(1): snyoms dbul ba dang / bdag nyid kyang legs par bde ba tshim par byas shig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal po kri kri las nyen nas/ sbubasu smir pa'i 'bras kyi shing rta lnga brgya tsam bkang ste/ 
149a8(1): rdza mkhan dga' skyong gang ra ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rdza mkhan dga' skyong la 'di skad ces spraso// des pa dga' spang rgyal po kri kris khyod la dbubs su smin pa'i 'bras kyis bkang ba'i shirtsa lnga brgya
149b1(1): tsam po 'di dag bkur gyis/ 'dis khyad kyi pha bsang ba gnyis gso pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungal bsod snyoms dbul ba dang / bdag nyid kyang legs par bde bar tshim
149b2(1): zu kyi smra sa sa pa du me pa nas gang du bya nga ba ltangs sa bajug/  kyang ga sa ma dum pas
149b3(1): de'i dus kyi bram ze khye'ub ma gang yin pa de ding nyid yid te/ ngas gang zar lo bskur gyi/ byang chub la ma yin pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par srid pas/ byang chub kyi snying por dka' ba lo drug spyad do// gal te
149b4(1): byang chub la bskur bar gyur na/ ngas slar yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du// byang chub kyi ched du bdag nyid shin tu dub par 'gyur ro// bcur pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ji zhig mdzad na/ 'phrin las de'i
149b5(1): rnam par smin pas/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang / bcom ldan 'das la 'khru ba'i sbyar gyis thebs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi
149b6(1): tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngor byung ba ri bor zhig na smar ba zhig yod pa
149b7(1): las de na khyim bdag cig gi/ bu nad kyis thebs nas/ des sman po de bkug ste/ dris nas des de la sman byin bA gsos par gyur na/ khyim bdag des de la rngan pa ma byin no// khyim bdag gi bu de lan gsum
149b8(1): gyi bar du nad kyis thebs te/ sman pa des lan gsum gyi bar du gsos par byas kyang / des de la rngan pa ma byin nus kris pa drag pos mi bzod par gyur bsams pa/ khyim bdag gi bu chung 'di bdag gis lan
150a1(1): gsum gyi bar du dpyad byas byas kyang / 'dis cung zad kyang lan du phan ma bdag kyis/ da ni rgyal nad kyis thebs par gyur pa dang / de la sman pa ma yin pa zhig gis de'i nang
150a2(1): 'grel rnams su dum bu dum bur 'dzag par gyur pa de lta bu spyir ro// snyam pa las ci tsam na khyim bdag de'i bu sbar na bar gyur pa dang / sman pa des mi bzod pa skyes pas/ de la sman ma yin
150a3(1): ba byin nas/ de'i nad grol rnams dum bu dum bur zags so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi sman pa gang yin de ni nga nyid yin te/ ngas ngan sems kyis khyim bdag
150a4(1): gi bu la sman ma byin pas des nad grol ba rnams dum bu dum bur zags pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ lo mang po zhes bya ba nas/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su bcos so//

150a7(1): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngun gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong
150a8(1): ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngar byung ba chu bo gnyen ldan gyi 'gram mnyang lnga brgya brten cing gnas to// de rnams kyis nya shin tu che ba gnyis shig/ ji zhig ltar gnyen ldan gyi nang du zhugs
150b1(1): te nya rgyal zin pa dang / de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te 'di gnyis gsad na sha blon par mi 'gyur shing / rul bar gyur ro snyam nas de rnams kyis de nyid phur pa la btags nas bzhag go// 
150b2(1): gang gi tshe lan 'ga' zhig nye ba 'ongs pa de'i bcad cing bcad bcing sbyin par byed do// de gnyis kyis lus la bcod pa na/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas/ nyen pas rang rigs mthun pa'i/ skad 'byin pas 'bo sgra 'don par
150b3(1): byed do// de na nya pa'i khye'u gcig cig de gnyis kyis sha tshod pa na yang dang yang du 'bo sgra 'don pa la dga' bar gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nya pa'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni nga yin
150b4(1): te/ ngas nya gsod par byed pa la dga' ba skyed pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ nga lo mang po zhes bya ba nas klad pa na bar gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 
150b5(1): las kyi lhag ma de kho nas/ da ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang / shAkya thub pa rnams bsad pa na/ klad pa'i nad rab tu drag pos thebs par gyur to// btsun pa bcom
150b6(1): ldan 'das kyis las ji zhig mdzad da/ las de'i rnam par smin pas/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang / bcom ldan 'das kyi sku rgyab bser ma'i bskur gyis thebs par gyur
150b7(1): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnamasu las 'di dag byas shing bsags pas zhes bya ba nas/ 
150b8(1): 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngor byung ba/ gyad cig gis yul ljongs kyi gyad thams cad brdabs pas/ rgyal ba'i pho brang de na rgyal po gyad
151a1(1): stobs dang / pha rol gnod pa thub lhag pa zhig yod do// de de dang lhan cig rgyal mtshan gyi phyir stobs 'gyed pa la zhugs so// gyad de dag gi kun tu stong pa
151a2(1): ni lag pas gzung ba kho nas skad kyis byang shes pa yin pas de nas rgyal po'i thad des/ yul ljongs kyi gyad 'di ni bdag pas stobs che'o bya bar shes nas/ des smras pa ni'u zla
151a3(1): bdag gi 'di ni rigs kyi rgyud kyis 'ongs pa yin gyis khyod bdag nyid 'gyel bar byos shig dang / bdag la ni grags par zad la/ ru mtshon ni khyod kyi yin par 'gyur ro// 
151a4(1): des khas blangs pa dang / des de gnan to// de ru mtshon blangs par brtsams pa dang / des smras pa/ ne'u zla rgya'am mthus brgyal ba don du gnyer ba yin pa las/ 
151a5(1): khyod ngas smras bsdus na/ ji'i phyir du mtshon sbyin/ bdag nyid chen pa de dang / nga rgyal bcom pa zhig pas/ lan gsum gyi ba rudu/ gyad de dang lhag cig 'gyed par nu
151a6(1): par/ yad de la bla zla bar bsums pa/ re'u bla khyod la ru mtshon gyis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi sring mo phyug mo khyim thabs la ma song ba zhig yod pa/ de cod la sbyin gyis
151a7(1): bdag nyid 'gyel bar byas shig/ bslus pa de de'i chung mas thos nas des smras pa/ rjes sras snga ma'i gling bzhi dag dgongs sam/ de nas de chung mas nga rgyal bskyed nas/ 
151a8(1): kun nas dkris pa drag pos btegs te/ brdabs de skal tshig chaganas shi'o// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi yul ljongs kyi gyad gang yin pa de
151b1(1): ni nga nyid yin te/ ngas ngan sems bskyed nas kun nas dkris pa drag pos/ rgyal de'i byad skal tshigs bcag pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smid pas da lo mang po dang / 
151b2(1): lo brgya phrag mang po dang / la stong phrag mang po rnam su sems can dmyal ba rnams su bcos so// las kyi lhag ma de kho nas da ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang / 
151b3(1): nga'i skal tshigs rlung nad kyis thebs par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnam dang zhes bya ba nas btsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis
151b4(1): de ltar bu la bslab par bya'o// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// // 'dul ba gzhi bam po lnga brgya drug pa'o// // thams cad zil gnor tham
151b5(1): cad gzigs/ thub pa 'jig rten kun la sman/ sred pa thams cad zad pa brnyes/ sbyor ba kun gyi mthar phyin mdzad/ thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad rig
151b6(1): thub chen thams cad mngon par mkhyen// mkhon dang 'jigs pa kun las 'das/ chom rkun gyi ni pha rol gshegs/ bsam pa kur la mkhas pa po/ sred pa
151b7(1): thams cad rab tu bcom// sems can kun la phan dgongs pa mdud pa thams cad rab tu grol/ bkal nyal dang kun bcad nas/ 'ching ba thams cad yang dag bcar / 
151b8(1): sems can kun gyi mchog ba ste/ thub pa chos rnams ston par mdzad/ sems dpa' chen po shes rab che/ brtson 'grus chen po grags pa che/ chos chen 'od kyi pha rol gshegs/ 
151b9(1): gru chen seng ge drang srong che/ shes rab chen pa'i bri mtshon/ nyon mongs chen po rab tu bcom/ stobs dang brtson 'grus rab tu che/ brten pa chen po pha rol gnon/ byang chub chen ba rnyed pa dang / dgra chem rnams
152a1(1): rnam par rgyal/ nad chen po'i dpyad mdzad pas// bcom ldan sman pa chen po lags// 'dod chags chen po zil gnon la// sman chen po
152a2(1): ni brtsol pa po// 'khor ba chen po'i brtson ran// 'ching ba chen pos bci ngas rnams la// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas// 'ching ba kun las grol/ 
152a3(1): bar mdzad// skyes bu chen po lnga chen po// tshogs rnams kyi ni tshogs chen ldan// sbyin pa'i mchog ni sprin chen po// zhi ba chen po'i go 'phangs reg/ sems dpa
152a4(1): mchog ste drang srong mchog/ de bzhin rnam par 'dren pa rnyed// nyan thos mchog ni phun sum tshogs// chos kyi mchog ni rab ston pa// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i mchog/ rnam
152a5(1): par grol ba rnams kyi mchog/ mtshan ni mchog rab kun dang ldan/ bcom ldan srid las rab tu grol// srid pa'i dga' ba las 'phags pa// srid pa'i 'dod chags kun nas bcad// 
152a6(1): srid pa'i sred pa rab tu bcom// chos chen po ni bsgrogs pas na// 'jig dang 'jigs su rung ba spangs// klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis gnas// ma dros pa'i mtsho chen du// thams
152a7(1): cad bya ba byas zin pa'i// nyan thos rnams kyis mdun byas te// lnga brgya rnams dang lhan cig du// rdzu 'phrul gyis na mkha' la gshegs// chu bo de'i 'gram dag du// smra ba'i mchog ni bzhugs
152a8(1): nas ni rjes su brtse ba thugs rje can// lus can kun la phan mdzad pas// mchol gzigs nas dge slong la// 'di skad ces ni bka' stsal nas// ngas ni sdig pa gang byas dang // nga yi
152b1(1): tshig ni mnyan par gyis// ngas ni sngon gyi tshe rangs su// g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag gyur// rang sangs rgyas ni legs smin te// skyon med pa la skur pa btab// skye bo'i tshogs chen ljags nas su// 
152b2(1): thub pa chos kyis yon tan dga'// bcings pa dam pos de bcings nas// grong khyer mchog ni chung ba dang // dge sbyong bcings pas dam bcings pas// sdug bsngal gyur te nga yis mthong // 
152b3(1): de la snying rje bskyed nas kyang // nga nyid kyis ni thar byas// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// dmyal ba rnams su yun ring 'phags// slar yang mir ni 'ongs pa ni// ngas ni skur ba thob par
152b4(1): 'gyur/ de nas las kyi lhag mas kyang // nga'i yang srid tha ma la// mu stegs rnams kyi mdzes ma'i phyir// yang dag ma yin skur pa babab// nga sngon bram zer gyur pa na// gsang
152b5(1): tshig 'dzin cing mthong thos pa// bram ze lnga brgya rnams la ni// tshal na gsang tshig brjod pa'i tshe// mngon shes lnga ldan rdzu 'phrul che// byin chen drang srong der 'ongs pa// bkur sti
152b6(1): byed pa ngas mthong nas// skyon med la ni skur pa btab// drang srong 'di ni 'dod spyod ces// bram ze'i rnams kyis nges tshig de// thos nas rjes su yid rang zhing // de nas bram ze'i
152b7(1): khye'u rnams kyis khyim dang khyim du slong ba na// drang srong 'di ni 'dod spyod ceso// skye bo mang po dag la smras// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// dge slong lnga brgya dag dang yang // mdzes
152b8(1): ma kho na'i rgyu las ni// skur pa'i dge ni thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon gyis// nyan thos gyur pa gnas 'jog bu// dge sbyong la ni ngas mi bden
153a1(1): gaskur pa mang po rab tu btab// sdig pa'i las de byas pas na// mi zad ngan 'gror song nas ni// sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes// sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong // 
153a2(1): de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// gang la bram ze ba rtsa mi 'dis// skye bo'i tshigs bsdus pa na// yang dag ma yin skur ba btab// nor gyi phyir ni skyon med par// ngas ni yas khyim n+ya bo ni// ri'i seb du bcuganas su// 
153a3(1): ngas ni rdo ba dag gis bsnun// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// dmyal ba dag tu yun ring 'phags// rab tu cha dang thig nag gi/ sdug bsngal tshe rab myong bar 'gyur// de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// lhas byin
153a4(1): gyis ni rdos 'phangs te// nga'i zhabs kyi bre bong ni// rdo ba'i dum bus rma yang byung // rgya mtsho yi ni gru bo che// rgya mtsho la ni 'gro ba ni// grun 'dug pa'i tshong pa ni// mdung thung rnon pos bsad par gyur// las kyi rnam par
153a5(1): smin pa des nya dmyal ba rnams su yun ring 'phags// de'i las kyi lhag mas ni// zhabasal blas zug par gyur// sngon ni nye ba'i bur gyur pa// nya rnams bsod par byed pa dang // yid dga' ba ni skyes par
153a6(1): gyuralas kyi rnam par smin pa des// nga ni dmyal bar yung ring 'phags// rab tu che dang thig nag tu// sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur// de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// gang tshe nga ni 'phags skyes pos/ 
153a7(1): shAkya rnams ni bsod pa na// klad pa mi zad nad kyis thebs// rnam par gzigs kyi gsungs rab kyis// nyan thos yongs su dpyad byas te// khyim ni nas rul za bar 'os// khyod la zas ni mi rigs
153a8(1): shes// ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang // las kyi rnam par smin pa des// dmyal ba thig nag rnams su ni// sdug bsngal mang po rnams su myong // de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// dgra thar dbyar ni
153b1(1): gnas bcas te bram ze yi ni spyan drangs tshe// zla ba gsum du nas rul zos/ gang ni sman par gyur pa na// tshong dpon bu bo khrur 'jug che// nad kyi sdug bsngal gyur pa la// sman pa yin
153b2(1): pa ngas byin no// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong // de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// de 'dra'i khru ba'i nad kyis thebs// sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su// 
153b3(1): nga ni thu can gyad gyur te// stobs dag 'gyed par gyur pa na// ngas ni gyad kyi bu dag bsad// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong // de nas las kyi lhag
153b4(1): mas ni 'di na nga'i rgyab bsrung ngo // sngon ni ngan spong bur gyur pa// dga' skyong la ni smras pa ni// mgor gangs blong cing nig bya// 'di byang chub yod ma yin// ngag gi nyes par
153b5(1): spyad pa dang /  las kyi rnam par smin pa des// 'dir yang mir ni 'ongs pa na// khyim med par ni rab byung nas// byang chub mchog ni 'dod pa'i phyir// lteng rgyas 'gram du lo drug du/ 
153b6(1): mchog tu dga' ba spyad pas ngas// sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong // sems can kun gyi rab mchog gis// chos kyi dam pa thugs su chud// sdig pa'i las ni gang mdzad pa/ 
153b7(1): tshogs kyi mchog ni bka' stsal pa// thams cad zil gnon stobs brnyes kyis// dge slong dge 'dun mdun bzhugs nas// ma dros pa'i mchi chen du// nyid kyi 'phrin las
153b8(1): rgya lung bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u'o// / sdom ni gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi can dang ni// rgyu can ko'u di rgya nye ba 'khor// 'od breng dang ni nam
154a1(1): gru ste/ khrim bde bar gshegs pa ni// madras pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das// dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang // thabs cig tu mtsho chen po mdzes par
154a2(1): 'phrin las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan nas// ma dros pa'i gnas mi snang bar mdzad de// mnyan yod kyi ri dgas 'dzin de// kye ma'i sngon kun dga' ra ba'i khang bzangs na bzhugs so// ri
154a3(1): dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa gas/ bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas mi sdang ba'i bar mdzad de// gnyan yod du gshegs nas/ mnyan yod kyi bdag gi khang bzangs kho na na bzhugs so// 
154a4(1): zhes thos nas kyang ma nyan yod nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ zhes bya ba nas rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo // zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
154a5(1): du'o de nas ri dgas 'dzin gyi sems stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das rla ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// brtsa
154a6(1): ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros par rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan pa'i dgra bcom pa lnga brgya gang dag lags pa dang / thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par te gdugs chod sbyor zhing / 
154a7(1): mchis na bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ ri dgas 'dzin gyi mas gang gnang bar rig nas zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das gsol zin nas/ phyag bcabs te/ 
154a8(1): lhung bzed gyur par rig nas/ zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ stan ches dpa' ba zhig blangs nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas
154b1(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis raM dgas 'dzin gyi ma sa ga la/ chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis// yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng stod/ yang
154b2(1): dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs nas/ bcug lag khang du byon pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs
154b3(1): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ri dgas 'dzin gyi mas ga lam rdzogs pa yod de/ des dge slong gi 'dun spyan drangs te/ gdugs mchod gsol na/ 
154b4(1): 'on kyang dge 'dun gyi ched du yon ma phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ grong khyer thigs pa can du byon nas/ grong khyer thigs pa can gyi byang
154b5(1): phyogs kyi grong khyer gyi shing sha ba'i tshal na bzhugs so// grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams bcom ldan 'das ko sa la nas zhes bya ba nas zhes bya ba nas shing sha
154b6(1): ba'i tshal na bzhugs so// zhes thos so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang / khyu nas khyer phrad cing 'dug ste/ grong khyer thigs pa can
154b7(1): nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der drong ste/ lhags pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ 
154b8(1): cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de ras grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bstan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der log
155a1(1): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag cag gi snum
155a2(1): par gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang do// / 
155a3(1): de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ 
155a4(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // de nas yi dgas rus gong sbal ba lte bu rang gi sras yog pa lta rotsam/ kha khab mig tsam/ 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu 'bar te/ me
155a5(1): gcig tu gyur pa lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la kun nas nyon mongs su bskor te/ 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// ba
155a6(1): ldan 'das khyod grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'di dag ni bdag cag nye tur gyur pa lags na/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs brtse ba nye bar gzung ste/ 
155a7(1): bdag cag kho na'i ming nas yon bsngo ba mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas dam pa zhig btsa ba ste/ gal te khyed cag chu byad 'di nyid kyis yon
155a8(1): ba sngo bur byed pa'i tshe 'ong na ni/ khyed cag gi ming nas yon bsngo bar bya'o// de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das g.yar tsha lags na/ ji ltar mchi lags/ de nas datsa
155b1(1): ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ ngo tsha med la ngo tsha byed/ ngo tsha ba la ngo mtsha/ 'jigs pa med la 'jigs pa la ni mi 'jigs lta/ log pa'i lta ba
155b2(1): blangs pas na/ sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro/ ngo tsha ba la ngo tsha dang / ngo ma tshal ngo ma tsha/ mi 'jigs pa la ni 'jigs lta ba'i/ yang dag lta ba blangs pa yis/ 
155b3(1): sems can rnams ni bde 'gror 'gro/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na/ mchi ba lags so// de nas grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze
155b4(1): dang khyim bdag rnams kyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i ze ba dang / bca' bdag sta gon byas nas/ zhes bya ba nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs
155b5(1): te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go/ zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ yi dgas lnga brgya po de dag 'ongs pa dang / de nas grong khyer
155b6(1): thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis/ yi dgas rnams mthong nas/ 'bros par brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes ldan
155b7(1): dag ci'i phyir 'bros/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yi dgas 'o ni dag mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshur sheg 'di
155b8(1): dag ni khyed cag gi nye du yin no// gal te khyed kyis gnang na ngas 'di rnams kyi ming gis yon sngo'o// de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rung lags so// 
156a1(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis/ de rnams kyi ming nas yon bsngo ba mdzad de/ sbyin pa 'di'i bsod nams gang / de na
156a2(1): yi dgas rjes 'gro zhing / 'di dag yi dgas 'jig rten naM/ mi zad pa las myur ldan shog/ de yis gos dang skom dang zas/ gnas ma la rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ dus kun tu ni
156a3(1): mi zad par/ de rnams la ni grub par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer thigs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis
156a4(1): yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug/ yang dag par gzed stod// yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te/ gshegs sa de nas grong khyer thigs pa can
156a5(1): gyis bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams rtog khang du lhags shing / tshogs nas 'dri lta bu'i gtam dag gleng bar byed de/ kye dge slong ko'u ta ma ni 'dod zhen che zhing de'i nyan thos
156a6(1): rnams kyang 'dod zhen che ba yin no// kha cig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag dge slong ko'u ta ma ni 'dod zhen chung zhing de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen chung ste/ mu steg
156a7(1): can rnams ni de lta ma yin no// de'i tshe bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge zhes bya ba/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur ro// de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ges grong khyer
156a8(1): thigs pa can rnams kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong ko'u ta ma 'dod zhe na che'am/ 'dod zhe na chung ba ngas khyed cag yid ches par/ 
156b1(1): bya'o// de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi seng ge/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bar song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// shes ldan ko'u ta ma dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs
156b2(1): cig la bdag gis bca' ba bur ma zhig dbul zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze smra 'dod seng ge la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas bram
156b3(1): ze smra 'dod seng ges bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la
156b4(1): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bram ze smra 'dod kyi bu seng ges glan ka tshol ba'i bsam pas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bca' ba bu ram la spyan sngar
156b5(1): drangs kyis/ khyed cag las gang gis ji tsam no zhig yod pa de tsam zhig blang bar bya'o// bram ze smra 'dod kyi bu seng ge la bu ram tshor ba'i khang pa lnga brgya yod pa nas/ des bu ram gyi khang pa re re na so bu ram
156b6(1): gyi snod blangs te/ bu ram gyi smom lnga brgya khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bar song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// shes ldan ko'u tam bu ram shing bsdogs lag
156b7(1): nyin thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te longs spyod du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag dang lhung bzed bcabs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams
156b8(1): pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi bu ram shing gi snod cig blangs te/ 'brim par brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi bar du 'brims kyang lhags
157a1(1): pas thams cad kyi de khon du 'dug pas de ltar byin gyis brlabs so// de nas bram ze smra 'dod kyi bu seng ge la mngon par dad par gyur to// de nas phyogs mtha' dag tu
157a2(1): sgra bsgrags pa/ shes ldan dag dge sbyong ko'u ta ma ni 'dod zhen chung zhing / de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhen chung ba yin no// de nas des mu stegs can rnams dang / bu ram longs spyod zhug
157a3(1): pa'i phyir mgron du bos pa dang / de rnams kyis bu ram bag med par blangs nas/ kha cig gis ni longs spyad/ kha cig gis ni snod bkang nas/ bor zhing khyer te dong ngo // de nas bram ze'i smra 'dod kyi
157a4(1): seng ge sa smras pa/ skyes bu blun po khyed cag kho na 'dod zhen che ba yin la/ dge sbyong ko'u ta maM ni 'dod zhen chung zhing / de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod zhe na chung ba yin no// zhes smras nas/ 
157a5(1): bcom lda na 'das la lhag par yang mngon par dad par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das gang na bar song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon tu zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
157a6(1): bzhin du ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag cag ces bya ba nas tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o// zhes bya ba'i
157a7(1): bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog tshangs par sbyang ba spyod cig ces gsungs pas/ zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus bzungs bka
157a8(1): par gyur ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dus sam dus ma yin pa'am/ na ba 'am min
157b1(1): pas bu ram la longs spyod par byed de/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa smra 'dod kyi seng ge ro myangs pa'i dri mi zhim pas/ sems rtse gcig pa nyid ma thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das
157b2(1): kyi dgengs pa/ dge slong smras 'dod seng ge ni/ srid pa tham pa yin na ci'i phyir bden pa ma mthong snyam du dgongs nas/ lus rul bas dri mi zhim pa las gyur par gzigs so// de nas
157b3(1): bcom 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong smra 'dod gyis seng ge'i gtsug lag khang dri dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / gdug pa dang / 
157b4(1): phye ma rnams kyi gtor la/ gnas mal la yang 'dug pas gdugs cing / me tog dri zhim pos brgyan pa'i me tog gis gdugs bres shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal
157b5(1): zhes che dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyam to// ji tsam na de bsod snyoms la song ba de'i bar du/ de'i gtsug lag khang du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das
157b6(1): kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra 'dod kyis seng ge bsod snyoms la rgyugs nas gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang / lha'i 'byor pa mthong nas de nas
157b7(1): dga' ba'i yid kyis bsad snyoms la longs spyad te/ zas kyi bya ba byas nas gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu rkang pa bkrus te/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas/ dkyil ma
157b8(1): dkrung bcas te/ lus drang por bsrangs te/ dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste/ 'dug pa dang / dri zhim po mnam nas de'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa skyes so// 
158a1(1): de nas de'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs ste/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas nas/ mngon du smra bar gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas
158a2(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i dge slong dang / nga'i nyan thos sdug pas rnam par grol ba rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong smra
158a3(1): 'dod kyi seng ge 'di yin no// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa dge slong gzhan rnams ni mi sdug
158a4(1): pas rnam par grol tshe dang ldan pa smre 'dod kyi seng ge ni ldog pas rnam par grol ba la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgya rabatung
158a5(1): mar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams nas shi 'phos shing de nyid du skyes te/ de ltar gyi srid pa tha ma mi rnams su skyes pa na/ lus rul ba'i dri ma rnam pas sems rtse gcig gcig pa ma
158a6(1): grub bo/ dri zhim po'i dri ma nam pa dang sems mnyam pa thob nas sdug pas rnam par grol bar gyur to// gal te 'di la thabs 'di ma byas par gyur na grol bar gyur pa/ 
158a7(1): yang 'dis skyes par mi 'gyur ro// de lta bas nA rjes su gnang skye/ gzhan gang zhig sdug pa 'di lta bus rnam grol bar gyur pa des rim pa de lta bu byas te/ 'di la 'gyod
158a8(1): par mi bya tshe 'di nas bcom ldan 'das yul sbed byed nas/ ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi spri'u rdzing gi 'gramacu
158b1(1): na khang brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so// yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa de
158b2(1): yangs pa can du byon na/ yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram du na/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs zhes thos s+ho// thos nas kyang gcig tu 'dus nas smras pa/ 
158b3(1): shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ sangs pa can du byon nas/ sangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram du khang pa rtsegs pa'i gnas
158b4(1): na ba zhugs so// zhes grags bgyis/ gal te bdag cag re re nas bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs te/ gdugs mchod gsol na nau/ bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs pa dang / 
158b5(1): gzhan gyi skyabs mi rnyed par 'gyur bas/ de la khrims shig bca' ste/ ji nas kyang tshogs shing 'dus pa kho nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdugs mchod kyis/ mi gcig pus ni
158b6(1): me yin no zhes// de rnams kyis khrims bca' bdag byas nas gzhag go// de'i tshe yangs pa can na bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa zhig gnas te/ nor can dang nor can gyi bu chung ma dang / nor can gyi bu dang / nor
158b7(1): can gyi mam ma'o// de dag gi khyim dun lhang rna rnams kyi g.yang 'bab par gyur to// de rnams kyis khrimasu bcas pa ma thos par khyim bdag nor can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te// 
158b8(1): yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na tha brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so smos so// thos nas kyang yangs pa can nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste zhes bya ba nas/ 
159a1(1): / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas khyim bdag nor can stan las langs te bla gos thag pa cig tu gzar nas/ 
159a2(1): bcom ldan 'das gdan bder logs su bral mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs chod
159a3(1): sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas khyim bdag nor can la gnang ngo // de nas khyim bdag nor can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar rig nas/ 
159a4(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nas song ngo // de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams yangs pa can nas byung nas/ 
159a5(1): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang thabs cig tu/ sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du
159a6(1): gsol la zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas 'jog gi bu dgang sngar khyim bdag nor can gyi spyan drangs zin to// de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes
159a7(1): ldan dag khyim bdag nor can gyi ni tshogs kyi khrims bcas pa las 'das par byas so// kha cig dag gis smras pa/ tsa ste 'das par byed gdon mi za bar des khrims bcas pa ma thos so// 'on kyang
159a8(1): bdag cag pas dang ni skyes bu ngam pa yin pas gdugs chod gsol du gzhug/ bdag cag gis ni gnangs gdugs chod gsol lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba nang bar sngar langs// 
159b1(1): lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas khyim bdag nor car gyi khyim gang na ba der song su phyin pa dang / shar sgo nas bzhugs pa dang / dzaM tsam na gdan ma bshams shing / zhal zas rnams su gan/ 
159b2(1): ma byas pa mthong nas/ de nas khyim bdag nor can la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag khyod kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs nas/ snying las rlung
159b3(1): dur gnas sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo ji snyed skad gsungs/ khyim bdag gdan ma bshams shing zhal zas rnams stagon ma byas pa mthong ngo // 'phags pa khyod chab ni
159b4(1): gang nas zhugs khyim bdag shar nas so// 'phags balho nas bzhugs shig/ de bzhugs pa las/ ji tsam na lha'i gdan bshams shing lha ri zhal zas rnams su gon byas pa yang
159b5(1): mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur ro// de nas khyim bdag nor can gyis bcom ldan 'das la gdugs mchod gsol ba btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom
159b6(1): ldan 'das kyis dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/ phyag bcabs te/ lhung bzed gyur par rig nas/ stan ches dma'
159b7(1): ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas nor can gyi chung ma stan langs langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang
159b8(1): rab der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang thabs cig tu/ sang bdag gi sdub par gdugs/ 
160a1(1): tshang su nang mchis ma gnang bar mdzad dug na/ btsam ldan 'das cang mi gsung bsan can gyi chung ma la gnang nga/ gnang nas kyang nor can mtshas bshad pa
160a2(1): mdzad ba nas gdan las bzhengs ta gshegs so// nor can gyi rlu mas kyang zhal pas rnams stagan byas sa/ danas tshe dang ldan pakun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ lhung bzedang/ 
160a3(1): chos gos thogs nas/ khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim gang na ba der song ste byin nas/ lho sgo nas bzhugs na gdan bshams shing / zhal zas rnams kyang sta gon ma byas pa mthong ngo // mthong
160a4(1): nas kyang nor can gyi chung ma la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag gi chung ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs nas/ ci snying la chung ngus gnas sam/ des smras pa/ 'phag
160a5(1): pa ci ste de skad gsungs/ gdan bshams shing zhal zas rnams kyang sta gon ma byas pa mthong ngo // 'phags pa khyod chab sgo nas zhugs/ lho gnas so// 'phags pa shar nas zhugs
160a6(1): shing ji tsam na gang na bzang po bshams shing / zhal zas bsod pa sta gon byas pa byas pa yang mthong ngo // mthong nas shin ngo mtshor skyes par gyur to// de nas nor can gyi chung ma'i sman drangs
160a7(1): kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gdugs chod gsal ga/ btsun pa gdugs tshang bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus las bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 
160a8(1): zhes bya ba nas phyag bcabs te/ lhung bzed gyubar gnas/ spyan tshes dma' ba zhig blabs te chas mtshan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
160b1(1): bzhin du/ de nas na can gyi bu san las langs te/ glags drug bcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan ba de lags su thal ma sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'das
160b2(1): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu/ sang bdag gi snum par gdugs mchod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
160b3(1): cang mi gsung bas nor can gyis bu la gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chung ma la chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegs so// nor can gyi bus kyang gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' dang
160b4(1): bca' bdag sta gon byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan ba kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ nor can gyi khyim gdan ba der song ste phyin nas/ lho sgo nas
160b5(1): zhugs na gdan ma bshams shing / zhal zas sta gon ma byas pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang nor can gyi bu la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
160b6(1): dge 'dun spyan drangs nas/ ci rnyed las chung ngus gnas sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa ci ste de skad gsungs/ gdan mi bshams shing sta gon ma byas pa mthong ngo // 'phags pa chod
160b7(1): chub sgo gang nas zhugs/ lho nas so// 'phags banub nas bzhugs shing / ji tsam na gang na bshams shing / zhal zas bsod pa sta gon byas pa yang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang
160b8(1): shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to// de nas nar can gyi bu'i spyan drangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/ 
161a1(1): @bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyur par rig nas/ stan ches dma'
161a2(1): zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyar sngar 'dug go/ zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas nor can gyis gna'am stan las langs nas
161a3(1): bcom ldan 'das gan ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la dag 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu/ 
161a4(1): sang bdag gis sdum par gdugs chod sbyar zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsungs pas nor can gyi mna' ma la gnang ngo // de nas
161a5(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can gyi bu la chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegs so// de nas yang ba can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang / ban/ 
161a6(1): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bo'i phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa car gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la
161a7(1): chas dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas cang mi gsung ngo // zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas yangs can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
161a8(1): cig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu/ sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs
161b1(1): sbyor mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/  gnas 'jog gi bu dbang sngar nor can gyis mna' mas spyan drangs zin to// de nas
161b2(1): yongs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams rngam nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag nor can cig pu la nor yod kyis/ bdag cag med dam cin// nges sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
161b3(1): slong gi dge 'dun nyin re re gdugs tshad gsol zhing / bdag cag kho nas skabs ma thob par gyur/ de la ji ltar sgrub par bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas la sa
161b4(1): pa dge slong gi 'dun gdugs tshod gsol zin nas/ gshegs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de'i khyim rdo ba re re nas bkogs te bshig go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar
161b5(1): lengs te lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas/ khyim bdag nor can gyi khyim gang ba der song ste phyin nas/ nub sgo nas zhugs nas gdan ma bshams shing zhal zas kyang swa
161b6(1): byas pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang nor can gyi gna' ma la 'di skad ces smras so// nor can gyi mna' ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs nas// 
161b7(1): ji khyod snying las chung ngus gnas sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa ci ste de skad gsung / gad na ma bshams shing zhal zas rnams kyang sta gon ma byas pa mthong ngo // 'phag
161b8(1): ba chab sgo gang nas zhugs/ nub sgo nas so// 'phags pa brang nas zhugs shig/ de byang nas zhags shag/ de byang nas zhugs na/ dzaM tsam na lha'i gdan bshams
162a1(1): shing lha'i zhal zas sta gon byas pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to// de nas nor can gyi mna'am 'dren gyi/ bcom ldan 'das
162a2(1): la dus mchod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ zhes bya ba nas/ 
162a3(1): dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi grang la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag thams
162a4(1): cad 'dus nas/ khyim bdag nor can gyi sgo na 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khyim bdag nor can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag yangs pa can gyi
162a5(1): tshogs rnams skon 'dug ste/ de dag gis khyod la gnod pa byas par gyur du 'ong gis/ song la bzod par gsol cig/ de phyir byung nas bzod par gsol pa brtsams pa
162a6(1): dang de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag ci khyod gcig pu la yon yod dam/ gang gi phyir khyod kyis nyin re zhing sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tsho
162a7(1): gsol to/ kho bo cag gis skabs mi sbed par byed/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag gis tshogs kyi khrims su bcas pa ma thos kyis/ de bas na tshogs kyis bzod par
162a8(1): bya ba'i rigs so// gzhan dag gis sbas pa/ shes ldan dag skyes bu 'di ni dam pa ma yin pas 'di la bzod par bya'o// zhes de rnams bzod par 'gyur ba dang / nges smra
162b1(1): pa/ gal te de lta nang du zhugs shig/ de nas khyim du zhugs pa dang / gdan bzang bshams shing / zhal zas bsod pa rnams sta gon byas pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang / 
162b2(1): shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur nas smras pa/ khyim 'dag 'ba' shig khyod sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol par 'os kyi kho bo cag ni ma/ 
162b3(1): yin no// des de rnams kyis ma blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rin po che 'di dag rnyed par dka' ba yin gyis/ de rnams kyis blangs pa las gang / 
162b4(1): gi ci 'dra ba blangs pa de'i kha dog kho nar snang bar gyur to// de nas nor can gyi mna' mas/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs pa rig cing bsod
162b5(1): pa'i bza' ba dang brtsa ba bdag gis zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
162b6(1): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can gyi chung ma dang / nor can gyi bu dad nor can gyi gna' ma rnams kyi
162b7(1): bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ gang thos na nor can gyi chung ma dang / nor can gyi mna' ma rnams 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse ma
162b8(1): nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bu 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtog pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de rnams kyi bden
163a1(1): pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pa zhes bya ba nas/ bdag gi ni mngon par 'phags sa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 
163a2(1): bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang dge slong gi 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bsnyen du gsol// ji srid mtsho'i bar du
163a3(1): sreg dang yang spos ste skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nor can deng nor gyi chung ma dang / nor can gyi bu dang nor can gyi gna'am rnams
163a4(1): la chos dang ldan pa'i gtom gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag bzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so// 'dus
163a5(1): bgazhi bam po lnga bcu bdun pa'o// / dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad bcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhugs pa/ btsun pa nor
163a6(1): dang nor can gyi mchis brang dang / nor can gyi bu dang / nor can gyi mna' ma rnams kyis/ las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam pa smin pas phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes shing / lha dang mi
163a7(1): rnams kyi dpal nyams su myong bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di rnams kho nas las rnams byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 
163a8(1): 'bras bu dag tu gyur pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// dge slong dag sngon byung war NA si na me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan zhig yod pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma
163b1(1): blangs te de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed do// dga' bar byed do// dga' mgur sbyor brgya byed pa las/ khye'u
163b2(1): zhig btsas so// de de yang rigs mnyam las chung ma blangs so// des dus phyi zhig nas bkren zhing shin tu bkren par gyur te/ de dang bu dang chung ma dang / mna' mas brtson pa
163b3(1): chen pos/ 'bad pas ras yug cig grub nas/ de nas me tog 'phreng brgyad mkhan yang de dgos nas/ rgyal po la me tog 'phreng ba dbul me tog 'phreng mkhan gyi chung ma ya
163b4(1): de nyid dgos nas btsun mo la dbul/ me tog 'greng rgyud mkhan gyi bu yang de de nyid dgos nas gzhon nu rnams la dbul me tog 'greng ba rgyud mkhan gyi mna' ma yang de nyid dgos nas rgyal
163b5(1): po'i mna' ma rnams me tog 'phreng ba dbul bar byed do// sangs rgyas rnams byung ba med pa na/ 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang / ngan pa la snying brtse ba/ gnas mal/ 
163b6(1): bas mtha' la bsten pas/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas cig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ ji tsam ni rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/ nyi ma nub ska'i dus su
163b7(1): wA ra NA ser byin nas me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan de'i khyim grong khyer gyi sgron 'dug pa de'i ldum par nub mo gan bdab se mo'i khams la snyoms par bzhugs so// de nas me tog 'breng/ 
163b8(1): brgyud mkhan des me'i phung por 'bar ba lta bur mthong nas/ de dad pa skyes te chung ma la sma saM pa dang / de yang dad par gyur to// des bul spras pa dang / de yang dad par gyur to// des
164a1(1): mamara' mal smras pa dang / da yang dad par gyur to// de nas de rnams kyi gros byas par brtsams pa/ bdag cag sangs mAr ma zos kyang bla 'dus la rab tu
164a2(1): byung ba zhi pa'i bdag nyid can/ 'di shos gsol lo// de nas nam langs nas/ de rnams kyis de la bsod snyoms phul lo// me tog 'breng rgyud mkhan gyis spras pa/ bzang mkho ngan
164a3(1): ris kyis dgo skal gang yin pa de ni/ rab tu byung ba 'di la dbul lo// des smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag gi yang dbul lo// bus smras pa/ bdag gi yang dbul lo// mna'am
164a4(1): smras pa/ bdag gis yang dbul lo// de nas de rnams 'dus nis de la ras bskon no// bdag nyid chen po de dag ni/ lus kyis chos ston gyi tshig gis ma yin pas/ de nas bdag nyid
164a5(1): chen po de de rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ nam mkha' la 'phags nas 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog rgya ba'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so// so so'i
164a6(1): skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtong bas/ shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas/ smon lam btab par rtsams pa/ bdag cag gis
164a7(1): yon nas dam pa 'di lta bu la/ byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag phyug cing nor mang po la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing / bdag cag gi khyim du lha dang mi'i g.yang 'ab
164a8(1): bar gyur cig/ 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig/ ces byas so// de nas rang sangs rgyas
164b1(1): kyis rnams la snying brtse bar rdzu 'phrul byas nas rgyal po'i rab tu snangan par bcas te song ba dang / de'i grib ma N+Dal ba'i steng du bab pa las/ bdag pos bstod de lta bar brtsam/ 
164b2(1): ba dang / bdag nyid chen po de mthong nas des bsams pa dang / bdag nyid chen po 'dis yang su zhig gi bkren pa'i rtsa ba phyung bar snyam mo// me tog 'phreng brgyad mkhan de rgyal ba la/ 
164b3(1): me tog dbul ba'i dus gang yin pa las the tsom yol lo// rgyal po yang me tog la sdod cing 'dug go// de nas me tog 'greng ba rgyud mkhan de rgyal po'i zho shas mche ba rnams kyis bku
164b4(1): pa dang rgyal pos de la smras pa/ ci'i phyir khyod kyi me tog de ring dus las yol/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / de nas rgyal pos ji snyed gyon pa byin no// de bzhin du me tog 'phro
164b5(1): brgyud mkhan gyi chung ma laM ni btsun mo rnams kyis ji snyed gyon pa byin no// me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhar gyi bu la ni/ gzhon nu rnams kyis so// me tog 'phreng ba rgyud mkhan gyi mna' ma la ni
164b6(1): rgyal po'i mna'am rnams kyis te/ de mthong ba'i chos de nyid la nor gyi mngon par gyur to// dbul ba med par gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi me tog 'phreng
164b7(1): rgyud mkhan gang yin pa de ni nor can 'di nyid yin no// me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan gyi chung ma ni nor can gyi chung ma yin no// me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu ni nor can gyi bu yin no// me
164b8(1): rtag 'phreng rgyang mkhan gyi mna' ma ni nor can gyi mna' ma yin te/ 'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bye ba byas shing / smon lam btab pa ba gang yin pa de'ilas kyi rnam
165a1(1): par smin pas phyug cing nor mngal/ longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes nas/ khyim du lnga dang mi'i yang mang po longs spyod rtag tu 'bab par gyur la/ nga'i spyan/ 
165a2(1): sngar nas kyang bden pa mthong bar byas te/ nga rang sangs rgyas byi ba brgya stong pas khyod du 'phags pa'i ston pa 'di dag gis mnyes par byas kyi mi mnyes par ma yin no// dge
165a3(1): slang de lta bas na las cig tu gnag pa rnams ni zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu las slab par bya'o// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas/ 
165a4(1): yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams lhag par yang mngon par dad par gyur nas/ stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 
165a5(1): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cog tu/ bdag cag gis dgung zla sum du nam bza' chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang / 
165a6(1): gzims cha dag bsgyur sbyangs dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams dbul zhing mchis nA/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar yangs
165a7(1): pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la gnang ngo // de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas/ 
165a8(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ stan las langs te dong ngo // de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis de nyid kyis nub sa
165b1(1): rdzas/ gsang ning bsong pa'i gza' bla dang / bca' bdags gan zas te nas bya ba nas phyag bcabs te/ lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ snyan chas dma' bzhig blangs te/ 
165b2(1): mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la chos
165b3(1): dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzeng stod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs
165b4(1): te gshegs so// de bzhin du nyi ma gnyis sam gnyis sam gsum gyi bar 'das so// yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi 'khor rgya chen po/ mu ge dang bcas
165b5(1): pa'i dus byung nas/ de rnams kyi nye du dag/ zas kyi phyir nyi ma re re zhing 'ong bas/ de dag gis gtses par gyur nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dge mu ge dang bcas/ 
165b6(1): pa'i dus byung bas/ bdag cag gi nyi du bdag bskur mchi ste/ de rnams la bdag cag gdugs gcig bzhin gsol pas/ khyed cag dang de rnams la khyab par rngo ma thog
165b7(1): nad kye ma 'phags pa dag bdag cag gi yo byad rnams dbul gyis/ zhal ta kho na mdzod cig/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das la nus te bya'o// zhes dge
165b8(1): slong rnams kyis skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams kyis zas kyi
166a1(1): zhal ta bya'o zhes gsungs pas/ de rnams kyis zhal ta bya bar brtsams de/ ji tsam na steng g.yogs med par thug par 'tshed pa'i zhal ta byas pa las/ 
166a2(1): lAs char 'bab pas de ma rung bar gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng g.yogs med par gtso bar mi bya'o// 
166a3(1): sgo khang dang khyams su 'tsho bar byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo khang dang khyams su btso'i bar mi bya'o// dge slong dag de lta bas na rung ba'i gnas kyi bzhin
166a4(1): mi rung ba bcu po 'di dag ste/ 'di rnams su zas rba kyi zhal ta mi bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ steng ga yogs med pa dang / sgo khang dang khyams dang / sro lang dang khrus khang
166a5(1): dang nga rgyal po'i gnas dang / mchod rten gnas dang / mu stegs can gyi gnas dang / khyim bdag gis gnas dang / dge slong ma'i dbyar khang ngo // bcu po 'di
166a6(1): dag ni rung ba ma yin pa'i gnas kyi gzhi yin te/ de rnams su dge slong gis zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o// zhal ta byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sdom ni na
166a7(1): bu can dang zas dag dang / g.yar bcus lhag pa dag dang yang / tshal gyi 'bras bu chu skyes dang / pad+ma'i rtsa dang lug dag go/ gling bzhi dang ni mnyan yod ni dge slong
166a8(1): nad bu can zhig yod pa des/ sman pa la dris pa bzhin bzangs kho bo la sman ston cig/ des nad kyi gzhi dris nas smras pa/ 'phags pa thug pa gsol cig
166b1(1): dang sos par gyur gyis/ des smras pa bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa thugs rje can yin pas/ 'di nyid kyi
166b2(1): rkyen nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do// des skabs de dge slong rnams kyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa gal
166b3(1): te sman pas thug pa btung shig ces zer na sman pas bsgo ba bzhin du thug pa btud pa bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sman gas so khe bzhin
166b4(1): ni sa mi na / dang / dri theg pa btung bar bya'i zhes bya ba bka' stsal pa dang / de'i nang g.yogs gis thug pa grang mo zhig khyer te byin no// 
166b5(1): de nas sman pa 'ongs nas 'dris pa/ 'phags pa khyod de'am/ des smras pa bzhin bzangs mi bde'o// ci khyod kyis thug pa ma gsol to// thungs so// ci 'dra ba'i zhig drang ma'o// / 
166b6(1): 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so// sad ni dron mo gsol cig/ de nas de'i nad yog gi spangs na grang mo lan rnyed nas/ des de bsres te byin no// de nas sman pas
166b7(1): 'ongs te de bzhin du dris pa dang / des smras pa mi 'de'o// ci thag pa ma gsol tam 'thungs so// ci 'dra' ba zhig grang mo zhig sos nas so// 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis sa
166b8(1): grangs te bsos pa lags kyis/ sang ni rang bzhin gyis dron por mdzad de gsol cig/ de nas de'i nad g.yog gis 'bras dang snod sta gon byas nas gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol
167a1(1): / gargya shing drung zhig tu bca par rnams pa las/ dngas paka'i drug pas ma rung bar byas pas dge slong da 'ongs par gyur pa'i skabs te/ dge slong rnams lam sa/ 
167a2(1): / slong rnams kyis ni bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na rung ba'i gnas dag spo bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / 
167a3(1): de dge slong rnams kyis ci 'dre ba dang / ci tsam par shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga/ rung ba'i gnas ni lnga ste/ brtsam pa'i mtha' can dang / sems gtong ba'i mtha'
167a4(1): dang ma nyal ba lta bu dang / stong pa'i gnas dang / bkos pa'o// de la brtsom pa'i mtha' can ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong lag gis blas gnas brtsom na der thog mar gzhi 'di ni dge 'dun
167a5(1): gyi rung ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro// zhes sems skyed cing tshig su bcad smras pa ste/ 'di ni sems gtong ba'i mtha' can zhes bya'o// mnyal ba lta bu gang zhe na/ gang la sgo tha dad par gsas
167a6(1): pa ste/ 'di ni mnyal ba lta bu zhes bya'o// gnas stong gang zhe ma/  spangs pa'i gnas te/ 'di ni gnas stong pa zhes bya'o// bsgos pa gang zhe na/ gsol pa dang gnyis kyi las kyi
167a7(1): bsdus pa'o// dge slong rnams kyis ci ltar bskyob ma shes ras/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gang zhig thams cad zin par byas pa/ nang tshams phyi rol nyen kor
167a8(1): 'dam gang dad bcas pag dge 'dun gyis 'ad na bsko bya'o// ban pa yang 'di ltar bya ste// gnas mal bgams nas/ 'ag ni badrangs te/ dris pa'i tshig gas das slong rnams la mang zar
167b1(1): skol dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cig mthun par byung ba dang / dge slong gtsigags gsol pa byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol// gnas thams cad lags
167b2(1): pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nyer khror 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun rung ba'i gnas bsgo na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar
167b3(1): mdzad cig dang / dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang phyi rol tu nyer 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di'i dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko'o// 
167b4(1): 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol// gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang phyi rol nyer 'khor 'dom gong dang bcas pa
167b5(1): 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas bsko bar bzhed de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang bcas pa/ 
167b6(1): 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bskyo na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las/ gang dag gnas thams cad legs pa/ nang mtshams dang phyi rol nyen 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas/ 
167b7(1): pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba gnas su bsgo bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de ni gsung shig/ dge 'dun gyis gnas su thams cad bgyis
167b8(1): lags pas/ nang mtshams dang phyi rol chen 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bskos lags te/ 'di ltar bar mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// 
168a1(1): gang du dge 'dun gyis rung ba'i gnas su bskos pa/ der gnyis bsgobs ste/ 'tshams kyi nas du bcos pa dang / 'tshams kyi nang du gzhag lon pa'o// sangs
168a2(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram du/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so// yangs pa can gyi sde dpon seng ge zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i
168a3(1): nye 'khor na gnas pa rnams kyis/ de'i ched du sha khyer te 'ongs na de yang za bar byed do// gang gis tshe des bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe mi bza' bas khyer te 'ongs
168a4(1): ra yo dge slong rnams la sbyin par byed do// dge slong rnams kyis de dag zos pa dang / mu stegs can rnams smod par byed gzhogs dbyas byed kha zer bar byed do// shes ldan dag ded
168a5(1): dpon seng ge'i ched du byas s+ho/ sha khyer te 'ongs na ni de dag ma zas la/ shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong srong rnams la byin pa dang / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyi ched du byas pa sha ni zlos
168a6(1): so zhes bya ba'i skabs de/ de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas gnas gsum gyi rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza'
168a7(1): bar mi bya'o// zhes bya gsungs pa'i gang zhe na/ bdag gis ched du byas par gsum du mthong ba/ rung ba'i ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / yid
168a8(1): ches yid ches pa las khyod kyis ched du byas pa yin no// zhes thos pa/ rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / rang nyid kyi blo la rnam par rtog pa'i
168b1(1): skyes pa'i tshul las 'di bdag gis ched du byas pa yin no// snyam pa ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o// zhes gsungs pa yin no// dge slong dag gnas gsum gyis rung ba'i
168b2(1): sha bza' bar bya'o// zhes gsungs pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'dis bdag gi ched du byed mngon gsum du mthong ba/ rung ba'i sha mi bza' bar bya'o// zhes gsungs pa dang / yid ches
168b3(1): pa las 'dis khyed kyi ched du byas pa ma yin no// zhes thos pa rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o// zhes gsungs pa dang / bdag nyid kyi blo la rnam par rtog pa tshul las 'di bdag gis ched du byas pa
168b4(1): yin no// snyam du ma skyes pa rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o// zhes gsungs pa yin no// gleng bzhi ni nyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ dge slong dag ltogs par gyur pas/ de rnams glos las
168b5(1): ste 'dug pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gcig tu brtson par bya ba'i bstan pa la/ ci'i slad du mgo bos phob ste bzhugs shing / dge ba'i phyogs la brtson
168b6(1): par mi mdzad/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas bsod snyoms lto 'brangs par ji snyed pas/ kho bo cag lcogs te/ nyams chung bas des glos phab ste 'dug go/ de rnams kyis
168b7(1): smras pa/ ji ste gus mi gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis garang ngo khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can pas/ gnang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas yod do// zhes bya ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis
168b8(1): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu stegs sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur/ dge slong rnams kyis g.yar
169a1(1): gnas su sus bza' bar ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ dge slong rnams la bram ze dang khyim bdag dang
169a2(1): pa can rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag 'di nyid du zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig/ de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ bsod snyoms sngar rnyed pa khyer gtsug lag khang du song ste/ 
169a3(1): de rnams kyis mu go'i skyon gyis dede yang bza' bar 'dod na 'on kyang / 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
169a4(1): stsal pa/ de'i byin su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon par 'di lta bu 'dod pa na sngar blangs zin to snyam du sems la/ sngar rnyed pa yang bza' bar byas te/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gling bzhi ni mnyan
169a5(1): yod na'o/ mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus su byung nas/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis/ dge slong rnams khyim gyi nang du zas la 'gron du bos nas/ de rnams kyis zos pa dang / bca' ba las
169a6(1): lhag ma zhig lus so// bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dang khyod kyi ched du spa gon bgyis pa lags kyis snoms te bzhud la phyis gsol gcig/ de rnams
169a7(1): kyis khyer te dong po de nas de yang za bar 'dod na 'gyod pa mazos pa'i skabs der/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
169a8(1): stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon par 'di lta bur 'di dag ni byin pa yin no// snyam du bsam nas/ bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng bzhin
169b1(1): gcan yong na los mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung ba ma bram ze dang khyim bdag dang ba can rnams kyis dge slong rnams pas 'gron du bos te/ de rnams kyis thon mas bca' ba las
169b2(1): bcung zad cig lhag pa ste dge slong rnams dong ba dag/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis sbas pa 'di ni bdag cag gis/ 'phags pa dag kho na la yongs su btang bas lags te/ 'tshal
169b3(1): te 'chi la kho na la dbul lo// zhes de rnams kyis khyer te 'ongs pa dang / dge slong rnams la yang za bar byed 'dod na 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis
169b4(1): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal ba dgon pa 'di lta bur/ sngar yongs su btang
169b5(1): pa'o// snyam du bsams pa nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni gnyen yod na'o// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis/ nub phyogs tshal na
169b6(1): yod pa'i 'bras bu rnams grub nas/ de rnams kyis bsam pa/ 'di dag ni brnyed par dka' ba yin pas/ 'phags pa rnams la dbul lo// zhes de dag gis dge slong rnam/ 
169b7(1): zlas zos nas spang 'byas pa rnams la/ de dag byin pa dang dge slong rnams kyis spang ba byas zin no// zhes 'gyod pas ma zos pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dang bcam
169b8(1): kyis sbas pa/ 'phags bdag gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba'i che/ mu stegs can rnams la yon gnas bgyid pa lags/ nga ni bcom ldan 'das
170a1(1): 'jig rten du byung nas/ khyed rnams kyis kyang da ni yon gnas su gyur pa lags na/ gal te khyed kyis ma bzhes na ci bdag cag dge ba'i shul
170a2(1): rgyags dang bral te 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mchi bar bgyi'am/ de lto bas na thugs brtsebs bzhes shig pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis
170a3(1): bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste rnyed dka' ba yinano/ snyam du bsam nas/ bza'/

170a5(1): thog ur man dang / shing thog ku ru ma yi ka dang / shing thog ni go tso dang / shing thog pa b+hu dang / shing thog sin tsi ka'o// gleng gzhi ni nyan yod na'o// khram
170a6(1): ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis/ dge slong rnams zas zos zin pa dang / chu las skyes pa dang phul ba dang / dge slong rnams 'dod kyang spang ba byas
170a7(1): zin to// zhes 'gyod pas zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brnyed dka'
170a8(1): ba yin no// snyam du bsam nas bza' dra bar bya ste/ de la mgyod par mi bya'o// de la chun skyes pa ni 'di dag yin te/ ud pa la'i rtsa ba dang pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang // 
170b1(1): kum+ba ta'i sa bon dang / brla'os zin no// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khams ma snyoms pas khrag dang / bdakan 'khrugs par gyur to// de'i rim
170b2(1): 'gro byed pa tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gul gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/ bdag rang gi blo na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la lan mang du rim gro byas kyis/ lan 'ga' yang sman pa lam
170b3(1): dris kyis/ ma la bdag gis dri'o snyam nas/ des sman pa la dris pa/ bzhin bzangs tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs par gyur na/ de'i sman ston cig nges
170b4(1): smras pa/ 'phags pa pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i ri bo ma rtsol cig/ nad sos par 'gyur ra ro// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis tshe dang
170b5(1): ldan pa shA ri'i bu la/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba phal ba'i 'o mas rim gro bya ba ni bdag nicha ma yin no// sum bsamanas/ ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pas/ mnyan yod
170b6(1): nas mi snang bar gyur te/ ngal gyis 'bab ces bya ba'i 'gram du phyin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rab rtan gyis gnas
170b7(1): bar gyur pa dang / de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dgongs pa ci zhig phyir phyin des smras pa/ tshe dang ldam pa shA ri'i bu khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs
170b8(1): nas/ dri'i sman pas/ baid+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma bstan to// klu'i rgyal mo rab bstan gyi gnas dang nye bar gyur pa dang / re shig bzhes shig/ de ngal gyis 'bab kyi nang du zhugs
171a1(1): nas mi'i chang tsam gyis pad+ma'i rtsa bdag bton cing / pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i skyo rar bzang nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i lhung bzed
171a2(1): bkang // tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos pad+ma'i rtsa ba gshegs pa lta bar brtsams pa dang / de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa mi gzigs pa pad+ma'i
171a3(1): bdag gsol par bzhed dam/ des cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / smras pa/ 'phags pa bzhud cig dang / skur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gul gyi bu chen pos/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o// 
171a4(1): mas lhung bzed bkang ba mkhyen nas ngal gyi 'bab kyi 'gram nas mi snang bar byas te/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' rab na phyin to// de nas tshe
171a5(1): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bstan pa gzhan pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o mthungs pas so sa par gyur to// klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis kyang glang po che nag po'i tshe byad 'chad pa la/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba khur cig bskur nas/ 
171a6(1): mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song la/ gtsug lag khang gi khyams kyi 'dun du gzhog la shog shig/ de rlung gi shugs ltar 'gyogs pa'i mthus/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal
171a7(1): byed kyi tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams khyams kyi 'dun du zhag nas slar log pa las/ lam gyis phyed nas tshal glang mo zhig yod pa dang / lhan gcig 'dus
171a8(1): bar gyur ro 'dus gzhan zhig na ba glang mo de la/ bgrang gi phrug gu gcig 'brang ba'i mdo la seng ge'i sgra byin to// de nas ba glang mo de bskrag pas/ gcig tu ston nas pa glang mo phrug gu
171b1(1): bar khros so/ denas rgyal po'i khaban gnas pa'i shing mkha zhig/ shing gi chang du tshal du song b.las bgrang phrug gung mthong nas/ tsam du grangs te sun gsos bskrad de/ nar gyis
171b2(1): bskyangs pas ming nor skyong zhes bya bar grags so// kha cig ni rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la nor skyod skyes su bskur ba las/ de mnyan yod kyi yul na
171b3(1): gnas pa'i skye bos nor gyis bskyangs pas na/ nor skyong zhes 'don do// pad+ma'i rtsa ba kha cig ni tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos zas/ kha cig ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kha cig ni
171b4(1): dge 'dun la brims pa las/ 'on kyang lhag par gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis spangs pa byas nas kyang za bar 'dod na bdag cag gis spangs pa byas so zhes ma zos pa'i
171b5(1): skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'angs la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mi rnams kyis lha'i pad+ma'i rtsa brnyed par dka' bas/ de'i phyir rjes
171b6(1): su gnang ste/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnyed dka' ba yin no// snyam du bsam nas bza bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe grong khyer bzang byed na bsod nams chen
171b7(1): pos shes par bya ba drug gnas te/ khyim bdag lug ces bya ba dang / lug gi chung ma dang / lug gi mna' ma dang / lug gi bran po dang / lug gi bran mo dang / khyim bdag lug bsod nam
171b8(1): che bar ji ltar shes zhes na/ gal te bang mdzod stong pa rnams bltas na/ mthong ma thag kho nar nor gang bar gyur to// de ltar na khyim bdag khrag bsod nams che bar shes so// lug gi rlung
172a1(1): ma ji lta zhe ma des gcig gi don du/ snod du bcos pa ri brgya stong gi bza' ba byung ste/ lug gi chung ma ni de lta bu yin/ lug gi bu ji lta bu zhe na/ de'i rkyen la lnga brgya pa'i
172a2(1): snod btags te 'dug la/ nges gang gi tshe brgya'am stong yongs su btang ba de'i tshe de du btang bar 'dug ste/ yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/ lug gi bu ni de lta bu yin no// lug gi mna' ma ji
172a3(1): lta bu zho ma des gcig gis don du dri sbyar na brgya stong khyed par 'gyur te/ lug gi mna' ma ni de lta bu yin no// lug gi bran po ji lta bu zhe na/ des gang gi tshe zhing la rol cig smos pa de'i tshe
172a4(1): zhing la rol bdun smon par 'gyur te/ lug gi bran po ni lta bu yin no// lug gi bran mo ji ltar bsod nams che bar shes zhe na/ des gang gi tshe gang tsam drus pa de'i bdun tsam du skye bar
172a5(1): 'gyur te/ de lta na lug gi bran mo bsod nams che ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ 
172a6(1): kun dga' bo song la/ dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyis/ khyed cig las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 
172a7(1): thabs cig du ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du/ 'dod par spo ba de ni chos gos rnams longs shig ces sgo shig/ btsun pa dka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan
172a8(1): 'das kyi ltar nyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dgra bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyis/ khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 
172b1(1): thabs cis sangs rgyam zang zung bdang bye du ba gra ma rnas gas rnams mangs shig tshe dang ldan bga' ba na tshal zhes dag slang rnams kyis / tshe dang ldan pa sun nas
172b2(1): bo las nyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba 'khor 'dul ba/ zhib 'khor zhig/ dgra btsam pa/ 'khor dgra bcom pa dang / ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs so// gang gi tshe
172b3(1): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod chom 'phrul chen po bsnyon pa de'i tshe mu stegs can rnams mtha' khob du dod pa las/ de nas kha cig grong khyer bzang byed du dong nas gnas pa de rnams kyis/ dge
172b4(1): sbyong ko'u ta ma 'ongs so// zhes thos nas kyang rong por gyur nas bdag cag sngon ni dge sbyong ko'u tams yul dbus nas mthar spyugs so// de la gal te 'dir 'ongs na/ gdon mi za bar bdag cag
172b5(1): 'di nas kyang spyugs par 'gyur gyis/ de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o// skam mo de rnams rims kyi khyim dag du dod nas smras pa/ chos thob par gyur cig/ 'phags pa dag de ci lags/ 
172b6(1): shes ldan dag ltos zin gyis 'gro'o// ji'i slad du re shig khyed cag gis 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa ni kho bo cag gis mthong gis/ ji srid rgyud pa mthong ba de'i bar du 'dod do// 'phags pa dag cag
172b7(1): rgyud pa ci zhig 'byung bar gyur legs/ shes ldan dag dge sbyong ko'u ta ma spu gri'i ser ba 'bebs shing / dum zhig bu med pa dang / khyim thab med par byed cing 'ong ngo // 'phags pa dag gal te de lta na gang gi
172b8(1): dus kho nar bgyi ba de kho na'i dus su bdag cag spangs par bgyi 'am bzhugs shig/ ma bzhud cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag ni ci ste 'dug/ khyed cag kho bo cag gi nyan du mi btub
173a1(1): bo/ 'phags pa dag gsungs shig nyan par bgyi'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag grang khyer bzang byed kyis kor gyi/ skye ba'i chags thams cad
173a2(1): gnas nas byung ga/ grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du chud cig / rtsa sngon po rnams na rjes shig ka 'dug pa'i gnas rnams ni shig cig/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnams tshe tshad cig/ chu/ 
173a3(1): rnams su ni dug blugs shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bzhugs shig dang thams cad bgyi'o// de nas de rnams kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas
173a4(1): gtor nas/ grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du bcug te/ rtsa sngon po rnams ni brngas/ 'dug gnas rI bshig/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni bcang / chu rnams ni dug thugs so// de nas lha
173a5(1): rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur bsti ma yin pa byed pa yal bar dor ba ni bdag gis cha ma yin te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med
173a6(1): pa gsum dung dka' ba brgya stong du mas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas/ bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i bcom ldan 'das de/ 'jig rten thams cad
173a7(1): med pa'i yul stong du rgyu zhing gshegs par bya'am/ mal bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bde ba la reg par bya ba'i phyir 'bad par bya'o//
