173a8(1): snyam nas des rlung bting ba'i lha'i bu rnams la bsgom pa/ song la chu can rnams snyoms shig/ char ba 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu rnams la bsgo ba/ 'di rnams kyis bskabs dang
173b1(1): khyod kyis chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i khong shig gargyal chen bzhi rigs kyi lha rnams la yang / bsgo ba khyod kyis grong khyer bzang byed che 'khor du gnas thob shig/ de nas rlung gtong ba'i lnga'i/ 
173b2(1): bus ni chu drug can rnams bskams so// char 'babs pa'i lha'i bus mi/ ra srang chu na lag brgyad dang ldan pas bkang ngo // rgyal cher bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyis kyang / thong khyer bzang byed
173b3(1): 'khor du gnas btab nas ljongs rnams 'byor cing rgyas par gyur to// mu stegs can rnams kyis grong khyer nag nas pa'i skye bo'i tshigs rnams bsags nas/ de rnams kyis rtog can dag mdegs ste/ 
173b4(1): ljongs rnams ci 'dra ltos shig/ de rnams dong ba las ljongs rnams lhag par yang 'byor cing rgyas par gyur pa mthong nas slar 'ongs te skyes pa/ shes ldan dag ljongs rnams 'di ltar 'byor
173b5(1): cang rgyas pa ni/ sngon lan 'ga' yang bdag cag gis ma mthong ngo // mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dge khyod kyis kyis mthong ngam/ re shig gang zhig sems pa'i dngos
173b6(1): po rnams kyang rgyur bar byed pa des/ khyed cag rgyur bar mi byed pa de lta bu sring re skam/ khyed cag rnam pa mas cad du bltas zin te/ blta ba'i tha ma byas nas 'gro'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 
173b7(1): 'phags bdag bzhugs shig khyed cag la dge sbyong ko'u tams ci zhig bgyir mchis/ de yang rab tu bya lags la/ khyed kyang rab tu byung srong zhing 'tshe ba lags na/ ci des khyed kyis slong ba
173b8(1): bkag par 'gyur snyam 'am/ mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ba ste/ gal te khyed cag sus kyang dge sbyong ko'u ta ma lam blta bar 'gro bar mi bya zhing / gang zhig 'tsho
174a1(1): de la chad par dkar sha ba na drug bcus bcad par khrims su cha' na 'dug go// de rnams kyis kyang khas blangs nas/ khrims su bcas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
174a2(1): ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs nas/ bzang byed kyi lho phyogs kyi gnas shig na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i bzhi'i bram ze'i bu mo// grong
174a3(1): khyer bzang byed du bag mar btang bder ba'i kha na 'dug pas/ bcom ldan 'das mun khung na bzhugs pa mthong nas/ nges bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rigs dga'
174a4(1): bar mdzad pa shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyal po spangs nas rab tu byung ba de ni 'di yin te/ gal te 'di la them skas shig yod par gyur na/ bdag mar me thogs la 'babs bzhin/ de nas
174a5(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi sa de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ tham kas zhig sprul to// de nas de'i snying dge' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas mar me zhogs te/ tha ma skas
174a6(1): las babs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mar me gzhag nas/ zhags gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ chos
174a7(1): mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa
174a8(1): bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas/ skyabs su mchi mngon par dang lags so// zhes bya ba'i bar gang bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
174b1(1): kyi bu ma de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo khyod tshur khyim bdag yug skyes gang na bar logs su byon pa dang / de lang na re nang par gyur cig ces spros la 'di skad ces
174b2(1): kyang smros shig/ khyim bdag kyi ched kho nar 'dir 'ongs na/ khyod sgob bcad nas 'dug pa/ glo bur ba la ji ltar khyod pa de lta bur bya ci rigs sam/ gal te tshogs kyi sa khrims su
174b3(1): bca' ba byas so zhes smras pa dang / khyod kyi bu'i rked pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags ste/ 'dug pa des gal te brgya 'am/ stong 'god par btang na yang gang 'du ba kho nar gyur zhing
174b4(1): yongs su zad par mi gyur na/ khyed kaM pa ni drug bcu byin nas 'ong mi nus sam zhes smros shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bu mo des bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar
174b5(1): mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs kyang mi tshor ba de lta bu byin gyis brlabs par khyim bdag lug gi phyin pa dang / smras pa khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das khyod la na
174b6(1): med par gyur cig ces gsungs so// des smras pa bu mo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// khyim bdagra bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed kho na'i ched dung 'dir gshes
174b7(1): nA khyod sde bcang nas 'dug pa/ blo bur ba la ji ltar khyod byed pa de lta bur de ci rigs sam/ des smras pa/ bu mo tshogs kyis khrims su bca' ba sus kyang dge sbyong ko'u ta ma la lta ba'i
174b8(1): phyir 'gro bar mi bya'o// gang zhig 'gron de la chags kyi kar sha man drug cu'i chang pas bcad de/ zhes bcas so// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ khyod kyi bu'i rkyed pa la/ 
175a1(1): lnga brgya pa'i snod cig btags te 'dug pa des gal te brgya 'am/ stong 'god par btang na yang gang ba kho nar 'gyur zhing yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na kar sha pa na drug
175a2(1): bcu byin nas/ khyod 'ong bar mi nus sam zhes gsung ngo // des bsam pa 'di ni sus kyang mi shes na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin pas/ 'gro snyam nas/ des kar sha pa na
175a3(1): drug cu stor bzhag nas te/ bram ze'i bu mos bstan pa'i thams smras la babs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la marga/ 
175a4(1): bis phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug skyes sam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang
175a5(1): bzhin nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ khyim bdag lug gis de thos nas zhes bya ba nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
175a6(1): mngon sum du byas so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// des bden pa mthong nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzang byed na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag gis kyang / ci zhig
175a7(1): 'di lta bu'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod la rten nas/ pha lo cher kun gyis thob 'gyur ro// de nas
175a8(1): khyim bdag lug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga mas song ste/ de khyim du phyin nas grang khyer gyi nang du kar sha pa na'i phung / 
175b1(1): po btsir te/ tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ gang gi rgyal ba'i 'dod chags skyon bcom rtsod med pa/ mtshungs pa med pa gser gyis mdog can lta 'dod pa/ de'i 'jigs med
175b2(1): snying gis shin tu nges byos la/ myur du deng shig den kho bos gzhal/ skye ba'i tshogs kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag dge sbyong ko'u ta ma mthong nas dge bar gyur rag/ des smras
175b3(1): pa/ dge bar 'gyur ro// de nas kyis smras pa/ gal te de ltar na tshogs kho bo nas khrims su bca' ba tshogs kho nas shin du bzang mod/ 'di la 'gal ba ci yod/ de rnams kyis
175b4(1): khrims su bca' ba shig nas/ byug par 'gyur brtsams so// de nas phan tshun sngos nas byung bar ma nus pa dang / gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes 'dul ba'i skye bo la snying ba rtse ba'i/ 
175b5(1): phyir/ rdo rje 'phangs pas/ ra ba dral nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul nas byung ngo // de nas skye
175b6(1): bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nye kor dag tshang 'khor bar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor de rnams zil gyis gnan te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi lung
175b7(1): la/ gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ sems can du ma dag gi rgyud las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byed pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas kha cig gis ni rgyur du zhugs
175b8(1): ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bcas so// zhes bya ba nas kha cig gis skyabs gro ba dang / slab pa'i gzhi rnams drangs so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// 'dul ba gzhi// 
176a1(1): bam po lnga bcu brgyad pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring zhig tu ches bshad pas gdugs tshad kyi dus las yol par
176a2(1): gyur to// khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag zas
176a3(1): kyi dus las yol bar gyur to// des gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags par rung ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mar dang bur ma dang / hwags
176a4(1): dang / sha kha ra dang btung ba dgo/ de nas khyim bdag lug gis g.yos ma kha na dag bkug ste smras pa/ shes ldan dag dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams myur du sta gon
176a5(1): gyis shig/ de rnams kyis dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams sta gon byas so// de nas khyim bdag lug gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la/ dus ma yin pa'i
176a6(1): bca' ba dang dus ma yin pa'i btung ba rnams kyis tshim par byas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug 'khor dang bcas pa yang bden pa rnams so so
176a7(1): bkod/ ri bo na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de yang / skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du btul to gshegs pa na/ khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bstan rgyas kyi
176a8(1): zed kar sha pa na dag bzhes shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis blang bar bya ba ma
176b1(1): shes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rung ba byed pas so// rung ba byed pa med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul gyis so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
176b2(1): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul gyi slab pa'i bzhi bcu bar/ gser dngul len par ma gsungs la/ bcom ldan 'das/ 
176b3(1): kyis dge tshul gyis blang bar bya'o// zhes gang gsungs pa de/ ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye ba 'khor ngas 'chang bar byed pa la dgongs
176b4(1): ste/ gsungs kyi mi blangs pa ni ma yin te/ des na dge tshul gyis blangs par bya ba'i blangs nas/ khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bu ram dag bzhes shig
176b5(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blangs par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis ji ltar blang bar bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim pa
176b6(1): 'am dge tshul med na/ dge slong zhag bdun par byin gyis rlabase nas rang nyid kyis bkur bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis ji ltar byin gyis rlabs par bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
176b7(1): bka' stsal pa/ lag pa gnyis dkrus nas byin len byas te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pas bkab nas/ dge slong zhig gi mdun du 'dug gnas/ tshe dang ldan pa dgo
176b8(1): su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i sman 'di bdag dang tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi phyir zhag bdun par byin gyis rlabs po// zhes de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par
177a1(1): gyur bya'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan panye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis nas bdur par byin gyis rlab par bya ba'o zhes
177a2(1): gis 'tshal bar gyis lags nye bar 'khor gang zag lnga rnams kyis te/ lam du zhugs pa dang / sbyang ba byang ba dang / nad pa dang dge skos dang / lag gi blangs so// dge slong ljongs rgyud
177a3(1): chas pa rnams kyis 'bras dang phye dag gi nang du bu ram bcug pa las/ lam gyisangal nas za bar 'dod na 'gyod pas bzos pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
177a4(1): la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag zas des zas kyi babyed mi nus pas/ 'bras bu dag gi ni nang du bcug pa gang yin pa de sprugs nas za bar bya'o// 
177a5(1): phye rnams kyi gang yin pa de ni chus bkrus nas bza' bar bya'o// kha cig bzhu bar gyur pa de'i bkur ma rung ste/ zas dang bcas pa nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
177a6(1): stsal pa/ spug gi 'tshal bas bzhar la chu sa dkru bar bya'o// 'on kyang zas med par bya ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs par gsal te chu'i nang du mnyes
177a7(1): la btung bar byas nas/ de tshags kyi btsags la btung bar byas te/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
177a8(1): 'das la nus pa btsun pa khyim bdag lug dang / lug gi mchis 'brang dang / lug gi bu dang / lug gi gna' ma dang / lug gi zan po dang / lug gi bran mos las ci zhig bgyis na/ das
177b1(1): na drug bsod chen por gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar bden pa mthong nas/ 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis kyis ma mnyes par ni ma lags/ bcom
177b2(1): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
177b3(1): du'o// dge slong dag sngor byung wA ra NA si'i grong khyer du/ rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go// de'i tshi wA ra Na si'i grong khyer du bltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu
177b4(1): gnyis su char mi 'bab pas/ mthur mas 'tsho ba'i mu ge chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// mu ge rnam pa gsum ni za ma tog dang / rus gong dkar po dang / thur mas 'tsho
177b5(1): ba'o// de la za ma tog de'i nang du mi rnams kyis 'bru dag blugs te/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis ched du bzhag nas/ bdag cag shin 'bru 'dis mi de dag gis bya
177b6(1): babyed par 'gyur ro snyam ste/ 'di ni za ma tog dang 'brel bas za ma tog ces bya'o// rus gong dkar po gang zhe na/ dus de na mi rnams kyis rus pa dag bsdus nas re shig btsos to// 
177b7(1): dza tsam na rus pa de dkar por gyur pa dang / de nas de'i khu 'thung ba ste/ 'di ni rus gong dkar po dang 'brel bas rus gong dkar po zhes bya'o// thur mas tsho ba gang zhe na/ dus de na mi rnams
177b8(1): kyis yul gyi gser gnas 'brum bu dag thur mas brus nas chu mang ba'i snod du btsas nas 'thung ba ste/ 'di ni thur ma dang 'brel bas thur mas 'tsho ba zhes bya'o// de nas rgyal
177'a1(1): po tshangs sbyin gyis wA ra NA sir dril sgrogs su bcug wA ra NA sir gnas pa'i shes ldan grong khyer ba dag nyon cig/ lhas mkhan rnams
177'a2(1): kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bobs pas/ za ma tog dang / rus gang dkar po dang/ brer mas 'tshe ba'i mu ge 'byung bar lung bstan gyis/ khyed las gang dag lo bcu gnyis
177'a3(1): kyi bza' ba dang btung ba yod pa de rnams ni 'khod cig/ gang dag la med pa de ni gar dga' bar ded la mu ge med cing lo legs par gyur nas slar gshegs cig/ de'i tshe wA ra NA si
177'a4(1): na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyad che ba 'khor mang shing rgya che ba zhig yod do// de de dag bkug ste/ smras pa/ kye nang rje kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi bzag
177'a5(1): ba yod dam/ des smras pa dpon po mchis so// de de nyid na gnas pa las/ mu me de rgyud kho nar byung bas de'i bang mdzod rnams yongs su zad pas 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad shi bar
177'a6(1): gyur te bdag nyid dang drug cig lus so// de nas khyim bdag des bang mdzod rnams byugs pa las/ 'bras bre chung gang zhig byung nas de'i chus snod du blugs te/ 
177'a7(1): btsas so// sangs rgyas rnams byung ba med pa na/ rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'jig rten du 'byung 'gyur ba zhes bya bani
177'a8(1): bar gong ma bzhin d+ha'o// ji tsam ni rang sangs rgyas zhig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba dang wA ra NA sir phyin nas snga dro shan thams bgos lhung gzed dang chos gos thogs
177'b1(1): wA ra NA sir bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na/ khyim bdag des kyang bza' bar bsdogs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas de yang rims bzhin du bsod snyoms la rgyas nas/ de'i khyin
177'b2(1): du phyin to/ khyim bdag dri lus mdzes shing sems dad pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bsams pa 'di dag gis zos kyang gdon mi za bar srog dang bral bar gyur gyis ma
177'b3(1): bdag gis skal pa rab tu byung ba 'di la sbyin no// snyam nas des chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo kho mo skal pa rab tu byung ba 'di la dbul lo// de bsams pa bdag gi khyim thang ni
177'b4(1): za na bdag gis ci ste bza' snyam nas des smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag gis skal ba yang 'di la dbul lo// de bzhin du bu mna' ma dang / bran po dang bran mos kyang dpyad nas// 
177'b5(1): rang rang gi skal pa yongs su btang ste/ de nas de thams cad 'dus nas/ rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms phul lo// bdag nyid chen po de dag mi lus kyis chos ston gyis/ 
177'b6(1): tshig gis ma yin pas des dang po'i rgyal po 'dab ma rkyang bltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ 'bar ba dang gsal ba dang / na raM 'bebs pa dang / klog 'byin pa dang / 
177'b7(1): cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so// so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtong ba yin pas/ shing rtsa ba nas bcad de 'grel ba bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas/ 
177'b8(1): smon lam ci 'dod pa btab par brtsoms ste/ khyim bdag gis smon lam btab pa bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis
178a1(1): @bdag gis gal te lag rmos na rol bdun rmos par 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob ras/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams
178a2(1): par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig bran mos smon lam btab pa bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag gis
178a3(1): gal te snod gang tsam drus pa gang yin pa des/ snod bdun tsam du 'phel bar gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i tshogs rnams kyang thob nas 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams
178a4(1): gnyis pa tha bgyid cing / mi gnyis par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ de rnams kyis de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/ rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po de rnams la snying brtse ba'i rdzu
178a5(1): 'phrul gyis chas pa dang / ci tsam na rgyal po tshangs byin gyi steng gyi khang bzangs kyi gzhir song ste/ 'dug pa las de rdzu 'phrul gyis song ba'i grib ma rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi steng / 
178a6(1): du bab nas/ de gyen du blta bar brtsams pa las rang sangs rgyas de thod nas de 'di snyam du bdag nyid chen po 'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyis gshol chen pos/ yang su zhig gis 'gren
178a7(1): kha'i drungs phyung bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas khyim bdag de re ba chen pos mdzod rnams la ltas pa dang / ci tsam gang bar mthong ngo // des chung ma la smras pa/ re shig kho bo'i smon
178a8(1): lam rdzogs par gyur gyis/ khyed cag gis blta'o// de nas bran mos 'dra snod gtsam drus nas/ bdun tsam du 'phel bar gyur to// chung mas gcig gi don du bcos par
178b1(1): de dag thams cad kyis zos kyang de kho na bzhin du 'dug/ nye 'khor gyi srog chags stong dag tu ma zos kyang / de kho na bzhin du 'dug go// de nas khyim bdag des wA ra NA sir dril sgrogs su
178b2(1): pa shes ldan dag khyed cag las su zhig ni don du gnyer de gshog shig/ wA ra NA sir sbags pa dang / sna chen por 'byung ba rgyal pos thos nas nges smras pa/ shes ldan dge
178b3(1): sgra gsal ba dang / sgra chen po 'di ci zhig yin blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha khyim bdag che ge mo zhig bgyi ba mdzod dang bang ba rnams phye ba lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi
178b4(1): tshe 'jig rten thams cad shi zin pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis mdzod dang bang ba rnams phye 'am/ lha su'i mdzod dang bang baM rnams phye/ 'on kyang de ring kho na sa bon brtsal ba'i 'bras bu de
178b5(1): ring nyid du grub pa lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ ji lta bu zhig des skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis bdag nyid chen po de la bsod snyom
178b6(1): phul lam/ lha bdag gis phul lo// de yang lhag par dad par gyur nas/ tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ kye ma'o yon tan las byung ba yi/ skyon kun rnam par spangs pa'i zhing / de la sa bon btab pa
178b7(1): yi 'bras bu de nyid thob par 'gyur/ dge slong ci snyam du sems khyim bdag dang khyim bdag gis chung ma dang khyim bdag gis bu dang / khyim bdag gi mna' ma dang / dang / 
178b8(1): khyim bdag gi bran pho dang / khyim bdag gi bran mo gang yin pa de ni/ lug gi chung ma dang / lug gi bu dang / lug gi mna' ma dang / lug gi bran pho dang / lug gi bran mo 'di dag nyid yin no// de dag
179a1(1): rang sangs rgyas la grub byas shing smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa drug nar yang bsad nams chen par gyur cing / nga'i spyan sngar bden bzung zhing / 
179a2(1): rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas kyi mi mnyes par ni ma yin no// de dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyis rnam/ 
179a3(1): par smin pa ni/ gcig gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyis ni gcig tu dkar ba yin pas zhes bya ba nas/ brtsal par bya ste dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la slab par bya ba'i rka
179a4(1): gong ma bzhin du'o// sdom ni ke'u na'i bu yis btung ba blangs/ kA shi'i tshod rdol nas thug dang / sdig can du ni bca' ba dang / 'gyod dang sbyar ba'i zas dag go// bcom ldan 'das
179a5(1): yul a du ma'i gnas na bzhugs so// de'i tshe drang srong ke na'i bu gnas ni yul a du ma na 'dug go// nyin par rdzing bu dal gyis 'gram du gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
179a6(1): dgongs pa ngas gang du 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams la chos bshad na des ngas tshegs chung ngus drang srong ke'u na'i bu thul bar 'gyur snyam dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du
179a7(1): dgongs te ma la ngas rdzing bu dal gyis bab kyi 'gram du bshad na der thul bar 'gyur ro// snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de/ chos nyid
179a8(1): kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te/ lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
179b1(1): kyis dgongs pa sems kyis par gyur pas/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ci zhig gi phyir/ 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed mdzad pa ltan bdag/ 
179b2(1): 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams kho na la chos bshad par bzhed do snyam du rig nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lnga brtson song la rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
179b3(1): gdan bshams te/ 'dus pa chen po 'dus pa na sus kyang de'i mngangs 'phrogs par/ drang srong ke na'i bu'i srungs ma gcig kyang bskos shig/ des rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du/ 
179b4(1): drang srong ke na'i bu srungs ma gzhag nas/ gnas shom par brtsams pa na/ de na skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i ca co'i sgra byung ba dang / de nas drang srong ke na'i bu ca co'i sgra langs nas/ 
179b5(1): srung ba de dag dris pa ca co'i sgra 'di ci zhig des smras pa/ gdan shoms byed pa'o// ci kho bo phyir ram khyod kyi phyir ni ma yin no// mod kyi 'on te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir ni ma yin
179b6(1): no/ khyed 'di na ci zhig la sdod/ khyod kho na ci zhig la sdod khyod kho na srung ngo // ci'i phyir 'byung po mang po 'du bar 'gyur bas so// des smras pa/ dge sbyong ko'u ta ma de su zhig gi srung bar byed par
179b7(1): 'gyur/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das de la su zhig srung / bcom ldan 'das de nyid ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa'i srungs ma mdzad do zhes byas pa dang / drang srong ke na'i bus thos nas
179b8(1): cang mi gsung / de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs bsnams lhung gzed dang chos gos bsams nas a du mar bsod snyoms la bzhugs/ a du mar bsod snyoms blangs
180a1(1): nas ji ltar thugs ma nyams par bzhag nas/ dge slong gi 'dun dang thabs cig tu a du ma nas mi snang bar gyur te/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du 'gron
180a2(1): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dgung gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po chen
180a3(1): po yul 'khor skyong / dri za brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / dri za stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / lha'i nor bus thub bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom
180a4(1): ldan 'das le lha'i nor bu rnams kyis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis ltas nas/ shar phyogs su rten
180a5(1): te 'dug go/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po yang / grul bum stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / lha'i mu tig gis thub bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'dis gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i mu
180a6(1): tig gis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas/ te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis ltas nas/ lho phyogs su brten te 'dug go// rgya
180a7(1): rgyal po chen po dmigs mi bzang yang / klu du ma'i 'khor dang / klu brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / klu stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / klu brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang ku mu ta dang / 
180a8(1): pad+ma dkar po dang man d+ha ra ba rnams kyis thub bkang nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma ma dkar po dang / ku mu ta dang
180b1(1): man d+ha ra ba rnams kyis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis ltas nas/ nub
180b2(1): phyogs su brten 'dug go// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kying gnod sbyin du ma'i 'khor dang / gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / gnod sbyin brgya
180b3(1): stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / lha'i dbyig dang / gser gyis thub bkar ste/ bcom ldan 'das gdo na der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbyig dang / gser gi gtor nas/ 
180b4(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gis dge 'dun la mdun gyis ltas nas/ byang phyogs su rten te 'dug go/ de la dbus pa'i
180b5(1): rigs ra ni gnyis ste/ yul 'khor skyong dang 'phags skyes pa'o// mtho kho ba pa'i rigs ni gnyis ste/ mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos bu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du/ 
180b6(1): dgongs ste/ gal te ngas dbus pa'i tshig gis chos bshad pa na/ gnyis kho nas shes par 'gyur gyis/ gnyis kyis ni mi shes la/ gal te mtha' khob pa'i tshig gis bshad pa na/ 
180b7(1): gnyis kho nas shes par 'gyur gyi/ gnyis kyis ni mi shes pas ma la ngas gnyis la ni dbus pa'i tshig gis chos bshad do// gnyis la ni mtha' khob pa'i tshig gis chos bshad
180b8(1): do/ snyam du dgongs nas/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di ltar lus zhig pa dang / tshe rabs sil bar 'gyur ba dang / 'du shes 'gags pa
181a1(1): dang / 'du byed rnams nye bar zhi ba dang / rnam par shes pa nub par 'gyur ba de nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal
181a2(1): ba dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong dang / de dang skal mnyam pa'i dri za/  brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med tsang dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas
181a3(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po de la khyod kyis mthong ba la mthong ba tsam dang / thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par
181a4(1): shes pa tsam du gyis shig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bka' stsal pa na/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i brul bum brgya stong zag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul
181a5(1): med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na rgyal po chen po/ e ne me ne dang be/ da kha bI/ 'di nyid sdug
181a6(1): bsngal gyis mtha' yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang / de dang bskal pa mnyam pa klu brgya stong phrag ru ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig
181a7(1): rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu la bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na rgyal po chen po/ ma shA Ta shA/ sang shwa mA mA sarba dra bi rA dI/ 'di nyid
181a8(1): sdug bsngal gyis mtha' yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal ba na/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos dang / de dang skal pa mnyam pa'i gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la/ chos kyis
181b1(1): mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ de ni bdag yongs su mya ngan las mnga' ba'i dus la khad kyis chem/ su la bstan pa bstad nas yongs su mya ngan lag
181b2(1): mda'/ gal te lha rnams la ni/ lha rnams bag med pa la dga' bas yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro// 'on te mi rnams la ni mi ni/ thung ba yin pas/ de bzhin du yun ring du gnas par 'gyur gyis/ ma
181b3(1): langs lha dang mi rnams dang dge slong 'od srungs la brtang nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o// snyam du dgongs nas/ rgyal ba chen po yul 'khor spyod la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis nga yongs
181b4(1): sudran las 'das pa'i ston pa/ shar phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kyang / lho phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/ rgyal po chen po mi barba
181b5(1): la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kyang / chub phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kyang / byang phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/ de nas/ 
181b6(1): rgyal po chen po bzhi rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsrung ba bgyi lags so// zhes gsol ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das las bden pa
181b7(1): mthong nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas dong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bstan pa mtha' dag gis bya ba rnams brtan nas/ 
181b8(1): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyed kyis kyang / bstan pa'i dor gyis bya ba brtson pas gyis shig/ dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ bcom thams cad gtsad pa sangs rgyas
182a1(1): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun po chen po bzhi rnams kyi las cig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas/ rgyal po chen po bzhir gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
182a2(1): spyan sngar bden pa mthong ba bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di nyid kyis sngon gyis tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing brtsams pa/ 
182a3(1): tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid// ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye rgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ 
182a4(1): ston pa zhes bya ba nas/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten du byung ngo // zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po na klu
182a5(1): gnyis shig gnas na dbugs 'byin pa dang / dbugs cher 'byin pa/ shing shal ma brtsegs pa na yang / nam mkha' lding gnyis yod pa 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang / gtsug gi dbang phyug
182a6(1): go gang gi tshe dbyugs 'byin dang / dbyugs cher 'byin gnyis la/ de gnyis gnod pa byed pa de'i tshe de nyid sa'i 'og tu 'gro bar byed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ dbyugs 'byin da
182a7(1): dbyugs cher 'byin gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od bsrung gi spyan sngar skabs su song zhing / sgrub pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa dang / de gnyis nam mkha' lding gis gnod pa bya/ 
182a8(1): bar brtsams pa las ri rab la rlung dang / chu'i shugs bzhin du lcags gnas slar log pa dang / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag sngon ni kho bo cag gis khyod cag gnyis la gnod pa
182b1(1): byas naHsa'i 'og tu 'gro na/ nga gang gis na kho bo cag khyod dang phrang nas ri rab la rlung dang chu bzhin du rdugs bzhin du rdugs nas phyir ldog pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/ dbyugs 'byin dbyugs cher 'byin
182b2(1): gnyis kyis smras pa/ bdag gcag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so// de nyid kyis smras pa/ gal te de ltar na
182b3(1): bdag gis blang ngo // zhes de gnyis gang dang lhan cig 'grogs te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar dong nas de dag phyin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
182b4(1): 'od srung gi spyan snga nas/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag gi chos thos nas dong ba de dag/ de gnyis kyi thong nas/ nam mkha' lding de gnyis kyis/ klu dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin gnyis
182b5(1): la bris pa 'gro ba pa gi dag su dag yin/ de gnyis kyi rgyas par smras pa nam mkha' lding gnyis kyis smras pa/ gal te de lta na bdag gis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di
182b6(1): srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang / slab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs la smon lam btab po zhes/ de gnyis kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la skyabs su 'gro ba dang
182b7(1): slab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so// dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs chen 'byin gnyis kyis ni/ sngar blangs so// de nas lhan cig 'dus nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
182b8(1): 'od srung gis zhabs gnyis la btugs nas smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar 'jig rten pa bzhi po 'di nyid bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar chos mnyan nas/ 
183a1(1): bden pa mthong ste/ rang gnas su mchis pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten skyong ba bzhir gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par
183a2(1): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de dge bram ze'i khye'u khyod skyes chu rnams kyis tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
183a3(1): bcom lnga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa'i bcom 'das des kyang de bzhin du/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'gram du bdag cag la
183a4(1): chos bshad de/ bdag cag gis chos de thos nas bden pa mthong ste/ 'di bzhin du rang gi gnas su 'chi bar gyur cig ces byas/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ klu dang nam mkha' lding
183a5(1): bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dbugs 'byin gang yin pa de ni yul 'khor skyong 'di nyid yin no// dbugs cher 'byin gang
183a6(1): yin pa de ni 'phags skyes po yin no// 'gro ba'i dbang phyug mi bzang yin no// gtsug gi dbang phyug ni rnam thos kyi bu yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'di dag gi yang dag par rdzog
183a7(1): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyar sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang / slab pa'i bzhi rnams blangs shing smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas 'jig rten skyong ba
183a8(1): bzhir gyur cing / nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas nas rang gi gnas su song ngo // chos bshad pa de drang srong ke na'i bus thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das
183b1(1): mngon par dad par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i bsam pa dang bag nyal dang khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas gang thos nas mod la drang srong ke na'i bus 'phags pa'i bden
183b2(1): pa rnams mngon par rtogs nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon gsum du byas pa des lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad do// de nas des rtogs pa'i dad pa dang ldan par gyur nas gtung ba brgyad
183b3(1): ba tso tsa'i btung ba dang / chu shing gi 'bras bu'i btung ba dang / rtswa shug gi btung ba dang / a shro ta'i btung ba dang / ud dum pa ra'i btung ba dang / rtsub gyur gyi btud pa dang / bra go'i btung
183b4(1): rgyan gyi btung bdag khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa btung ba brgyad po 'di dag ni sngon gyi drang srong rnam
183b5(1): kyi bstod cing bsngags pa lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rtse ba nye bar bzung ste gzhes su gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyi drang srong ke na'i bu la thugs rje brtse bar dgongs nas
183b6(1): btung ba brgyad po dag pa zhes so// bzhes nas dge slong dag btung ba brgyad po 'di dus su byin len byas dus su mnyes dus su btsags dus su byin gyis rlabs pa nas dus su
183b7(1): ma yin par longs spyod par mi bya'o// nam gyis thun dang po la thal nas ni longs spyad par mi bya'o// btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byas la/ dus ma yin par mnyes/ dus ma yin par
183b8(1): bcags/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs pa ni longs spyad par mi bya'o/ btu ngo ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin len byas/ dus su mnyes la dus su ma yin par btsags dus ma yin par
184a1(1): byin gyis rlabs pa ni longs spyad par mi bya'o// btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus ma yin par byin ler byas/ dus ma yin par mnyes dus ma yin pa ra ba tsag
184a2(1): pa ni zas kyi 'og tu yang longs spyad par mi bya la/ nam gyi cha stod 'das na yang longs spyod par mi bya'o// drang srong ke na'i bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag par zer nas/ bcom/ 
184a3(1): ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bya dag gis
184a4(1): gdugs tshod sbyar zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang song ge ra'i bu la tsang mi smrabs gnang ngo // de nas drang srong ke na'i bu bcom ldan 'das cad
184a5(1): gsung bar gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyang rdzing bu dal gyis 'gram du mi gnang bar mdzad de dge 'dun 'dri kho bos gdugs tshod la spyar drangs so// 
184a6(1): de nas drang srong ri bos sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pas gnang bar langs te/ 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na 'di kho bos gdugasakau suM tshod la spyan drangs so// de nas
184a7(1): drang srong ri bos sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pas gnang bar langs te/ 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'dis kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo/ 
184a8(1): zos phyag byas ste phyogs cig tu 'dug nas/ drang srong ri bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la/ bdag rab tu byung ba dang / 
184b1(1): bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos pa thob pa ltam bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs spyad pa spyod par bgyi'o// drang srong ri bos 'khor lnga brgya legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la/ 
184b2(1): rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to// 'dul ba gzhi bam po lnga bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas drang srong ke na'i bus de nyid
184b3(1): kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod ma bza' dang bca' ba dag ces bya ba nas/ bstabs shing tshim par byas so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong me bzhin du'o// des sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge
184b4(1): slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol ba na/ ri rab tu byung ba mthong nas/ des smras pa/ ri bo khyod rab tu byung ngam/ rab tu byung ngo // legs par byas so// shin tu legs par byas so// / 
184b5(1): kho bo yang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol zin nas rab tu byung ngo // de nas drang srong kai na'i bus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la
184b6(1): rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin phyag bcabs te lhung gzer gyu bar
184b7(1): rig nas sman cher dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yon bsngo ba dang chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegs
184b8(1): so// de nas drang srong ke ra'i bus rgya lhag de dag thams cad btang ba'i chos byas nas/ 'khor lnga brgya dang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs
185a1(1): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs cig tu 'dug go phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ drang srong ke na'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
185a2(1): btsunar pa lags par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu byung ba dang / gnyen par rdzogs pa dge sbyong gi dngas po thob pa ldan/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag tshangs par smra
185a3(1): spyod par bgyi'o// drang srong ke na'i bu 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to// de nas
185a4(1): bcom ldan 'das la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong stong po dang / 'bab chu rab tu bzang mo'i 'gram du a mra'i tshal gdugs lta bur dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so// 
185a5(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka phyi na la dge slong lnga brgya btang ngo // tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la gnyis brgya lnga bcu btang ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri bu la
185a6(1): gnyis brgya lnga bcu btang ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka phyi nas gdams ngag phog pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon gsum du byas so// tshed
185a7(1): sngar ba mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// dge slong rnams the
185a8(1): tsam skyes nas the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i la shes rab che ba rnams dang / tshe dang ldan pa mthu
185b1(1): 'gal gyi bu chen po mthu chen dang / rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan lags na/ 'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka phyi nas gdams ngag phog pa gang lags pa de dag ni dgra ba
185b2(1): pa tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen po gang dag lags pa de dag ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang dag lags pa de dag ni/ d+hun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon
185b3(1): sum du gyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ka phyi ra'i ngas gdam ngag phogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzugs med
185b4(1): pa'i khams la rab tu bkod/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu'i gang dag de dag ni gzugs kyi khams dang / shA ri'i bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa de nyid cig dang / 
185b5(1): dge slong dag sngon byung ba dgon pa gnas gzhan zhig na drang srong gnyis gnas te/ so sor 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do// ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ de gnyis las gcig na/ 
185b6(1): gcig shi nas de'i bram ze'i khye'u rnams bla ma dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde bas gdungs nas/ phar tshun 'phyan 'phyan nas/ drang srong gi shos de'i tshe de'i drung du 'ongs pa dang / des de
185b7(1): rnams mig mchi mas gang ba mthong nas dris pa bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed cag mkhan po de dag gar song / gum mo// des bsam pa bdag 'das na/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su
185b8(1): 'gyur gyi ma la bdag gis 'di dag bsdu bar bya'o// snyam du des de rnams dbugs phyung ste bsdus so// ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong de yang nad kyis thebs par gyur nas de'i slob dpon ma
186a1(1): mchog gsum yod pa la des cig la ni lnga brgya gnyis la ni gnyis brgya lnga bcu gsum la ni gnyis brgya lnga bcu gtong ngo to// de ni 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur/ 
186a2(1): to/ de la lnga brgya gtang ba gang yin pa des ni/ 'di ltar gzugs med pa'i khams la bkod par de ltar gdams ngag phog go// gnyis brgya lnga bcu btad pa gang yin pa des ni 'di ltar gzug
186a3(1): kyi khams la bkod pa de ltar gdam dag phog/ gnyis brgya lnga bcu phog pa gcig gshos kyis ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pa de ltar gdams ngag phog go// dge slong dag
186a4(1): ci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya gzugs med pa'i khams la rab tu dgod pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no// gcig shos
186a5(1): kyis brgya lnga bcu mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa gang yin pa ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin no// kyang dge slong phyi na sa gdams ngag tu phog pa gang yin pa de dag ni dbang po rnamam
186a6(1): yin no// mo'u 'gal gyi bu'i gang yin pa de dag ni dang po 'bring ba yin no// shA ri'i bu'i gang yin pa'i de dag ni dbang po brdul po yin no// gal te shA ri'i bus gdams ngag phog par gyur na dag
186a7(1): gis drabar gyur pa yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// ke na'i bu ni ral pa can ji ltar sangs rgyas bsngags brjod pa// rab tu ngang ba'i sems kyis ni// thams cad mthun par mnyan par gyis
186a8(1): ke na'i bu'i khyim du ni/ dus cig cig na ston mang po/ dpe med nyan thos thabs cig tu/ gdugs tshod la ni spyan drangs so// ke na'i bu'i khyim na ni// zas gtam byed pa dag ni// bram ze
186a9(1): 'god pa gang yin pa ni dge slong ka phyin 'di nyid yin no// gnyis brgya lnga bcu gzugs kyis khams la rab tu dgod pa
186b1(1): thos mthong gyur te/ mthong nas ke na'i bul 'dris/ bag ma len tam 'on te ci// rgyal po yul 'khor mgron pos sam/ khyod kyi mchod byin ched pus mar dris pa de ni bdag la spros// bdag/ 
186b2(1): ni bag ma mi len la/ rgyal po 'am yul 'khor mgron ma pos bdag gis sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog/ gdugs chod la ni spyar drangs so// ri bos sangs rgyas sde thos nas// 
186b3(1): yid skyo ba ni skyes gyur te// sangs rgyas de ni ka na'i bu// dris pa de ni dag la spros/ shAkya'i rigs las skyes pa'i/ ston pa gang zag bla med yod//  byas spangs rgyas zhes bya'o// 
186b4(1): 'dus byas 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gzigs la// de bzhin ma 'ongs pas gzigs shing / da ltar byung ba rnams kyang gzigs/ mngon shes
186b5(1): bya ba ji snyed pa// de kun rtogs pas thams cad rig/ thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// mngon par shes bya mngon shes byas// bsgom par
186b6(1): bya ba rnams kyang bsgom// spangs par bya ba spangs pa ma de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// gang zhing ltas par gyur pa ni// rgya mtsho rig par bcas pa'i// sa 'dir rab tu g.yos
186b7(1): mdzad pa la de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis gdung dang nag po'i// rtsa lag gzhom bcas patsam nas ni/ de bzhin gshegs kyi stobs thob pa// de la thal sbyar phyag
186b8(1): 'tshal lo// wA ra Na si'i grong bzhud nas/ gang gis rnam par bcu gnyis pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo de bskor ba// de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal mo/ gang gis 'dod chags zhe sdang ma
187a1(1): sa pa' stsang sa gdungs pa'i// sems can mang po dgrol mdzad pa// de dag thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang zhig/ rnam 'dren de ni ji srid na/ shAkya
187a2(1): sras po 'od mdzad la// de ring nyid nas bskyabs su 'gro// tshul sdug yid du 'ong ba de// gang na bar ni bram ze chos// dri za'i rgyal po lta bu'i// sangs rgyas bla med mthong bar 'gyur// rnam
187a3(1): bza' ngur smrig 'od ldan de// gser mdog nyi ma'i 'od gzer can// de bzhin gser ni gtso ma yi// gser las gzugs ni byas pa bzhin/ sa la shing tog me tog dag/ kar ni/ 
187a4(1): ka'i me tog 'dra// rin chen sna tshogs smras pa'i// rin chen mchod sdong ji bzhin no// myag gro shing de lta bur ni// chu zheng gab par gyur pa dang // 'khor yug 'dom gang 'od kyi ni/ kun
187a5(1): ras snang ba dag tu mdzad// rgyal srid rgyal dang nyer dur bcas// 'dod pa kun dga' spangs nas ni// rab tu 'byung bar mngon 'byung ba'i// thub pa bden pa rnams la dgyes// spong ngan/ 
187a6(1): langs pa'i seng ge ni// gnas su 'jigs pa med pa ltar// seng ge lta bur brnyengs med gsung // bram ze sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// zhal mdzum mdzad pa'i gsung dang ldan// tshangs
187a7(1): pa'i gsung dang snyan pa'i gsung // rnga sgra'i gsung ni lta bu yi// sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// zla ba dag pa nam mkhar la// rgyu skar rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'i// zla ba'i
187a8(1): dkyil 'khor lta bu yi// sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa// nam mkha'i dngos la mdzes lta bu'i// sangs rgyas mun dang bral gyur cing // mdzad pa bram ze
187b1(1): mthong bar 'gyur// ji ltar khya'i khya mchog ni/ nog dang ldan pa'i mi g.yon// skes bu khyu mchog stobs bcu ldan// sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// rgya mchod ga ni gting
187b2(1): zab pa'i chu chen tshad gzungs med pa'i lha// sangs rgyas bsam gang na ldan pa'i mchog/ bsam gyis mi khyab bla med mthong // nag po'i tshogs las des 'byung ba'i// nyi ma
187b3(1): mkha' lag sal ba dang // me'i phung po 'bar ba yi// ko'u tam sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'khor los sgyur rgyal po// zhabs ring byed cing yongs bskor ltar// de
187b4(1): bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// dgra bcom rnams kyis mdun byas mdzes// 'dod pa rnams la dbang bsgyur dang // ji ltar tshangs chen dbang phyug ltar// stong gsum gyis
187b5(1): ni 'jig rten khams/ mthur par dbang ni bsgyur bar mdzad// gang thos nye ba re zhi 'gyur zhing // sdug bsngal mtsho chen las sgrol ba// sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma dang // sdug bsngal kun byung
187b6(1): gang yin pa sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba dang // lam ni yan lag pazhi mtshan gnyis// sbrang rtsim skol ro lte ba'i// bden pa dag ni rab tu 'chad// nor med rnams la nor sbyin zhing // 
187b7(1): nad pa rnams kyis spyad kyang mdzad// gnod pa rnams kyis skyabs gyur pas// skye rgu'i sdug bsngal mol bar mdzad// mun par gyur pa'i sems can dang // blun po lam la rgyu ba la// bde ba
187b8(1): ngan 'das grol ba'i// lam ni drang po rab tu ston// 'dod chags zhe sdang kun 'bar zhing // gti mug rab 'byin skye rgu rnams// ji ltar sprin chen char 'babs ltar// thub pa chen
188a1(1): bos zhi bar mdzad// gzugs dang khadreg stobs ldan pa/ de dang 'dra ba yong ma yim/ su bregs stobs ldan mchog pa ni/ ri bo bzhin du zhin/ 
188a2(1): tu nas/ rnyed dang ma rnyed pade sdug dang // smad pa dang ni bstod pa dang // grags pa dang ni ma grags pas// chu yis pad+ma bzhin ma 'gos// srog bcod pa ni rnam spangs te// ma byin
188a3(1): bdag mi byed de bden pa gsung zhing tshangs par spyang // de ni bram spangs pa yin// tshig cu bdag ni migasung zhing // dus su bab par mdzes po gsung // de ni 'dod pa rnams sems
188a4(1): med// skye bo rnams la de sems byams// yang dag lte bas phun sum tshogs// ting 'dzin stobs dang spyod yul// bsam gtan chen po mngon shes drug/ rdzu 'phrul gyis ni kha la gshen
188a5(1): lha dang mo'i 'jig dag ni// gang yin rnams tshogs gnas/ gtan mongs can ras dge yang rung // pha rol gyi ni sems kyang mkhyen// gang dang du sdong gnas// sngon gyi gnas la mkhas
188a6(1): bdang sems can 'gro dang 'ong ba yi// 'chi bo dang ni skye ba mkhyen// zag pa zad cing mi ldan pas// de nyer bzhi shin mya ngan 'das// dbang po na zhing thugs zhig/ mtsho ni gang
188a7(1): bzhin du gnas// pad+ma'i rdzing na glang po che// dam pa drug cu lon pa ltar// mthong na ngoms ni mi shes pas// bram ze dga' ba thob par 'gyur// rib bcom ldan 'di'ang ste/ 
188a8(1): de'i sku ni skyes can gyis// sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing // gzi brjid me'i phung po bzhin// gang gis lo brgya ma 'tshang bar// skyob pa'i sngags pa brjod byas kyang / 
188b1(1): de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pas// des ni mthar phyin mi 'gyur ro// bram ze gang gis de mthong ba// de'i snyed pa bla na med// gang gis mthong nas skyabs song ba// de'i rnyed pa de bas/ 
188b2(1): 'phags// bram ze'i ri bo thub chen gyis// sngags pa thob nas skyob par 'gyur bden pa'i sems kyis rtogs pa yis// ke na'i bu la 'di smras pa// mir gyur pa la bdag gis ni// de 'dra'i
188b3(1): sngags pa thos ma myong // ke ne'i chad pa dang sbyar ni// de ni 'jig rten kun gyi gtso tshong ba nor dag don nyer ltar// khyod kyis nga rgyal rgyal mtshan spongs// de la bkur bstir gus byos dang / 
188b4(1): bram ze dga' bar thob par gyur// bram ze khye'u ni lnga brgya yi// slob ma dag gis mdun mngar te// sangs rgyas bzhugs pa bzang po der// bram ze ri bor song bar gyur// lha rnams
188b5(1): kyis ni dga' tshal ltar// me tog shing ni pur sum tshogs/ rnam par dben zhing sgra med cing // bya'i tshogs kyis bsten gyur pa// mi min bdug pa med rgyug// shAkya'i sras kyis bsten pa 'i/ 
188b6(1): chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas su ni// deras bram zes zhugs par gyur// ma dul 'dul ba kha lo basbyar// skyes bu dam pa mthong nas ni// ri bo yis ni tshig gsol pa/ shes ldan snyun cig mi
188b7(1): mnga' 'am/ ka la pin ka'i sgra dbyangs can// sangs rgyas snyan cing gsal ba'i bkas// ri bo la ni slar gsungs pa// nga la nad ni yod min te// nyes pa med cing sdig pa med// the tsom tham
188b8(1): cung rnam par chad// rnam par grol zhing mi ldan pa/ nga ni zag med thar med// 'jig rten na ni brdul med rgyu// gtsang zhing dag la dring med// des na bram zer dang gtsang ste// kho na dang
189a1(1): 'jigs pa kun las rgal// ri bo khyod kyang 'ongs pa legs// bstan 'di la ni legs par 'dug/ bram ze ci dga' bde'am byed// lus ni ngal bar mi 'gyur mod/ 
189a2(1): dpa' bo chen po khyod mthong bas// thub pa chen po da ltar bde// rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa ltar// yid ni rab tu dga' bas na// de dang rjes su 'tshal ba'i gtam// rim pa bzhin du byas
189a3(1): nas ni/ de nas bram ze 'dzem pa dang // dman pa'i yid kyis 'dug par 'gyur// klog pa dang ni gsang tshig 'dzin// rig byed sum gyis rig mthar byin// bram ze bo 'dug nas ni// thub pa'i
189a4(1): mtshan la rtogs par byed// 'jig rten dag gis mgon po yis// sku las mtshan ni sum cu mthong // lags srang 'dom spa sbubs nub pa// gnyis la ri bo the tsom za// thub pa chen por
189a5(1): mtshan rnams la// the tsom yid gnyis gyur nas ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rigs// bden pa'i mtshan la yongs zhugs pas// thub pa chen po mtshan las yongs// sum cu rtsa gnyis
189a6(1): thob pa dang / bko'u tam khyod kyis sku dag la// gnyis ni g.yar sngar ma bab po// mi'i dad pa mngoms kyi ni// spab sbubs su nub lags sam// ljags bzang zhes ni bgyi ba yang / 
189a7(1): cig ni thung ba ma lags grang // thu bo chen bdag gis ci nas kyang // ljags sas myur du rgyang mdzad do// bdag gis thetsomags padu gsol// rnam par 'dren rnams 'dzag rten bu/ 
189a8(1): laman ni lan 'ga' 'byung // u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin// thub pa chen po dkon pa lags// sos ka skom pa che dang ni// bkres pa la ni dbyar zas dang / nad pa sman la ci lta bar// ston
189b1(1): pa la ni bkur bstir gyis// ka la bing+ga'i sgra dbyangs can// sangs rgyas snyan cing gsal ba'i bka'/ ri bo la ni skar gsungs pa// bram ze the tsom spangs par gyis// ljags kyis
189b2(1): spyan dang snyan dag ni// rab tu khyebs par ljags ring gis/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khyebs par mdzad// rdzu 'phrul bzhi pa mkhas pa yi// rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang bstan mdzad pas/ 
189b3(1): thub pa'i mdoms sbubs nub pa/ bram ze ri bos mthong bar 'gyur thub chen po'i mtshan rnams la// the tsam med cing zung dru byung // sems kyi rtog pa rab tu dga'// ri bo yis
189b4(1): na tshig gsol pa// gsum cu gnyis dang dpe byad rnams// bdag gis gsang tshig las thos pa// de kun khyod kyi sku 'di la// yong su rdzogs te ma tshang med// dge dang ldan pas spyod pa bzang
189b5(1): legs par 'khrungs pas blta ra sdug/ nyan thos dge 'dun dbyug nas ni// gdugs bdal ba ni lta bur mdzes// dam pa'i sngags pa khyod la ni// dge sbyong dngos pos ci zhig bgyi// mi'i khyu
189b6(1): mchog khyod lta bu// dpung gi yan lag bzhi dag dang // rin chen bdun dang ldan pa'i// 'khor los bsgyung ba'i rgyal por 'ongs// sa bdag rgyal po mdzad nas ni// sa steng 'khor los
189b7(1): bsgyur bar mdzod// ri bong ni rgyal po ste// chos kyi rgyal chen blo na med// nga ni sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed// nga ni dge ba'i rigs las khrungs// bdud
189b8(1): dpung btsas par bcom nas ni// rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa thob// bram ze'i dran pa 'khor lo ste// nga'i shes rab dron por yin// brtson 'grus shugs mgyogs rta po ni// btang na dang la byung
190a1(1): @ba yin/ nga'i nor bu dam pa ni// ting 'dzir mun pa gsal byed yin// btang snyoms glang chen dam ste// skul na dang la rgyug pa yin// chags pa bud med 'dod pa ltar// bram ze nga'i/ 
190a2(1): / dga' 'dod yin no// phyogs rnams kun nas nga rgyal bas// ngal sngo ba'i dgra yod min// nyon mongs tshogs rnams 'joms pa'i// 'khor bzhi po dag nga yi sras// rdzu 'phrul kun dga' phun sum
190a3(1): tshogs pa lam gyis bani mdo sprul pa byas// mdo sde skyes pa'i rabs dag bkram// skyes bu chen pos rnams kyis bston// rnamathar gsum gyis sgron ma can// dran pas bsrungs ma
190a4(1): rnams kyis bsrungs// ngo tsha khrel yod kyis g.yogs pa'i// grong khyer sngon gyis sangs rgyas kyis// brten pa dag tu de bzhin gshegs// rgyal po nga ni bzhugs nas su nga'i chos
190a5(1): kyis yul smad de// chos kyi rdza bo ches brdungs nas// bdud rnams mtha' dag bcom byas te// nga ni byang chub phyir dbang bskur// tshad med pa dag rab bsgoms pa// nga'i rgyan du
190a6(1): gdogs pa yin// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po yis// nyon mongs pa dag rab tu bzlog/ pha rol rab tu rgol bcom ste// rnam par bcom zhing rmed med byas// srog chags rnams
190a7(1): la 'jig rten 'dir// snang ba spyir zhing yang dag spyang // nga ni dben par gnas bcas nas// ye shes kyis ni rnon gyis bcad// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gnas yin te// zhi gnas
190a8(1): nga'i 'dzer stangs yin/ tshul khrims shing rta sgra snyan la/ nga'i lhag mthong kha lo bsgyur// bzod dang nges pa'i go bgos nas// lam bsgoms pas na g.yul ror ni// gang gis
190b1(1): sgrib pa 'joms pa yi// dbang po lnga yi 'dod pa dang // gang gis nyon mongs thag 'dzud pa'i// yang dag spyod pa bzhi po yis// ngas ni dpa' bo g.yul sprad de/ chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs
190b2(1): nas bdud dpung bcas par btsem byas te// nga'i ni byang chub dbang skur to// rig pas ma rig tsom nas ni// phung po skye zhing 'jig pa can// g.yul gyi rtse mo rgal te nga // skye rgu
190b3(1): byang chub phyir sangs rgyas// gang gis skyes bu gnod byed pa/ 'jig rten chom rkur chen po gsum// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// de kun nga yis bcom pas na// mngon shes// 
190b4(1): kun gyis stobs byung bas// nga ni dgra bcom yon gnas 'ongs// zhing zhing gshin pa la zhugs pa'i// sbyin sregs rnams kyang len pa yi// brtson 'grus dam pa brtsams nas ni// ngas
190b5(1): ni zag pa rnams bcom mo// chu bo che las rgal nas ni// bsgral ba'i phyir ni gnas pa yin// ji ltar seng ge mche ba'i stobs// gnas su srog chags dang phrad nas// chung dang 'bring
190b6(1): dang chen po'ang rung // de la 'tshungs par snun par lta// me'i seng ge'i rnams 'dren// rdzogs sangs de bzhin 'jig rten ni// byis pa 'bring ngam chen po la// mnyam par chos ni
190b7(1): bston par mdzad// ko'u ta ma khyod kyis 'di la ni// nad pa bdag gis the tsom gsol// zug rngu 'byin pa rnams la ni// mig mkhan rnams kyis cho ga khyod lags// khyod kyis the tsom/ 
190b8(1): gsal bar byas// bram ze khyod ni 'dun par bgyis// grags ldan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// mthong ba rnyed pa dka' ba ste// gang zhig 'di ni snyed dka' bas// rgyal ma na ni lan
191a1(1): 'ga' 'byung // bram ze rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa// chos kyi rgyal po bla med yin// de bzhin gshegs la res gsol pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas shes bka' stsal te/ 
191a2(1): ma 'dres 'khor lo bskor mdzad na// ko'u tam ji skad gsungs pa bzhin// khyod kyis 'khor lo bskor ba gang // rjes su mkhas pa bskor bgyid pa// stong pa nyid 'khrugs nyan thos ni/ 
191a3(1): de dbar dag tu su 'gyur lags// bram ze nga la nyan thos ni// shes rab mtshungs pas sras yod pa// nye rgyal zhes ni grags pa po/ mang du thos pa shA ri bu// bdud pa kun las rnam grol ba// nye zhing / 
191a4(1): zag pa yod pa de// ngas ni 'khor lo gang bskor ba// mkhas pa rjes su bskor bar byed// e ma'o sangs rgyas chos dang ni// e ma'o nyan thos phur sum tshogs// e ma'o rin chen dam pa gsum// 'jig
191a5(1): rten 'byung ba ngo mtshar che// bzang po khyod kyi nyan thos su// bdag gis g.yar gyis blangs bgyis la// e ma'o chos kyi bcud 'tshal nas/ shin tu mya ngan 'das par bgyi// sems rtog rab tu dag
191a6(1): 'gyur nas// de nas bram ze skyo 'gyur te// bden pa 'dod pa'i sems kyis ni// 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so// nags na seng ge ngam 'byin ltar// bsam gtan chen po zug rngu 'byin// spyan dang ldan pa'i
191a7(1): ci gsungs pa// 'di ni shes ldan dag gnyen cig/ gang dag 'dod pa rjes su so// gang dag mi 'dod de dag deng // shes rab chog gi bstan pa la// de ring kho na rab byung ngo // tshangs par spyad 'od logs spya
191a8(1): cing ma lam nyid shin du goms byas na// bag yod pa la gnas pa'i// rab byung 'bras bu bcas par gyur// gal te khyod cag rab byung zhing // bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod na ni// bram ze la
191b1(1): 'dir bregs te ba bdag cag rab tu byung bar bya// sems rtog rab tu mgu gyur pas// sor mo bcu'i thal sbyar te// bla gos phrag pa cig gzar nas// bram ze'i ri bo des gsol pa// bram ze'i khye'u lnga
191b2(1): brgya'o/ 'di dag thal sbyar 'khod pa ni// thub chen rab tu byung ba dang // bsnyen par rdzogs thob 'tshal ba'o// de nas ston pa thugs rje can// drang srong chen po thugs brtsebs// dge slong tshur shog bka
191b3(1): stsal pa/ de dag snyen par rdzogs par 'gyur// shes rab chen po shA ri'i bu// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa mo'u 'gal// dga' yod gnas brtan ka pa na// spobs pa rtogs par khong du chud// chu bo bzang po'i
191b4(1): 'gram du ni// yid du 'ong ba'i tshul khrod du// spobs pa byung ba'i gnas brtan gyis// de dag la ni gdams ngag phog/ der ni de la chos kyi gtam// rjes su mthun pa de shes nas// ring por mthogs rnam grol
191b5(1): te te dam pa'i don la rab tu bkod// de dag mthong thos bde gyur pas// mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren pa la// rab tu gus pas phyag byas so// dam pa chos dang tshogs gtso la/ 
191b6(1): rgyal ba'i sngags pa'i slab pa dang // ting nge 'dzin dang bged pa dang // bag yod pa la phyag byas so// de bas bdag la phan 'dod pa/ bdag nyid chen po mngon 'dod pas// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ bkur sti/ 
191b7(1): byos la skyabs dang // 'di ni de nyid gzigs pa yis// 'jig rten na ni skyabasu sngags// 'dod pa rnams kyis skrag pa las// bde ba kun ni rab sbyin mdzad// chos kyi rgyal po nyi ma'i gnyen// sangs rgyas bstan
191b8(1): pa chos kyi ni bdag nyid chen po mchog gyur la// thar pa 'dod pas rtag tu rton// ke'u na'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi ka nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te// ka shi tshong
192a1(1): ma / rdul du byon ga'i'i tsheng rdal de nas sngor 'dzeg mkhan byed byed pa'i/ rab tu byung ba ba spang gnyis shig yod pa las// bus smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das can thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs
192a2(1): cig tu yul ka shaM'i ljongs rgyu zhing shes nas/ gtsug lag khang du byon pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun sku gnyis kyis/ mal bdag cag gis// bcom ldan
192a3(1): 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nas thug la spyan drangs nas/ da la ci khyod thug pa sta gon byed dam/ 'on te dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs des smras pa/ khyod song la dge
192a4(1): slong gi dge 'dun spyan drongs shig/ nga ni thug pa sta gon byed do// des dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs so// de'ang me long zhig thogs nas tshong dus song ba las nges na tshong
192a5(1): dpon zhig skra dang kha spu ring ba mthong nas/ des de la me long bstan pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa'i'ade lta bu'i mkhyen pa yang mnga' 'am/ des smras pa yod do/ 
192a6(1): gal te mnga' ne re shig nges breg par brtsams las khyim bdag nyid log nas/ bregs zin pa dang sad do/ des smras pa 'phags pa bregs lags sam/ khyim
192a7(1): bdag bregs zin to/ da mgu nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag lhag par slob la bdags so// khyod mchog cig zhed pa don to// des smras pa/ kho bos sangs rgyas
192a8(1): lasogs padag slong ging dag 'dun nas thug sa spyar drangs kyis nas thug byin cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa nas thug lnga khyod la ci rung / bza' ba dang bci'abags pa bdag dadum gyis
192b1(1): kha spyan drongs shig/ nad med par gyur cig ces smras pa nas des song ngo // de nas khyim bdag des gtsang zhing gsod pa zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la/ gdan bshams pa nyid ga
192b2(1): bzhugs so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa dag brims pa na/ dge slong rnams kyi sa bsams pa ni/ bdag cag ngar pa la mgron du bos// 
192b3(1): na/ kha zas bsod pa 'di bdag cag gis ltar blang zhes/ de rnams kyis zhus pa'i skangs pa/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
192b4(1): gal te ngan pa la mgron du bos la kha zas la bsod pa rnyed na longs spyad par bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa gang nyes dmigs ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag rig
192b5(1): dang mthun pa'i snod thogs pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis rang bzo snyad par mi bya/ rigs dang mthun pa'i snod kyang srogs par mi bya'o// sregs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
192b6(1): tesngon smad ba yin na gang khyab kyi bsal ba dang / sngon yi ge pa yin na ram pis sbal ba dang / bza' mkhan rab tu byung na/ khab bsrel ba dang ni ma rtogs so// bcom ldan 'das kyang yul nas
192b7(1): ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa de sdig can du byon nas/ sdig can na srid pad+ma'i tshal sdug po na bzhugs so// sdig can na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i zhing po gyang sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan
192b8(1): zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de shin tu ma dang pa zhig ste// bcom ldan 'das sdig can gyi gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ sdig can du byor nas sdig can srin bu pad+ma'i tshal sdug po na
193a1(1): bzhugs so// zhes thos so// thos nas gros par brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das kyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs na/ sdig can du byon nas/ sdig can srin bu pad+ma'i cha
193a2(1): sdug po na bzhugs so// zhes thos kyis gal te bdag cag re res/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol na/ gzhan gyis skabs mi rnyed par gyur pas/ ye khrims zhig
193a3(1): bca' bar bya ste/ bdag cag sus kyang cig pus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshad gsel bar mi bya zhing / bdag cag 'dus pa kho nas gdugs tshod gsol bar bya'o// bdag cag lan
193a4(1): gang zhig gcig pus gdugs mchod na/ de la tshogs kyis kar sha pa na drug cu'i chad pas bcad do// de nas sdig can gyis gyad thams cad 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bder song ste/ lhags
193a5(1): pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs cig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang // bcom ldan 'das chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis/ sdig can gyi gyang rnam
193a6(1): la zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo // zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas sdig can gyi gyang rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ 
193a7(1): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal te/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang / bdag cag gi bsdubs/ 
193a8(1): par gdugs cha bskur zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gas la/ bcam ldan 'das kyis tsam can gyi kyang rnams la cang migasung bas gnang ba/ danas sdig ca kyi kyang rnams kyis bcom ldan
193b1(1): cang mi gsung bas snang ba rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yid rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ stan las langs te
193b2(1): song ngo // gyang chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan pa nyid ni 'dug pa dang / de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'od ldan khyod dad par gyur tam ci/ des smras pa bdag dad par ma 'gyur mod kyi 'on
193b3(1): kyang tshogs kyi khrims su bcas pa zhes bya ba nas kar sha pa na drug cu'i chad pas bcad do// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// khyod chad pas 'jigs nas bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i 'ongs pa lta zhig
193b4(1): btsun pa de lta lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos// gyad sna chen po la rtogs par 'od ldan khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di
193b5(1): skad ces gsol to// btsun pa gyad sna tshon po la gtogs pa 'od ldan 'di ni/ sangs rgyas la mngon par ma dang / chos la ma lags/ dge 'dun la ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da ltar 'di
193b6(1): sangs rgyas la mngon par dad cing / chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de ltar chos legs par bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la cang mi/ 
193b7(1): gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan la gang thos pas/ gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan sangs rgyas la mngon par dang / dge 'dun la mngon
193b8(1): par dad par 'gyur ba'i de lta bu'i chos bshad par mdzad de/ de nas gyed sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gad na ba
194a1(1): @de logs su thal mo sbyar btung te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu gsang bdag gis
194a2(1): snrums par gdugs mchod sbyor zhing mchis na gnod par mdzad du gsol/ 'od ldan sngar sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis spyan drangs zin to// bcom ldan 'das gnang bar mdzad cig
194a3(1): dang ji ltar sdig can kyang rnams btub pa de ltar bdag bgyid do// 'od ldan gal te sdig can gyi gyad rnams btub na/ de bzhin dungs khyod gnang ngo // de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis/ 
194a4(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan lartas langs te chas/ nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / sdig can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras
194a5(1): so/  shes ldan dza dag re shig sdod cig/ bdag gis thog mar bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs mchod gsol nas/ de'i 'og tu khyed cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dang/ 
194a6(1): dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol bar dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag gis sngar sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs zin pas/ kho bo
194a7(1): cag mi nyan to des smras pa/ ci ste mi btub na bca' ba dang / btud ba re re zhig brim mo// de nam dad pa gang yin pa de dag gis smras pa/ mi gnang ngo // dad pa can gang yin pa de dag gis smras pa/ 
194a8(1): shes ldan dag 'di ring pa med pa ni gams dzas dpe 'du mnga' ba'i mini dag 'dul par 'gyur bas garang zhes de rnams kyis nga la ga dang / denas ngas gsas mkhar dag bcar
194b1(1): slob shes ldan dag kho bos yo byad thams cad sbyar gyis/ bca' ba cig pu gang kha nas 'drangs par gyur pa de lta bu sta gon gyis shig/ des dri zhim po sna tshogs rdzas la sogs pa
194b2(1): dang ldan pa'i yo byad rnams phog pa dang / de rnams kyis dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis yo byad rgyas pa/ re res re re 'drangs par 'gyur ba'i bca'i gang yin pa dag byas sa// de nas sdig can gyi
194b3(1): gyang rnams kyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas
194b4(1): gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bca' ba'i dang btung ba dang / brim par rtsams pa dang / dge slong rnams 'gyod pas longs ma smad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon
194b5(1): bdag lta bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis sdig can gyis kyang rnams la lhas pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag kyang sna chen po la gtogs 'od ldan gyis bdag cag
194b6(1): spus lags kyis zhes shig/ de nas gyang sna chen po la gtogs pa'i 'od ldan gyis bca' ba brims pa dang / de kho nas dge slong rnams 'drangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yon
194b7(1): bsngo bar mdzad de/ gshegs pas sdig gyis kyang rnams kyis zas de dag longs spyad par mi 'gyur to// nyi ma gzhan zhig la dge slong rnams bra snyoms la zhugs pa dang / bram
194b8(1): ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas tshur byon/ dge 'dun tshur byon/ 'di dag snyoms shig/ dge slong rnams 'gyod pas ma blangs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
194'a1(1): stsal pa/ ci kho bo la sbyin nam/ 'on te bcom ldan 'das rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la 'dul zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te bcom ldan
194'a2(1): 'das rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'o// zhes sman bdag gir mi bya'o// bdag cag gi sangs rgyas ni khyed nyid lags so// zhes sman blangs par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod
194'a3(1): par mi bya'o// de bzhin chos 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la 'am/ zhes brjod par bya zhing / dge 'dun tshogs rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'am// 
194'a4(1): zhes rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun bsro gang la spyar drangs so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan
194'a5(1): pa sa ri zhes bya ba gzhon nu thor bu// lang tsho la bab pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring por ma lon pa/ chos 'dul ba 'dir 'ongs nas ring po ma lon pa nges bsams
194'a6(1): pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gang gis nyung ngu byin pa dang / gang gis mang du byin pa dang / gang gis bzang po byin pa dang / gang gis yid dga' bas las byas pa dang / gang gis rab tu
194'a7(1): dga' ba'i sems kyis rjes su yid rang ba de dag thams cad ni bsod mas kyi skal ba can du 'gyur zhes gsungs kyis/ ma la bdag gis kyang las shig bya'o// snyam nas des shing
194'a8(1): gshegs par brtsams pa las/ ci tsaman shing rul pa zhig gi ser gnas sbrul ga dug pa zhig byung nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i bre bong la zin pa dang / dug gi shugs kyis
194'b1(1): rgyal nas sal 'tshol te/ dbu bar skyug cing bzhin yang 'gyur mig kyang 'gyur te/ de de ltar sdug bsngal ba bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan/ 
194'b2(1): dag 'di ni khyim bdag su zhig gi bu yi ni dag gis smras pa/ che ge mo zhig gi'o// de dag gis smras pa/ dge sbyong shAkye sras mgon med pa rnams kyi rang du rab tu byung gi/ gal
194'b3(1): te rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ nye du rnams kyis 'di dag spyad byas pa zhig ces pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
194'b4(1): stsal pa/ sman pa la bris la spyad byos shig/ dge slong dag gis sman pa la dris pa dang des smras pa/ 'phags pa sbyar ba'i zas gsol cig pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom
194'b5(1): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman pa'i bstan pa sbyin par bya'o// dge sbyong gis zas sbyar ba ji lta bu yin ma shes nas/ de rnams sman pa la dris
194'b6(1): pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa dge khyod nyid kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa kho na yin te/ de nyid mkhyen te zhes dge slong rnams kyis
194'b7(1): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ dge slong dag zas sbyar ba ni lci ba dang / gcan dang thal ba dang sa'o// de lci ba ni byung nas ring por ma lon
194'b8(1): pa'i be'u rnams kyi'o// gcin yang de dag kho na'o// thal ba ni shing lnga paM kan tsa na'i dang / ka ping ka'i dang / a shro tha'i dang / u dum wa ra'i dang / n+ya gro nga'i'o// sa nis las sor
195a1(1): bzhi'i 'ganas byung ba 'o/ 'di ni sbyar ba'i zas yin no// de nas dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa zas sbyar babyin na/ 'on kyang sos par ma gyur ba'i skabs de/ dge slong nam/ 
195a2(1): kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba kun dga' mo khyod kying la rma bya chen po'i rig sngags bzung nas kun chub par byas te/ dge slongs ril srung ba dang / yongs su
195a3(1): sgrub pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / dug bzhil ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba dang / nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ mnyan te
195a4(1): bgyi'o / 'dul ba bzhi/ bam po drug bcu tham pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i che/ rma bya chen ma'i rig sngags 'di bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshas
195a5(1): lo/ chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ mang gi l+ye/ hi ra ma?/ hi ran+ta gar+b+he/ bAd tA/ su b+had d+he/ sa man ta b+ha rbe/ shA b+hed d+he/ sarba ar+tha sad+d+hi na/ 
195a6(1): par mar+tha an rar+tha/ pra sha mya naM/ sarba mang ga le/ sa d+ha naM/ ma na se/ ma ha na se/ a ts+tshan te/ ang b+hu de/ ang tad b+hu te/ mug taM/ mau tsa naM/ meg shag naM/ a ra dze/ b+hi ra dzA/ a mri te/ a ma re/ a mar ni/ bram
195a7(1): mA sa reHpu re re pur rna/ ma mo ra thA/ mug ga te/ dzi ba ta/ sa ri la gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / nad thams cad la srungs shig swA hA/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan
195a8(1): 'das kyis spyan sngar nas/ rma ba chen po'i rig sngags blangs nas/ dge slong sa rol bde lags su gyur pa byas pas dug med nas/ sngon ji ltar bzhin du gyur te// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsam
195b1(1): thams cad bcang ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la nus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyi rma bya chen po'i rigs sngags sman pa dang / bcos sgras bgyid pa ngo mtshan che lags so// dge
195b2(1): slong dag da lta 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga log par ltung ba'i lus mi mkhom par gyur pa na/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen pos phan pa dang gces spras byas pa nyan cig/ dge slong
195b3(1): dag sngoran byung ba ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la/ rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de nang par rma bya chen po'i rigs sngags 'dis/ bde lags su 'gyur ba byas te/ 
195b4(1): nyin mo bde legs su gyur byas te/ mtshan mo bde legs su gnas so// de dus gzhan zhig na/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la/ lhag par chags 'dod pa rnams la zhe na/ chums rgyal mo'i rab tu rmongs rab tu
195b5(1): rgyal te/ bag med pa'i nags kyi rma bya chen mo rab tu mang po rnams dang / lhan cig tu kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang / bskyed mos tshal nas bskyed mo'i tshal dang / rings nas ri'i ngos su rgyu ba las
195b6(1): ji tsam ni ri'i ser ga zhig tu zhugs pa dang / de der yun ring du phyir rgol ba dgra rgyur pa klags lta ba rnams kyi rma bya'i snyis gzung ste/ de ni mdza' bo'i nang du song ba dang / rab tu rmongs pa las dran pa
195b7(1): rnyed de nas rma bya chen mo'i rigs pa 'di kho na yid la byas so// 'di lnga ste/ a ma lo/ baM ma le/ nai ra ma le/ mang ga le/ hi ra n+ya/ hi ra r+ya gar+b+he/ b+hu dwe/ su bed d+he/ sa man ta b+hud d+he/ shA rid dwe/ sarba ar+tha
195b8(1): sad ni par ma rba sa d+ha ni/ sarba a na rar+tha/ pa sha ma ni sarba mngag la/ sad ni/ man si/ ma ha na si/ a tsu tre/ ad b+hu tre/ ad t+yang b+hung tra/ mug te/ mo tsa naM/ mog shag ni/ a ra dze/ a ma ra ni/ 
196a1(1): baM m+ba sa re/ pu ra ne/ pur na/ ma no ra the/ mug ga ti/ dzi ba na taM/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las bsrungs shig swA hA/ de rma bya'i sI chad nas bros so// dge slong dag rdzi
196a2(1): mnyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus rma bya'i rgyal po// gser snang ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa ni ngal rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags kyis phan pa dang / bcos spras byas so// da ltar na yang nga'i rma bya chen man
196a3(1): rig sngags kyi sa phan pa dang bcas smras byas so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyis dge slong sa ri le ci tsam bde lags su 'gyur ba bgyis pa la gzigs/ dge slong dag da ltar
196a4(1): 'ba' shig ma yin gyi/ ji ltar 'das de yang nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba dang / wA ra NA si'i grong khyer na/ sbrul sngags mkhan zhig yod do// rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig sbrul gyis zin
196a5(1): nas de shi ba dang / sbrul sngags mkhan gyi rig sngags kyi de sos par byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sprul sngags mkhan gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i
196a6(1): tshe de'i dus kyi khye'u gang yin pa de ni dge slong sa ri yin no// sman gyi gzhi rdzogs s+ho// gos kyi gzhi bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ mtsho byed dang ni gsor sa dang / de bzhin kha tshar ring po
196a7(1): dang / dbyar ral bar bar rig byed dang / 'chi ba'i dus dang / tha ma dag ni nad pa yin/ bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ 'tsho byed dang ni gsum 'dral dang / dbyar gyi ram chen gdeng ba dang / g.yan pa
196a8(1): bde gshegs mon dar dang / bal dang sha na zar ma'i ras/ sdom la/ drum bus skyong ba seng ge dang / de bzhin yangs par song ba dang / sems 'phrog dran srong mtsho ma dang / 
196b1(1): a pra skyong dang 'jigs med dang / mchong dpon chung ma rigs skyes dang / sman pa yin lung dang maM rdo 'jog dang ni bzang byed dang / u dum pa ra gzhal ba dang / bskyed dang rgyal chen
196b2(1): bskyed mes tshal/ bcom rlag kyang dang bud med sbrul/ yu mun dang dur khrod dang / yangs pa mig dang srin gyi med/ rgyal po'i khab bdun bzhi lnga dang / mtsho byed sde mtshan bsdus
196b3(1): pa yin/ lus 'phags pa na rgyal po 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba/ 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go// de'i
196b4(1): blon po dum bu la sogs pa lnga brgya yod pa las/ blon po'i mchog dum bus chos dang mthun pa/ rgyal srid byed du bcug ste/ tha snyad du bye ba yang rigs pas lta bar byed do// des skye bo'i tshigs thams
196b5(1): de'i dor ltas shing 'dug go// de rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lha cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par
196b6(1): byed pa/ las khye'u zhig btsas ste/ de'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun sum nyi shu rtsa gcig du zhes bya ba nas/ sa skyong zhes bya bar btags so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar
196b7(1): byed/ dgar mgur spyod par byed pa las/ khye'u zhag bcas te gong ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/ de ni song ge zhes bya bar btags so// sa skyong seng ge rib gyis gzhon nur gyur pa na yang / blon
196b8(1): po'i mchog dum bu ni thog ma nyid nas dpa' zhing pha rol gnod pa gnas lnga las byung ba yin no// des ra blon po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to// gang gis tshe bu'i mthu skyes pa de'i tshe lhag par
197a1(1): yang blon pa rnams cad zil gyis gnan te 'dug sa// de nas zla ba rnams thabs kyis non pasna maM bzod pa skyes nas phyan mUd+hArAd+ha m+b+has b+h+yas twa rgyal blos rlung \u0f7f
197a2(1): ngo de nas skabs la bab par rig nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha rgyal po su lags des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gi stag tu ci yod/ rgyal po lta nga yin mod gzhon su zhig yin/ de rnams
197a3(1): kyis gnod pa lta rgyal po ni dum bu lags kyis lhag ma lags so// gal te de 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ lha rgyal srid las phyung nas/ rang nyid bcod pan bcings te/ rgyal
197a4(1): srid kyis dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos bsam pa des 'dis 'di dag thams cad zil gyis gnan pas/ des dbyen byed de snyam mo/ res shig dus
197a5(1): gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/ 'dug pa dang / blon po mchog dum bu rgol ba dang / phyir rgol ba brgya stong yongs su bskor nas/ rgyal
197a6(1): po'i pho brang de gang bar byas nas 'dug go// gang gi tshe rgyal srid kyi bu ba byas nas phyir phyung ba de'i tshe/ yang rgyal po'i pho brang de stong par 'dug go// rgyal po'i
197a7(1): smras pa/ shes ldan dag skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phyir byung bar gyur tam/ blon po rnams kyis glags rnyed nas de rnams kyis smras pa/
