197a8(1): gang gi slad du snyam du gsol pa/ lhas spyan sngar bab lags so// gal te dum bu 'tshal bar gyur na/ lha rgyal srid las byung nas ni rang nyid kyis
197b1(1): nga pan bsangs te rgyal sring tsha dbang phyug sa dbang bzong bar 'gyur ro/ rgyal po rnams raM la lta khum sreg za ba yin pas nges bsams pa/ 
197b2(1): 'di rnams kyis ji ltar smras pa/ de bzhin du gdan mi za' snyam nas/ dede bla na ka tshol bar gyur to// 'jig rten ni mdza' ba dang / 
197b3(1): mdza' ba dang / bar ma yod pas ji tsam nabazhin dag gis dum bu la smras pa/ khyed la rgyal po bla na ka tshol zhing 'dug gis
197b4(1): thabs legs par soms shig/ de rtags pa skyes shing de spyod pa la zhugs pa/ gal te mnyan yod na song na ni mnyan yod de yang rgyal po'i
197b5(1): mnga' ris yin pas/ nyen 'di yod do// de bzhin du wA ra NA si dang / rgyal po'i khab dang / tsam pa yang dag gcig dbang du gyur pas nyen
197b6(1): 'di nyid yod do// yangs pa ni tshogs kyi dbang yin te/ bcu dga' ba gang yin pa de la ni/ nyi shu mi dga' bar 'gyur bas/ de yangs pa can du 'gro'o// snyam
197b7(1): nas des yangs can gyi li tsa byi rnams la bdag gis phag na 'dug par 'dod do zhes pho nya btang ngo // de rnams kyis grus pa'i tshul gyis lan spangs pa las yangs
197b8(1): pa legs kyis byon cig/ de nas blon po'i mchog dum bu sa nye du rnams bos te smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag ni yangs pa can du chas kyis khyed cag las gang
198a1(1): radag 'dir dga' ba 'di dag ni 'dug shig/ gang dag mi 'dod pa de dag ni sta gon gyis shig dang 'dong ngo ba lang rdzi dang / phyug
198a2(1): rdzi rnams la bsko ba khyed cag gi ba lang dang ma he yangs pa can gang na ba der skyongs shig/ zhogs mtsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/ yangs pa can
198a3(1): du 'dong gis gyon cig/ de nas skye bo'i tshogs de dag sta gon byed du bcug nas/ rgyal po'i drung du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs
198a4(1): te sres pa/ lha bgyi ba cung zad zhig mchis te bskyed mo tshal du mchis te/ gzigs su gsol// rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin byas
198a5(1): so shig/ des bskyed mas tshal byaM dar byas nas/ nor gces pa shIng rta bkang ste steng bza' ba dang bca' bas g.yogs nas song ngo / blon
198a6(1): pa rnams kyis dum bu bris sa zhes thos nas de rnams rings par rings par rgyal po'i drung du dong nas smras pa/ lha bram bu ni zos so rgyas
198a7(1): sa smras pa deng la slar khug shig de rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas sngags te smras pa/ 
198a8(1): dum bu lta sa bka' stsal gyis lhar log shig des smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag gaM yun rings po zhi ga nas/ kye ma'odum
198b1(1): bu shi ma zos par gyur kyang tsam rung snyam du bsams/ ngachags chung ngus grub kyis dang shig mkhan thos pa yin na/ denam
198b2(1): kyis rgyal ba'i sems bsungs pa'i byar/ mnga' dang mda' nga / 'dres par byas nas mags rgyal ba la smras pa/ lha zan
198b3(1): chag dum bu ni zos so// rgyas pas smras pa ma mags snyam du bsams nas/ cang ma smra bar 'dug na/ dum bu yang rim
198b4(1): gyis yangs pa can du byin to// de 'di'i cha yangs pa can ris gsum du gnas te/ ris dang po na ni khang pa rtsegs ma bdun stong pa
198b5(1): gam gser la sa byas pa'o// res bar man ni khang pa rtsegs ma khri bzhi stong gam dngul las byas pa'o// ris tha man ni khang partsegs ma chi
198b6(1): khri cig stong ba gam zangs lus byas pa ste/ de rnams na mi dam pa dang / bar ma dang phal ba rnams ni rigs par gnas sa/ yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis zhen
198b7(1): su bcas te bzhag pa ni/ ris dang por bu mo bcas pa gang yin pa gang yin pa de ni/ ris dang po nyid du gtong bar byed kyi bar mar ma yin thamar ma yin// bar ma'i gang yin pa de ni ris dang
198b8(1): dang bar ma la gtong bar mi byed do// tha ma gang yin de ni rigs sum char du btong bar byed do// bud med rnams ni yangs pa can ma gtogs par gzhan du mi gtong zhing mi 'byin to// bud med
199a1(1): rin po che ni su la yang mi btong tshogs spyi'i yongs su longs spyod kho nar byed do// dum bu ni skyes bu dam pa yin no zhes te/ ris dang por khang pa byin
199a2(1): gnas pa de na/ gnas par brtsams pa las gang gi tshe tshogs 'dus pa de'i tshe/ de bos kyang 'dur ma btub nas de la yongs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu
199a3(1): khyod ci'i phyir mi 'dug des smras pa/ dum bu khyod na las bdag la nyes dmigs byung nas bdag mi 'dra'o// yangs pa can rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu 'dus shog/ 'dir nyes
199a4(1): dmigs ci zhig 'byung des 'du bar brtsams nas/ blo gros ma byin no de rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu blo gros byin cig/ des smras pa/ gang gi phyir blo gros kho nas/ bdag la nyes
199a5(1): dmigs byung bas na/ blo gros ni ma sbyin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ blo gros byin cig 'dir nyes dmigs ci zhig byung / de tshogs dang ldan cig 'dug nas blo gros kyang byin to// sngon yang
199a6(1): pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams gang su la yang rung yi ge spring bar byed na rtsub po dang bcas pas srid par byed do// gang gi tshe dum bus blo gros pa de'i tshe/ 'jam po dang bcas par yi ge sbed par
199a7(1): byed do// gang dag la 'jam po dang bcas pa'i yi ge 'ongs par gyur pa de rnams phan tshun du gros byas pa/ shes ldan dag gis yangs pa can gyi tshogs dang bcas par spring bar byed pa las/ 
199a8(1): da'ajam po dang bcas par yi ge sbed par byed do/ gang dag la 'jam po dang bcas par byed par gyur pa la rgyu zhig yod/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ khyad par yod de// lus 'phags
199b1(1): rgyal pa mnag dum bu 'dir 'ongs nas/ de dag da'i blazas bzhin zung / dam na du ltar 'jam po dang bcas par spong bar byed do/ dum bus sa myong dang sang sa'i khyim phub nas
199b2(1): seng ge rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ bu mo gcig ces te/ de'i bcas ston cher byas nas/ gos can zhes bya bar btags so// de las mkhan
199b3(1): rnams kyis mthong nas/ khye'u zhig bcas par 'gyur te/ des pha srog dang bral nas/ rang nyid bcod pan btsongs te/ rgyal srid byed par 'gyu ro// zhes lung ston to// de yang rtse bar
199b4(1): byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i bcas ston yang rgya cher byas nas nye gos cas zhes bya bar grag so// de yang lhas mkhan rnams kyis
199b5(1): mthong nas/ bu mtshan rdzogs pa zhig bca' bar 'gyu ro zhes lung ston to// sa skyong gdugs pa rtsal po che zhig pas/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal rnams
199b6(1): ma rung bar byas pa dang / skyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis smras pa/ yangs pa can lA tsA byi rnams gdugs pa rtul po che yin gyi skyed mo tshal rnams ma rung ba ma bya zhig/ der slar
199b7(1): bzlog kyang ma btub nas skyed mo'i tshal bsrung ba rnams kyis dum bu la smras pa/ khyod kyi bus yangs pa can gyi laM tsa byi rnams kyi skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas te/ li tsa byi
199b8(1): rnams gdugs pa rtul pa che yin pas 'di la gnod pa byas su 'ang gis/ 'di skar bzlog shig des de bklag nas sbas pa/ zas yangs pa can gyi li tsa bri rnams ni gdugs pa rtsab
200a1(1): po che yin pas 'di dag gi bskyed mos tshal ma rung bar ma bya shig/ de dag gis gnod pa byas sa re des smras pa/ yab 'di dag la ni bskyed mos tshal mchis na/ bdag cag
200a2(1): la ma mchis des smras pa/ bu skyed mos tshal gyi don du tshogs la gsol ba btab po// des tshogs la gsol ba btab pa/ shes ldan dag bdag gi bu gnyis la skyed mos tshal ma mchis kyis bdag
200a3(1): la bskyed mos tshal gcig thugs dpag 'dzad pa'i rigs so// de rnams kyis de dag la bskyed mos tshul rnying pa zhig byin pa las/ de na shing sA la chen po zhig yod de/ de dag la gcig gis
200a4(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs brnyan byed du bcug go// cig shos kyis ni zhal sros byas so// de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo'i nang du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yang
200a5(1): pa can na/ sa skyong dang seng ge'i shing sA la'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes brjod do// sa skyong gis byas pa yin pa stong phrag dag byas pas li tsa byi rnams smod par byed gzhog 'phyas byed/ 
200a6(1): kha zer bar byed de nan dub bus bkug ste bsgo ba/ bu khyod tshogs 'khrugs pa med par/ ri bor che ge mo zhig du song la der rang gi zhing bras kyis mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed 'dug shig/ 
200a7(1): de der song nas rang gi zhing blas kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta bya bar brtsams so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yangs pa can gyi sde dpon du bcug pa/ las nges kyang ngas thu du zhig du chos
200a8(1): dang mthun pas sde dpon byas nas shi'o// yangs pa can gyi tshogs 'dus nas su zhig sde dpon du zhugs cing byas pa dang / de na kha cig gis smras pa/ blon po'i mchog dum bras tshogs
200b1(1): yongs su bskyangs pas/ de nyid kyi bu gzhug go// kha cig gis smras pa/ de'i dus skyong 'dug pa srul po che zhig ste/ gal te de sde dpon du bcug na ni/ gdon mi za bar tshogs phye bar
200b2(1): 'gyur ro// de'i nu mo seng ge gang yin pa de ni nges pa/ 'grogs na bde ba tshogs kyis sems mgu bar byed nus pa zhig pas gal te tshogs 'dod na de sde dpon du bzhugs so// / 
200b3(1): thams cad dga' bas de rnams 'dus nas seng ge'i gan du song ste/ seng ge khyod la sde dpon sbyin no// des smras pa/ sa skyong ni sa bdag gi phu bo yin pas sde dpon du chug shig/ 
200b4(1): rnams kyis smras pa/ seng ge sde dpon khyod kyis rigs rgyud kyis rim pas 'ongs pa yin nam ci/ tshogs gang la 'drang ba des sde dpon du bya bar zad do// gal te khyod mi 'dod na/ kho
200b5(1): bo cag gis gzhan zhig sde dben dug go/ des bsams pa gal te bdag gi khyim nas sde dpon du shor na/ de ni ma 'ongs pas bkur ro// snyam nas/ des khas blangs pa dang / de rnams
200b6(1): bkur sti chen pos sde dpon du bcug go/ yangs pa can pa rnams sngon gang la yi ge spring ba de la dum bu la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri ba las/ gang gi tshe seng ge sde dpon
200b7(1): du gyur pa de'i tshe/ seng ge la sogs tshogs kyi bka' stsal pa/ shes 'dri bar byed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ri bor nas su skyong rang gi zhing blas kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed pa'i
200b8(1): ri bor gang yin pa der spong ba 'ongs pa dang / sa skyong gis phye ste blangs nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag sngon ni yangs pa can gyi tshogs dum bu la sogs kyi bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri na/ 
201a1(1): da ni seng ge la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'dri na/ ci kho bo'i pha shi'o// de mi bzod pa skyes nas/ yangs pa can du song ste smras pa/ phu bong
201a2(1): bdug bzhin du khyod kyis sde dpon bya ba cig rigs sam/ seng ges ji ltar gyur pa de la smras pa dang / de yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la mi bzod pa skyes nas bsams pa/ bdag
201a3(1): yangs pa can rnams kyis bkur si ma yin pa byas kyis/ rgyal po'i khab du 'gro'o snyam nas des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la/ bdag lha'i btsan phog na mchis par 'chal
201a4(1): lo// zhes pa ha btang ngo // da la sred pa 'ong ba lags kyis shog shig ces spong ngo // de rgyal po gzugs can stong pas blon po'i mchog tu bcug go// jitsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po
201a5(1): gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas/ de'i 'gram pa la lag pa gtad de/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa des sa skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du
201a6(1): zhal la phyag tad de/ zugs mi dges shing bzhugs des smras pa/ de'i btsun mo dam pa shi na ci'i phyir sems khengs sa chud cing 'dug/ lnga zong thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ 
201a7(1): bdag gi nu bo la bu mo gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa lnga kho la 'ong ba gnyis mchis na/ de la gcig la ni pha 'gum pa'i mi zhig bca' bar 'gyur/ cig shos ni mtshan
201a8(1): phun sum tshogs pa zhig bca' bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan na khwa'i ched du khrid de mchi bu mtshan phun sum tshogs pa bca' bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa
201b1(1): de'o// de nas sa skyong gi seng ge la smras pa/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas/ khyod kyi nye gos can tshur skyi shig bcun mo dam par 'gyur ro// des
201b2(1): de la yi ge'i ldan spring ba/ gar bskor kyang khyod la bdag 'dri bar zad de khyod kyis byas pa gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma'i mchog yin pas/ khyod nyid shes so// ji ltar
201b3(1): tshogs kyis khrims bcas pa/ yangs pa can las gzhan du bu mo mi btang ngo // zhes bcas mod kyi 'on kyang khyod nyid 'ongs te/ bskyed mos tshal du sdod cig dang / 
201b4(1): bos bskyed mos tshal du phyung ba dang / khyod kyis khrid de song shig de nas sa skyong gis rgyal po la phyi phyag byas nas/ shing rtar zhugs te/ yangs pa can du song nas rim gyis
201b5(1): phyin nas bskyed mos tshal du sdod do// de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi sgo drungs shi ga shi nas mi ma yin rnams su skyes pa des yangs pa can rnams la bstan pa/ bdag ni mi ma yin
201b6(1): pha rnams su skyes kyis bdag gi gnod sbyin gyis gnas byos la/ mgul pa la dril sbyongs shig gal te yangs pa can rnams la phyir rgol ba 'ga' zhig yongs na bdag gis ji tsam du zin
201b7(1): pa'am gros par gyur pa de srid du dril gyi sgra bsgrags par bya'o// de rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi gzugs brnyan byas nas mgul pa la rdul btags te/ gar dang glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / 
201b8(1): gtor ma dang / me tog 'phreng gi yo byad kyis sgo gang bzhag go/ sa spong gis seng go la springs pa/ kho bo bskyed mos chal na sdod kyis byung shig/ des yangs pa can gyi tshogs la rtags
202a1(1): nas/ khyim song ste/ nye gos can la smras pa/ khyod rgyal po gzugs can snying po la byin gyis/ rgyan rnams thogs la bskyed mos tshul du byung shig/ de rgyan
202a2(1): rnams thogs par brtsams pa dang / gas can gyi mthong nas des smras pa/ ci zhig gis phyir rgyan thogs/ kho mo bag mar btang ngo // su zhig la rgyal po gzugs can snying po la'o// 
202a3(1): des smras pa/ kho mo bu mo yin no// khyod ci ste bag mar btang gal te de lta na khyod rgyan thogs shig/ de yang smra ba las dril gyi sgra phyung ngo // yangs pa can gyi tshogs rong rong por gyur te/ 
202a4(1): bdag cag gis mi 'dza' ba zhig yangs pa can du zhugs so// seng ge sngags pas/ nye gos can yin no snyam nas gos can khrid de myur bar phyir byung ba dang / sa skyong yang spangs pas/ gos can
202a5(1): shing rtar bcug ste song ngo // yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis/ phyi bzhin bsngags de nas de rnams kyis su lhan cig mtha' bar brtsams pa dang / de gnas lnga rnams la byang ba yin pas/ 
202a6(1): nges li tsi bye lnga brgya'i gnang du bsnun nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ngas khyed cag las/ lnga rgya gnang du bstan zin gyis/ lhag ma rnams srog skyabs kyis la srar deng shig/ 
202a7(1): rnams kyis smras pa/ deng tsag las sems can gcig kyang bsad pa med do// gu phud cing de rnams kyi go phrad pa dang / lnga brgyas la 'gyel nas srog dang bral bar gyur to// de nas de
202a8(1): rnams kyis mi 'di srin po yin no snyam nas skrag ste zos so// yangs pa can du lhags nas/ thos byas par brtsams pa shes ldan dag bdag cag gi sgra 'di la/ gzugs can snying po
202b1(1): bu rnams la lan glon du gzhug gis/ glegs bu la yi ger bris te/ sbom bur bcug nas rgya skegs la rgya btab nas bzhag go/ zhes de rnams kyi de bzhin du byas nas bzhag go// se sbyong yang
202b2(1): rims kyis rgyal po'i khab du phyin nas smras pa/ nye gos can po bas shig/ des smras pa/ khu gu bdag ni nye gos can ma lags te/ bdag ni gos can lags so// khyod kyi ci'i phyir
202b3(1): bdag las ma smras pa/ des cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas/ rgyal po'i drung du song ba/ rgyal po'i mthong nas smras pa/ sa skyong 'ongs pa legs so// / 
202b4(1): lta bdag mchis lags so// he gos can khring de 'ongs sam/ lha khrid de mchis kyang ma mchis so// ci zhig zer nye gos can lags snyam nas/ gos can khrid de mchis so// lhas
202b5(1): khrid de shog shig/ de nang du khrid pa dang / rgyal pos lhag par gzigs pa dang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba dang / bud med kyi yul gyis phrogs pas/ mthong ma thag kho nar rgyal
202b6(1): po tshabs par gyur nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag bu gsod pa gang yin pa de na rgyal srid kyi phyir yin pas 'gal te/ nga la bu yod par gyur na/ de btsas ma thag du ngas cod pan gyis bcing
202b7(1): bar bya'o// de nas des dpal gyis 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te/ yul lus 'phags ma zhes bya bar grags so// de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur
202b8(1): spyod par byed do// res shig dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po ri dgas kyi phyir byung ba dang / bsti gnas zhig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so// 
203a1(1): ji tsam ne ri dgas mda'i long ba la btags pas bsgag pa zhig drang srong de'i bsti nas su zhugs zhing / 'byung ba rgyal po'i mda'i gnad du bsnun to// de nas drang srong
203a2(1): de khros nas smras pa/ zab grol can gyi rgyal po bdag gi bsti nas can gdug pas bzem par bya bar rigs dag skyabs su 'ongs pa/ khyod kyis bsad dam zhes drang srong de rgyal po la
203a3(1): 'di skad kha zer ba dang / dpung gi tshogs 'ongs nas smras pa/ lha 'dis la g.yar mchi/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ngol yin na shes ldan dag rgyal po la kha tshas zer ba gang yin pa de chang pa
203a4(1): ci yod/ lnga de'i chang pa 'gum pa lags so// gal te de ltar na ngas drang srong 'di yongs su spangs so// de bsad par brtsams te/ de gsod pa na smon lam log par btab pa/ rgyal
203a5(1): po 'thab bkrol can 'dis bdag nyes pa can med cing gnod pa mi byed pa/ gsod par bsgris gang du skyes pa der 'dir srog dang bral bar byed par gyur cig/ yang bsams pa rgyal
203a6(1): po 'di dag ni shin tu spangs pa/ shin tu bsrungs pa shin tu btsas pa yin te/ gal te gzhan du skye ba blangs na/ lan 'ga' yang skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur gyis/ rnam pa thams cad
203a7(1): du smon lam 'di'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes par gyur cig ces byas so// de smon lam log par btab pas gos can gyi mngal du skyes so// gang gang tsam kho na la cin mtshams sbyor ba
203a8(1): blangs pa de nyid kyi nyim la/ khrag gi char bab po/ gos can 'dod pa skyes pa/ e ma'o bradag gis lnga'i rgyab kyi sha bcad cing zos kyang ci ma rung snyam mo// de ltar gyur pa rgyal ba
203b1(1): la smras pa dang / rgyal pos las mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ni btsun mo'i rum du sems can zhig zhugs pa gang lags pa de'i mthus
203b2(1): lags so// rgyal po sems khongs su chud de/ 'dug nas 'di'i 'dod pa zhig gsel bar 'gyur snyam mo// mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gzhan dag gis smras pa/ lha sras kyi bar
203b3(1): rtsang shas bltam par bgyi te gsol la/ nyid btsun mo la stobs mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal pos ras kyi bar shes gang bsams pa bgos nas/ bdag nyid gos can la ltas pa dang / 
203b4(1): des rgyab kyis sha yin no// snyam nas zos so// de nas de'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar 'gyur ro// yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma'o bdag gis lha'i khrag kho na 'thungs
203b5(1): kyang ci ma rung snyam pa de yang rgyal po la smras pa/ de nas rgyal pos yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtar nas khrag blud pas/ de 'dod pa de dang yoyang bral bar gyur to// ci tsam na zla ba dgu tshang ba dang
203b6(1): khye'u gzugs bzang ga mdzes pa lta na sdug pa zhig btsas so// btsas te gang gis nyi ma bcas pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la yang khrag gi char bab po// rgyal pos yang bltas mkhan rnams
203b7(1): bkug nas smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bstan chos las ji ltar gda' ba ltar na/ gdon ma btsal bar khye'u 'di'i lha'i sku tshe dang bral na/ rang nyid cod pan bcings te/ 
203b8(1): rgyal sing bying bar 'gyur ro// rgyal pos bsams pa/ rnam pa thams cad du rgyal srid kyi cheng du pha'i srog dang bral bar byed kyi/ 'di la bdag nyid kyi rgyal srid byin na ci'i phyir
204a1(1): bdag srog dang bral sngam mo// de'i cha yangs pa can na li tsa byi ming can zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i skyeng mas 'chal na/ a mra'i chal yod pa las der blo bur
204a2(1): du chu shing gi sdong po zhig skyes pa kun dga' bo bsrung ba'i mthong ngo // de ma thag kho nar me tog chags pa dang / de ngo mtshar skyes nas ming chen la smras pa dang / des smras pa/ lhas
204a3(1): mkhan rnams bkug nas dris pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha de bsrung du stsol cig dgung bdun gyi nyin par gas par 'gyur te/ de'i nang nas nu mo zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag
204a4(1): ming can gyis thos nas/ lhag par yang mtshar skyes par gyur to// bskyed mos tshal dor kun nas srungs pa'i mi rnams bkod nas/ nyi ma grang ba bzhugs so// ci tsam na zhag bdun lon pa
204a5(1): dang / bskyed mos tshal de rdo ba dang / gseg mo dang / gyo mo rnams rtsol tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa shing dri zhim po'i por phor dag bshams dar gyi chung 'phyang mang po bris/ me tog
204a6(1): sil mas bkram klu dang rol mo'i sgra rnam pa du ma dag/ 'dza' bo dang gnyen bshes kyis skye bos yongs su bskor nas/ dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos chung ma dang lhan cig byung nas skyed mos
204a7(1): tshal de na de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las chu shing gi sde po gas nas bu mo gzugs mdzes pa lta na sdug pa/ yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhog byang
204a8(1): ngo 'de nas ming chen gyis chung ma dam pa la btang pa dang / des smras pa/ lha 'di'i ming bdags su gsol/ ming chen gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di a mra'i tshal nas rnyed pa yin pas/ 
204b1(1): 'di'i ming a ma skyong ma zhes bya'o// ji tsam na khyi bdag gi ming can skyed mos chal nas rang gi khyim du song ste/ bu mo a mra skyong ma skyed bsrings te/ zhes bya ba nas chen mor gyur te/ 
204b2(1): zhes bya ba'i bar gling ma bzhin du'o// de smyung ba'i phyir yul krung brang ba rnams dang / shAkya rnams dang / gzhan yang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i rgyal po'i bu dang / blon po'i tha
204b3(1): dang / tshong pa dang tshong dpon dang / ded dpon du ma dag 'ongs pa dang / khyim bdag ming can gyis bsams pa/ gang kho na la ma byin pa/ de kho na sngar bar 'gyur na 'on kyang tshogs
204b4(1): kyis khrims su bcas pas/ re shig tshogs la brtag go snyam nas/ des yangs pa can gyi tshogs bsdus te shes ldan dag bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams nyon cig/ bdag
204b5(1): gis skyed mos chal nas/ bu mo zhig rnyed pa de/ bdag gis snun bstod de skyed nas/ de bdag gis rang gis rigs rgyud dang / 'tsham pa 'ga' zhig la chun mar sbyin na tshogs kyis ltos
204b6(1): shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag sngon tshogs kho nas khrims su bcas pa bud med rin po che mi btang to/ tshogs kyis spyad do// zhes pa yin gyis/ re shig bu me de ci 'dra
204b7(1): ba bltas/ khrid de shog shig/ des de tshogs kyi nang du khrid de 'ongs pa dang / gzugs dang / lang tshe phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/ tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig
204b8(1): bgrad par de kun tu/ brtags par brtsams nas smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ni bud med rin po che yin pas tshogs kyis skyed kyis/ su la yang mi byin no// khyim bdag ming can
205a1(1): yid mi bde zhing rang gi khyim du song nas de 'gram pa la lag pa btang nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa a mra skyong gis mthong nas dris pa/ yab ci'i
205a2(1): srad du thugs mi dgyes/ bu mo khyod bud med rin po che yin no// zhes tshogs kyis spyad par 'gyur te/ bdag gis yid la re ba rdzogs so// yab ni khyod gzhan gyi dbang du gyur
205a3(1): tam/ bu mo sngon tshegs kyis khrims bcas pa/ bud med rin po che ni tshogs spyad do zhes bcas la/ khyod kyang bud med rin po che yin pas/ de'i phyir bdag la dbang med do// 
205a4(1): des smras pa/ dam zhig bcu ste/ gal te bdag la tshogs kyis dam pa zhig stsal nas/ bdag gis tshogs kyis spyad par bgyi ste/ rigs dang por khang pa stsal pa dang / 
205a5(1): skyes pa gcig shos nang du mi 'jug gang yin pa de yin kar sha pa na lnga brgya 'tshal te mche ba dang / gang gi tshe khyim nyul ba de'i tshe bdag khyim zhag bdun na nyul ba dang / 
205a6(1): bdag gi khyim du mchi ba rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa la mi rtag pa'o// ming can gyis a ma skyong ma'i spring pa bzlas pa dang / tshogs kyis smras pa/ de
205a7(1): bzhin bya ste/ ris dang po'i khang pa zhes gang smras pa la ris dang po'i khang pa'i ni bud med rin po che 'di kho la 'ongs so// gcig nang du zhugs pa na gcig shos nang du 'jug
205a8(1): bar bya'o// zhes gang smras pa yang bden te/  khon rnams la 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi sha khon tha chang yin pas/ gal te gcig nang du bzhugs nas/ gcig gos kying
205b1(1): nang du zhugs na gdon ma thos par gcig bsad par 'gyur ro// nang 'dug pa des ka sha pa na lnga brgya thogs te nang du 'dug par bya'o// zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te
205b2(1): gdon mi za bar de'i gos dang rgyun du dgos so// zhag bdun lon na khang pa byul bar bya'o zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ sngar ram phyir byas kyang rung de la 'gal bcu
205b3(1): zhig yod/ skyes pa rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa la mi rtog go zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ 'di skad 'tshod ma yin pas/ gal te mi rnams kyi
205b4(1): phyir 'byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa brtags na su zhig de'i khyim du 'jug/ de nas tshogs kyi spyad par 'gyur to// yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis dga' mgur spyad
205b5(1): pa'i phyir de'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa las/ de na kha cig ni yul la chags ches phyir mthong ma thag kho nar 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro// kha cig gis
205b6(1): reg pa kho na te/ de la 'gal kyang skyes pa'i bya ba ma byas so// des bsam pa 'di dag ni skyes pa ma yin gyi thabs shig bshams par bya'o// snyam nas des yul sku
205b7(1): tshogs na gnas pa'i ri mo mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang na rgyal po dang blon po 'am/ phyug po'am/ tshong dpon nam/ tshong pa'am/ ded dpon ci 'dra
205b8(1): ba mthong ba de 'dra ba dag rtsig pa la rigs shig/ de rnams kyis ji ltar mthong ba bzhin bris pa dang / de nas a mra skyong ma rgyan tshogs kyis rgyan nas/ ri mo'i las rnams
206a1(1): la sa sar rtags te rjes pa/ shes ldan 'di gang zhig 'di ni rgyal por snang / gzhan 'di gang zhig kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal lo// gzhan 'di gang shig
206a2(1): pang sa la'i rgyal po char byed de/ gzhan 'di gang zhig ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'o// des de bzhin du bris pa dang / de nas rnams kyang thams cad smras so// de nas
206a3(1): des thams cad la brtags pa dang / gzugs can snying po la mag chags nas des bsam pa skyes bu 'di lta bur chu zheng gab pas bdag dang / lhan cig dga' mgur sprang par nus so snyam
206a4(1): mo// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po seng gi khang bzangs kyi bzhir song nas/ blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug nas/ tshul ma
206a5(1): yin pa'i gtam smras pa/ shes ldan dag sus smad 'tshong ma ji lta bu mthong na/ sa skyong gis smras pa lta re shig gzhan lta zhog yangs pa can na/ smad 'tshong ma a mra skyong ma zhes bgyi ba shin du
206a6(1): gzugs dang lang tshe phun sum tshogs rtsal drug bcu rtsa bzhi 'tshal bltas kho nas spyang du zhig mchis so// des smras pa sa skyong gal te de lta na yangs pa can du 'dong / de dang lhan cig dga' mgur
206a7(1): spyang ngo // des smras pa/ yangs pa can gyi lats+tsha byi rnams ni yun ring por gnas gnod pa bgyid pa la/ skar rgol ba dgra bo lags pas/ khyod la gnod pa bgyis su mchi'o// rgyal pos
206a8(1): sbas pa/ shos ldan dag mi rnams ni skyes bu'i dpal snying can yin pas 'dong ngo // des smras pa/ yA gal te don mchis pa la gcig cher mdzad na gshegs mod/ de shing car zhugs nas/ 
206b1(1): sa srong dang lhan cig yangs pa can du chas te/ rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin nas/ sa skyong ni bskyed mos chal na sdod de/ rgyal po na a mra skyong ma'i khyim du zhugs pa dang / ji tsam
206b2(1): na dril gyi sgra byung ngo // yangs pa can gyi li tsi byi rnams rol por gyur nas/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gi mi mdza' ba zhig nang du zhugs pas dril 'khrol lo zhes sgra bsal ba dang / skra chen
206b3(1): po byung ba dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos a mra skyong ma la dris pa bzang mo 'di ci zhig yin/ lha sdum pa nyul bar bgyid do// ci zhig gi phyir lha'i slad du'o// ji ltar bya ci 'bros
206b4(1): sam/ lha mi dgyes pa ma mdzad cig/ lha dgung bdun lon pa dang / bdag gi sdum pa nyul bar bgyid pas/ re shig dgung bdun du rol pas bgyes par mdzod/ dgyes dgur mdzod
206b5(1): la dgung bdun lags dang / dus mkhyen par bgyi'o// de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ ci tsam na a mra skyong ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ des
206b6(1): rgyal po gzugs can snying po la smras pa/ lha bdag la sems can zhugs te sa skyong dang lhan cig chas pa dang / dril bu mi 'khrol bar 'dug go// de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan
206b7(1): ngag dgra bo byung gis rjes bzhin du btsal lo// zhes li tsa byi sa skyong 'khor gyi mngo' lci bas can lnga rgyas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i phyir bzhin du stsags pa dang / sa skyong gis
206b8(1): mthong nas des skyes pa/ lA yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams mchi na/ lhas ci 'di dag dang lhan cig thab mo bgyi 'am/ 'on te shing rta mda' des smras pa/ da ni dum pas shing rtar
207a1(1): deng gis/ khyod kho nas 'di dag dang lhan cig zab mo byed cig/ des de rnams lhan cig zab mo 'gyed par brtsams pa las/ yangs pa can gyis ngo shes nas/ des smras
207a2(1): pa/ shes ldan dag ma'i srin po de nyid 'di yin gyis slar ldog go// de rnams slar log nas yangs pa can du 'ongs te 'dug nas/ yang khrims bcas pa shes ldan dag bdag gi sgra 'di yang
207a3(1): gzugs can snying po'i bu rnams kyis sha kon du zhugs so zhes bcas so// ji tsam na phra ba dgu 'das pa dang / a ma skyong ma la khre'u gzugs bzang po mdzes pa lta na sdug pa zhig bcas so// 
207a4(1): btsas nas zhes bya ba bsrings bskyed de chen por gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de yangs pa can gyi li tsi byi'i khye'u rnams dang / lhan cig rtse bar las de rnams kyis mi dga' ba'i tshig smras
207a5(1): pa/ bram ze'i bu khyod brgya stong phrag du ma zhig las ni skyes na pha su yin/ de dus nasnga ma'i drung du song ba dang / des smras pa/ bu ci'i phyir du des thams cad brgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ 
207a6(1): bu gal te yang 'dri ba dang / de'i pha lta bu ni khyed cag lig la yang med do zhes smros shig/ gal te su yin zhes smras na/ nga rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin no zhes smros shig/ ci tsam na de
207a7(1): rnams dang lhan cig yang rtse bar byed pa las/ de rnams kyis de la de bzhin du smras pa dang / des smras pa/ nga'i pha lta bu ni khyed cag gcig la yang med do// su yin rgyal po gzugs can snying
207a8(1): pa yin no// de rnams kyis shes ldan dag bdag gi dgra gang yin pa de/ 'di'i pha yin no zhes lhag par yang brtags so// des dus nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams ma la sbas pa dang / de bsam
207b1(1): pa yangs pa can gyi li tsa bri rnams ni gdug pa rtsal po che yin te/ gal te 'di bsad par 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do snyam mo// de de lta bu snyems shing 'dug pa dang / tshong ba rab tu/ 
207b2(1): mang po zong thogs nas rgyal po'i khab du 'dod pa de dag des mthong nas/ spras pa sor gdab kyi rgya 'dis snod rgyas thob la deng shig dang / sho gam ma bcod par 'gyur ro// khye'u 'di
207b3(1): yang rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid la sor gdub rgya 'di mgul du thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor zhog shig/ de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangs so// bu la yang mu tig
207b4(1): gi do shal byin nas smras pa bu rgyal po dgos pa'i ched du 'dus dang / mu tig gi do shal rkang pa'i steng du zhol mdzes te/ pang du 'dug shig gal te 'ga' zhig khye'u 'di 'jigs mi shes
207b5(1): pa zhig go zhes smra ba dang / de la bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga' yod dam zhes smros shig/ de tshong pa rnams dang lhan cig du rims kyis rgyal po'i khab du phyin nas/ de rnams kyis khrus byas
207b6(1): te/ sor gdub kyi rgya btags nas/ 'u 'ang ni ka rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor bzhag go/ de rgyal po gang na ba der seng ste phyin nas/ mu tig gi do shel rkang pa la gzhag nas 'dzegs te/ 
207b7(1): phang du 'dug go/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag khye'u 'di ni 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go/ des smras pa/ yab bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga' mchis lags sam/ de nas rgyal/ 
207b8(1): pos 'jigs pa med pa'i sgra kun du smras pas/ rgyal po gzhon nu 'jigs med ces bya bar grags so// // 'dul ba bzhi bam po drug cu gcig pa// / rgyal po
208a1(1): gzugs can snying po gzhan gyi bud med la lhag sa par chags pas/ glang po che la zhon nas grong khyer gyi srad rnams su song nas/ mig phan tshun du lta zhing khyam par
208a2(1): byed/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na tshong dpon phyug po nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba zhig yod pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas shes bya ba nas/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// 
208a3(1): zhes bya ba'i gar gong ma bzhin no// de dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo zong thogs nas yul gzhan du 'gro'o// des smras pa/ rje'i sras de bzhin du mdzod cig/ des
208a4(1): zong thogs te yul gyi mthar song ngo // de yang kha bas zhim po dang gos kyis nyon mongs pas gdungs par gyur pa las/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po glang po che la zhon nas/ de'i khyim
208a5(1): drung nas song ba dang / des kyang skar khung du 'dug nas/ rgyal po la me tog gi phreng ba bor ro// de nas rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/ mAr shog/ des smras pa/ lha g.yar cha lags kyi
208a6(1): khyod nyid du gshegs shig/ de nas rgyal po nang du zhugs nas/ de de dang lhan cig dga' mgror spyod par byed pa las/ de yang de'i tshe rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan pas sems can
208a7(1): chags par gyur nas/ des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha bdag ni sems can dang ldan par gyur to// de nas rgyal pos de la yang sor gdub kyi rgyu dang / seng ras khro bo byin nas sbas pa/ 
208a8(1): gal te re shig khye'ur gyur na/ ser nas 'di skon la/ ser gdub kyi rgya yang mgul bar thogs te/ nga'i drung du skri shig/ 'on te bu mo yin na ni khyed nyid kyi yin no// zhes smras pa
208b1(1): nas rgyal por song ngo // ci tsam nA ded dpon de don grub ste/ rgyal po'i kha ba dang nye ba zhig du phyin nas/ des chung ma la bzang mo dga' ba skyed cig/ kho bos grub nas bde bar
208b2(1): 'ongs te/ zhag 'di tsam kho na phyin par 'ong ngo // spring ba de thos pa bdag ni bya ba ma yin pa 'di lta bu byas la de yang 'ong na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya snyam du phongs par gyur
208b3(1): nas/ des de lta bur gyur pa rnams rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / de nas rgyal pos slar song ba/ bag ma tsha bar 'dug shig/ ci nas kyang myur du mi 'ong ba de ltar ngas bya'o// / 
208b4(1): rgyal pos de la pho nya btang ba de de dpon ngal rin po che ge mo dag cig dgos kyis/ de med par khyod 'dir ma 'ongs shig/ de rin po che de rnams kyi phyir lam ring por song ngo // de
208b5(1): yang zla ba dgu 'das nas bcas pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa lta na sdug pa zhig btsas so// ma bsrabs pas kyang bud med la shes nyen yod pas/ de mar dang spang
208b6(1): rtsis te 'drangs par bstod nas sor gdub kyi rgyan mgul du btags te/ seng ras kyis dkris nas sbom bu'i nang du bcug ste/ bu mo dag zhug ma la sgo ba sbom bu 'di khyer te rgyal
208b7(1): po'i pho brang gi sgor khyed kyis dkyil 'khor byos la me mar bus te/ phyogs gcig tu ji srid 'ga' zhig gis blangs kyi bar du sdod cig/ des de bzhin du byas pa dang / ji tsam na rgyal
208b8(1): bo steng na mkhang bzangs kyi gzhir song nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med dang / lhan cig 'dug pa las/ des rgyal po'i pho zing gi sgon mar me mthong ngo // de nas gzhon nu mchog
209a1(1): ngag la bsgos pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgon myur me 'bar ban rna ci yin ltos shig/ des dag gis ltas nas smras pa/ lha sgrom bu zhig
209a2(1): mchis so// des smras pa longs shig rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med kyis smras pa/ lha sgom bu de na ci mchis pa de bdag la stsal par ci gnang rgyal pos de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas
209a3(1): blangs so// ji tsam nas sgom bu blangs nas rgyal po la phul ba dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ kha phye shig khabye ba las khye'u zhig byung ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ 'di ci gson nas 'on
209a4(1): te/ shi ba bzhin de dag rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gson lags so// de nas rgyal pos sor gdub kyi rgya dang seng ras ngo shes nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med pa la phyin pa dang / des
209a5(1): de bstun bstod de bskyed de/ rgyal pos gson nam zhes tshig tu byung ba dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med kyis mtsho byed gzhon nus gsal zhes bya bar grags so// ji tsam dus gzhan
209a6(1): zhig na mtsho byed gzhon nus gsal chen por gyur to// de 'dzegs med dang lhan cig ze mo gtam zer zhing 'khor ba 'jigs med gzhon nu ma skyes dgra ni ma bcas pa khong nas rgyal po
209a7(1): nyid du lung bstan gyis/ bdag cag gis ni bzo chung zad bslabs te/ des na bdag cag gi phyir dus kyi mtsho bar gyur ro// de gnyis kyis de ltar gros byas pa las/ shin tu dang
209a8(1): mabanags dkar po gan pa rnams kyis yangs su bskor nas rgyal ba'i mo zang du zhugs pa dang / de rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med des mthong nas/ ngas rgyal po'i tshe gzhan dag
209b1(1): la dris pa/ 'di su zhig yin de rnams kyis smras pa/ shing rta mkhan lags so// 'dis ci thob mtsho ba'o des bsams pa/ bdag gis kyang lnga la brtags nas/ shing rta mkhan srab
209b2(1): snyam nas/ rgyal po'i drung du song nas smras pa/ lha bdag kyang shing rta mkhan srab po// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu khyod ci 'dis mtsho bar 'gyur ram/ ya ba rgyal po'i bu ni gzo thams cad la
209b3(1): srab par bgyi ba lags so// bu gal te de lta na khyed shing rta mkhan slobs shig/ des spabs par rtsams so// mtsho byed kyis kyang sman pa gos dkar po gon pa rnams kyis yongs su
209b4(1): bskor nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa mthong nas/ des gzhan dag la dris pa 'di su zhig yin/ de dag gis smras pa lags so// 'di ci zhig byed dpung bgyid do// ci tho ba gal te
209b5(1): nad pa zhig gsos na rngan pa thob po// 'on te gum na mi 'chol mi dri'o// des bsams pa sman spyad bsgrub po snyam nas/ de ba'i gan du song ste smras pa/ lha gnang bar mdzod cig sman
209b6(1): spyad bsrabs lags so// bu khyod rgyal po'i sras yin na khyod la sman spyad kyis ci bya/ lha rgyal po'i bus na bzo thams cad srab par bgyi ba legs so// bu gal te de lta na spobs shig/ 
209b7(1): de sman spyang bslab par brtsams pa dang / des sman spyad ni lobs na des klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i spyad shes nas/ des rdo 'jog na sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu shes bya ba yod de/ 
209b8(1): de klad pa'i thod pa 'byed shes so// zhes thos nas/ de rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/ lha rdo 'jog du mchi'o// ci zhig gi phyir de nas sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes bu zhes bgyi ba
210a1(1): mchis te/ de klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i spyad 'chal pas de slob du mchi'o// bu khyod 'dis mtsho 'am lha yang na ni spyad mi bslab yang na ni lags par smra bar
210a2(1): ga bgyi'o// bu gal te de ltas na song shig/ des rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po la springs pa/ bdag gi bu 'di sman spyad slob du rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du 'ongs kyis/ 'di'i dgos pa thams
210a3(1): cad kyis sbyor cig/ de rim gyis rdo 'jog du phyin pa dang / pad+ma'i snying pos kyang spring yig blags te/ rgyun shes kyis bu la gtad nas/ rgyal po'i bu 'di khyod kyi drung du 'ongs kyis
210a4(1): 'di la sman spyad spobs shig/ rgyun shes kyi bu de la son par byed pa na/ des cung zad bstan pa dang / tshe byed khyad par dang bcas pa slob po// rgyun shes kyi bu'i kun du spyod pa ni
210a5(1): gang gi tshe nad pa la ltar 'gro ba de'i tshe/ bram ze'i khye'u gcig khrid de 'gro ba yin pas/ de dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed khrid de song nas/ des nang pa'i sman bstan pa 'di dag byin
210a6(1): cig/ ces smras nas byung ngo // 'tshe byed kyis bsams pa/ 'di mkhan pos nyes te 'dris sman 'di zos na de nga nyid mchi bar 'gyur te/ mkhan po snyan pa ni legs pa ma yin
210a7(1): gyis thabs shog pu'o// snyam nas de rgyun shes kyi bu dang lhan cig byung na slar nang du zhugs te smras pa/ mkhan po 'di skad ces gsung ngo // kho bos spyan snyan pa gang yin dem
210a8(1): smin par 'di dag byer gcig des de bzhin du byas pasasas par gyur to// dza tsam nyi ma gzhano chog la rgyun shes kyi bu yang de'i drung du seng nas dris pa na 'i ltar sos par gyur ci// 
210b1(1): sang yang de nyid phyin cing tsa snga ma lags sam/ 'on te skad kyis bstan pa lags ci bdag cag gis sngar bsan+na tam/ 'on te phyis bstan de dag gis smras pa/ 'di dag ni khyed kyis
210b2(1): mngon gsum du stan to 'di ni 'tsho byed la 'phrin du spring ba yin no// nges bsams pa/ bdag gis nyes kyis 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin no// snyam bsams nas sbas pa/ 
210b3(1): mtsho byed kyis bstan pa gang yin pa de byin cig rgyun shes kyi bu mtsho byed la dga' ba skyes pa/ de gang du 'gro ba der khrid do// bram ze'i khye'u gzhan rnams kyis ji skad bstan
210b4(1): pa bzhin byas nas bsams pa gal te mkhan po rdzas gzhan gyi rin 'dri bar byed na/ bdag gis ji skad brjod par byas thams cad du rdzas thams cad kyis ri bo snyam mo// de
210b5(1): dag thams cad mkhan po'i drung du song nas ji skad bstan pa bzhin smras so// rgyun shes kyis bus bstan pa'i rdzas kyi rim dri bar brtsams te/ bram ze'i khyo'u yi rdzas che ge ma
210b6(1): zhig gi rin ji tsam/ des smras pa mu 'tshal to// gzhan dag la dris pa dang / smras pa ma 'tshal lagaso// mtsho byed la dris pa dang / des rdzas thams cad kyi rin smras so// 
210b7(1): rgyun shes bus smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag khyod kyis thos sam/ zos lags so// ngas mtsho byed ni shes rab can yin no// cung zad bstan na yang de la rang gi rnam par 'byed
210b8(1): nus so// zhes smras pa ni don med yin no// gzhan yang mngon du bya'o// zhes de rnams la smras pa/ zang shing can gyi ri la deng la sman yin par dag khyer la shog shig/ de dag
211a1(1): las gang zhig gis gang ma yin par shes pa de dag gis blangs so// mtsho byed kyis bsams pa/ sman ma yin pa ni cung zad kyang med do snyam nas/ des 'dam
211a2(1): bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang / rdo'i dum bu zhig blangs so// ji tsam na 'tsho byed kyis lam gyi phyed na phyug rdzi zhig gzhon nu'i bum pa dang / phrum tshur khyer nas rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du
211a3(1): song ba las/ de shin du mig na ba des mthong nas/ des dris pa gang du 'gro des smras pa dang / des de la gnas de nyid kyi drung na yod pa'i sman zhig stan las nges byas pa dang / mod la
211a4(1): sos par gyur to// de dga' ba skyes nas smras pa/ zho bum pa dang phru ma tshud 'di khyod rnams shig/ des phru mtshud blangs te zho'i bum pa ni de nyid la byin nas/ de bru ma tshud khyer te song
211a5(1): ba las ci tsam bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis lam gyis dbus na/ glang po che'i rjes shig mthong nas de rnams kyis de la rtag par brtsams pa dang / tshe byed kyang 'ongs nas/ des
211a6(1): smras pa/ 'di ji yin gru po che'i rjes su yin gyi/ 'di ni ba glang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig g.yas pa'i nar ba de'i ri 'kho nar glang po che'i phrug gu byung bar gyur pa ni/ 
211a7(1): yin la/ de la non pa bud med yin la/ de yang mig g.yas pa nar ba sbrum pa/ de ring nyid du bu po bca' bar 'gyur ba zhig yin no// ci tsam na rgyun shes kyi bu'i
211a8(1): drung du 'ongs nas/ gang gis gang khyer te 'ongs pa des de snyan to// rgyun shes kyis bus smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u de dag 'di thams cad ni sman yin te/ re shi
211b1(1): 'di thams cad ni sman yin te/ re shig 'di ni cho ga che ge mo yin la de bzhin drug nan dang gnan dag kyang yin no// 'tsho byed la dris pa khyod kyi khyer 'i 'ongs/ des sbas pa dang / 
211b2(1): mkhan po thams cad stan lags te/ sman ma lags pa ni ji yang ma mchis so// 'on kyang bdag gis 'dam bu'i rgyu'i rtsang dang / rdo'i dum bu dang / drum chu cig 'tshala'i mchis so// 
211b3(1): 'di dag ci dgos/ sdig pas zin pa la'ang mthu'ang mchu'i rtsa ba'i drung ba'i 'dug go// blam chud kyis ni kun par bgyi'o// rdo'i dridum zas ni ston pa'i dus namo bum pa 'chag par
211b4(1): 'gyur ro// rgyun shes kyis zas 'dzum byung ba dang / zam ze ga bye'u rnams kyis bsams pa mngan pa ni di la khros so// ma nas de rnams kyis spras 'amakhan po 'di gcis
211b5(1): bur 'gro bas sum 'am/ bdag cag mchi ban lam gyi dbus su glang po'i rjes shig mthong ba na/ 'di'i mching nas/ 'di ni bal grang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig gams
211b6(1): pa zhar la sbrum pa/ de ring kho nar glang po'i phru gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/ de yang non pa bud med yin la/ de yang mig g.yas pa na rab sgyum mde ring nyid du pho btsa' bar
211b7(1): 'gyuraro zhes mchi'o// rgyun shes kyi bus dris pa mchi byed bden nam mkhan po// mang ngo glang po che'i rjes sam/ bal glang rI'i rjes yin pa 'i ltar shes/ des smras pa/ mkhan po bdag
211b8(1): ni rgyal po'i rigs las chen por gyur pa lags na ji ste mi 'tshal/ glang po che'i rjes ni zlum mo// bal glang mo'i rjes ni chung ring ngo po/ mig g.yas pa nar ba ji ltar shes
212a1(1): g.yon phyogs su ran 'tshal zhing mchis pa lags so// sbrum par ji ltar shes/ rkang pa gnyis gnod cing mchis lags so// deng kho nar 'brang bar
212a2(1): 'gyur ba ji ltar shes/ gcin be'u bsnabs dang bcas par 'byung bas so// glang po che'i phru gu phor 'brang bar ci ltar shes/ rkang pa g.yas pa lhag par yang gnon cing mchis
212a3(1): so// de la bud med gnon par ji ltar shes/ babs nas rkang pa'i bar du gcig pa lags so// de yang mig g.yas bkar bar ji ltar shes/ g.yon phyogs su me tog tha
212a4(1): zhing mchis pas so// de yang sbrum par ji ltar gyur/ de'i rkang pa'i rting pa phal cher gnon cing mchis pas so// deng kho nar bca' bar 'gyur ba ji ltar shes/ gcin ldan
212a5(1): ljin dang bcas te 'byung ba lags so// de lta lags kyis kyang / gal te mkhan po thugs mi ches na/ 'dron pa gnas pa'i phyogs de bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig mngag tu
212a6(1): gsol/ des bram ze khye'u zhig btang ba dang / mtsho byed kyis ji skad smras pa de thams cad de bzhin du gyur to// rgyun shes kyi bus/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram
212a7(1): ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis thos sam/ mtsha byed ni de 'dra bar shes rab can yin no// mtsho byed kyis klang ba'i thod pa dbye ba'i spang ma gtogs par thams cad bslabs so// 
212a8(1): tsam na ma zhig klad nad kyi thebs nas/ rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du sang se sbas pa/ rgyun shes kyi bu bdag la spang mdzod cog/ des smras pa/ nad kyang rje re shig de ring dong / 
212b1(1): rkos la lci bdag sa gon gyis shig dang / sang bdag gis khyod kyi spang bya'o// mtsho byed kyis thos nas/ de'i bro bzhin song ste/ kye nang rje bdag gis chung zad bslabs
212b2(1): pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni sems can la phan pa'i phyir yin na/ bdag gis klang ba'i thod par dbye ba ma bslabs kyis/ khyod kyis bdag dben pa zhig du zhog shig dang // 
212b3(1): khyod kyi las ji ltar byed pa lta'o// des smras pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o// des de phyogs dben pa zhig du bzhag go/ de nas rgyun shes kyi bu 'ongs nas/ mi de dong du bcug te// 
212b4(1): tho pa dbye ba'i slad kyis thong pa phye nas des snyam pas srog chags de blang bar brtsams pa dang / mtsho byed kyis smras pa/ mkhan po gzu lums sum blangs shig/ rigs/ 
212b5(1): kyi bu 'di deng nyid du mgum par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ mtsho byed 'ongs sam/ smras pa/ mkhan po bdag mchis so// kho bos srog chags 'di ji ltar blang bar bya
212b6(1): mkhan po skam pa che bar mdzod do// rgyab du reg nas/ rkang lag 'khums par gyur pa dang / de nas 'or cig/ des de bzhin byas nas smos par gyur to// rgyun shes kyis
212b7(1): bus sbas pa/ mtsho bred kyi kho bo shin tu mgu bar gyur kyis/ khyod khrus byas la shog shig dang / klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i spyad byin no// des khrus byas nas
212b8(1): 'ongs pa dang / des de la klang pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i spyang byin nas smras pa/ mtsho byed bdag cag ni 'dis 'tshe ba yin gyis/ yul 'dir khyod kyis ma byas shig/ mkhan/ 
213a1(1): po de bzhin du bgyi'o mtsho byed kyis rgyun shes kyi bu la phrag byas nas/ rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po'i drung du song ste/ phyag byas nas bdag gis sman spyad bslab
213a2(1): lags kyis mchi'o// de'i tshe rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po dang / mthun pa mtha' khob pa skya gsang zhes bya ba dag cig yod de/ des smras pa/ mtsho byed bdag dang mi thun pa mtha'
213a3(1): khob pa/ skyab seng zhes bya ba dag cig yod kyis/ 'di ltar khyod ni shes rab can nus pa yin pas/ re shig de phob la/ phyis song shig dang / de lta na bdag cag gis 'jig
213a4(1): rten gyi tshul byas par 'gyur/ des de la khas blangs pa dang / de nas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa sbas te btang ba las des mtha' khob pa srub bseng de rnams phab
213a5(1): nas gte'u zung dpya blangs te slar bde ba 'ongs nas/ khyer te 'ongs pa de bzhin rgyal po la phul ba dang / de shin tu dga' ba nas/ de nyid la rjes su yid rang ste/ des kyang
213a6(1): rgyun shes kyi bul byin no// de nas mtsho byed rim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du phyin nas/ de nyid dbyar gnas te/ den nges 'byung po thams cad kyi skad ces bya ba'i bstan bcos
213a7(1): bslabs nas grong khyer bzang byed nas chas pa dang / mi zhig shing khur khyer nas grong khyer du 'jug pa nus pa dang / pags pa'i lhag ma lus pa/ lus kun nas 'dzag pa
213a8(1): mtsho byed kyis mthong nas/ des smras pa/ kye nang rje ji zhig gi gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur/ des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang mi shes na/ 'on kyang bdag gis mi shes
213b1(1): shing khur 'di khyer nas bdag kyang 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs sa gyur to// de bzhin brtag pa la byung ba yin pas smras pa/ kye nang rje shing khur 'di 'tshong ngam/ 'tshong ngo / 
213b2(1): tsam kar sha pa na lnga brgya'o// des de nyos nas de nas bltas nas/ 'byung po thams cad dad par byed pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu mthong nas/ de'i mthu ni 'di 'dra ste/ gang gi tshe nad pa'i/ 
213b3(1): mdun du bzhag pa de'i tshe mar mes khyim na yod pa'i rdzas bzhin du nang ji lta ba bzhin snang ngo // de rim gyis yul u du mtha rar phyin pa dang / de na mi bris 'jal ba bzhig yod/ 
213b4(1): pa des bre bor gcal ba'i nas/ bres mgo la bsnun pa/ 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas smras/ kye nang rje ji'i phyir de ltar byed pa dag gi klad pa lhag par g.ya'o// tshur shog blta'o// / 
213b5(1): zhes de bsngal nas klad pa ltas te/ de nas 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dad par byed pa'i nor bu/ de'i klad pa'i steng du bzhag pa dang / ci tsam na srin gyis med cig snang
213b6(1): ngo // des des smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod kyis glad pa la srid kyi med do// des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ bdag la sbyang mdzod cig/ des khas blangs so// 'tsho
213b7(1): byed kyis bsams pa/ mkhan pos ji skad ston pa bzhin 'di'i spyad du bya'o// snyam nas/ des de la sbas pa/ kye nang rje re shig de ring dong rkos la lci ba dag sta gon byos shig/ 
213b8(1): deng sang sbyang bya'o// des rkang pa gnyis la btugs nas song ngo // 'tsho byed kyis de'i phyir de nyid 'ongs nas de dong du bcug ste/ klad pa'i zod pa phye ba'i dpyad kyis/ klad
214a1(1): pa'i thod pa phye nas skam pa tshangs pas sprin gyis ming gi rgyab la rig par byas te des rkang lag 'khums pa dang / de nas des rnam pas blangs
214a2(1): te/ bor bas sos par gyur to// des de la kar sha pa na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro// de nas 'byed la yul ro hi ta ka na khyim bdag
214a3(1): gcig la bskyed mos tshal me tog dang 'bras bu dang Ta phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod de/ de de la lhag par chags pa las shi nas/ de nyid du mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes so// / 
214a4(1): de'i bu ni khyim gyi dpon por gyur nas/ bskyed mos tshal der bsrungs ma'i mi bzhag pa dang / de mi ma yin pa des bsad do// gnyis pa bzhag pa dang / de yang bsad
214a5(1): nas khyim bdag gis bu des/ bskyed mos tshol de bor ro// ji tsam na mi dmamu chus gang ba/ sbran pa thams cad kyis spangs pa zhig bskyed mos tshal der song nas nub mo
214a6(1): brang btab ste 'dug nas/ kye ma'o bdag ni mi ma yin pas bsad kyang ji ma rung snyam mo// de nyid du 'tsho byed kyang nub mo brang btab ste/ 'dug go// ji tsam na mi ma yin
214a7(1): pa des/ dmu chu can de bsdigs par brtsams pa dang / dmu chu'i nad de byung nas smras pa/ 'di bdag gis sngar bzung nas/ tsa'i phyir 'di sdigs/ khyod la ra spu'i
214a8(1): drang bas bdug pa 'ga' yang med pa gar/ nges ni khyong dpag tshad bcu gnyis su 'bros par 'gyur ro// des kyang sbas pa/ khyod la yang la bug gi sa bon mar byung
214b1(1): ba'i ngar ba dang btags te/ sbyin pa 'ga' yang med pas la/ des ni khyod dum bur mdzad par 'gyur ro// thams cad 'tsho byed kyis thos nas/ de nang par sngar langs te/ 
214b2(1): khyim bdag de'i drung du song nas des smras pa/ khyim bdag bskyed mos tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / cu phun sum tshogs pa ci'i phyir dor/ khyim bdag gis de la ji ltar
214b3(1): gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / des sbas pa/ khyim bdag ra spre'i bdug pas bdugs shig dang / mi ma yin pa dpag tshad bcu gnyis su 'bros par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gis
214b4(1): rA spu'i bdug pa dang / mi ma yin pa dpag tshad bcu gnyis su 'bros par gyur to// khyim bdag des kyang 'tsho byed la kar sha pa na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des de yang rgyun shes
214b5(1): kyi bu la bskur ro// de nas 'tsho byed kyis dmu chu can la dris pa nang rje khyod ci'i phyir ma yin pas gnas btab pa'i bskyed mos tshal du 'dug/ des de la ji ltar gyur pa dag
214b6(1): smras pa dang / 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ la pug gi sa bon mar phyung ba'i dar ba dang / btags pa thungs shig dang sos par 'gyur ro// des 'thungs nas sos par gyur te/ 
214b7(1): ma ngas kyang 'tshe byed la kar sha pe na lnga brgya byin no// des yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro// de 'tsho byed rim gyis bcom brlag gi phyi rol na shing zhig drung du ngal so zhing 'dug
214b8(1): go/ ji tsam na gyad kyis kyang gcig brdabs pas de'i nang grol rnams 'khrugs nas de shi'o zhes phyi rol tu phyung ngo // shing de la yang bya rgod mo phru gu dang bcas pa zhig
215a1(1): 'dug pa las/ de la phru gu de rnams kyis smras pa/ ma sha byin cig des smras pa/ bu sha ga la yod/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ ma gyad kyis
215a2(1): kyang 'di brdabs te shi nas phyung ba yin no// bu 'dir sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'ongs nas des 'dis sos par byed pa'i gnas de yod do// ma 'di ci zhig gis sos par
215a3(1): 'gyur/ gal te de'i nang grol rnams ni reg par byas na'o// de thams cad 'tshe byed kyis thos so// de nas de langs te ro drung du song nas dris na shes ldan dag 'di ci zhig
215a4(1): de rnams kyis smras pa/ gyad kyis kyang rdabs pas shi ba yin no// 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ zhog shig dang lha'o// de nas 'tshe byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dang bar
215a5(1): byeng pa'i nor bu klang par bzhag nas brtags na/ ji tsam na nung grol rnams 'khrugs par byas pa mthong nas/ des smyug ma'i sbubs su b+he ma blugs te/ khas bus
215a6(1): ba dang / phye mas nang grol rnams la reg pa dang sos par gyur to// des kyang 'byed la kAr sha pa na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des kyang rkyen shes kyi bu la bskur ro// bcom
215a7(1): brlag na khyim bdag cig yod pa'i chung ma gzugs dang lang tse phun sum tshogs pa yin pa// de de la lhag par chags shing 'dug pa las/ shi nas de nyid kyi mi mtshan
215a8(1): gyi srin bung skyes par gyur te/ de gang dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod paro shi bar byed do/ de nas de dang dga' dgur spyod par mi byed do// des smras pa 'tsho byed de
215b1(1): 'ongs so zhes zos so// de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag la mo na mchis kyi spyad mdzod cig 'tsho byed kyis de mthong zhing smra ba'i tshig thos nas chags pas
215b2(1): smras pa/ dam zhig bcas te/ gal te bdag dang lhagacig dga' mgur sprad pa ltar na spang bya'o// des smras pa/ khyod kyi spyad gzhan ni med do// bdag las phangs pa
215b3(1): gzhan med pas/ des khas blangs so// de nas des sgren mor phyung ste bzo bcos byas nas mo mtshan gyi sgor sha'i dum bu zhig bzhag pa las/ de nas srin bu de de la
215b4(1): chags pa dang / des de blangs nas bu de sos par gyur te/ de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la lhag par zhen pas brda zhig byas pa dang / des rna ba gnyis dga' ste smras pa/ 
215b5(1): khyod kho bo'i srin mo dang 'dra ste/ khyod kyi spyang de yin pas kho bos de ltar byas par zad do// des kyang de la kar sha ba na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des de yang rgyu shes kyi bu
215b6(1): la bskur ro// de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis chu bo ya mu na'i 'gram du phyin pa dang / des de na mi ro zhig yod pa/ de'i rting pa'i phyogs na/ rgyus pa'i 'brel ba yod pa ny+dza
215b7(1): rnams kyis drangs pa las de'i mig 'byed pa dang / 'dzum pa mthong nas 'tsho byed kyis de thams cad brtags te/ ji ltar rgyas pa dang long ma la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis
215b8(1): 'brel bra thabs ni de kho na ltar 'dug gsum nas/ de rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin pa dang / ji tsam na gyad kyis kyang cig thal mos bsnun pas/ mig gi 'bras 'phags
216a1(1): pa dang / 'tsho bred de'i drung du song nas/ nges rting ba'i rgyas pa'i phreng nas drangs pa dang / slar chung par gyur ro// des de la kar sha pa na lnga brgya byin
216a2(1): pa dang / des 'jigs pa med kyi ma la byin no// yangs pa can na mi zhig yod pa de'i rna bar srin gyi med zhugs te/ der de las phru gu bdun brgya byung nas/ de rna ba'i nang
216a3(1): kyis nyen par gyur nas 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ste smras pa/ spyad mdzod cig/ 'tshe byed kyis bsams pa/ sngar ni bdag gis mkhan pos bstan pa las byas kyis de ni
216a4(1): rang gros las bya'o// snyam nas des mi dri la ge ba/ kye nang rje song la/  lo me'i spyil po byos te/ ras sngon pos g.yogs la de'i 'og tu rnga zhig zhog ste sa yang dron
216a5(1): bor gyis shig des ji skad bstan pa bzhin thams cad byas so// de nas 'tsho byed kyis mi de las stsal nas/ sa la des chus chag chag btab nas/ de nas rnga brdungs pa
216a6(1): dang / srin gyi med kyis sbyar gyi dus bab po snyam nas phyir byung ngo // de nas 'tsho byed kyis rna ba'i drung dra sha'i dum bu zhig bzhag pa dang / de yang skar zhugs te/ phra gu
216a7(1): rnams khrid de byung nas/ phru gu rnams dang lhan cig shwa'i dum bu'i chags pa dang / 'tsho byed kyis de'i mod la sha'i dum bu bor ba dang / mi dredri sos par gyur te/ 
216a8(1): des kar sha pa ni lnga brgya byin pa dang / res 'jigs med kyi ma la byin no// de rim gyis rgyal po'i khab du byin pa dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'tsho byed
216b1(1): ji ltar 'ongs pa thos nas/ des gzhon nu ma skyes dgra la bsgo ba/ bu khyod kyi phu bo 'ongs kyis bsur song shig/ de bsur song ba dang / 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu ma skyes
216b2(1): dgra ji ltar tshur 'ong ba thos nas/ des bsam pa gal te bdag gis des bsu ba rang gis byas nas ni/ nam rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gnod pa byed par 'gyur
216b3(1): ro snyam nas/ de slar log ste sgo ba gzhan zhig nas zhus so// dus gzhan zhig na mtsho byed skye bo'i tshigs chen pos yongs su bskor te/ sems yer zhing song ba dang / 
216b4(1): ji tsam na bram ze zhig nad kyis thebs nas/ mtsho byed kyi drung du song ste/ bdag la sman ston cig/ tshig pa zos nas smras pa thal bas thobs shig/ de drang po zhig pas
216b5(1): thal ba btab pa dang / sos par gyur to// mig nad kyis thebs pa gzhan zhig yod de/ yang 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ba bram ze des mthong nas dris pa kye nang rje gar 'gro
216b6(1): de ji ltar gyur pa smras pa/ khyod la 'tsho byed ci dgos/ des kho bo la snyan pa de byos shig/ de yid ches par gyur nas/ des thal bas gtab pa dang / long bar gyur to// / 
216b7(1): dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying po spyi bor phol mig byung ngo // des blon po rnams la sgo ba/ shes ldan dag sman pa khug shig/ blon po rnams kyis sman
216b8(1): pa rnams kug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag nga'i spyi bor phol mig byung gis spyad byos shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha sman pa chen po 'tshe byed chis pa na/ bdag cag
217a1(1): gis bgyi ci chal rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dga' tshe byed khugs shig/ de rnams kyis de rnams kug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ 'tsho byed
217a2(1): spang byos shig/ 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ lha dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te lha la bdag nyid kyis ci bgyid du gnang na bgyi'o// de bzhin bgyis shig/ de nas 'tsho byed kyis
217a3(1): skyu ru ras skud cing / smin par gyur pa'i rdzas rnams dang / sros pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya blangs te/ gang gis tshe smin pa de'i tshe na tshor bar spu gris reg pa dang byas pa dang
217a4(1): rdol to// de nas 'tsho bar gyur pa'i rdzas dag btab nas/ 'tshe bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams dang sres pa'i chu brem pa lnga brgya blugs pa dang / rma de sos shing lpags pa 'dra
217a5(1): ba dang sgra yang mnyam par gyur to// rgyal po khrus byas ma thag tu smras pa 'tsho byed spud byos shig des smras pa/ lha re shig bshes gsol cig/ rgyal pos zas zos shig nas
217a6(1): 'cha byed spyad byos shig lnga bgyis lags so// de yid mches nas lag pas byugs nas/ phyogs gangan rma yod pa ma shes so// me long blangs te las na 'on kyang ma mthong ngo // 
217a7(1): btsun mo la dris nas/ des kyang phyogs gden rma yod pa ma shes so// rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dga'atsho byed sman pa'i
217a8(1): rgyal por dbang skur cig mi long ba des sbas pa/ lA tsi sras la byams pas sam 'on te sman mkhas pas dbang bskur bar mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ skam pas so// des smras pa/ 
217b1(1): gal te de la lags na 'dis bdag ni sos par ma bgyis so// 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ kye nang rje bdag gis khyod mthong yang ma mthong na sos pa lta ga la byas/ des smras pa/ de ni
217b2(1): mngan 'on kyang khyod kyis gang la snyan pa nges bdag la bstan to// ci zhig bstan/ che go mo zhig go// 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ de'i khams kyang gzhan la khyod kyi'ang gzhan yin
217b3(1): gyis/ de 'di dang 'di dag byos shig dang sos par 'gyur ro// des byas nas sos par gyur pa dang / smras pa/ lha 'di sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur bar mdzad du gsol/ 
217b4(1): glang po che la zhon nas/ dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur to/ rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag gcig yod pa sran gyi nad kyis thebs nas sman pa thams
217b5(1): cad kyis spangs pa dang / des bsams pa 'gro'o// gal te spyad cig byas na ni de ldan legs/ gal te ma byas na bdag nyid 'chi bar bya'o snyam nas/ de 'tsho byed kyi drung du
217b6(1): song nas/ 'tsho byed bdag gis spyang mdzod cig/ des smras po/ kye nang rje khyod kyis sman 'di ni rnyed par dka'o// nges bsams pa 'tsho byed kyis kyang bdag spangs nas/ 
217b7(1): 'di la ci byar yod/ dus la bab kyis bdag ni 'chi'o snyam nas/ de dur khrod du song ngo // de na ro sregs pa'i me 'bar bar ne'u le 'dug pa zhig dang / srog chags go/ 
217b8(1): d+ha tsan dan zhes bya bar 'thabs te ltung ba dang / de bsres pas gnyen pas de gnyis ka gzos te dur khrod du char phab pa'i 'obs kyi chu de la 'thungs nas/ dur khrod dang ha tsang mi
218a1(1): ring ba zhig na gnas lha yod pas der song ste kro dra'i chan dang mar phyung zho 'thungs pas skran rdol te g.yar slon mar 'khrus nas sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin
218a2(1): gyur to// dus gzhan zhig na lus 'phags ma'i 'doms kyi phyogs ngol mig byung ngo // des rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal pos 'tsho byed la sgo ba/ mayar mo'i spyad byos
218a3(1): shig/ des pas blangs so// de nas zan byas te ma ma la byin nas/ khyod kyis 'di'i steng du 'dug du chug shig/ des 'dug du bcug pa'i zan/ 'tsho byed kyis
218a4(1): mthong nas bsams pa/ phyogs che ge mo zhig na'o snyam mo// de nas smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab te/ smin par shes zan gyi nang du gtsags pu sbas te ma la ske
218a5(1): ba/ khyod kyis de 'di la 'dug du chug la/ btsun mo 'dug nas slar song shig/ des de bzhin byas pa las/ btsags pu reg ma thag tu phol mig rdol bar gyur to// 
218a6(1): de nas 'tsho byed sbran par 'gyur ba'i rjes dang sreg pa bska ba'i chus bslus te/ 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams btab pas sos par gyur to// mtsho byang rgyal
218a7(1): po'i drung du song ba dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ mtsho byed khyod kyis ma yer mo'i spyang byas sam/ lnga bgyis so// khyod kyis sgren mor phyung ste/ ma lus sam/ 
218a8(1): lham pa byas so// ji ltar byas/ des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/ des blon po rnams la smras pa/ mtsho bred la
218b1(1): lan gnyis su sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur cing / ma na can la mchi byed kyis sman rnyed par dka'o zhes smras pa yin pa des smras pa/ lA ci sras la sug pas
218b2(1): sam/ 'on te sramakhas pas dbang bskur mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ spyan mkhas so// gal te de lags na 'di bdag ni sos par ma bgyis so// mtsho byed kyis
218b3(1): smras pa/ kye nang rjengs khyod la ngas spyad ni ma byas kyi/ 'on kyang ngas khyod kyi sman rnyed par dka'o zhes smras so// des smras pa/ bdag sman ji lta bu dag cig yin/ 
218b4(1): 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ gal te zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la mi ser skya cig shi nas/ de dur khrod du sreg na/ ne'u le gdug pa dang / srog chag tsha go d+ha tsan dan
218b5(1): 'thabs nas mer lhung ba dang / de gnyis khyod kyis zos la/ dbang phyug chen po'i ltas dur khrod du char phab pa'i 'ong ba'i chu de la 'thungs la/ ko dro'i chan zos
218b6(1): shing mar phyung ba'i zhi blangs nas/ de ltar na khyod sog par 'gyur te/ bdag gis de las bsams nas sman rnyed par dka'o// zhes smras pa yin no// des smras shin
218b7(1): tu legs par shes te/ de bzhin du bdag gi zos so// de nas dga' bur gyur nas smras pa/ lnga 'dis sman pa'i rgyal po rdo theg gis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur du gsom
218b8(1): lan gnyis su yang sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur te/ gang tshe mi dge ba'i grogs po lngas byin gyis ma skyes dgra smras nas/ pha chas rgyal po chos dang ldan pa srog dang bral pa
219a1(1): de'i tshe de la sman gyi nad kyis thebs par gyur to// des sman pa rnams la smras pa/ de la spyad dgyis shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i gcen sman
219a2(1): pa'i rgyal po// 'tsho byed 'di la mchis bzhin du bdag cag gis spyad bgyid rdo ga la thogs/ des blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'tsho byed khug shig/ de rnams kyi bkug
219a3(1): pa dang 'tsho byed nga la skran gyi nang byung gis spyad byos shig/ lha bgyi'o// de nas bsams pa rgyu gnyis kyi sman rdol par 'gyur te/ lhag par khros pa yin na sems can sdig pa byed
219a4(1): ba 'di lhag par dga' ba ga la 'gyur gyis rnam pa thams cad du khros par bya'o// snyam du bsams nas smras pa/ lha dam zhig bca' te/ gal te gzhon nu 'tshar byed bzang po'i
219a5(1): ga sol ba ltar na spyad bgyi'o// rgyal pos thos nas khros te smras pa legs so// ngas ni pha srog dang bral khyod kyis kyang 'char byed bzang po srog dang bral/ de yang rang nyid nad
219a6(1): kyis shi phos/ khyod ni rgyal por gyur mod des smras pa/ lha spyad ni legs te/ gzhan gyis sos par rngo mi thog go// bdag dang 'dra ba'i phangs pa med pas des khas blangs so// 
219a7(1): de nas mtsho byed kyis gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas rgyal po la phul te/ gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po la legs par gzigs pa de ltar mdzad
219a8(1): drags la/ bris gzigs par mi 'gyur ro// de nas nges bsan nas khyim du khring nas bzhag go// de nas mtsho byed sha'i don du gsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song ba las/ gsil
219b1(1): kha'i tshal gyi drang khrong ni shi ba'i ros stong ba ma yin pas de nas ngas ra sha blangs te/ ma brud kyi zang par ngag dang g.yas rdzas nAs/ rgyal za dag bab pa'i dus su bsgrubs sa/ 
219b2(1): de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras kun sha'i phor ba blangs nas/ za bar bcas pa dang / mtsho byed kyis 'phrogs nas/ klang du stan te srog byed pa khyod kyis pha chos kyi rgyal sreg dang bral
219b3(1): lo// dbu'i sha yang za bar byed dam/ de rngam nas smras pa/ gal te de lta na ci'i phyir bsad ces mi bzod pa skyes pas/ de'i skran rdol nas yar sbon mar 'khrus te kha nas khrag dang
219b4(1): bcas par byung ba de mthong nas rgyal te sa la 'gyel to// de nas chus gtor nas dbugs slar byung ba dang / khrus byas te 'phrod pa'i zan byin pas sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin gyur to// / 
219b5(1): de nas mtsho byed kyi gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas khrid de/ rgyal po'i drung du song nas/ rkang pa gnyis la btugs te smras pa/ lha gzhon nu 'char
219b6(1): byed bzang po 'di lags te/ bdag srog chags grog spur yang srog dang bral bar bgyid mi phod na gzhon nu lta 'tshe bar 'gyur bas bdag gis thabs bsham pa bgyis so// rgyal/ 
219b7(1): po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas des blon po rnams la sgo ba 'tsho byed sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur cig/ blon po rnams kyis glang po che la zhon nas/ dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos lan
219b8(1): gsum du yang sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur pas dbang bskur ro// de nas 'tsho byed dregs bskyes te/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i sman pa ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te/ bdag ni
220a1(1): lus kyi spyad byed pa rnams kyi mchog yin la/ bcom ldan 'das ni sems kyi spyad mdzad pa rnams kyi mchog yin no// snyam mo// de dus gzhan zhig na bcom
220a2(1): ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar song ba las/ de rdegs pa'i bsnyems pas bden pa rnams ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis dge ba'i rngub
220a3(1): bskyed na ci'i bden pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur snyam na/ dregs pa'i bsnyems pa gyur par gzigs nas/ de 'dregs pa spang bar bya'o// snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
220a4(1): sman pa'i rgyal po mtsho byed la bka' stsal pa/ mtsho byed khyod kyis ri'i rgyal po grangs can mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos kyi
220a5(1): mtha' nas bzung shig des bzung ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po mtsho byed khang nas ri'i rgyal po gangs can ga na ba der gshegs pa dang / de na sman pa'i
220a6(1): rnam pa sna tshogs sgron ma bzhin 'bar ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po mtsha byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mtsho byed sman ji tsam 'dod pa longs shig/ bcom
220a7(1): ldan 'das 'jigs lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sprin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje sang la mtsho byed la bsrung ba byos shig/ de deng song nas
220a8(1): des sman sna tshogs dag blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtsho byed sman 'di'i ming ci yin nges par gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das che ge mo lags ste/ 
220b1(1): cho ga 'dis nad che ba zhig zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'dis ni che ge mo zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan rnams kyi ni ming yang ma shes so// ma shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag bcom
220b2(1): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtsho byed 'di ni che ge mos nad che ge zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'di yang che ge mo zhig zhes bya'o// mtsho byed kyis gsol pa/ bcom
220b3(1): ldan 'das kyi sman spyad kyang mkhyen pa de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po mtsho byed la bka' stsal pa/ mtsho byed sman zug rngu byin pa yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa
220b4(1): ni rgyal po la 'ongs rgyal po la 'khor ba rgyal po'i yan lag gi grangs su 'gro'o// 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug cu gnyis pa// // bzhi gang dag zhe na/ 
220b5(1): 'di la sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad pa la mkhas pa yin/ nad kun nas spong ba la mkhas pa yin no// nad pa kun nas spong ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la sman pa zug rngu
220b6(1): 'byin pa/ nang 'di ni rlung gis kun nas blang ba'am/ mkhris pas kun nas blang ba'am/ bad kan las gyur pa'am/ gzhan las gyur pa'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'am/ dus
220b7(1): las gyur pa'o// zhes de ltar nad kun nas spong ba la mkhas pa yin no// nang 'byung ba spong ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la sman zug rngu 'byin pa na shes shing / nad 'di ni mig
220b8(1): sman nam/ skra mnye'am/ skyugs sman nam/ bkra sman nam/ sngar glags pa'am/ du bas bdug pa'am/ nang rtse'i las kyi spong bar 'gyur ro// zhes de ltar nang byung ba spong ba la
221a1(1): / mkhas pa yin no// nad spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas po ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la smad pa zug rngu 'byin pa nad shes shing nad 'di ni 'phrod// 
221a2(1): ba'i cho ga 'di lta bu dag byas te/ spangs nas phyis mi 'byung ngo // zhes de ltar nang spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ngo // zhes de ltar nad spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba mkhas pa yin te/ 
221a3(1): de ltar na/ sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa rgyal po 'ongs pa yin/ rgyal po la kho ba yin/ rgyal po'i yan lag gi gi grangs su 'gro ba yin no// de bzhin
221a4(1): du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i yang sman pa'i gzugs rngu 'byin pa bla na med pa zhes bya'o// 
221a5(1): mtsho byed bzhi gang dag zhe na/ 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o// zhes dag pa
221a6(1): ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to// 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o// zhes yang dag par ji lta ba
221a7(1): bzhin rab tu mkhyen te/ mtsho byed smin pa zug rngu 'byin pas ni skye ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug rnams spangs pa'i sman mi shes so// rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / 
221a8(1): smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spang ba'i sman mi shes so// mtsho byed de bzhin gshegs pas
221b1(1): ni skye bas rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spangs pa'i mkhyen to// zhwa da / 'chi ba dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i
221b2(1): ma lug bsngal spang ba'o// na mkhyen te/ rgab ba dang / 'chi ba dang / b+h+rUM sngags 'dzin pa dang / sdug sbal ba dang / ma mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i rtsab cad kyi na rdzu k+Sha
221b3(1): de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med pa zhes bya'o// chos kyi rnams grangs 'di bshad pa na/ 
221b4(1): 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas 'tshe byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / 
221b5(1): chos rig pa dang / chos kyi ting legs pa dang / som hi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mo 'jog po dang / gzhan gyi mi bkri ba dang / ston pa'i
221b6(1): chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas bstan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ 
221b7(1): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong dge 'dun la
221b8(1): skyabs su mchi na/ dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsngos te/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad ba lags so// de nas sman pa'i
222a1(1): rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // ri'i rgyal po gangs
222a2(1): can kha ba'i g.yogs pa'i steng du lpags pa che bas/ bcom ldan 'das grang nad kyi bsnyun gyis thebs pa dang / sman pa'i rgyal po mtsho byed kyis bsams pa/ dper na 'khor lo
222a3(1): bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la bya ba bzhin/ de bzhin nyid kho nas bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya'o snyam mo// de nas mtsho byed kyis me tog ung pha la sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / bkru sman gyi
222a4(1): rdzas dag sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'phrul te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams shangs kyis bsnam du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnams pa las/ thang gsum cu rtsa
222a5(1): gnyis kho na 'kho na khrus par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das cig legs par 'khrus legs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
222a6(1): ba/  mtsho byed sbyin gang dag gams lam g.yos la ma 'khrugs de dag kyang yod/ 'khris lam g.yos pa yang yod/ 'khrus la g.yos pa yang yod/ ma 'khrus lam
222a7(1): g.yos pa yang yod/ mtsho byed kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das la gal te de lta na bu ram dang / a rur gsol lnga/ khra ba'i rim pa yang mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das
222a8(1): kyis de bzhin du mdzad na/ bsnyung gdangs par gyur to// mtsho byed kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal po 'am/ blon po gang su'i spyad byas kyang rung ste/ des de la grong ngam mchog sbyin
222b1(1): par byed pa yin no// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ mtsho byed kyis lus 'phags pa kyi rgyal po sbyang byas las/ des de la brgya stong ribs gos be'u ras yug po che zhig/ 
222b2(1): byin pa dang / des de langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de seng ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs cig tu 'dug
222b3(1): phyogs cig tu 'dug nas/ mtsho byed gzhon nu bskyed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis kun tu spyod pa ni/ rgyal po 'am/ 
222b4(1): blon po gang su'i spyad bgyis kyang rung ste/ des bdag la grong ngam grong mchog rtsol ba lags pas/ bdag gis lus 'phags kyi rgyal po la dpyad bgyis pa dang / 
222b5(1): des bdag la brgya stong ri bas rad pa bzhin stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag dbul zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i nye bar bzung ste/ 'di
222b6(1): bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mtsho byed gzhon nus bskyed las/ brgya stong ri ba'i gos byas be'u ras yug po che zhes so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'o// 
222b7(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis snam logs su gsil yab thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nam bza' chos gos gsum
222b8(1): dang bdag nyid kyi bla gos dang bcas pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos blangs te/ sa phyogs gsal ba yangs par song nas/ gzhal bar brtsams pa las chos gos
223a1(1): chos gos mang du ldang bar mthong ngo // de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi na bza' chos gos gsum dang bdag nyid kyi bla gos thang gos dang bcas pa/ 
223a2(1): dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyi ral chung dpung chad gcig byas so// bcom ldan 'das dbyar gyi gnas der/ ras lnga brgya bskyes shing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis
223a3(1): kyang du ma rnyed na/ dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ma shes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
223a4(1): bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams kyis khyim pa'i gos gros dras te/ kha ngan dang bar byas pa bcang bar bya'o// rgyal po gzugs can sdong po
223a5(1): kun tu spyod pa ni/ dge slong ma mthong na glang po che las babs nas rkang pa la byed pa yin no// dus gzhan zhig na glang po che zhon nam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
223a6(1): la mgo bos phyag byed du song ba las/ ci tsam lam gyi dbus nas mthong nas de de la gus pa bskyes de glang po che las babs nas rkang pa gnyis la btugs te/ de na ma dad pa
223a7(1): gang yin pa de dag gis bsams pa/ lha ni dge slong 'ba' zhig pa mngon par dad pa ma yin no// dad pa can gang yin pa de dag gis bsams pa ni/ gdon mi za bar ltas dge
223a8(1): blang yin sum te/ de gus pas glang po che las babs nas dang pa gnyis la gtugs so/ sam nas yang gnyis su gyur te/ rgyal po la sbas pa/ lhas su la phyag bgyis/ btsam
223b1(1): ldan 'das nyan thos la'o// lha 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ma lags te/ 'tshob pa lags so// de nas gzugs can snying po 'di snyam du bsam te/ bdag gi don 'di
223b2(1): kho na gsol lo snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs cig tu 'dug glo phrogs
223b3(1): cig tu 'dug nas/ ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi kun tu spyod
223b4(1): pa ni/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma mthong na glang po che las babs nas/ de'i rkang pa la phyag bgyid pa las/ de ring bdag gus pa skyed pa ni/ glang po che las babs te slong lags
223b5(1): snyam nas/ 'tsho ba pa'i rkang pa la gtugs lags kyis/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bas nye bar bzung ste/ 'phags pa rnams kyi chos gos rnams la mtshan
223b6(1): ma cung zad cig gnang du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po car mi gsung bdag gnang ngo // de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das
223b7(1): kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal
223b8(1): ba/ dge slong dag mtsho byed gang gis bden pa mthong ba las bla/ dag gis byas pa ni nyams te mi rung ngo // de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo// bcom ldan 'das kyi snam
224a1(1): logs su bsil yab thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ 
224a2(1): kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus 'phags kyis ri bo mthong ngam btsun pa mthong lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nam bza' chos gos kyis mtha' nas zung shig/ des bzung
224a3(1): ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab nas mi snang bar mdzad de de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs nas lus 'phags kyis ri bo la
224a4(1): bzhugs so// de'i tshe me ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyi zhing nyen kor mnyam pa snang gi khyad par sna tshogs dag snang gis 'brel cing mdzes pa dag gzigs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
224a5(1): bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis zhing mnyam zhing gnyen kor mnyam pa sten gyi khyad par sna tshogs dag snang sbal gyis 'bral bar mdzes pa de dag mthong ngam/ 
224a6(1): btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bur chos gos rnams dras te drub par bya'o// gnas brtan kun dga' bo dge slong
224a7(1): rnams la smras pa/ khyed kyis 'di lta bur chos gos rnams dras la drubs shing / dge slong rnams kyis chos gos dag dras te drubs par brtsams pa na/ snam bu rnam par kha
224a8(1): phyogs cig tu san pas mi mdzes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal mod kyi/ 'di khon rkyen byas nas gnang bar 'gyur
224b1(1): ba'i gnas de yod do snyam nas/ des bri rnams kha phyogs gnyis gar stan na 'on kyang thar skor med pa mdzes par ma gyur nas/ mtha' sar byas so// de nas byas shing zin pa/ 
224b2(1): dang / bcom ldan 'das la phul le/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba kun dga' bo legs so legs so// ngas gang gi brir bka' stsal pa de khyod kyis shes
224b3(1): de bas na dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bur chos gos rnams dras la/ drub par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis chos gos zas shing drubs pa re re bcangs nas/ lhag ma ni
224b4(1): mangs so// bcom ldan 'das mang ba'i ljongs rgyu shing gshegs te/ 'grog dgon nas su byon nas/ 'grog gnas na phrog gnas kyi tshal na bzhugs so// 'grog
224b5(1): gnas 'bab chu dang nye bas grang zhing rlung bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thun dang po la mthang gos gsol to// thun par ma la bla gos gsol to// thun tha ma
224b6(1): la cha dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo la snam sbyar gyis g.yog shing / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo lag pa gnyis bkrus nas sman
224b7(1): sbyar gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du g.yogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nam za' chos gos gsum gis mtshan mo de 'das par mdzad do de nas nam langs nas/ dgod
224b8(1): pa 'jig rten na shin tu skyid pas bde bar 'dod pa gang yin pa su yang rung ba rnams kyi mchog ni nga yin te/ nga yang chos gos gsum gyis 'tshe bar spyod na/ nga'i nyan thos
