254a3(1): bdag la nyes pa 'byung na mi rung ngo // gcig shes la yang smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis bsgos shing / des kyang de bzhin du smras pa dang / nyer dgas smras pa/ khyod ni nyes
254a4(1): ba 'byung bas 'jigs kyi/ nyer dga' ni spyi'u tshugs su sems can dmyal ba 'gyur 'dod cing / nye dwags bsams pa/ rgan zhugs gnyis sdongs gos dbyer bya'o// 
254a5(1): skam du de nas de dag gis rgyun du rung ba'i las byed pa'i g.yog po mthong nas cig gi drung du song nas dris pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas brtan bdag gis
254a6(1): gtsug lag khang du rtags par rtags chad dang / phyag dar dar ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas so// rgan zhugs gal te chug rlag dang / phyag dar byas pa kho nas rnyed pa thob
254a7(1): palta na/ nye dga' gtsug lag khang thams cad rlag rlag chag dang phyag bya'o// 'on kyang bdi rnyed pa byung ba gang yang yin pa de ni rgan zhugs gcig shos de'i mthu yin te/ de
254a8(1): de gtsug lag khang dus su chos 'dod pa'i sbyin pa byed pas/ chos 'dod pa don du ge nyer ba'i lha'i spro ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ des na rnyed pa rnyed par 'gyur gyis/ 'dis
254b1(1): byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ khang par mi bya'o// des de gnad la phab pas/ skyengs nas cang ma gsung ngo // de nas cig shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ rgar zhugs khyod kyi 'dir
254b2(1): ci dag byas/ gnas brtan bdag gis 'dir dus dus su chos bsgrags pa'i sbyin pa byas so// rgan zhugs gal te chos bsgrags pa rnyed pa the ba par ldan/ nye dgas 'greng pa
254b3(1): dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / zhal ba dus thams cad du chos bshad do// rnyed pa gang cung zad grub pa de thams cad ni rgar zhugs cig shos de'i mthus ya r+yA te/ des gtsug
254b4(1): lag khang 'dir chag chag dang / phyag dar dang ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byub pa byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar byed pa la yon tan lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ bdag ni
254b5(1): kyi sems dang por 'gyur pa dang / gzhan gyi sems dang bar 'gyur pa dang / lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la sogs par 'gyur
254b6(1): pa dang rgya lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'dzag rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// zhes bka' stsal pa de lta bas na/ gtsug lag khang phyag dar byas
254b7(1): pas yon bdag bdon par dang bar 'gyur// lha yid dag par 'gyur te/ des na de sred pa byung bar 'gyur te/ de bas na de'i mthus 'dir rnyed pa byung bas des tsaM byin pa de blang
254b8(1): bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o// de yang gnang la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go de gnyis spobs med par byas nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs dge bcom ldan 'das kyis
255a1(1): gsol ba'i las mi 'khrus pa gsungs pa'i thabs gzhan yod pas gsol pa byas la bsrem/ de gnyis snar sla phab pas smras pa/ gnas brtan
255a2(1): tsa dgyes pa'i de bzhin du mdzod cig/ de nas nye dgas cha gsum du byas te/ cha gnyis kyi bar du de rang nyid 'dug go// de gnyis kyi bar du rwa cig gzhag nas/ gsol pa bya
255a3(1): bar rnams pa/ rgan zhugs khyed gnyis nyon cig khyod nyon cig khyed gnyis dang 'di cig/ 'di gnyis dang kho bo cag ste/ de ltar sum gsum mo// 'di ni gsum pa'o// 
255a4(1): de nas cha gnyis ni bdag gis blangs so// rwa cig de gnyis la byin pa dang / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ gnas brtan 'di kho na las bdag cag gnyis brtsod par 'gyur gyis/ 
255a5(1): khong khro nas bdag cag la bsgos shig/ des bsgos par brtsams nas/ de na ras yug cag kha khyer du 'dug pa de yang blangs nas/ ras rnams bam por btsangs ste song ngo // 
255a6(1): de nas rim gyis pa nan yod du phyin pa dang / de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga'i khyod kyis su zhig shi ba mthong / des ci ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa
255a7(1): dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod de ltar byed pa brtags pa yin na me/ mi mdza' ba rnams kyi 'grin pa gdogs pas mnan nas so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
255a8(1): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang tsa byung ba ni// dge slong rnams gzhan gyi rnyed pa la tho ba rgyal ba las gyur gyi/ 
255b1(1): de lta bas nas na dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o// thob rgyal byed na 'gal 'arlabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams
255b2(1): da gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa ci dga' rgan zhugs de gnas chos kyi sgo nas bslus pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
255b3(1): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig tu bzad do// 'das pa'i dus na ji ltar 'dis rgan zhus gnyis bslus pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'bab chu'i
255b4(1): dogs shi ga na/ sram gnyis shig gnas pa las de gnyis gang gi che chu'i nang du zhugs pa dang / nya skam la thon par 'gyur zhing / gang gis che skam la dong ba de'i tshe chu'i nang du dong
255b5(1): nas/ cung zad kyang ma rnyed do// de nas de gnyis kyis gros byas pa/ bdag cag las cig ni rlu'i nang du 'gro'o// gcig shos gnyis kyis ni skam pa ste/ snyed pa gang yin pa
255b6(1): de ni spyir bya'o// de nas cig ni chur song ngo // cig shos ni skam la ste/ de la rgyur zhugs pa gang yin pas nya rnams sgrogs te/ skam la ton nas/ de rnams skam la gnas pas
255b7(1): bsad do// chu la gnas pa ni chu la gnas pa nyid kyis so// tsa tsam na nye'i phung po chen por gyur pa dang / gcig gis smras pa/ khyod kyis dgos shos kyis smras pa/ bdag mi
255b8(1): dgod do// ci'i phyir/ bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo // des kyang smras pa/ gal te de lan/ bdag la yang nyes pa 'di nyid yin no// de gnyis sems khongs su chud cing
256a1(1): / 'dug pa las/ ji tsam na wa bzhin rgyas zhes bya ba des smras pa/ chu bo dag ste sems khongs su chud cing 'dug/ zhang po bdag cag ni nyams rnyed pas so// 
256a2(1): ci ste mi 'god zhang pa nyes pas 'jigs so// khyod ni nyes 'jigs la/ bzhin rgyas rkang pa spyi'u tshug su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'dod dam ci/ bzhin rgyas kyis
256a3(1): bsams pa ci/ 'di gnyis sdong gis/ dbye bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas de gnyis kyi rtag tu g.yog byed pa rus sbal zhig mthong nas/ cog gi drung du song song ste/ dris pa
256a4(1): cha bo khyod kyis 'dis ci dag byas/ zhang po bdag tshur zhugs nas te/ bdag chur zhugs nas/ nya rnams sgrogs te/ skams thon pa dang / 'dis bsod do// tsha bo chur
256a5(1): zhugs pas cung zad tho ba na lta/ gzhin rgyas rtag tu chu nang du 'gro'o skam la 'gro ba de ni stong du ma gyi 'jigs pa dang / tsher ma'i 'jigs pa dang / spyan zan gyi 'jigs
256a6(1): pa dang / mi'i 'jigs pa dang / ngam grog gi 'jigs pa yod do// gzhan yang gal te des ma bsad na khyod kyis sgrogs kyang ma phan/ mdod na 'dir ni rnyed pa gang yin pa de
256a7(1): rnams ni/ de'i mthu' yin pas 'dis tsa byin pa de blangs par bya'o// de des gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas tsag shos kyi drung du song nas smras
256a8(1): pa/ chu bo khyod kyis 'di dag byas nang po bdag gis skam la 'thon pa'i na rnams bsad do// chu bo gal te skam la song bas cung zad thob na lta/ bzhin rgyas rtag tu skam la 'am/ 
256b1(1): chur 'gro ba ba de ni dpa' glong gi 'jigs pa dang / rul sbal gyi 'jigs pa dang / chu srin byis pa bsod kyi 'jigs pa dang / chu srin gum pa'i ris 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs
256b2(1): pa dang / gzhan yang gal te des ma skrags ma khyod kyis ci ltar bsad/ mdo rngan 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni// de'i mthu yin pas/ des ci byin pa blang bar bya
256b3(1): ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o// de des gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// bzhin rgyas kyis smras pa/ tsha bo dag 'di la tshigs su cad pa'i/ dbyings kyis migs
256b4(1): bar bgo ba'i thabs yod do// de sngar sla bab pas smras pa/ zhang po tsa dgyes pa mdzod cig/ bzhini rgyas kyis cha gsum du dgos te/ zha' 'jug ma rnams gcig tu byas/ bar
256b5(1): gyis cha rnams cig tu byas/ tshigs bcad de smras pa/ thang la rgyu ba 'jug ma ste/ gting tu rgyu nas mgo bo'o// bar gyi lus ni gang yin pa/ de ni chos la gnas pas bska/ 
256b6(1): gzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa 'di gnyis bslus pas bdag rnyed pa dang ldan no// snyam nas/ des na chen po zhig garked pa khyer to// ma'i drung du song ba dang / de nas de'i ma mgu
256b7(1): nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dris pa/ nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dris pa/ bzhin rgyas khyod ni gnas 'ongs/ mgo' yang med cing 'jug med pa'o// 4'otshe
256b8(1): zhig thogs nas ni/ shin tu don grub ga las 'ongs/ des smras pa/ gang phyir blun po rtsod gyur cing // chos min bya ba mi shes pas// rgyal po'i mdzod ni 'phel ba ltar// des kyang rigs su
257a1(1): bcad pas smras pa/ rgyal po lta na sdug pa khyod// pha rol gnan pa shin tu legs/ de gnyis kyang ni mgu gyur la// khyod kyang rnyed pa phun sum tshogs// 
257a2(1): dge slong dag ci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa bzhin rgyas gang yin pa de ni/ nye dga' 'di nyid yin no// sram gnyis pa gang yin pa de ni rgan zhugs 'di na te/ de na de
257a3(1): gnyis 'dis slus la/ da ltar yang de gnyis smras so// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim bdug cig yod pa des/ gtsug lag khang zhig btsugs nas der dge
257a4(1): slong brgyad dbyar gnas par dam bcas so// khyim bdag de'i blo skyes pa/ ras yug brgya sbubs ste/ dge slong re re dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ dge slong re re la yang
257a5(1): rAs yug re re skon no snyam mo// ji tsam na nye dgas khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi/ dge slong ga'i dun gdugs chod gsol to/ re re la yang ras yu ga re re skon no// zhes thos
257a6(1): sathong nas kyang bsams pa/ gal te de la ras yug ma grub na/ bdag nye dga' 'am yin no snyam nas/ de 'gron du ma pos bzhin du song ngo // khyim bdag gis dge slong
257a7(1): gi dge 'dur gdugs chod gsol nas/ ras rnams brim par zhe dgas ras cig blangs nas myur ba myar ba song ngo // ci tsam na dge slong gcig gi ras yug chang ngo // khyim bdag rga
257a8(1): smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis legs par bgrangs nas 'tshal te/ 'tshal te 'chis na 'phags pa 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis snams par ma gyur grang / dge slong rnams
257b1(1): kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag ltar su zhig byed/ 'od kyang btsun pa zhi dga' khyod kyi sbyar sngar zangs sam/ des ras de khyod ras sang ngo // de nas khyim bdag de slong bar brtsams
257b2(1): pa'i ni/ bas te/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la dgongs pa ni dmigs gang ci byung ba ni/ dge slong dag 'gror tu ma bos par
257b3(1): bzhon gyi rid pa thob rgyal byed pa las gyur pas/ de lta bas na dge slong gis/ mgron tu ma bos pas gzhan gi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o// thob rgyal byed na 'gal rlabs can du
257b4(1): 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas/ g.yar ma drangs par gzhan gyi rnyeng
257b5(1): pa la tho ba rgyal byed pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da lta 'ba' shig du ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nye ga'i mgron du mgos
257b6(1): par gzhan gyi rnying pa la thob rgyal byed pa de zhon cog/ dge slong dag sngon 'byung ba'i rabor zhig na bram ze 'khor la dbang sgyur ba zhig yod de/ des bram ze'i khye'u brgya zla ba gsum
257b7(1): du 'gron du bos te zan byin pa nas/ de'i blo skyes pa bram ze'i khye'u re re la yang ras yu ga re re skor na/ snyam mo// de dang ha tsong mi ring ba zhig ni bram ze rgad po zhig gnas pa des
257b8(1): thos nas/ de rgan pa'i mthar 'dug ste/ thog mar zos mas ras yu gcig khyer nas song ngo // bram ze ras rnams 'brim par byed pa na/ ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u cag gi ras
258a1(1): rad nas des dris pa// shes ldan dag bdag gis ras yug rlon brgya legs par bgrangs te 'ongs nas/ bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis
258a2(1): blangs par ma gyur grangs de rnams kyis smras pa/ de ltar su zhig bgyid 'on kyang khyod kyis bram ze rgad pa 'gron tu bos sam/ bdag gis 'gron du ma bos so// des ras yug de thog
258a3(1): mar blangs nas song ngo // bram ze des smra bar rnams so// de dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze rgang po gang yin pa de ni/ nye dga' 'di yin te/ de na yong de rtson
258a4(1): du ma pos so// da ltar yang ngo // gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag gcig yod pa des// rtsug lag khang zhig rdzogs nas/ der dge slong cig dbyar gnas
258a5(1): par dam bcas pa las/ de ljang phun sum tshogs pa zhig pas/ des nyi ma re re nang cag lag khang de byug pa dang / phyag dar byed do// gtsug khang de ni sa phyogs dbyen par zhing
258a6(1): gtsang ba'i phyogs su rtsigs la/ shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang ne co dang / ri skegs dang / khu dbyug rnams skad byin pa/ 
258a7(1): me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no// ci tsam na dedade dpon 'byor pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa zhig gtsug lag khang der dgongs pa btab pa las des tsug lag
258a8(1): khang de rnams mdzes pa dang / nye ba'i rol mdzes pa dag mthong nas/ mngon par dad par gyur to// dge slong gyi dge 'dun ma mthong yad de'i byed du rnyed pa phal mo che dag skar nas/ 
258b1(1): de mas par sngar langs te sang so// dge slong de mdzem pag can nag pas rnyed pa 'di ni dge 'dun gyi yin no// nas 'gyod pas mablangs par 'gro ba phyi dge slong rnams tshol bar byed
258b2(1): pa'i skabs te/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong gyis pa'i lci ba'i khang par g.yar gnas pa
258b3(1): dam bcas par gyur kyang / de gal te bram ze'am khyim bdag rnams kyi dge 'dun gyi rnyed du/ rnyed pa nyung ngu'am phal pa cher phul na/ de na gnas pa cig gam gnyis sam/ rab tu
258b4(1): mang po gang yin pa de rnams kho na'i ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sdom la dbye ba rnams la skal ba ni/ sbyin dang drang srong rgyu ba las/ dge 'dun gyis na chos gos kyi/ rnyed pa brgyad
258b5(1): du bya ba'o// gleng bzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis nus pa/ btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge 'dun dbye bar gyur
258b6(1): na// rnyed pa'i 'di stsal bar bgyi 'am mi stsol bar gyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor kha tsag la ni sbyin no// kha cig la ni mi sbyin no// gang la stsal
258b7(1): bar gyi// chos dang mthun pa'i phyogs la'o// btsun pa dbyar gyi nang yongs su dge slong gyis slab pa phul te/ nyams par gyur no/ rnyed pa stsal b.rarda bgyi'am/ mi stsal bar bgyi// 
258b8(1): nye bar 'khor kha cig la ni spyir ro// kha cig la ni mi sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi gang yun rang du gnas pa la'o// btsun pa dbyar gnas log su dge slong gum par gyur na/ rnyed pastsal
259a1(1): khar bgyi'am ma stsal bar bgyi/ nye bar 'khor kho cog lan sbyin no// kha tsag lan mi sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o// ri 'or
259a2(1): zhig na khyim bdag cag yod pa des/ yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las/ gtsug lag khang der
259a3(1): phyin pa dang / khyim bdag des zan byin nas/ ras yug lnga brgya byin pa dang / des ras yug lnga brgya po do rnams gcugs lag khang de nyid la phul nas song ngo // ji tsam na
259a4(1): de'i lhan cig gnas pa drang srong len dang / drang srong byin gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las/ ri 'or de nyid du phyin pa dang / khyim bdag des de gnyis kyang zan byin nas// ras
259a5(1): yug lnga brgya byin no// dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyi mkhan pos/ khyim bdag de las ras yug lnga brgya thob pa/ de rnams bdag cag kho na la
259a6(1): bgos kyis de ring gi rnyed pa 'di rnams kyang bdag cag kho nas thob par 'gyur ro// de gnyis smras pa/ mkhan po ni bsod nams che ba shes pa dang / ldan pa yin te/ des lan
259a7(1): 'ga' khyed cag la byin par zad do// de rnams kyis slar ldan par brtsams pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
259a8(1): dge slong dag rnyed pa ni brgyad po 'di lta ste/ brgyad po gang nan rnams kyis thob pa rnyed pa dang / khrims kyis thob pa dang / rten gyis thob pa dang / dge 'dun gyis btags pa dang / 
259b1(1): dge slong gir btags pa dang / dbyar gyi dang / mngon sum dang / sa so bstan pa'o// mtshams kyis thob pa'i snyed pa gang yin no na/ 'di lta ste gnas gnyis lags
259b2(1): sbyong gcig pa ste/ gtsug lag de gnyis kyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni/ gtsug lag khang gnyis ka'i gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyi yin no// de la nyug mar
259b3(1): gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis rgyal la gso sbyong tha dad par dbyar gnas par dam bcas na// de la rnyed pa grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin te/ 
259b4(1): gsor sbyong tha dad pa nyid kyis de'i gnyug mar gonas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis/ longs spyod par bya ste/ 'di ni mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// khrims
259b5(1): kyi rnyed pa gang yin zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba khyed kyi ni khyim che ge mo zhig go// kho bo cag gi ni khyim che ge mo zhig go'o// 
259b6(1): lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / gzhi mdo dang / sum mdo ni spyi'i yin no// zhes bcas nas/ dbyar gnas par dam bca' las/ gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams kyis gnas/ 
259b7(1): dam bca' ba'i dge slong rnams la zar byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs la/ dam ma bca' ba rnams rnyed pa phul na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam
259b8(1): bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan la byin nas/ dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la chu drangs la/ dam
260a1(1): bca' ba rnams la rnyed pa phul na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// 'dul bzhi// bam po drug
260a2(1): cu lnga pa//  / dam bca' ba rnams kyi gnas su/ dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan
260a3(1): byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bca' ba nyid la rlu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas
260a4(1): pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bca' ba dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar gyur zhe na/ 
260a5(1): dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas rnams kyi gnas su dam bca' ba dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ rgan zhugs mthar rnyed pa phul lo// 
260a6(1): dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bca' ba dang / dam ma bca'
260a7(1): ba'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// 
260a8(1): dam bca' ba rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nis/ rgan pa'i mtha' logasu rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar chu drangs na/ 
260b1(1): rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na dam bca' ba rnams kho na'o// ri ltar dam bca' ba rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin
260b2(1): nas shes bya ba rnams grangs dgu yin pa/ de bzhin du/ dam ma bca' ba rnams kyi gnas su dam pa tsa'i dge slong rnams la zar byin nas shes bya ba rnams dgu'o// gal te
260b3(1): bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams kyis/ lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang sum mdo'i rnamasu dam bcas pa dang / dam mi bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ 
260b4(1): dam bca' ba rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang tshong dus dang / gzhi mdo dang sum
260b5(1): mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byir nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang
260b6(1): dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / gzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ 
260b7(1): dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na la ru drangs nas/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang tshong dus dang / gzhi mdo dang
260b8(1): sum mdo rnams su dam bcas dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam byas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa
261a1(1): / pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang tshong dus dang / gzhi mdo dang sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i
261a2(1): dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam bai ri dang / 
261a3(1): rmong 'dus dang gzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dmam bcas
261a4(1): pa rnams kho na la chu drangs/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang rlong dus du dang / gzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul
261a5(1): la dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po ro dang / tshang dus dang / gzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnamasu dam bcas pa dang / 
261a6(1): dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis ga'o// 
261a7(1): lam po che dang / rmong dus dang / gzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zar byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ 
261a8(1): rlan pa'i mthur drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gtsuga'o// lam po tshwa dang / tshong dus dang / gni mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams
261a9(1): su sa sa na sa sa sa gang na sa don mi rgyung sngon cas pad dem ba'i mi dam
261a10(1): 'arnams la rnyed 'phrul la/ dpam bca khri dzi na la chu ngas na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar n+de nA/ gnyis rdo ni/ lam ba rtse dang/ tshong 'dus dang / ka'i mdo dang / bum mngon su dam
261b1(1): la zan byin nas/ rnam rgan pa'i mthar logs su rnyed pa phul la/ dmam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam pa re dang / tshong dus
261b2(1): dang / gzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dmam byas po'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar
261b3(1): chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang tshong dus dang / gzhi mdo dang sum mdo rnamasu dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams la zan byin nas/ rgan pa'i
261b4(1): mthar rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar nyid du chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// ji ltar dmo bcas pa dgu yin pa de bzhin du/ dam ma bcos pa nye
261b5(1): rnams la yang brjod par bya ste/ 'di ni khrims kyi rnyed pa thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// rten kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na dge slong skyes pa'am/ bud med dam ma ning gang la rten to// 
261b6(1): dbyang gnas par dam bcas pa ste/ rnyed pa byin pa gang yin pa de ni de kho na'i yin te/ 'dini rten kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dge 'dun gyi btags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 
261b7(1): rnyed pa gang zhig des la dmigs kyis ma phye ba ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun gyir btags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dge slong gir btags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig de la dmigs kyis
261b8(1): phyi nas/ 'di ni gnas khan pa'i 'o// yang thog pa'i'o// khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'o zhes btags pa'o// de ni dge slong gnas pa gang yin pa de kho na ste/ 'di ni dge slong gir btags
262a1(1): pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin bdag rnams kyis bcas pa de 'di ni dbyar gyi
262a2(1): rnyed pa zhes bya'o// mngon gsum gyi rnyed pa gang zhes na/ rnyed pa gang zhig ma nges pa la dmigs kyis ma phye ba ste/ 'di ni mngon sum gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o// so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa gang
262a3(1): zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig bstams pa dang / byang chub dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la phul ba ste/ gal te mchod rten chen po bzhir khyer mi nus na/ rmod
262a4(1): rten cig kho na la dbul gyi gzhan la na ma yin pa de/ 'di ni so sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// sdom la gnas nas phyung dang shi ba dang / 'gro ba dang ni bsre ba dang / gnas nas phyung dang
262a5(1): dge tshul dang / 'byung ba gsol dang shi nga'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa 'di ltar gnas
262a6(1): cig ni/ gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la de rnams las gnas phyung ba zhig gum pa de'i yo byad/ gang dbang bar 'gyur
262a7(1): lags nye bar 'khor ra bzhin du gnas pa rnams kyis so// btsun pa gnas nas phyung ba ni gnyis mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa ni rab tu mang po lags na/ gnas nas phyung ba zhig
262a8(1): gu ma na/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams khyo na'o// gnas nAs phyung ba ni rab tu mang po zhig mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/ de rnams las rang bzhin de gnas
262b1(1): ba zhig gum lags na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o// btsun pa 'di ltar gnas cig na gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang / rang bzhin
262b2(1): duganas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la de rnams las/ rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum lags na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags na/ ring bzhin du gnas pa rnams shes// 
262b3(1): gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mang po zhig ma ris la rang bzhin du gnas pa nyis mchis pa las/ rang bu zhin du gnas pa zhig gum lags na gum pa de'i yo byad gang lags pa dbang par
262b4(1): 'gyur lags rang bzhin du gnas pa cag rnams so// gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mang la rang bzhin du gnas pa cacig mchis pa gum na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ gnas nas
262b5(1): phyung ba rnams las/ thog mar sdig pa'i lta bar song ba spongs pa gang yin pa'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa dge tshul 'ongs nas sha na/ dam bcas pa rnams
262b6(1): kyi sa dam ma bcas pa rnams la/ khyed kyis dge tshul shi'i sa/ de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed logs ces po nya btang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams 'geng bar byed na/ bgo
262b7(1): zhes par bgos pa yin no// dam ma byas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres nas 'ged par byed par byed na/ ma bgos pa zhes par
262b8(1): bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dem bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su/ dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas// 
263a1(1): 'di skad ces gsol pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol bdag dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes smras pa las/ de yang ma phyug par sha ni/ dam bcas pa
263a2(1): rnams kyis dam ma byas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul sha'i sa de'i chos gos dang / lhung bzed longs shig ces po nya btang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos
263a3(1): pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams bged par byed na/ bgos pa yin no// bsros te 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i
263a4(1): dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngo ba yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su/ dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas shi na/ dam bcas pa
263a5(1): rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la/ khyed kyis tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos longs shig ces po nya btang bar bya'o// khas blangs pa rnams bged
263a6(1): par byed na bgos pa yin no// dmam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'ged par byed na/ mgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin/ phyogs bzhi'i dge
263a7(1): slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin/ dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs nas 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag
263a8(1): drang du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o// zhes smras pa las de yang ma byung bar shi na/ dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam ma bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa chungs par spyod pa shi yis
263b1(1): de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos longs shig ces pho na btang bar bya'o// khas blangs pa rnams dge ba na/ ma gos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams bged par byed
263b2(1): nam bgos pa nyes par mgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na/ legs par bsdu ba yin no// dmam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su/ dam bcas
263b3(1): pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas sha ni/ dam mra bcas pa rnams kyis/ dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos longs shig ces po nya btang bar bya'o// 
263b4(1): dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi 'god par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// sres te 'ged
263b5(1): par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam pa bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam
263b6(1): bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas/ 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes zer ba las/ de yang ma phyung bar she na/ dam ma bcas pa
263b7(1): rnams kyis gnas su dam bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas lo/ khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis/ de'i lhung bzed dang / chos long shig ces po nya btang bar bya'o// dam ma bcas
263b8(1): pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'ged
264a1(1): par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// 
264a2(1): dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su/ dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs te shi na/ dom ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa tshungs par spyod pa shi yis
264a3(1): de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos longs shig ces po nya btang bar bya'o// dmam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa zhes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams
264a4(1): 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// sres te bged par byed na/ ma bgos pa zhes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la
264a5(1): bsngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs la 'di skad ces rwa dang ldan pa dag bdag drung du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes smras
264a6(1): pa las de yang ma phyung bar shin/ dmam bcas pa rnams kyis/ dam bcas pa rnams la/ khyed kyis rnyi nges par spyod pa sha yos de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos langs shig ces na
264a7(1): nya btang bar bya'o// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'god par byed na ma bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'ged
264a8(1): par byed na/ ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no// sdom ni nye dgo dang ni byin gyis rlabs/ bar ma sbyin
264b1(1): dang blang bya dang / bdag shi sbyin pa med pa dang / spang ba dang ni mi gsum pa'i/ gleng gzhi'i mnyan yod na'o// nye dga'i spyi bor po la mig gcig byung nas/ de sman pa'i gan du song
264b2(1): nas/ bzhin bzangs kho bo la sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags mar khu gsol cog dang / sos pa 'gyur ro// zhe dgas bsams pa gal te de'i ring kho na 'thungs na/ de ring
264b3(1): nyid sos par 'gyur na/ sang mar dang gos bslang pa ji ltar rung bar 'gyur gyis/ re shig blangs la phyin nas btung bar bya'o snyam du shes nas/ bsod nams chen pa dang ldan pa des
264b4(1): lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas rnams tu dgas pa dang / de rnams kyis mar gyi bum pa dang / rma g.yog pa'i gos phal me che blangs// de nyidan par sman pas dris pa/ 'phags pa
264b5(1): khyod kyi sa mar gsol tam/ bzhin bzangs mthungs so// 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis gyis/ deng gnyis gyur tu gsol cig/ des lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas rnam
264b6(1): la smras pa dang / sman pas ci skad smras pa thos bam/ mkhan po thos legs so// kho bo'i nad 'di ni rmer skyes par gyur te/ mar dang rma g.yog pa'i gos mang du bgos kyis slong shig/ 
264b7(1): de rnams kyis mar dang gos phal po che blangs so// de sad gyi thabs la chags par 'gyur pas/ nyi ma de la yang mi mthung bas de'i nad rab tu skyes par gyur to// ji tsam yang sman pa 'ongs nas
264b8(1): dri sr-i gA/ 'phags mar gsol tam/ bzhin bzangs ma 'thungs so// 'phags pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis so// des smras pa bzhin bzangs/ de ring ni gsum 'gyur tu btung ngo // 
265a1(1): sman pas smra ba/ 'phags pa gal te mar gyi sgrom gyi nang nub par zhugs kyang / da ni khyod la srog ma mchis so// des smras pa bshin rje'i g.yog 'dra ba khyod kyi 'gus
265a2(1): pa/ brdogs pas mnan la mar bathungs dang sos par 'gyur ro// sman pa des mjal to// zhes bya ba nas/ khros te song ngo // de nas nye dgas mer khus lhung bzed bkang ste/ thungs pa la
265a3(1): ma zhu nas shi'o// de la gser mang du yod do// tshe gcig ni chos gos las so// rwa gnyis pa na nad kyi rkyen sman lags so// cha gsum pa las ni rdungs su byas pa dang ma byas pa las te/ 
265a4(1): gsang srang sum khri byung ngo zhes blon po rnams kyis nas/ rgyal po la smras pa/ lha 'phags pa nye dga' gum pa las// de la gser srang gsum khri mchis kyi/ de la bka' stsal ba rigs// 
265a5(1): rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na deng la de'i gnas khang rgyas thob shig/ dge slong rnams de khyer te sreg tu dong ngo // de rnams kyang lhags nas/ gnas khang rgyas thob/ dge slong rnams
265a6(1): kyis de dur khrod du bsregs nas gtsug log khang du 'ongs pa na/ gnas khang rgyal po'i rgyas btab pa mthong nas/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / 
265a7(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la nga yi tshig gis rgyal po la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la/ 'di skad ces rgyal po gang gi
265a8(1): khyod rgya pa'i bye ba byed pa de'iche/ khyed kyis dge slong zhe dga' ltas sa mngon te gang gci khyod bag mdong ba'am/ bag ma len pa de'i tshe/ nye dga' lanan 'ga' yang khyod kyis dus
265b1(1): ba'i rlos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / na ba'i rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad rnams kyis bstabs sam/ 'on te na rim gro byas sam zhes gyis shig/ gal te ma bgyis so// 
265b2(1): zhes smras pa dang / de la rgyal po khyim pa rnams kyi khyim gyi bya ba dang / rab tu byung ba rnams kyi tha dad pas sems las chu du sa gnas par gyis shig rnyed pa 'di ni tshangs pa tshungs par spyod
265b3(1): pa rnams dbang bar 'gyur bas tog 'dod thong shig/ ces smros shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ 
265b4(1): ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
265b5(1): ji skad stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi ste/ bdag gtog 'dod pa mi bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal pos lan gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas
265b6(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong nye dga' shi ba'i yo byad bgos shig/ dge slong rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi dbus su phyung ste/ 
265b7(1): bsgyur nas bgos so// gnas bcas kyi dge slong rnams kyis nye draga' shi nas de la gser srang sum khri dge slong rnams kyis bgos so zhes thos nas/ de rnams myur bar mnyan yod
265b8(1): du lhags nas smras pa/ bdag cag kyang btsun pa nye dga'i rlangs pa chungs par spyod pa yin pas/ bdag cag kyang de'i rnyed pa la dbang bar 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams kyis bsdus te de dag
266a1(1): dang lhan cig yang bgos so// yangs pa can pa dang / ba ra Na sa dang / rgyal ba'i khab dang / tsam pa pa'i yul gyi dge slong rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang du bsdus
266a2(1): nas bgos te/ de ltar grong khyer chen po drug na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams 'dus so// dge slong rnams bsdud cing 'gyed pa na/ lung gnod pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / yid
266a3(1): la byed pa bor ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed pa bgo ba'i rgyu ni lnga ste/ rgyun rwa sum dang mchod
266a4(1): rten dang / tshul shing dang / lnga pa ni gsol pa'o// shi ba'i 'ogaN+DI brdungs pa yin na 'ongs pa gang yon pa de la rnyed pa sbyin te/ rgyun chags gsum 'don pa dang / mchod rten la phyag byed
266a5(1): kha dang / rdul shing 'drim pa dang / gsol ba byed pa na yang de bzhin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ shi ba'i yo byad thams cad gsol ba byas te/ bgos na mi 'khrugs par 'gyur// 
266a6(1): 'di ltar yang bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// shi ba'i yo byad rgan
266a7(1): pa yi mthar bzhag ste/ dge slong gcig gis rgan pa'i mthar 'dug la gsol lo bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge slong nye dga' gum ste/ gun
266a8(1): bde'i yo byad gda' ba dang / ma gda' ba mchis pa 'di lags te/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun
266b1(1): gyis dge slong nye dga'i yo byad kyi sngas gda' ba dang / mi gda' ba la gum pa'i yo byad du byin gyis brlabs pa'o// 'di ni gsal pa'o// dge slong dag 'di ni shi ba'i yo byad bgos zin pa
266b2(1): ste/ 'di lta ste/ gsol ba'o// gsol ba byas nas dge slong ba gang yin pa de la ni rnyed pa sbyir no// tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun
266b3(1): pa gang na dge 'dun ma mthun pa'i gsol pa bgyid pa ma mchis pa der gum pa'i yo byad bgo bar bgyi'am/ bgo bar mi bgyi lags/ nye ba 'khor thog ma dang tha mar byas nas bgo
266b4(1): bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis thog ma dang tham shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ yod byed gcig tu bsgyur te/ de la cung zhig dge 'dun gyi rgan pa dang / dge 'dun
266b5(1): gyi gzhon pa la byin nas/ ci dga' dka' bar bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gsol pa 'am/ thog ma dang tha ma mi byas pa'i shi ba'i yo byad kyi rnyeng pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
266b6(1): slob ma thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams the rlom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa che dang ldan pa nye dga' ma 'ongs pa'i
266b7(1): chags pas gum par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da lta ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ma 'ongs par chags pas shi ba
266b8(1): gon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'dzin pa zhig gis mda' dug can gyis glang po tshe gnang du bsnun pa dang / de nas gnang la bab pa'i tshor bas/ zhen cing mnga'i bzhin du song nas rngon pa de sras
267a1(1): @dang bral lo// dza tsam na stes dbang gis te chom rkun pa lnga brgyas ri 'ong zhig bcom nas/ phyogs der phyin pa dang / de rnams kyis glang po che mthong ngo // mu ge dang
267a2(1): bcas pa'i dus byung bas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag sha 'di rnyed kyis/ gnyis brgya lnga bcus ni glang po dri'i shi bcad la bco'o// gnyis brgya lnga bcus na chu blang ngo // de na glang
267a3(1): po rma sha gcod cing ba rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag bdag cag 'de 'dra ba'i las byas pas/ rkun rdzas rab tu mang po grub kyis de dag la ci'i phyir sbyin/ 
267a4(1): sha las ci yog pa zos la/ lhag ma dug gis bdab po// de dag gis sha dug can zos pa dang / 'chi bas rkun rdzas bdag gir 'gyur ro// zhes de rnams kyis tsa yog pa'i sha zos nas lhag ma
267a5(1): drug gis btab po// gang dag chu la dong ba de rnams kyis kyang / de bzhin du bcad nas chu ci yog pa 'thungs nas lhag ma dug blugs te 'ongs nas/ gang gis zos pa de rnams kyis kyang chu
267a6(1): ta 'thungs/ gang dag gise chu 'thungs pa de'i dag gis kyang sha zos nas thams cad shi bar 'gyur ro// ci tsam na sa wa zhig dus kyi zhags pas bcings nas phyogs der 'ongs nas
267a7(1): des de dag thams cad mthong ngo // de nas chags pa skyed pa'i yid bde bas bsams pa/ bdag la rnyed la phal me che yod kyis rims bzhin du bya'o// sram nas des gzhu mchog khar bcug ste/ 
267a8(1): gzhu rgyud kyi rdong ba rgyus pas bca' bar tsams te/ de nas rgyus pa mchod pa dang / mchog mas bkan la gzug nas shi bar gyur to// lhas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ bstsol par
267b1(1): yang ni bya ba ste/ lhag par cog par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni gtan yod na'o// cog la chags pa'i wa long ba/ gzhu yis bsad par 'gyur la ltos/ dge slong dag ji snyam
267b2(1): sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni/ zhe dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'di lhag par chags pas shi'o// da ltar yang 'di lhag par chags pas shi bar gyur to// gleng gzhi
267b3(1): nomanyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs pa/ sdug bsngal ba nang rlabs che ba zhig yod pa de/ dge slong gi rim gro byas nas/ 'or kyang shi bar gyur pa na/ de'i lhung bzed
267b4(1): chos gos rgan pa'i thar mkhyer ba dang / de nas chos gos gtsag la go rtsi bdag gis 'phags shing sbrang ma rnams 'du bar gyur to// de nas gos 'ged pas rim gro byed pa de la
267b5(1): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis sgyu dang na byas te/ chos gos ma kram gyi khrus gyis shig/ des smras pa/ yo byad ni khyod 'ged na/ kho bo khru 'am khyod nyid kyis khrus shig/ skabs de dge slong
267b6(1): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad yog la yo byad drug cha byin la/ lhag ma dge slong gis bgo bar bya'o// gal te rA ba yog
267b7(1): mang bar gyur na/ thams cad spyir ya byad drug 'go bya'o// de dge slong gshes gnyen dang bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa gzhan dag gcig shi nas/ de rnams kyi yo byad dang / dge tshul
267b8(1): gyi yo byad dang / che ba'i yo byad mang po rgan pa'i mthar spungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nab yog gis yo byad drug cha bkur bar bya'o// zhes bka' stsal to// zhes des gdams gdams
268a1(1): shing bzang po rnams blangs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang po rnams las sbyin par mi bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis ngan pa las byin nas/ 
268a2(1): ga na bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngan pa rnams las sbyin par mi bya'o// 'on kyang bar ma rnams las sbyin par bya'o// rad pa ma tshor bar dge 'dun gyi gnas mal tu shig par 'gyur
268a3(1): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad yog gis nad pa'i rtags la mkhas par bya ste/ myur ba myur bar brtag par bya'o// de'i bya ba nyams par mi bya ste/ lus kyi gnas
268a4(1): skabs shes nas gang zag gi gnas mal la bstan par bya'o// gleng gzhi ni gnyen yod na'o// dge slong nad pa zhig yod pa des lus kyi gnas skabs la rtags nas/ dge slong zhig la smras
268a5(1): pa/ re shig kho bo ci tsam madro'i bar du rim gro gyis shig/ kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ni kho bo tra~M shi nas khyod ci bder gyis shig/ des de'i rim gro bya bar brtsams pa las/ dzaM tsam na dge
268a6(1): snang sha'o// de nas gos 'ged pas de la smras pa/ dge slong de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos phul tsag des smras pa/ des kho bo kho na la ci bder byed du macugo/ zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnam
268a7(1): kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gson pa'i tshe nyid nam byin na/ shi nas sbyin pa lta smos tsa dgos bdag shi nas 'di'i yin no// 
268a8(1): zhes bya'i sbyin pa 'di ni med pa yin pas blangs te/ bgos la/ dge slong de'i rang gi skal ba sbyin par bya'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ nad tshabs che ba zhig yod
268b1(1): pa des shes pa chung bas/ de'i slan med nas/ de lus kyi gnas la brtags te/ rim gro byed pa la smras pa/ bdag ci yang med kyis bdag gi ched du mchod pa gyis shig des blangs pa las
268b2(1): de shi nas ngan song rnams su skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong sha ba'i gang yin pa des rim gro byed pa la 'di skad smras pa/ 
268b3(1): de rnams kyis dza ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang / dge slong dag dge slong de log par ltung ngo // gal te tshangs pa rlangs par spyod pa rnams kyis/ de'i cheng du dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa
268b4(1): byas par gyur pa dang / dad pa skyes pas logs par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ de lta bas nas dge slong gis rangs patshungs par spyod pa ni yal bar mo bzhog ste/ nad g.yog sbyin par
268b5(1): bya'o// rang gi yo byad slong na/ rim gro byed pas myur ba myur bar sbyar bar bya'o// ma sbyar ra 'gal rlabs car du 'gyur ro// gleng bzhi ni gzhan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong rad pa zhog gnas
268b6(1): khang du sha nas mam sen pa rnams kyi nang du skyes so// gos bgang pas lhung bzed dang chos gas bga' zhes dge slong de'i gnas khang du 'jug par badzums pa las/ de kun nas dris pa drag pas
268b7(1): dbyug pa blangs te langs nas/ des smras par shig kho bo dur khrod du yang ma phyung bar/ lhung bzed dang chos gos 'god par byed dam/ de spangs nas zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom
268b8(1): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / re shig thog mar dge slong gi ro phyung nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo bar bya'o// gleng gzhi ni gzhan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong shi nas dge slong rnams kyis phyung ste/ 
269a1(1): dur khrod bzhin du bong nas gtsug lag khang du lhags te/ gros 'ged pas chos gos dang lhung bzed bgo'o zhes de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa dang / de mi ma yin
269a2(1): ga ba rnams su bskyes pas/ dbyug pa blangs te lang sa nas/ des smras pa/ re shig kho bo'i ro la mchod pa yang ma byas par chos gos dang lhung bzed 'ged par byed dam/ zhes pa'i skabs
269a3(1): de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams kyi sngar de'i ro la mchod pa byas la/ de'i 'og tu lhung bzed dang chos
269a4(1): gos bgos dang / nyis dmigs 'dir mi 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig gnas khang du shi nas/ des dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du khyer te ro la mchod
269a5(1): pa byas sreg nas de nas gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang / gos 'ged pas de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa dang / des dbyug pa blangs te langs nas re shig bdag gi ched du chos bsgrags pa ma
269a6(1): byas par chos gos rnams 'ged par byed dam/ zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i ched du chos
269a7(1): bsgrags pa dang / de'i ched du yon bsngo ba byas nas/ chos gos rnams bgo bar bya'o// sdom la nad pa dang ni tshong dpon dang / dngos po'i sbyin pa lag gi bla/ mtshams bzhi dag tu bya ba dang / 
269a8(1): po na brgyad du bya ba'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge 'dun gdugs chod la spyan drangs pa las/ 
269b1(1): dge slong gi dge 'dun na lpags so// bcom ldan 'das na rjes kyi bsgrub par bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal ba zhes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu lngas rdzas kyis
269b2(1): bsgrubs par bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi skal ba bzhes te/ lnga pa gang gis shes na/ nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed pa dang / lha rnams la ros 'chad par bzhed pa dang / gnas
269b3(1): mal la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nad pa la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / bslab pa'i bzhi bca' bar bzhed pa ste/ skabs 'dir ni nad pa la gzigs pa dang / slab pa'i bzhi
269b4(1): btsa' bar bzhed nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas/ bsod snyoms kyi sku bskal ba zhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi
269b5(1): dge 'dun don nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas/ lde mag bsnams te/ kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang dang / sprul po nas
269b6(1): skyil pa dang / 'chags nas 'chags rnams su rlag tsang gshegs na/ gtsug lag khang chen po gang na ba der byon pa dang / de na dge slong nad tshabs che ba/ shes pa chung ba/ rang gi
269b7(1): gcan dang ngan skyugs kyi nang du nub pa zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mgon ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag la mgon ma mchiso// 
269b8(1): zhes skad ngan po bton pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khams gsum gyi mgon po'i rjesu khyod rab tu byung na/ tsa'i phyir de skad du bcom ldan 'das
270a1(1): bdag la mgon ma mtshas so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag la mgon ma mtshas lags so zhes de skad 'don pa/ bdag la tshangs pa tshungs par
270a2(1): spyod pa 'ga' yang rim gro bgyid pa dang / lta ba ma mchis so// dge slong khyod kyis tshangs pa chungs par spyod pa 'ga' la rim gro dang lta ba byas pa yod dam/ bcun
270a3(1): pa ma mchis lag so// de bas deng khyod gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye ma'o// lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin gyis mtsho chen
270a4(1): po ma dros pa nas chu khyer te 'ongs shing / ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sa khyer te 'ong bor gyur cig ces/ 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed mdzad do// chos nyid kyis 'dzag rten pa'i
270a5(1): thugs bskyed mdzad pa de'i tshe brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs te/ lha rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
270a6(1): brgya byin gyis/ mtsho chen po ma gros pa nas/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gser gyi ril ba bkang ste/ ri spos kyi ngad lngar las sa blangs nas/ myur bamyur bar bcom
270a7(1): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs te/ re 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shig dang / de'i rim gro bdag gis bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
270a8(1): bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di khyod kyi phyir rab tu byung ba ma yin gyis/ 'on kyang nga'i phyir yin no// gzhan yang khyod kyis 'di sngon ma mthong la/ lha rnams na gtsang sgra la dag
270b1(1): kha yin pas/ 'dug shig ngas 'di'i rim gra bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzar ros gos rjes nas/ phyag 'khor lo dang / bkra shas dang / g.yung rung 'khrul
270b2(1): pa can/ bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa/ skrag pa rnams las dbugs 'byin pas/ dge slong bzung ste/ gcan dang ngan skrags nas phyung nas mtha' gcig tu
270b3(1): bzhag ste/ myug ma'i chal pas bzhar ras sa dkar pos dril mchis byas te bkrus so// de nas dkyil mo chur bcug nas/ de'i chos gos rnams bkrus te/ phyogs yang
270b4(1): lci ba 'jam pas byug pa mdzad do// de nas phyag dang zhabs bsil nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la nad pa la rim gro bya ba sngon du 'gro ba'i chos bshad pas/ yang dag
270b5(1): par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas/ gtsug lag khang du bzhugaso// gtsug lag khang du/ ro dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsod snyoms khyer te/ bcom
270b6(1): ldan 'das kyi spyar sngar song ngo // chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod snyoms mnos nas khyer 'ongs pa'i dge slong la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad
270b7(1): pa 'dis/ so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ de dge slong ci dga' dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas gsod pas legs par tshim par byas sam/ zhes yang dag par rab
270b8(1): tu dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gcig dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pas legs par rim
271a1(1): par byas sam/ btsun pa de bzhin du/ zhal zas bsod snyoms pas dge slong gi dge 'dun legs par rlom par bgyis legs so// de nas
271a2(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis bsad sems kyi phyed khyer te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la/ gtsug lag khang che ge mo na dge slong nad tshabs rtse ba
271a3(1): zhig yod pa de la bsod snyoms phyed po 'di khyer la/ zos nas 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi rim gro ston pa nyid kyis bsod snyoms phyed kyi bgo bshas mdzad do// zhes bgyis shig/ 
271a4(1): btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ bsod snyoms kyi phyed khyer te de la bsod snyoms byin nas/ ji skad bka' stsal
271a5(1): pa yang smras so// / 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug cu drag pa// / de nas dge slong de rnams 'di snyam du sems
271a6(1): bdag ni khams gsum gyi bla ma nyid kyis rim gro mdzad do// bsod snyoms kyi phyed kyang gnang gyis/ bdag pas byin pa longs spyad nas/ le los dus 'da' byed pa ma yin pas/ 
271a7(1): ma la bdag nam gyi cha stod dang / gnam gyi cha smad la mi gzhal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas par bya'o// skam nas/ de rnams kyi rwa stod dang / cha smad la ma nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson
271a8(1): par gnas pa na/ 'khor ba'i 'khor los dus lnga pa g.yo ba dang mo g.yo ba 'di 'di rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnams pa thams cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang rnam par 'thar ba dang / rnam
271b1(1): par 'dzag pa chos nyid du zil gyis mnan nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom par gyur to// dgra bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral
271b2(1): ba dang / bong ba dang gser du ma'am pa/ na mkha' dang lag mthul du mtshungs pa'i sems can dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa ma rig pa'i sgo// mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag
271b3(1): par rig pa thob pa/ sred pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur bstil rgyab kyi phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / brjed par bya
271b4(1): ba mngon par du smra bar bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nad pa 'di dag la ni rangs pa chungs par spyod pa/ khyod
271b5(1): cag kho na ma gtogs/ ma med pa med rtsa lag gzhan med do// de lta bas ra rungs pa rmongs par spyod pa rnams kyi phar tshun du rim gro bya ste/ mkhan po la ni lhan cig gnas
271b6(1): pa'o// lhan cig garas pas ni mkhan po'i'o// slob dpon gyis na ni garas kyi'o// ne nas kyis ni slob dpor gyi'o// mkhan po cig pas ni mkhar po cig pa'o// 
271b7(1): slob dpon cig pas ni slob dpon cig pa'i'o// gtam 'dres pas ni gtam 'dres pa 'i'o// bebs par smra bas na phebs par smra ba'i'o// smras 'dren gyis ni smras pa drin
271b8(1): gyi'o// 'khor dang bral ba shes pa chung ba yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyis nad kying gnas skabs la btags nas/ rim gro ba cig gam gnyis sam/ mang po sbyin te mthar na dge
272a1(1): ga'adun gyis kyang rim gro bya'o// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom
272a2(1): ldan 'das nyid kyis dge slong de'i lus kyi rim gro mdzad nas/ des dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta 'ba' zhig tu
272a3(1): ma zad do// ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di'i rim gro byas nas/ des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba sti gnas me tog dang 'bras bu dang chu phun
272a4(1): sub chog pa/ shing sna tshog kyis marjes par byas pa zhig na/ drang srong mngon par shes pa ldang mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de
272a5(1): nga nyid yin no// drang srong de'i slob ma gang yin pa de dge slong 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang ngas de'i rim gro byos so// da ltar yang byas so// gzhan yang dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
272a6(1): la zhus pa/ btsud pa bcom ldan 'das lhag par yang nad pa rnams la byams par mdzad pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de
272a7(1): ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang da lhag par nad pa rnamal byams pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngor byung ba yul shi bi'i rgyal po'i pho brang na/ rgyal po shi bi zhes bya ba 'byor pa rgyas pa dang / 
272a8(1): bde ba dang / lo legs pa dab skye bo dang me mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'dug ste/ de spong ba ba rnams la mi gtong ba cung zad kyang med pa nang pa rnams la ni khyang bar byed do// 
272b1(1): de tsam mkhyim bdag nang ba srad pa thams cad kyis spangs pa zhig rgyal po'i drung dus nganas lnga bdag la dpyad mdzod cig rgyal ba'i slar ba rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di'i slar de dkon lags
272b2(1): so// rgyal pos smras pa dkod pa de ci 'dra ba zhig min/ lha gang zhig btsas tshun chad sdod lan 'ga' mang sral yang zor myong ba de'i khrag las nas thug bgyis te
272b3(1): zla badrug sbrul na de sde 'di bsas par 'byung lags kyi/ gzhar mas pa lagasas rgyal bas smras pa/ nga'i slad dkod pa de bden no// de ras
272b4(1): bdag nyid kyi spyod pa brtag par brtsams na/ bdag nyid kyi spyod pa brtag par dka' bar 'byur nas/ nges ma ma la dris par brtsa kha mang dus 'di srid kyi
272b5(1): bar du sngon 'ga' la khros pa yod dam/ gzhor khyod gang gi re bdag gi bar du pyod pa de nas bdag kyang sngon sul yang lan 'ga' yang zo pA myong na khyod lha ci spos kyang 'ar la/ de nas ma'i drung du so
272b6(1): nas smras pa/ mu ma bdag dus 'di srid kyi bar tu sngon 'ga' la zos pa mchis sam/ gzhon nu khyod gang gi rum tshe bdag gi rlab du zhugs pa de nas bdag kyang sngon su
272b7(1): la yang thob pa byang na/ khyod lnga smos kyang ci dgos/ nges bsams pa/ sman rnyed do snyam du rig nas/ des spad pa rnams la bgong
272b8(1): shes ldan dag nges rang la brtag nang sngon sul mang khrom myong bas nga'i yan lag lnga'i rtsa btod cig/ lnga bdag
273a1(1): cag ni mi phel ba zhig gi don tu lba'i sku la mtshon mi 'debs so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas de dang de rnams la
273a2(1): mkhas pa yin pas rgyal ba 'di nyid kyi rtsa gtar te/ khrag des zla ba drug tu nyi ma re re zhing de la nas thug brud pas bsos par gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus
273a3(1): kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te de na yang rad pa rnams la byams par byed na/ da ltar lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos// / gzhan yang shi bi'i rgyal po'i
273a4(1): bu gzhogs phyed skams par gyur nas/ rgyal pos sman pa rnams la bsgo bshes ldan dag gzho nu'i dpyad gyis shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bcud thams cad mar dang sgrol cig/ 
273a5(1): lo bcu gnyis su bcud thams cad stsogs na 'di'i yang shang shang ti'u'i sha ma rnyed do// sman pa rnams kyis bya ba po dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan+de dag me long dang bya gag khyer te/ rgya mtsho'i
273a6(1): 'gram du deng la der snyi tshugs te bya gag gi mdun du me long zhog shig dang / bya gag rang gi gzugs brnyan mthong nas/ 'odi bya gag yin no snyam ste/ skad phyung dang shang shang ti'us bya gas
273a7(1): gi skad thos nas ngo mtshar che bas/ bya gagagi drung du 'ong bar gyur te/ de dag gzung ba'i thabs ni 'di yin no// de rnams kyi de bzhin du byas pa las/ dza tsam na las kyi zhags pas
273a8(1): zin pa'i srog chags shang shar ti'u thogs nas de rnams kyis de khyer te dong ngo // 'di ni chos nyid yin to// 'dzag rten gnas pa chags nas ring po ma lon pa'i tshe dud 'gro rnams kyang smra
273b1(1): shes pas srog chags shang shang ti'us smras pa/ bdag gar 'gre do rnams kyis lhar gyur pa smras pa/ des smras pa thong shig sha'i mthu yod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sman dang rin po che nams
273b2(1): sbas pa/ re shig khyod kyis sman de dag dza 'dra ba ltas ston cig/ des smras pa bdag gi khrus byas pa'i chu na sha'i mthu yod pa yin gyis de khyer la deng shig/ rin po che 'di dag yin no// 
273b3(1): de dag rgyal pos 'jigs pas rin po che rnams bor te shang shang ti'u de nyid khyer dong la las rims kyis yul shi bi'i dbyings kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin pa na/ de rnams kyis srog chags shang shad
273b4(1): ti'i'u rgyal po la phul te/ des bstan pa'i slar gang yin pa de rgyal bas shang shar ti'u la dris pa dang / smras pa lha bdag bkrus pa'i rab kyis sha stobs can du bgyid pa lags so// rgyal bas
273b5(1): chu snod bdur rgyu bzang pos bkang bar bzhag bzhag go// ji tsam na de dag ji srid legs par ngal sos de srid du khrus byas nas/ de ras lus kyi stobs shes pa dang mod la 'phur te/ khang pa'i
273b6(1): steng du 'dug nas/ 'dzag pa dang / bag tsha ba dang brel nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ re shig thog ma bdag blar te/ phyin sa bya ba 'di dag go/ de nas rgyal pos sman pa te blun pa'i dkyil
273b7(1): 'khor legs par rdzogs shes smras nas song ngo // de ras rgyal pos sman pa rnams bkug ste dris pa/ shes ldan dag shang shang ti'us khrus byas pa'i chu de sha'i mthu yod par byed pa bden nas/ de rnams
273b8(1): kyis smras pa/ lha mang lags kyis mar dang sgrol cig/ de rnams kyis bcud thams cad mar dang bcos te rgyal po'i bu la glud par zhugs so// ji tsam na gangs ra'o sul zhig na/ rang sangs rgyas lnga
274a1(1): brgya gnas pa las den cig cig brnogs byed skams par gyur te// de la rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ljongs su song la sman pa
274a2(1): la smos te/ slar bsten cig dang sos par 'gyur ro// zhes smras pa re dang ldan pa dag skye bo mang po la mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mang po la mi dga' ba skye bo mang po yid du mi 'ong ba/ sem
274a3(1): sems can thams cad kyi mthun mong gi chos 'di lta ste/ 'dri ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'ongs te bdag nang dang bcas te khyer bar 'gyur na/ ci'i phyir grong gi mthar 'gro/ 
274a4(1): rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de lta mod kyi 'on kyang ji tsam du skyes bu gang zag tshul khrims dang ldan pa yun ring du 'tsho ba de tsam du bsod nams mang po sogs pa de tsam du mtho
274a5(1): ris rnams su yun ring dga' bar 'gyur ro// zhes de de rnams kyis skul ma btab nas ljongs su babs te rims kyis yul shi bi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin to// de nas
274a6(1): lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/ sman pa'i drung du song ste bzhin bzangs kho bo 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis sman ston cing / des smras pa 'phags pa khyod kyi snyun nad 'di ci 'dra ba kho na
274a7(1): rgyal po'i sras kyi yang de kho na 'dra na/ lo bcu gnyis kyis bcud thams cad mar dang bcos pa mchis kyi bzhud la bsod shig dang / gal te skal pa'i khyad par gyis bcud de thog
274a8(1): na/ de nas khyod mtsha bar 'gyur ro// de rgyal ba'i babrang du song nas sgor bsdad do// rgyal ba de'i kun tu spyod pa ni spang ba pa'i sra bzon gzhug pa'i phying rgyun tu bral skags te/ 
274b1(1): gang gi tshe slong ba poskon 'dug pa de'i ri de dkrol bar byed do// ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas 'ongs nas dral te dkrol to// de nas rgyal po'i bus ma dang pa la smras pa/ yab yum
274b2(1): slong ba zhig mchis pa ci zhig slong smros shig/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bu bdag cag gis lo gnyi su rdzas rnams bsogs te/ bcos nas byas pa'i bcud 'di re shig 'thungs
274b3(1): shig dang / phyi nas slong ba po nang du bkug la ci slong ba smra'o// de ngo mtshar dang bkra shis dang bde legasu 'gyur ba dag byas nas mar 'thung bar 'dod na slong ba po'i lus kyi gan su
274b4(1): phog nas mar de ma 'thungs par smras pa/ yab yum re shig slong ba po nang du ma bkug gi bar du mi 'tshal lo// rgyal pos bsgo ba spong ba po nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal ba'i lus
274b5(1): mdzes pa dang sems dang ba spyod lam zhi bas zhugs pa mthong nas des smras pa/ 'phags ci zhig bzhed des rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa'i bcud ni khyod kho na la
274b6(1): 'os kyi bdag la ma legs kyis dbul gyi bzhed shes shig des lhung bzed bzed pa dang / rgyal po'i bsam pa drang pos lhung bzed der bcud blugs so// bdag nyid chen po des
274b7(1): kyang rgyal po'i bu la sems can thams cad la phan pa dang ldan pa'i sems bgyis pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems bgyis pa dang / tshul dang ldan pa'i smon lam ni 'grub
274b8(1): par 'gyur la de yang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnas ka yang sas par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu gang yin pa den
275a1(1): nga nyid yin te/ de na yang nga nad pa rnams la byams par byed na/ da lta lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ btsun pa rgyal bu dang rang sangs des las ji zhig bgyis na/ 
275a2(1): des na gnyis ka mnyam du bros thebs lags/ mnyam du sos par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di gnyis kho nas sngon gyi tshe rab sa gzhan
275a3(1): rnams su las tshogs pa rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'ong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis
275a4(1): sa sar myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pas/ 'di gnyis nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las
275a5(1): byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las
275a6(1): dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni// rlud mi za ba'ang phyogs dang
275a7(1): dus/ rnyed na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid// dge slong dag sngon byung ba wa ra Ni si'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba byung ste/ de le bu gnyis yod pa las/ 
275a8(1): nu'o re shos gang yin pa de rgyal srid la dga' bar gyur to// mdun na 'don la'ang bu gnyis yod pa las/ nu'o shos gang yin pa de mdun na 'don 'dod par gyur te/ sems can rnams
275b1(1): ni khams kyi sgo nas shed phod pa yin no snyam/ de gnyis pan nun du yang drug par gyur nas/ rgyal bus smras pa thabs tsa zhig byas na des na nga rgyal por gyur/ des smras pa khyod kyis gal
275b2(1): te bdag 'dur ra 'dor du bzhug ra ni thabs mchis kyi srin du gsol bar bgyi'o// des smras pa/ de ltar bya ste gzhug gis smros shig/ des smras pa/ bdag gis khyod kyi can zhwa bor brgyas
275b3(1): dang khyod rgyal bar 'gyur ro// des rjesu yid rang ngo // de ras des bu phru zo nas de la sran ma yin pa byin nas zhu bar gyur to// dus gzhan zhog ra rgyal po shi ras blon po rnams kyis de chen por
275b4(1): gyur to sum nas nu bshos rgyal por dbang bskur to sram nas nu ba shes rgyal por dbang bskur to// des kyang mdun na 'dor ts+tsha nu za nas gang yin pa de mdun na 'don du bcug na/ dza tsa mar dus
275b5(1): gzhan zhig na rgyal po dang mdun na 'don lhan cig tu ze ma gau tam smra zhing 'dug pa la rgyal pos phu bo zhi ba de mthong ngo // des de mthong ngo // des de mthong nas 'argyad par gyur to// bdag gis
275b6(1): rgyal srid kyi phyir bu bo zhi bar byas pa gang yin pa ni ma legs/ ma yin pa zhig byas so// lha bdag kyang 'gyod par gyur gyi/ gal te lhar dgyod na 'di phyir sngon gyi gnas dza lta ba po zhir du brgya/ 
275b7(1): des smras pa gnang gis byas shes des de la slar thun nas sos par gyur to// de nas de gnas kyis rang sangs rgyas shog la za ba byas nas/ smon lam gdab par bsdams pa gang yin pa 'das cas
275b8(1): gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i las 'di'i rnam par smin pas phyug tsag nor mang ba la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing na bos byas pa'i sdig pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa
276a1(1): yang nyamasu mi myong bar gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i bu gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// mdun
276a2(1): na 'dun gyi bu gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas 'di nyid yin no// de gnyis gros byas nas rgyal bu gzhan la sman ma yin pa byin gang yin pa desar mnyam du na bor gyur to// yang 'gyed
276a3(1): par gyur pas de gnyis kyis gros byas te/ slar sman byin pa gang yin pa des na mnyam du sos par gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na las cag tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni

276a6(1): na'o// de'i tshe mnan yod ma khyim bdag tshong dporan zhes bya ba phyug tsang nor mang ba la ngas spyod che ba yongasu bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bul

276a8(1): sogs pa la gsol ba 'debs shing / lha'i bye brag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang / tshal gyi lha dag dang / gzhi mdo'i lha dag dang / sum mdo'i lha dag dang /

276b2(1): dag skye bo zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod do/ de ni de lta bu ma yin no// gal te de ltar 'gyur du zin na/ re re la yang 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong
276b3(1): yod par 'gyur ro// 'on kyang gnas gsum du gyur pa las bu pa dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum pa dag gang zhe na/ pa dang ma gnas chags par 'gyur cing 'dus pa dang /

276b5(1): la gsol ba byas kyang bu po dang bu mo med pa de che lha thams cad spangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad por gyur te/ ji tsam na dge slong zhig ga drung du song ste/ 'phags pa las
276b6(1): par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu byung bar 'tshal lo// bzhin bzangs dag de bzhin du gyis shig ces des de rnams kyis skra nas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams sbyin par brtsams
276b7(1): pa las rims chen pos thebs nas/ rab tu byung ba'i bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
276b8(1): sbal pa/ re shigasas kyi bar du bslab pa'i bzhi rnams ma skyon zhing de'i rim gro bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rim gro bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ dge slong rnams kyis sus bya ba ma shes nas/ 
277a1(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams dang sman pas so// sman pa rnams kyis nyin mtshan sman byas na mtshan mo nad la bar 'gyur ro// de rnas
277a2(1): gakyis smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di'i dpyad bdag gis gdugs la bgyis na/ mtshan mo bro nang la bar gyur gyis/ gal te 'di khyim du bskyal na/ bdag gis nyin mtshan du 'di'i dpyad
277a3(1): brgya'o zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la ba gsol dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ khyim du stsol la/ der yang de'i rim 'gro byed pa sbyin par
277a4(1): bya'o// de'i nad yun ring por gyur nas/ de'i skra ring por skyes pas khyim bdag de khyim bdag mgo reg ces bya bar grags so// de gang gi ri rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang mdab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu'i
277a5(1): sman gyis bsnyen bkur bya ba las slar nang la bar gyur pa de'i tshe des bdag ni 'tsha'o zhes bya bar rang gis ma chod nas des 'tsha ka'i tshe rang gi nor thams cad glegs bu la bris te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed
277a6(1): kyi ral du bskur ro// den shi'o// blon po rnams kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la smras pa/ lha khyim bdag mgo rog bu ma mchis par gum ste/ de la dbyig dang gsor dang dang glang ba
277a7(1): tshe dang rta dang / baglagrang dang ma he dang / go cha la sogs pa te/ phal mche zhig mchis pa rnams de thams glegs bul bris nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phul la
277a8(1): rgyal bas smras pa/ 'phags pa 'i dga' dbang ba'i glegs bu lam bris pa yang ngas ma thob na/ glegs bul bris pa lta smos kyang tsa dgas/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang pa gang
277b1(1): yin pa de longs shig pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ dge slong dag de la ji dag yod/

277b8(1): bye ba 'bum rnams ni dge 'dun tshogs pas bgo bar bya'o// mdung shing ring po gang yin pa de dag ni 'dzam bu lta bu'i gzugs btsun gyi rgyal mtshon gyi shing bya'o// thung ngu gang yin pa
278a1(1): / de dag ni khar sil gyi yu bar byas la dge slong rnams la sbyin par bya'o// khye'u dang bu mo ni dge slong rnams la sbyin par bya'o// khye'u dang bu mo na dge 'dun gyis mang
278a2(1): bsgyur te/ dza rigs pa zhig blangs nas ci bder btang bar bya'o// rkang bzhi pa rnams las glang po rI dang rta nang rnga mor dang bung bu dang dri'u rnams ni rgyal po la dbul bya'o// ba glang dang ma he
278a3(1): dang lug rnams ni phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir bzhag te mi bga'o// 'thab star dang / go ra dang / gzhan yang rgyal po la 'os pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni rgyal po

279b3(1): 'phags pa kun dga' bo la gtang ngo // tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ bdag gis gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig tu bzhag go zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong
