279b7(1): gnas 'dir dge slong khrum stong gum na de'i lhung bzed dang ros gos dang / gos kyi rin dang bcas pa kun dga' bo'i sug pa na mchis kyis gal te dge slong gi dus la babatsang bzod na/ 
279b8(1): dge slong gis gnang bar mdzod cag dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong khrum snyad kyi gum pa'i yo byad lhung bzed dang cha sogs dang gos kyi rin du bcas pa'i dngos po'i sbyin bdag kun dga'
280a1(1): byin gyis brlabs par bgyi'o// 'di ni gsol pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong yang gzhan
280a2(1): du gum/ lhung bzed chos kyang gzhan na mchis dngos po'i sbyin pa yang gzhan na mtshos na/ de'i ris gos dang lhung bzed gang dbang bar gyur lags nye bar 'khor gang dngos po
280a3(1): sbyin pa'i dge slong na khyams yod pa'o// gleng gzha ni gnyen yod na'o// de'i che dge slong lag gi bla zhig shi'o// dge slong rnams de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos la 'gyod pas ma
280a4(1): bgos pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun thams cad bsogs la ci 'dres sam
280a5(1): ma 'dres par gyur pa de rtag par bya'o// gal te 'dres te dge 'dun gyis ni mchod rten gyi dge 'dun gyis gyur na/ de lta bu rlos dang mi mthun pas/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos dang gos
280a6(1): kyi rin thang chas pa la chu sum du bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun no// dge 'dun gyi dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o// sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang drag tsang khang
280a7(1): mchod rten rgyas lag gse sbyang bar bya'o// dam pa'i chos kyi ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar byed/ seng dge 'a wa rgyan par bya'o// gal te 'dres par mgyur na thams cad dge slong rnams
280a8(1): kha na bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par ma bya'o// / gleng gzhi na mnyan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las rim gyis mnyan yod kyi grong
280b1(1): khyer dang ni bzhig tu phyin pa dang / de rnams kyi nang dus dge tsug sha'o// de rnams kyis bsams pa gtsug lag khang na 'dug pa'i tshangs pa batshungs pa rnams kyang skal pa 'dod par 'gyur
280b2(1): dri 'ong gis/ gtsug lag khang gi phyir rol tu bag par bya'o// skam pa las mnyan yod de na pa yon na gnas pa'i glang rje dang ru thur dang shing thur dang / lam gyis 'tshe ba dang lam
280b3(1): gol bas 'ga' ba'i rnams kyis kun nas gang zhing de rnams gang dang gang du 'dug nas bged par byed pa de dang der skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongasu bskor bar gyur ras/ de rnams kyis bsam
280b4(1): pa/ gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig tu bgo skam nas/ de rnams kyis gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig du bgo bar rtsams pa dang / dge skos gis rAs smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci
280b5(1): zhig byed/ de rnams kyis ji ltar grub smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag kyang mtsham su 'ongs pa yin na zhes des 'khangs kyang de rnams kyis ma byin pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge
280b6(1): slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams kyi rang la mtshams kyi nang du shes te/ shi ba'i yo byad 'ged par byed ram bgos pa zhes par bgos pa yin
280b7(1): slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar byed ste/ gzhan dur 'gal rlabs can du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mtshams kyi rang la yid gnyis gas 'ged par byed nam
280b8(1): bgos pa nyes par bgros pa yin zhite/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang / lhan cig bgo par bya ste/ gzhan du 'gal chabs du gyur ro// mtshams kyi phyi rol lam rnams kyi nang ga
281a1(1): 'du shes kyis 'ged par byed na bgos pa zhes par bgos par yin te/ srang yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan gcig bgo par byed pa'o// gzhan dun
281a2(1): 'gal rlabs can du 'gyur ro// mtshams kyi pha rol la nad kyis 'ged par byed na bags pa zhes par bgos pa yin no// slar yang mams na 'dug pa rnams lhan cig bgo pa
281a3(1): ste/ gzhan du na 'gel rlabs can du 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi ni mnan yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong gis dge slong la dge slong gi la gnas chos gos dag skur ba na dge slong des gang gis skar
281a4(1): ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong des yid la
281a5(1): gtsugs par bya ba ma yin pa la yid gcugs pa skyed de/ 'di ltar des gang zag skur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyod do// 'on kyang dge slong gis dge slong la dge slong la se nas chos
281a6(1): gas dag bkur ba na gang la skur de la ying gcugs pas spyang na lags par snang ba yinan// gang gi skang ba des srid gcugs pas sbya na zhes par sbyang ba yin no// dge slong gas dag
281a7(1): slong la tshwas gos dag bskur bar byed par/ gang la bsrung ba de'i shal/ gdugs skur ba de la yid gtsugs pas spyad na/ nyes par spyad pa yin no// gdul skur ba de shi pa'i yA d+had
281a8(1): du rung bar byin gyis rlabs par byed na/ legs par byin gyis rlabs pa yin no// dge slong gis dge long la rlos gos dag skur bar byed pan/ gang gse ba skur ba'i di sha ba'i yo byed/ 
281b1(1): du rung bar byin gyis rlabs par byed na/ nyes par byin gyis rlabs pa yin no// dge slong ya gas dge sbyong la chos gos dag skur ba byed pa na/ gang la bskur ba des slar bzlog
281b2(1): lo gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs par spyad par na lags par spyad pa yir no// gang la skur bde'i yid gcugs pas spyod na chis par spyad par yir no// dge slong gis
281b3(1): dge slong la chos gos skur ba na gang la bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung ba'i byin gyis rlabs par byed na/ legs par byir gyis rlabs pa yin no// gang gis skur ba de'i shi ba'i ya
281b4(1): byang du byin gyis rlobs par byed do// zhes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed pa na/ gang la skur ba des slar zlog gang
281b5(1): gos skur ba de yang sha ras gang la skur ba des la yid gcugs par spyod na zhes par spyod pa yin no// gang la skur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung ba'i byin gyis brlabs par byed ra/ 
281b6(1): legs par byir gyis rlabs pa yin no// dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag skur bar byed pa yin na/ gang la bskur ba de'i de'i blor zlog nas de shi ba'i las gang gis skur bar
281b7(1): byed pa de'ang shin/ de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis brlabs par byed na nyes par byin gyis brlabs par byed na'o// gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin
281b8(1): gyis brlabs par byed na/ legs par byir gyis brlabs pa yin no// gos kyi gni rdzogs s+ho// srab brkyang gis gzhi'i sdoms ni/ gnas bcas
282a1(1): / ba dang / kha cig dang / rdol pa dang ni ldings pa dang / dus dang gang zag ma mo'i gzhi/ nyi shu dag tu byas pa dang / bgos pa dag ni bcu gnyis ste/ gnas
282a2(1): bcas dbyar gnas dam bcas pa/ ston pa lta bar 'dod pa na/ 'dam rjeb kyis ni ngal gyur pa/ de la der ni chos gos gnang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi ral mgon med
282a3(1): zas byin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs par zhal gyis gzhes so// de'i rmi dge slong rab tu mang po dag gnas bcas su dbyar gnas par dam bca' ste/ dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po 'das nas
282a4(1): chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas lhu bzed dang chos gos thogs ste/ rtsa stug po dang rdzab chen por tsha bas ngal bar 'gyur tsang / rdul gyis lus g.yogs pa bzhin
282a5(1): dradrugazhan yad gan bder rgyu zhing song ba ste/ rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba dang mnyan yod du phyin to// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis chos gos gos dang lhung bzed ma khongs su phab nas rkang pa
282a6(1): bskus te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas lhag pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs gnas la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogos cag tu 'dug gyi/ chos nad kyis sangs rgyas bcom
282a7(1): ldan 'das rnams ni glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong rnams so so yang dag par dga' mdzad pa de/ dge slong dag khyod de bzod gang nas 'ongs/ gnas gang tu dbyang nas btsun pa bdag cag na gnas
282a8(1): bcas nas/ da bzod mtshas lags te/ bdag gnas bcas na/ dbyar mchis lags so// dge slong dag khyed cag gnas bcas de bde ba reg par dbyar nas sam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'brel
282b1(1): bar ma 'gyur mod// btsun pa mang bar gsol te/ bdag cag gnas bcas su bde bar rag dbyar gnas shing bdag cag bsad skams kyis kyang 'brel par ma mchis lams sa// 'on kyang
282b2(1): bdag cag lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rtsa stug po dang rdza ba chen por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing rdul gyis lus g.yegs pas ljongs rgyu zhing mchis te rims kyis rgyu zhing mchis pa na/ tshogs
282b3(1): chen pos 'dir mchis lags so// 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug cu bdun pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ kye mnga'i nyan
282b4(1): thos rnams lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te/ rwa stug po dang rdza ba rnon por tshabs ngal gyur cing / lus rdul gyis g.yogs pas ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba ni nyon mongs kyis ma langs
282b5(1): dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir dge slong rnams la sra brkyang gnang bar bya'o// 'di ltar sra brkyang btang
282b6(1): na phan yon lnga yod de zhag bcu las thal na ma yin pa dang zla ba las thal no ma yin pa dang / nub ma bral na ma yin pa dang / bla gos tha gos dang bcas pa'i chos gos kyis ljongs rgyur 'gro ba
282b7(1): swA dang / chos gos rung ba ma yin pa ji tsam 'dod pa 'chang ba na ma yin pa'o// gzhan yang phan yon de tshogs shing zan ma yin pa dang / yang yang zan ma yin pa dang / khyim rnams
282b8(1): mgrin du ma bos par mgron ma yin pa dang / ji tsam 'dod pa'i chos gos chal ba dang / ston 'bring po nas dpyid la ra ba'i bar gyi nang der sra brkyang btang ba rnams kyi rnyeng pa yin no// 
283a1(1): @skam dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na ras rjes su gnang te/ dge slong rnams reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir
283a2(1): dang sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyir pa'i chos longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis sra brkyang bting bar bya'o// 'di ltar sra brkyang la phan yon lnga yin de/ 
283a3(1): zhagra bcu thal na ma yin pa dang / zhes bya ba nas sra brkyang bting ba rnams kyi rnyed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis srabarkyang bting bar bya'o// 
283a4(1): zhes bka' stsal pa na/ dge slong rnams kyis sra brkyang ji ltar bting ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gi chos gos kyi rnyed pa ya
283a5(1): pa skang yin pa de las bting bar bya'o// gdings pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/ re shig thog par mthur pa'i go bar bya ste/ chos gos 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyeng pa byung
283a6(1): ba lags te/ gal te dge 'dun bzhed na rmos gos 'dis dge 'dun kyis srabarkyang bting bar bgyi'o// de nas phyi de nyin par gnas mal bshams nas gan+ti rdungs te dris pa'i rlig gis
283a7(1): dge slong rnams la yang dag par sgrol dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / dge slong cig gis gsol bar bya ste las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du
283a8(1): gsol/ chos gos 'din dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnying pa byung ba lags te/ dge 'dun gyis chas gos 'das sra brkyang bting bar bzhed ni/ des na sra brkyang ba ting ba
283b1(1): gnas nas rmas pa la chos gos rnyings pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang ma byung nas sar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang tsam tshal/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la babatsang bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis
283b2(1): gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad de/ chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dongs so// des na sra brkyang gting ba'i gnas
283b3(1): nas chas pa la/ chos gos rnyid pa rnams dang bral ba yang mi byung na sad pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 'di ni gsol pa'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan
283b4(1): tu gsol// chos gos 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnyidang pa byung ba lags la/ dge 'dun yang sra brkyang brtse bar bzhed de/ dge 'dun gyis rlos gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad pas
283b5(1): chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang sa dngos so// des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas rus pa la chos gos snying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ sar pa rnams dang lta smos
283b6(1): kyang tsa 'tshal/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag chos gos 'dis brkyang du bgyi zhing chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting ste/ de nas sra bkyang bting ba'i gnas nas rus pa
283b7(1): la/ chos gos snying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na sar rnams dang lta smos kyang tsam rul bar bzod pa de dag ni cing ma gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung
283b8(1): gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad nas rmos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'dings te/ des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la rmos gos rnying pa
284a1(1): rnams dang 'bral ba yang ma 'byung na/ sar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang tsa 'tshal bar dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin
284a2(1): du 'dzin to// de'i 'og tu sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni sra brkyang 'dings par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya zhing / bskos pa
284a3(1): ni dbyung ba bya'o// lnga gang zhe na dbyar gyis ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral pa dang dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'o// 
284a4(1): gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan pa na bsko bar ma bya ste/ spo ba dang / sba ba dang / gzhi nas spo ba dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba spyod pa'o// gnas nas phyungs
284a5(1): pa'o// gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na bsko bar mi bya ste/ 'dun bas 'gro ba dang zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang sra brkyang ting ba dang ma
284a6(1): btang ba mi shes pa'o// yang chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni sra brkyang 'dings par ma skos pa ni bsko bar bya zhing bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// lnga gang zhe na 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / 
284a7(1): zhes sdang gis pa 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'dzags pas mi 'gro ba dang sra brkyang bting ba dang ma bting ba shes pa'o// bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams
284a8(1): te zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun thams cad rlogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhir du ste/ re shig thog mar spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyis
284b1(1): brkyang 'dangs par smra'am/ gal tu stan dpa smra mas brdad bung dru//  rab tu na snang smras nas la par dran/ dog 'dur bcur pa rnams gas
284b2(1): du gsol/ sra brkyang 'dongs pa'i dge slong mang 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyisra brkyang 'dings par spon/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzang na/ dge 'dun gyis
284b3(1): gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/ sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dge 'dun gyi
284b4(1): sra brkyang 'dings par 'gyur ro// 'di gsol pa'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsur pa rnams gsan du gsol// sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge
284b5(1): 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par spron/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'dra zhes brgya bas brkyang 'dangs par bzlas te/ sra brkyang 'dengs pa ming 'di zhes gyi bas/ dge 'dun rtswa
284b6(1): sra brkyang 'dings par 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag mang 'di zhes pa sra brkyang 'dings par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig gang dag mi bzod
284b7(1): pa de dag ni gzungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te// 
284b8(1): 'di ltar cang mi gsungs pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de nas gsol bas/ sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong lasra brkyang sbyin par bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan
285a1(1): du gsol/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni sra brkyang du mdzad lags na/ dge slong mang 'di zhes pa 'di yang sra brkyangs 'dings par bskos lags te/ 
285a2(1): gagal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab tsang bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la chos gos 'di sra brkyang gi
285a3(1): slad du gsal to// 'di ni gsol pa'o// des dge slong sra brkyang 'dings pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong sra brkyang 'dings pas sra brkyang la thams cad
285a4(1): du thog mor 'gro bar bya ste/ bkru'o brkyang ngo // dra'o drub po// kha myur ro// chung ngun khob kyis sus gnyis sam gsum du sems bskyed par bya'o// de ston 'thong ngo // zla ba yang
285a5(1): gyi ngobo ches bco lnga la go bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag sang kho bas sra brkyang 'dangs kyi khyod cag so so'i chos gos sngags phyungs shig/ de nas sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong na
285a6(1): sra brkyang dri zhim po bdug pas/ bdugs nas gnas mal bshams te/ gan+d+ha de rdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par slo ba/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs
285a7(1): shing 'dus nas mthun par 'gyur ba dang / rgan pa'i mthar gzhag par bya'o// de nas rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas sra brkyang blangs te/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ 
285a8(1): dge 'dun gyis rlos gos 'di ni sra brkyang du mdzad la bdag dge slong mang 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/ sra brkyang 'dings pa bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas chos
285b1(1): gas 'das dge 'dun gyis brkyang 'dzangs par 'gyur ro// 'dzang ba tang // nga skad lan gnas lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// de nas gting nas ngag 'dun mdzangal bdag sa
285b2(1): srang ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sra brkyang 'dings par bsgo te/ sra brkyang 'dings pa bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par 'gyur ro// 
285b3(1): 'ding ngo bting ngo // de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// de nas btang nas dge 'dun gyis gnas brtan gyi mdun tu 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces gnas brtan dgongasu
285b4(1): gsol/ chos gos 'di ni dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang du mdzad la/ bdag mang 'di zhes brtsa ba yang sra brkyang 'dings par bskas pa lags te/ bdag gis chos gos 'dis dge 'dun
285b5(1): glos btang bting logs so// zhes brjod par bya'o// des legs par bting ngo // shin tu btang ngo // 'di la rnyed pa dang phan yon yod pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gi yin no// 
285b6(1): zhes brjod par bya zhing / de bzhin du lan gsum dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar du thams cad kyis legs par gtong ngo // shin tu bting ste/ 'di la rnyed pa dang / phan yon yod pa gang
285b7(1): yin pa de ni bdag cag gi yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gi sra brkyang thogs ste/ chab khung sar ma yin no// chang mang du 'jug par mi bya'o// 
285b8(1): mtshams kyi phyi rol tu 'gro bar bya'o// gal te song la der gnas par ma bya'o// sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug
286a1(1): par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can 'gyur ro// de nas sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis dpyid zla tha rlung yang do'i res bco lnga lnga song go bar bya ste/ re dang ldan pa
286a2(1): gdag sad kho bo sra brkyang 'byin kyis khyod cag so so'i chos gos rnams byin gyis brlobs shing / de la snyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o// sangs rgyas
286a3(1): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa du zhig sra brkyang ma bting ba lags/ nye bar 'khor lnga ste/ dbyar gi gnas ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral pa
286a4(1): dang dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad bar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / sra brkyang de 'dings pa na mngon sum du ma gyur pa'o// gzhan yang lnga po 'di
286a5(1): ma bting ba yin te/ spo ba dang / spo ba sbyang zin pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang mgu bar bya ba spyad zin pa dang bslab pa byin pa'o// btsun pa du zhig gi rnyed pa mchis la phan yon
286a6(1): yang ma mchis lags/ nye bar 'khor lnga'i ste/ ma mtho bas gnas nas byung ba dang phyir ma byed pas phyung ba dang / sdig pa'i lta bar seng ba ma bor bas gnas nas phyung ba dang / 
286a7(1): dbyar tha dad bar gnas pa dang / dge 'dun dbye nas chos ma yin pa'i phyogs pa'i 'o// dge slong rab tu mang po ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang / chom rkun rnams kyis bcom nas/ de dag
286a8(1): rims kyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so// 'ongs pa legs so// bde bar spyad dam/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bde
286b1(1): bar spyad pa nidze 'dra ba zhig/ bdag cag ni chomarkun pa rnams kyis bcom ma// tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag la rnyed pa mang du byung ste/ gal te sra brkyang phyung na khyed la chos gos kyi
286b2(1): bgo bsha' bya ba gyis zhig ces pa'i skabs te/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ chom
286b3(1): brkur bdag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir sra brkyang dbyung bar bya'o// dbyung ba na 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams pa la gan+d+ha brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams
286b4(1): la yang dag par sgrol/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / dge slong cog gos gsol ba bya ste/ las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsal/ 
286b5(1): gnas padir dge 'dun mthun pas 'di srid du sra brkyang btang ba las/ dge slong rab tu mang po ma rkun po dag gis bcom nas lhags na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la ba btsang bzod na/ 
286b6(1): dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'du gyis dge slong chom rkun gyis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya/ 
286b7(1): ste dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas 'od srid du sra brkyang btong ba las/ dge slong rab tu mang po// chom rkun pa bdag gis bcom nas lpags ste/ 
286b8(1): dge 'dun gyis dge slong tshom rkun pa dge gas bcom pa rnams kyi skad dus btung 'byon par mdzad du gsal/ tshe dang ldan pa dag las gang dag dge slong tshom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams
287a1(1): phyir sra brkyang 'byir par bzod pa de dag na tsong ma gsungs shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod tsang gnas nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun pa
287a2(1): ga/ dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du/ sra brkyang 'byin pa bar mdzod do// gang gis slad du cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de nas rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de bgo bar bya'o// bgos nas gang
287a3(1): 'dod pa des rang gi skal pa las chom rkun pa gang dag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la bgo bsha' bya'o// sdom la/ rdol pa dang ri sril zos dang / mtha' skor ba dang ldan rings dang / gso ma'i ser ras
287a4(1): zengs pa dang / rIngs dang spangs dang dengs pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa chos gos rdol pas sku brkyang 'dings su rung lags sam/ nye bar
287a5(1): 'khor mi rung ngo // btsun pa chos gos srog chags kyis 'chal pa dang / chos gos chags btab pa dang / chos gos ldan pa can rlobs btab pa dang / chos gos lhan rings can dang / gso ma'i seng ras
287a6(1): kyi tshis gas dang / rma sogs thegs pa dang / rmas gas rnyings pa dang / rgyam gas spangs pa dang rnam gas dengs pas sra brgyad 'dings dus rung lags sam/ le bar 'khor ma rung ngo // 
287a7(1): sngam la/ grangs dang dus ma ya ba dang / gang zag chos gis ma rung dang / madras khwa lnga mchog ma b+ha// zla mthun mor dang mi 'atangs dang // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la cha dang ldan pa na bar 'tshan
287a8(1): gas zhus pa/ btsun pa blangs pa'i ros gos kyis sra brkyang 'ding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi rung ngo // bcur dus ma lags pa'i chos gos dang / gang zag gi snam sbyar dang / rgya bla gos dang thang
287b1(1): gos dang / ma rung ba'i chos gos dang / ma dras pa dang khru lda ma mchis pa dang / blo mthun par ma brgyas pa'i chos gos dang / sra brkyang 'dings pa mi bskos pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol du blo mthun
287b2(1): par bgyis pa'i tshesags kyis brkyang dang / rnams kyi phyi rol tu bsgos pa'i sra bdung 'dong du rung la gams ma/ nye bar 'khor marung // sdom la/ dus kyi dang ni zla ba gsum/ sar pa dang ni brtags pa/ 
287b3(1): zhing phongs pa'i ngang na so ma'i ras// gang zag na chos gos gsum// btsun pa dus kyi chos kyis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting du rung lags sam/ zhi ba 'khor rung ngo // btsun pa rgun gsum 'das nas/ 
287b4(1): dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa gang yin lags sam/ nye bar 'khor rung ngo // chos gos sar brtags pa rung ngo // phongs pa'i chos gos rung ngo // gso ma'i seng ras ram sbyar mi rung ngo // btsun pa gang
287b5(1): zag gi snam gyis sra brkyang bting du rung lags sam/ gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na rung ngo // bla gos dang thang gos kyang de bzhin no// sdom la/ gang zag gi dang khyim pa'i dang / khru lnga pa dang khru
287b6(1): lnga pa'i lhag/ zla mthun byas pa'i bting ba dang / mtshams kyi nang cing smra ba'o// btsun gang zag gi rjes zas kyis sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ ma rung ngo // gal te dge 'dun la phul bar rgya
287b7(1): na'o// khyim pa'i gos kyis mi rung ngo // gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na rung ngo // khru lnga pa rung ngo // khru lnga las lhag par rung ngo // blo 'thur bar byas pa'i sra brkyang gis chos gos dang / sra brkyang ni
287b8(1): gding b.rung ngo // mtshams kyi nang du blo 'thun par byas pa'i sra brkyang gyis chos kyis kyis rung ngo // mtshams kyi nang dus brkyang 'dengs pa bskus pas rung ngo // ma ma brgyad kyi gnas sa N+Da brkyang phyungs par 'gyur/ 
288a1(1): brgyad gang zhe na/ song ba dang rdzogs pa dang / nges pa dang nyams dang / thos pa dang / mtshams 'das pa dang / re thag chad pa dang / brgyad pa dang na sra rkyang phyung ba nyid
288a2(1): de/ song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba dang / rdzogs pa'i mtha' can dang / nges pa'i mtha' can dang /  nyams pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can dang / mtshams 'das
288a3(1): pa dang re thag rad pa dang / brgyad pa ni sra brkyang phyungs zir pa nyid yin no// song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang btang ba'i gnas nas chos gos
288a4(1): ma byas chos gos ma zin par lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te/ phyir mi 'ong ba phurnams kyi phyi rol tu sor ba de ni song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkya
288a5(1): byung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ phyir 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o// snyam pa las de'i 'di snyam
288a6(1): du sems te/ bdag slar mi 'ongs te/ 'on kyang chos gos mi bya'o// snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyis sra brkyang phyungs pa yin no// nges pa'i mtha' can gyisra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 
288a7(1): 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gas bya'o// sbam pa las 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos
288a8(1): gos kyang mi bya'o// snyam na de ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyangs pa'o// nyams pa'i mtha' can gi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos
288b1(1): ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o// snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar yang mi 'ong la chos gos kyang mi bya'o// snyam nas/ 
288b2(1): nges de rtsom zhing brtsams pa dang / nyams de ma nyams pa'i mtha' can gyis brkyang byung ba yin no// thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gan/ 
288b3(1): naswa rlos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slor song te/ chos gos bya'o snyam pa las dge 'dun 'thun pa'i sra brkyang phyungs la des dge 'dun 'thun pas sra
288b4(1): brkyang phyung ngo // zhes thos nas/ thos nas kyang legs par phyur / shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yid rang ba byas la/ de ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// mtshams 'das pa'i
288b5(1): sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma zin par phyir 'ong ngam mi 'ong snyam pa las de'i chos gos re ba gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams
288b6(1): cad du bcing pa de'i na ri theg cad pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/ 
288b7(1): de yang slar 'ongs shing sra brkyang bting ba phyung nyamasu myong ba de ni brgyad pa sra brkyang phyung ba nyid yin no// sdom la/ ma byas pa ni nyi shu dang / bsags pa dag ni nyi shu dang / re ba yod pa nyi shu cig
288b8(1): 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o// snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 
289a1(1): slar ma 'ong mod kyi/ 'on kyang chos gos bya'o// skam pa de ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyis brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas
289a2(1): nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin pa'i mtshams kyi pha rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o// snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o// 
289a3(1): snyam pa de ni nges pa'i ma mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ 
289a4(1): slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las des de rtsom zhing de'i brtsom pa nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas
289a5(1): chos gos ma zin par ma mas kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ongs zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ dge 'dur 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo // 
289a6(1): shin tu phyung ngo // shin tu rje su yid rang ba byas pa de ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gas
289a7(1): ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong chos gos bya'o// snyam du sems pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o// skem rdzog
289a8(1): ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang byung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos mazin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong na
289b1(1): chos gos bya'o// snyam pa las de dang song nas grol zhing de'i rtsoms pa rnams bden rnams pa'i mtha' can gyis btung phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang btang
289b2(1): ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma zin par tshogs kyi phyi rol du song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o// snyam pa las dge 'dur 'thun pa sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun 'thun
289b3(1): pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo // shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su yid rang ba byas pa de ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ 
289b4(1): dge slong gis sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las de 'di snyam
289b5(1): du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing 'on kyang chos gos bya'o ba de ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra ba kyong phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang btang ba'i gnas nas chos gos
289b6(1): ma byas chos gos ma zer bar ma rnams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slang 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o// zhes sems la gzhag pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar ma 'ong zhing
289b7(1): chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par
289b8(1): marnams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o// zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de'i de rloms zhing de'i rtsams pa nyams pa de ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang
290a1(1): phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma zin par tshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos
290a2(1): gos bya'o// zhes sems li gzham pa las/ dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so// thos ras kyang legs par
290a3(1): phyung ngo shin tu phyung ngo // zhes rjes su yid rang ba byas pa de ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos
290a4(1): ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o// zhes sems la gzhag pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te slar mi 'ong
290a5(1): ste 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pas de ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos
290a6(1): mazin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la gzhog pa las de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar ma 'ong zhing ris gos kyang
290a7(1): mi bya'o snyam pa de ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas ras chos gos ma byas par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar
290a8(1): 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o// zhes sems la gzhag pa las de der song ras rtsom zhing de'i rtsom pa nyams pa de ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge
290b1(1): slongasra brkyang btang ba'i gnas nas ras gosom byas chos gas pa zin par mtshums su d+hA ram tusang nas/ slong badranang rgyas gas bya'o// nas sems la gnag pa las// dge 'dun
290b2(1): 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung la des des dge 'dun 'thun pas sa brkyang phyung ngo nas thos sa// thos nas kyang legs par byung ngo // shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjesu yid rang bas byas pa de ni thos pa'i
290b3(1): mtha' can gyis brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang btang ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gis ma zin par slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems
290b4(1): la the tsom za zhing mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong sde 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o// snga ma du de ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 
290b5(1): 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gis ma byas chos gos ma zin par ci ltar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar ma'ong zhes sems la the tshom za zhing mtshams kyi phyi rol
290b6(1): tu song ba la/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o// snyam pa de ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i
290b7(1): gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las des de the tshom zhing de'i brtsams pa/ 
290b8(1): nyams pa de ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang btang ba'i gnas nas rmos gos ma byas rmos gos ma zin par tsa ltar 'ong ngam 'on
291a1(1): @#// slar 'od kyang chos ni bya'o snyam pa de rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyisra brkyang phyung ba yin no// der song nas zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gsungs pa ji lta ba bzhin du
291a2(1): ga/ nges pa'i mtha' dang / nyams pa'i mtha' can dang / mthos pa'i mtha' can yang de bzhin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas rlos gos ma byas chos gsam
291a3(1): zar+ya pAr bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ ci ltar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar ma 'ong zhes sems la the tsom za ba las de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ongs te/ 'on kyang chos
291a4(1): ni bya'o snyam pa de ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// sems la the tsom za bas rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gsungs pa ji lta bar nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams pa
291a5(1): mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can yang de bzhin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas/ chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par btsal ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol
291a6(1): tu sang nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos byas so snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o// snyam pa de ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba lan
291a7(1): btsal ba zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis snga ma bzhin du bcu gnyis pa gzhan no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma zin par slar mi 'ong bar yul ltar
291a8(1): mtshams kyis phyi rol tu song ba de ni song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas rlos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par yul
291b1(1): ltar mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ ji ltar 'ong ngam 'on te slar ma 'ong zhes sems la the mchom za ba las de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar ma 'ong ste 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa de ni mtha
291b2(1): can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams pa'i mtha' can yang de bzhin no// yul lta ba'i lnga jo ltar gnas pa lta ba'i lnga yang de bzhin no// sa brkyang gi gan
291b3(1): rdzogs s+ho// 'dul ba ga ni// bam po drug cu brgyad pa'o// / ko'u sham bi par gzhi'i sdom ni/ ko'u sham bi ni 'thab krol gyi/ 
291b4(1): dge slong rtsod pa sna tshogs dang / khru'u dang drod par byed pa dang // dang por len g+ha spyad pa dang // ngan pang lan cha khang pa dang // srungs dang chal stug glang chen dang // ma 'gags pas ni ded byas
291b5(1): dang // mnyan yod du ni zhi bar byas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ko'u sham pa'i dbyangs ldan gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ko'u sham pa'i dge slong 'dug pa rnam par gnon pa/ 
291b6(1): mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa zhig yod de/ de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang 'dug po rnam par gnod pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma ma
291b7(1): 'dzin pa yin no// yangs pa can gyi dge slong gdug pa rnam par gnod pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa zhig yod de/ de'i grogs po'i dge slong mang ba yang
291b8(1): 'dug pa rnam par gnan pa/ mang sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma ma 'dzin pa yin no// de nas yangs pa can cing na mang dus pazhan nag na sangs rgya nang ba dang / ku'u sham par byin/ 
292a1(1): de lam gyis du ba dral sos nas/ ko'u sham pa'i dge slong gi drung du song ste/ sod pa dang / phan tshun so so yang dag par byas nas mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang / chos mngon
292a2(1): ba rnams gtan la dbab par mtshal te/ de na cig shes kyis smras pa/ mdo sde 'di ni de skad gdon par mi ma bya ste/ mdo sde 'di'i don na 'di ma yin no// khro bo'i ni rigs so// khyod kyi ni mi
292a3(1): rigs so// kho bo'i ni 'brel pa n+d+har yin no// khyod kyi ni ma 'brel ba yin no// zhes de gnyis phan tshun du mi mthun par gyur nas/ ke'u bo'i dge slong gis yang sa n+dan gyi dge slong la glan ka btsal bar
292a4(1): ltar len cing 'dug go// dge 'dun gyis kyang 'di lta bu'i khrimasu bca' ba bya te/ gang gis khrus kyi bum pa chu 'grims pa dang chung ba dang chu med par mthong ba des chus bkang ste/ gnas dza lta ba bzhin du bzhag par bya ba
292a5(1): 'am/ dge slong la khrus kyi bum pa stong par 'dug go zhes bsgo bar bya'o// gal te bdag nid kyis ma bsgom par gyur na/ de ni gus pa yin te/ mgu ba'i phyir de bdag gis ltung byed kyi ltung ba'i 'chag su gzhan
292a6(1): go zhes byas so// dza tsam na khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gis dge 'dun khyim du gdugs mod la spyan drangs so// de na dge slong kha tsag ni zan la dong ngo // kha cig ni 'gro bar cha so// 
292a7(1): yangs pa can gyi dge slong khrus kyi bum pa blang nas/ snam bu phyis sar zhugs pa dang / de'i lhan cig gnas pa rims rims ltar 'ongs nas sgra phyung ba mkhan po// dge slong kha cig ni zas la dong lag so// kha tsag ni
292a8(1): 'dod tshar chos kyis chur byon bzhud do// de de dang lhan cig khrus kyi bum pa gnas cig tu bzhag ste rmas so// ko'u sham pa'i dge slong de yang phyogs de nying du phyin pa dang / de nas yangs pa can gyi dge slong des
292b1(1): khrus kyi bum pa blangs te gtsug lag khang du 'jug par brtsams dang / lhan cig gnas pas smras pa/ mkhan po gang bzhud des smras pa bu kho bo la ko'u sham pa'i dge slong 'di glan ka rgol bas khrus
292b2(1): kyi bum pa 'gengs su 'gro'o// 'di thams cad kyi thams cad du stong ngam/ thams cad kyi thams cad du stong pa ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang chu 'dis rgya'i bya ba byed mi nus so// mkhan po thams cad
292b3(1): thams kyi thams cad du stong par ma gyur pas/ 'tshal te/ bdag cig ni mkhan po'i phyogs dang dpung dang grogs bgyid pa lags kyis tshul sbyor bzhud do// des de nyid du bzhag nas de dang lhan
292b4(1): cig 'dong ngo // ko'u sham po'i dge slong gis mthong nas khrus kyi bum pa de la gnas so// de nas mi bzod pa skyes te mjal to// zhes bya nas khrus kyi bum pa bkang ste/ chu'i bya ba byas nas song ngo // de nas
292b5(1): zan zos nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang / dge slong rnams bsgrags pa tshe dang ldan pa dag yangs pa can gyi dge slong des dge 'dun gyi rang khrims dral to// de nas rgan rims
292b6(1): dza lnga ba bzhin du 'dud par byas nas/ rim gyis de'i drung du son pa dang / smras patshe dang ldan pa skabs phye shig/ ltung ba'i ros lnga la skabs bya'o// khyod la ltung ba byung gis/ ltung ba yang chos bzhin
292b7(1): drabagyi shig/ ltung ba ma mthong ngo // dge 'dun gyis khrims bca' ba gang gis khrus kyi bum pa ru 'gribs pa dang chu nyung ba dang / chu med pa mthong nas bdag nyid kyis chus bkang ste/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin du
292b8(1): bzhag par bya ba 'am/ de dag bskos la tshe dang ldan pa khrus kyi bum pa stong par 'dug go zhes bsgo bar bya'o// bdag nyid kyis kyang ma bkang la dge slong la yang ma bsgo ni de na ma gus pa yin te/ ma gus pa'i phyir
293a1(1): te ma 'ong zhes sems la the tsom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/ dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung la des dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo // 
293a2(1): zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo // zhes rje su yid rang ba byas pa de ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas
293a3(1): chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas zhes bya ba nas thams cad brjod par bya'o// 'on kyang snga ma'i nyi shu la chos gos ma zin par zhes bya'o// 'dir ni chos gos ma zin zhes bya
293a4(1): ba bor te/ chos gos rtsams pa zhes bya ba gcugs te/ rnam pa 'dis nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang btang ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par maram
293a5(1): kyis phyi rol tu song nas/ slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o// skam pa'i rig pa yod pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o// snyam pa'i de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha'
293a6(1): can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin te/ re ba yod pa zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis snga ma bzhin du nyi shu pa la gzhan bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas rlos gos
293a7(1): ma zin par slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o// snyam pa'i re ba med par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste 'on te chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa de ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can
293a8(1): can gyis brkyang phyung ba yin te/ re ba med pa zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis lham bzhin du nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o// sdom la/ bya ba dag ni bcu gnyis dang / btsal ba dang ni de bzhin gzhan/ 
293b1(1): sus yul la lngar ni bya ba ste/ gnas la yang ni lnga yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas snga
293b2(1): 'a zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ srang ma 'ong sde/ 'on gadran bya'o// sram par ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyis btang bya yin no// 'di lta ste/ dag slod sra brkyang btang ba'i
293b3(1): gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos mazin par bya bzhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu sang nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o// snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ srar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang ma
293b4(1): bya'o snyam pa de ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyis brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu sang
293b5(1): nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o// snyam pa'i lA dris rtsom zhing de'i rtsams pa nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos
293b6(1): ma byas chos gos ma zin par byas pazhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu sang nas/ srar 'ang zhing chos gos bya'o// skam pa las dge 'dun 'thun pas sra bkyang phyung la des 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang
293b7(1): byung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par byung ngo // shin tu phyung ngo zhes rjes su ying rang ba byas pa de ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bti
293b8(1): bo'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o// skam pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 
294a1(1): de bdag cag gis ltung byed kyi rigs ltung ba 'chags su bzhag go// zhes bcas pa ma yin nam/ des smras pa/ de ha cang stong pa ni ma yin no// stong par ma
294a2(1): gyur kyang rung ste rlu des ru'i bya ba byed mi nus so// de cang mi smra bar 'dug gi/ ko'u sham+ba'i dge slong ni ko'u sham+ba ni gnyug ma dang 'khor mang po yin pas des de la nan kyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las
294a3(1): byas dang / yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams khrugs par gyur nas/ de nas ko'u sham+bi'i dge slong rnams dang 'thab dkrol dang 'arlang Shadru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 
294a4(1): ltung ba 'byung ngo zhes 'am/ ltung ba ma 'byung ngo zhes 'am gnas nas phyung ba yin no// zhe sa 'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin no// zhes gang yang ltung ba 'byung ba dang / ltung ba med dang gnas nas 'byung ba
294a5(1): dang gnas nas phyung ba gang yin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa bzhag par 'ongs pa'i phyung ngo zhes pa'i skabs te/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan
294a6(1): 'das kyis gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa rnams pa rnams pho nyas bkug ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag khyed 'thab dkrol dang tshang babru ba
294a7(1): dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa dang byung ba nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhes 'am// zhes bya ba nas/ 'khrugs par bzhag par 'ongs pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du do// bden nam btsun pa mad lags/ 
294a8(1): dge slong dag 'thab dkros ma byed tsog 'chang ma 'dru shig ma rtsed cig/ ma 'gyed cag gzhan yang ngas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ slong gnas nas phyung ba skam du sam
294b1(1): bskyed par bya ste/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong 'di ni 'dug pa rnam par gnod pa'i mang sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma ma 'dzin pa yin no// de'i 'grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang
294b2(1): 'dugs pa pha rol gnod pa mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin te/ gal te bdag gis ltung ba chos bzhin du slar ma byas na/ des na dge 'dun 'thab dkrol byed pa dang / mchab
294b3(1): 'dru ba dang / brtsod pa dang 'gyed pa byung bas gnas par 'gyur gyis ma la bdag gis ltung ba'i phyir chos bzhin du bya'o// gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ci ltar bcas pa bzhin
294b4(1): yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal rlabs can du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas phyung ba'i dge slong dang gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas
294b5(1): nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa 'di yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams bzeng bstod nas/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjesu phyogs pa'i yang rjesu phyogs pa'i dge slong
294b6(1): rnams po zhes bkug te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed thab dkrol dang mtshang 'dru ba dang 'gyed pa byung nas/ 'di lta ste ltung ba byung ngo zhes bya ba nas bzhag par 'os pa zhes bya ba'i bar
294b7(1): gong ma bzhin du ste/ bder nam btsun pa mang lags so// dge slong dag 'thab dkrol ma byed cig mtshang ma 'dru shig/ ma rtsod tsag/ ma 'gyid cig/ gzhan yang ngas gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong gakun
294b8(1): tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong gas 'di sems bskyed par bya'o// gnas phyung ba'i dge slong 'di ni gdug pa rnam par gnod pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin
295a1(1): pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ mngon par 'dzin pa yan la 'di'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang 'dug par rnams par gnod pa'i mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin
295a2(1): pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin no// gal te bdag gis de la ma 'dod pa glengs sam dran par byas nas/ des na dge 'dun 'thab dkrol dang dred pa dang 'tshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas par 'gyur gyis
295a3(1): ma la bdag gis 'di la ma 'dod pa gleng bar mi bya mi bya dran par mi bya'o// gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dgas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar ba bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na// 
295a4(1): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa na/ 'on kyang dge slong de rnams 'thab dkrol byed pa mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa dag byung bas gnas
295a5(1): shing da dung gas sbyong la yang gso sbyong ma yin par byed pa'i skabs dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes phyogs
295a6(1): pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas byung ba'i rjes su rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rje su phyogs pa rnams po na bkug ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag khyid la des de skad ces
295a7(1): bka' stsal pa dang / 'thab dkrol can dang tshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / byung bas nas shing 'dug sa spyod lags so sbyong ma yin par bden nam/ btsun pa mang lags// 
295a8(1): dge slong dag 'thab dkrol ma byed cig/ 'chang ma 'dru cig ma rtsod cig ma 'gyod cig/ dge slong dag khyed cag 'thab dkrol dang mtshang 'dru ba dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa 'byung zhing gnas na
295b1(1): las su bya ba gang dag yin pa gas sbyong dang / dag gang bye dang gsal bdang gzha' las bya ba rnams ma byas pa dang 'khrugs par 'gyur nang / dge slong dag khyed dang dge slong
295b2(1): rnams su de rnams dang / khyed cag tha dad par gnas par 'gyur ro// de tsa'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag gnas pa 'dzin tha dad par gnas pa yin te/ ga tshig bdag nyid kyis bdag
295b3(1): nyid tha dad pa'i gnas su bzhag pa dang / gang zhig dge 'dun gyis chos gos bzhag pa'o// bdag nyid nyid kyis bdag nyid tha dad pa'i gnas su bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong
295b4(1): rnams 'thab dkrol dang / 'tshong 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung zhing / phyogs gzhan du gnas pan ched du bsams te/ chos kyi phyogs nas chos ma yin pa'i phyogasu 'gro ba ste/ 
295b5(1): de lta bu ni bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid tha dad pa'i gnas su gzhag pa yin no// dge 'dun chos kyi bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge 'dun gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba dang // 
295b6(1): phyir ma byed pa dang / sdig can gyi lta bar song bA mra 'dor ba gnas nas dbyung ba ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun gyis chos kyis ma yin no// dge slong de gnyis po 'di dag ni mthun par gnas
295b7(1): pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ gang zhig bdag nyid mthur pa'i gnas su bzhag pa dang / gang zhig dge 'dun gyis bzhag pa'o// bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid mthun pa'i gnas su
295b8(1): bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong rnams 'thab dkrol dang / 'chang 'dru ba dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa byung zhing phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du gnas pa na rmed de bsams te/ chos ma yin pa'i phyogs
296a1(1): nas chos kyi phyogs 'gro ba ste/ 'di ni bdag nyid mthun pa'i gnasu bzhag pa yin no// dge 'dun gyis bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge 'dun gyis
296a2(1): mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba byin pa dang / phyir mi byed pa dang sdig pa can gyi lte bar song ba mi 'dor bar gnas nas phyung ba 'byin pa na/ dge 'dun gyis chos kyis yin no// de nas bcom
296a3(1): ldan 'das kyis gnas nis phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nis phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes pa rnams gzang skad
296a4(1): gnas ras 'byin pa 'di dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjesu phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong
296a5(1): rnams pa nas bkug nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ dge slong dgangs de de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'on kyang khyed 'azab krol dang 'chang 'dru ba dang / rnyed pa dang 'gyod pa byung
296a6(1): ba'i gnas shing da dung gso sbyong la yang rgas sbyong ma yin par byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa med lags so zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs kyang dge slong
296a7(1): de rnams 'thab krol dang 'drang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa dbyung bas gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// khyim par gcig gi sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ dge slong na
296a8(1): dge 'dun bya gdugs tshang la spyan drangs pa las/ dge slong mi dge 'dun na 'ang // bcom ldan 'das na rdzas kyis bsrubs don bzhugs mi bas snyoms kyi sus la nang bar mdzad/ 
296b1(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas kyis bsgrubs shing bsad snyoms kyi sku skal nod par mdzad pa yin zhes bya ba nas/ skabs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das can thos rnams
296b2(1): 'dul ba la srab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhing ras rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms kyi sku sa la nod par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas rgol ba
296b3(1): dang phyir tshal ba'i dag sdang rnams pas kyi phyir khyim gyi nang du bzhugs pa dang / 'thab dkrol dang ma dang 'i dru ba dang / rgod pa dang bgyid la 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta sa sgrub byung
296b4(1): ngo zhes 'am ltung ba ma byung ngo zhes bya ba rnaMs bzhag par shes pa'o// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de ni phan tshun du rdeg pa la zhugs so// de ras dge slong bsardo snyoms
296b5(1): nod pas bsad snyoms khyer ras bcoma'i ngas gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas bsod snyoms mtha' cig tu bzhag ras/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyag
296b6(1): 'tshal te/ spyan sngar 'dug go/ chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod snyoms nod pa'i dge slong las so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'das sas yang
296b7(1): dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsad pa'i kha zas kyis tshim par byas sam zhes gsungs pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zas rnga snyoms nad pa'i dge slong
296b8(1): la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad ma'adas sas yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// dge slong gi dge 'dun la kha zas bsod pas tshis par byas sam/ btsun pa mang ngo dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal
297a1(1): zas sod pas tshim par bgyis na/ 'on kyang rgol ba'i dge slong rnam snga ma pa'i nang du 'thab dkrol dang mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed par dbyung nas
297a2(1): 'di lta ste ltung ba byung ngo zhe 'am zhes bya ba nas bzhag par 'os pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dan phan tshun rdeg pa la zhugs pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
297a3(1): kyis zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs gnyis bkrus te nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug lag khang du zhugaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka rang du yang
297a4(1): dag par 'dzag las bzhengs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gangan sham pa ning la bzhug so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed la
297a5(1): zas la khyim du zhugs pa 'thab dkrol dang 'chang 'dru ba dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa byung bar 'gyur nas/ 'di lta ste ltung ba byung ngo zhe sa 'am zhes bya ba nas/ de ni phan tshun rdeg pa la zhugs so// 
297a6(1): zhes bya ba'i bar du bden nam btsun pa mang lags so// dge slong dga' thab bkrol ma byed cag ma tshang ma 'dru shig/ ma rtsod cig/ ma 'gyed cig gzhan yang ngas rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i
297a7(1): dge slong rnams khang pa'i nang du 'jug pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i tshes bca' bar bya ste/ rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis khang pa'i nang du zhugs nas/ gang tu lus kyi kun tu spyod
297a8(1): pa rung ba ma yin pa de lta bu'i skabs ma 'byung bar ston par yang par 'dug par bya'o// rgal ba dang phyir rgal ba'i dge slong rnams kyis khang pa'i nang du zhugs nas kun tu spyod pa'i chos
297b1(1): ltar bcas bzhin yang dag par blangs te/ 'jug par ma byed na 'gal rlabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nyis de skad ces gsungs na/ 'on kyang dge slong rnams 'tha
297b2(1): dkrol dang 'chang 'dru ba dang rtsod 'gyed pa byung nas/ gnas pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams
297b3(1): la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dga' thab dkrol ma byed cig 'chang ma 'dru shig/ mchod ma 'gyer cig/ dge slong dag khyed cag 'thab dkrol dang mchang 'dru ba dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa
297b4(1): byung bas gnas na drang pa byung ning byung bstan pa'i bstan pa nas 'dul bas 'dul bang bya ba dang na bar bya ba dang / seMgan par bya ba dang gnas 'ad yad// dge slong dag na
297b5(1): byung ba yul ka she'i rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba dang yul ko sa li'i rgyal ba ring po lan gnyis pan tshun rjor par gyur te/ rgyas par ni lung bar ma'i ting nge 'dzin ldan pa'i le
297b6(1): las don pa rtsa len gyi mdo bzhin no// de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces rangs sbyin rga ba sdug bsngal ste/ nor rnams
297b7(1): yongs su sdug pa dang / gnyen rnams kyang ni ma mthong dang / yul gzhan sha ba sdug bsngal la/ zhes bka' stsal pa zhig kyang mdzes so// de nas btsam
297b8(1): ldan 'das kyis tshams su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ tshag samarnamaphyogs marnams pa 'jigs man nas sems byed pa/ 
298a1(1): dge 'dun dartse bar gyur na po/ mthun rlung zad cis mi bsam/ srog chags nus pa gcog pa dang / rta dang bgrang nor 'phrogs dang / yul khor phung
298a2(1): khang byas rnams kyang // 'dum par bya ba nyid yod na/ chos 'di rnams par shes gyur pa// khyed cag ci yi phyir mi 'gyur// spyod yul ston par byed pa'i gsung // chags las zlog
298a3(1): pa lhur len pa// rtags nas mkhas par snang ba ni// gang la rtsod pa des mi shes// gzhan dag bdag can 'di la ni// brtson zhes bya bar mi shes kyi / gang dag gis ni 'di
298a4(1): shes pa/ de la gzo' bo mi dgos so// bdag spos bdag la kha byas dang // bdag rgyal bdag ni par gyur pa// de la gang dag 'khod 'dzin pa/ de dag sha kho na zhi mi 'gyur// 
298a5(1): bdag spos bdag la kha byas dang // bdag rgyal bdag ni phan gyur pa// de la gang dag khon ma 'dzin// de dag sha kho nar bzhi 'gyur// de dag sha lo de nyi k+Sha/ khon tu
298a6(1): 'dzin pas sha khon dag/ 'dir ni ga kar yang zhi mi 'gyur// bzod pas sha khon ni 'gyur ba// 'di g.yung drung chos yin no// khon tu 'dzin pas sha kho na nam yang ni mi 'gyur
298a7(1): khon tu 'dzin pa med rnams sha khon zhi bar 'gyur// khor la chags pa lus can rnams la phar mi 'gyur// des bas nA mkhas pas len tu 'dzin mi byed// gal te grags
298a8(1): po grus srer lan cig sred pa dang // legs par gnas pa brtan pa rnyed par ma gyur na// zag par 'gyung ba thams cad zil gyis gnan byas nas// de dang yid dga' dran dang
298b1(1): ldan pazhini spyad bar bya'o// gal te grags pa 'grus ngas ga gnas pa dang // lags par gnas pa pa na deng bar mgyur na/ rgyal pos sul 'khor rtsal chen sangs par gyur pa/ 
298b2(1): banin gcigs 'jug par bla'ang dag pa mas maH// gas te ba tshas te bdag 'dra ba'am// sag par rnyed par mthung na// byis pa stangs mer thar med pas/ tsag sa
298b3(1): s+yAd brtan par spad / cig pu sred pa legs gyur gyis// byis pas stangs pa legs min pas// ma dang dgon pa'i glang chen ltar// sems las bskrang te / cig pus sngar / 
298b4(1): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // ko'u sham pa'i dge slong gis bcom ldan 'das la// 'disad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni chos kyi rje legs/ bde bar ga
298b5(1): pan chos kyi rje lags ni// 'di rnams bdag cag la tshig ngan pa dang // mi snyan pa mchi'an/ bdag cag gis de rnams la ci'i slang dra bzed par bgyi lags/ de nas
298b6(1): ldan 'das kyis dge sdang de rnams kyi song tshul dang / legs par sgrubs pa des thugs lam bab pas te/ de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la gshegs te/ gzhan yod
298b7(1): na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so/ rims kyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / mnyan yod du rtul branapa byed kyi chos mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban zhugs so// 
298b8(1): ldan 'das der ga shegs pa dang / ko'u sham pa'i dge song rnams dang yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams 'dis bra'i sred lam du ma te/ sa rngon pakyi srong bas sa mas
299a1(1): la 'jug/ zas kyi 'og tu ni sgo bcad nas zab mo 'gyed par gyur to// de rnams kyi tshul dang skrong pa dang / log par smra bas pa des lo bcu gnyis
299a2(1): 'das so// ko wu sham pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'dum khang du 'dug nus phan tshun gros byas par rtsams/ shes ldan dag bdag cag ni bcom ldan
299a3(1): 'das lan bza' chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang srung dpyad kyi rkyen sran dang ye byad rnams dbul bar shin tu dad pa na/ 'on kyang bco ldan 'ad kyis
299a4(1): spyod yul 'di la bcu gnyis kyi bar du spangs te/ da dung yang ma byon no// kha cig gis sbas pa/ shes ldan dag bco ldan 'das 'dir gshegs par ga la 'gyur 'dir na daltar
299a5(1): sham pa'i dge slong rnams kyi tshul dang spyod pa dang / log par smra byas pa 'i'adi lta bung byed de/ snga dro zas kyi phyir bsod snyoms la zhugs la zas kyi'og tu sgre bcad na thal mo' byed de
299a6(1): kha cig gis smras pa shes ldan dag de rnams la nyes pa yod pa ma yin gro'on kyang bdag gis lan ste bdag cag gyis de rnams la bsod snyoms byin pa'am/ tshig sraso// rlung bdag cag
299a7(1): gis khrims shig bcas la bzhag ste sras kyang de rnas la bsod snyoms ma byin zhing tshig kyang mi smra'o zhes de rnaMs kyis khrims bcas na bzhago/ de nas phyir nyi ko'u sham bi'i dge slong
299a8(1): rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang sras kyang ma spras la bsod snyoms kyang ma byin te/ de rnams ji skar lhung bzed bkrus pa nyid kyis bsod snyoms la zhugs pa/ de ltar bkrus pa
299b1(1): kyis sa byung / bsad sams tsas kya mad de/ denas rnams 'dus nas kyi zhugs du'i bram pa dang tshas da rnams bslus pa/ shes can dag chenapa nang 'ad par
299b2(1): bsangasems mi steng pa ni rigs na/ bdag cag gis shes pa ci cig dusun tshig snang ma steng de nas kyis sbas pa/ gang dag gi tshul dang sreng pa dang lag pa sbubs pas san pa thugs med kyis
299b3(1): shing thugs lam bab nas/ steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs so/ lo bcu gnyis 'das na/ dadung yang srang ma gshegs pa khyed cag kyang shAkya'i mas kyi dge slong yin par bdag nyid las
299b4(1): che 'am/ de rnams cad mi gsungs pade 'khod nas/ de rnams kyi drung nas dong ste sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag brgyad par zlog tu phag ste/ gang zhigs la spel ba de de nyid la brten te
299b5(1): ldang bas ma nor na mnyan yid du dong la/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol lo// de nas ke'u sham bi'i dge slong rnams de nyid kyi nub mo 'das nas/ lcang
299b6(1): b.red dang chos gos khyer de ko'u sham bir mazhugs par mnyan yod gangan ba der rgyu zhing dong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ko'u sham bi'i dge slong 'thab dkrol byed pa mtshang
299b7(1): 'dra bar byed rtsod par byed 'gyed par byed partsod pa'i gzi byed pa rnams 'ong ngo // zhes thos nas gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das thugs dbyung bar bgyis te/ 'dir gsheg pa de dag
299b8(1): ngo med pas mtho'i mtshams pa'i phyir bdag cag la gleng bar 'gyur gyis/ mal bdag gis btsaldan 'das lags so/ sam du sems nas/ bco ldan 'das gang na pa der
300a1(1): song sde phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis pas gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phrogs cig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'

300a3(1): par bgyid pa rtsod pa rnams 'dir mchi'o zhes thos lags te/ gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das thugs dbyung bar bgyid te/ 'dir glen pa de dag mtshan ma mchis pas mtho' ba tsham
300a4(1): ba nyid du bdag cag la gleng bar bgyid dran par bgyid na de rnams la bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi'o// kun dga' bo de dag la dge slong rnams kyis lag brtas gan

300a6(1): ci'i phyir gnas mal gyi gzhi zam bzhin zhes smras na/ gang dag gi tshul dang sred pa dang log par bsgrubs pos ston pa'i thugs med gyes shing thugs lam pa banus 'dir
300a7(1): gshegs pa khyed cag kyang shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong yin par bdag nyid las rgya che'am/ sngon bzugs rje can des 'di ga nang ba nyid kyang khyed dbang bar mi 'gyur ro// zhes
300a8(1): smos shig/ skyes dgu'i bdag mchen me go'u ta mis ko'u sham pa'i dge slong za ba bkrol byed pa tshang 'dra bar byed rtsod par byed pa 'gyed par byed brtsod par byed pa'i
300b1(1): nga rnams dang / zhes mas thams ca tshus mdus ma pa shesangs ba ga cagags dris bska ba bya/ banam ldan 'das 'jug/ sam nas brnam /

300b3(1): la sde dgra'i bdagra ma chen me ko'u tamis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis ko'u sham pa'i dge slong 'thab dkrol byed pa/ 'tshang 'dra bar 'gying pa/ brtso
300b4(1): bar byed/ 'gyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i bzhi bgyid pa rnams mchi'o zhes shes lags na/ bdag gis de rnams la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ ko'u ta mi khyod kyis ko klu sham pa'i dge slong
300b5(1): rnams la/ 'khor gyi gtso ba yin pas mthong ma thag tu sten dor ba ma gtogs par gtam 'dri bar mi bya/ phebs par sla bar ma bya/ blta bar mi bya rnam par lta bar mi bya'o// khyim bdag mgon

300b7(1): du sems so/ song la bdag cag gis de rnams la ji ltar srab par bya/ bcom ldan 'das lana'i snyam bsam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi na
300b8(1): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs cig tu 'dug go phyogs cig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med pas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
301a1(1): kun pa bdag gis ko'u sham bi'i dge slong rnams 'thapa dkrol byed pa/ mtshang 'dru bar byed pa/ rtsod par byed pa/ 'gyed par byed par 'gyid pa/ bcod pa'i gzhi bgyid
301a2(1): pa rnams mchi'o zhes zos la gas na/ bdag gis de rnams la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ khyim bdag gis ko'u sham pa'i dge slong rnams la sbyin pa dang mi mthun pa med pas bsod snyoms ni
301a3(1): sbyin gyi gtam 'dre bar mi bya bebs par sla bar mi bya/ lta bar mi bya rnams par lta bar mi bya'o// de nas kro'u sham bi'i dge slong rnams rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin+da nas/ der lhung bzed dang / 
301a4(1): chos gos ma lus su la ba ste/ rkang pa dkres nas dris pa gnas mal 'gyed pa su yin/ phyag chang dag gis sbas pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo lags so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo

301a6(1): la lag bsngas gnas mal tha ma zhig snyan par rtsams pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang pa kun dga' bo bdag cag rgan pa yin na/ ci'i phyir bdag cag la gnas mal tha dag sbyin/ 
301a7(1): sbas pa/ khyed cag kyang shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong yin par zhes bya ba nas/ de yang khyed dbang bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas yid chad cing sdug bsngal bas
301a8(1): mtshan me mnga' bar byed do// de nas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis nam gyi slad kyi dus su rang gi rgyud la rtags nas/ de 'disnyam du sems te/ bdag cag za ba dkrol dang ma rang
301b1(1): 'dru ba dang rtsod pa da 'phreng par byung nas/ 'dus ste/ rlung ba byung gis 'a srung bas byung ngogs nas dbyung ba yinanano na ma gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin no nas bya ba bdag ni spang bam/ 
301b2(1): byung ba/ gnas nas dpung ba gang yin pa yang ces dang mthun pa'i sdebs pa'i sam dra byas pa nas nang par sngar sangs te/ gnas nas blang ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas
301b3(1): nas phyang ba'i rjes su phyogs pa rnams gang na ba der song sa/ seng nas gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas byung po'i rjes su phyogs pa rnams la 'di skad
301b4(1): ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dir mngar gsum nam gyir srad kyi dus bdag gis rang gi rgyud la rtags pa na/ 'di snyam du sems te/ gleng gzhi gang lags zab dkrol dang rtsod pa dang / 
301b5(1): bgyid pa byung nas/ 'di la ste ltung ba byung ngo zhes 'am/ ltung ba ma byung ngo na 'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba yin no zhes 'am/ bdag ni gnas nas byung ba ma yin no// zhes bya ba dag ni ldang ba ma byung
301b6(1): ba ma yin te/ lung ba byung ba yin zhing gnas nas ming myang ba yin te/ gnas nas dbyung ba yin no// da yang chos dang mthun pa'i las mi thug par mi 'os pa phyung gis/ mal bdag gis
301b7(1): mthun par sngams bu'i sems nas/ khyed ci mi sme/ de rnams kyis sbas pa legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas gnas nas phreng ba'i dge slong dang gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyog
301b8(1): pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas byung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjesu phyag/ 
302a1(1): pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong
302a2(1): dang gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong yang rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams la 'di skad smras
302a3(1): ba tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dir mdangs gsung nam gyi cha srad kyi dus su/ bdag cag gis rang gi rgyud la rtag nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ gleng bzhi gang las za ba dkrol dang mtshang 'dra
302a4(1): ba byung nas zhes bya ba nas sdums bya bar sems na zhes pa'i bar gong ma bzhin ste/ khyed ci smra/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ legs kyis de bzhin du bya'o// de nas gnas nas phyung ba'i
302a5(1): dge slong dang gnas nas byung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas byung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su
302a6(1): phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas na sa 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phrogs pa rnams/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan
302a7(1): 'das kyis pas zhes la mgo bos phyag 'aral te/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do/ phyogs cig tu 'khod nas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal/ 
302a8(1): btsun pa 'dir mdangs sum nam gyi chasad kyi dus su/ bdag gis rang gis rang gi tsud la rtags na 'dis ma dri sems te/ zhes bya ba nas mthun par sums bgyi bar zhes bya/ 
302b1(1): pa'i bdag pa rdzas/ bdag gis dge so dag thams cadapa ldan pa'i rtsas pams pa/ ma man 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge slong legs sa lagasas/ gang na ga dges
302b2(1): rnams zab dkrol dag dang mchang 'dra ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'byed par blang bas gnas shing phyogs dang phyogs gzhan la gnas pa rnams kyis skams bred pa de ni bsod nams mang po ched med pa
302b3(1): gas sa med pa skye bar bzung ro/ gdanag gis sa dras brang chu btubs pazag mar snang bar byed pa de bzhin du gang cig dge srung rnams thab gre zhes b+ha ba nas 'thun par snrums byed pa
302b4(1): bsod nams mang po tshad med pa grangs med pa gzhal du med pa skyed pa'am/ zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag 'on kyang ngas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gi kun tu skyed pa'i chos
302b5(1): bca' bar bya ste/ gnas nas byang ba'i dge slong gis dge 'dun la dbyas pa gsol bar bya'o// gsal ba ni 'di ltar byas/ gnas mal bshams la rdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong
302b6(1): rnams la yang dag par sel/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / rgan rims 'jig pa bzhin du gus pa dang bcas pas 'drad pa byas la rgan rims kyi mdun drathal mo snang
302b7(1): cigacig 'dug pa 'disang ces dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gas drugasel/ bdug gi gleng ga ni gang las ma pa dkrol dang mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa byung nas/ 'dig se ltung
302b8(1): pa byang ngeshes pamazung bam byung ngo // gis pa'am/ gnas nas byung ba lags so// ni'ab/ gnas nas dpung bam legs sa/ zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba me lags so gas bgyi
303a1(1): @bdag ni ltung ba byung ba ma legs te/ ltung ba byung ba legs shing gnas nas mi byung ba ma lags te/ gnas nas dbyung ba lags la/ gnas nas phyung ba gang lag
303a2(1): pa yang chos dang 'thun pa'i las ma'i khrims pa gzhag par ma 'os pas phyungs// gnas nas byung ba'i dge slong bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol na/ dge 'dun
303a3(1): btsun pa thugs brtse bas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag byang du gsol/ tshes ji gnas lta ba bzhin dang / 'dul ba bzhin bgyi'o zhes/ des nga lan gnyis lan gsum dra brjod par bya'o//
