380b7(1): blangs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de nyid kyi nub mo 'das nas/ snga dro sham thabs gsol/ 
380b8(1): chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms spyod de zas kyi bya ba byas zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs te/ gnas mal
381a1(1): ji ltar longs spyod pa mkhos su phab nas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ngo // de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la ma rgyags
381a2(1): mang po khyer nas/ nub mo nub mo zhig mnyan yod du song ste phyin nas/ de mnyan yod du ma zhugs pa nyid du kun dga' ba nas kun dga' ba dang / nags tshal nas nags tshal dang / bskyed mos
381a3(1): tshal nas bskyed mos tshal du 'chag pas 'chag pa na dpyod cing 'di skad ces smras// mnyan yod dang ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi nye ba dang / nyin par yang long nyung zhing ku co nyung ba dang / mtshan ma
381a4(1): gcom chung ba dang skra chung ba dang / sbrang bu dang sha sbrang dang / rlung dang nyi ma dang sdig sbrul gyi reg pa chung ba'i sa phyogs de gangan song ba der ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig
381a5(1): go zhes pa las khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhonu rgyal byed kyi kun dga' ra ba ni mnyan yong dang / ha cang yang mi ring la ha cang yang mi nye ba la tsan par lang long nyung zhing ku co nying ba dang / mtshan
381a6(1): mo gcom chung ba dang / sgra chung ba dang / sbrang bu dang sha sbrang dang / rlung dang nyi ma dang drag sbrul gyi rig pa chung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems rtse/ 'dir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das
381a7(1): kyi phyir gtsug lag khang bcug go snyam nas/ de rang gi khyim du song ba nyid du gno nu rgyal byed gang na ba der dong ste byin pa dang / gnon rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so// gno nu bdag la kun na
381a8(1): rab stsol cig/ der bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang bcig legs so// des smras pa khyim bdag de ni nga'i kun dga' ra ba ma yin te/ bskyed mos tshal yin ma kyi nga'i mi
381b1(1): no// lan gnyis lan gsum du yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smraso// gno nu ba dag la snyed mos chal stsol cig/ bdag gis der bcom ldan 'das kyi
381b2(1): phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig lagaso// khyim bdag der gser gyi phye ma bshibs kyang nga mi gtong ngo // yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyis gnonu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smraso// gzhi ru kun
381b3(1): dga' ra ba'i rin bcad zin gyis gser dang dbyig longs shig/ kun dga' ra ba ni bdag gi lagaso// sus rin bcad / khyod kyis rin bcad mod// de gnyis rin bcad dor na ma bcad do zhes rtsong
381b4(1): pa byung nas/ zhal che gcod pa'i sna chen po la gtogs pa'i mi gang na ba der dong ba dang / de'i bar du 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'di snyam du sems te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di ni bcom ldan
381b5(1): 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig par brtson gyis/ de'i grogs bya snyam nas/ de nas zhal lce gcod pa'i sna chen po la gtogs pa'i cha byang du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ dgos pa'i phyir 'duso// / 
381b6(1): de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang gzhonu rgyal byed gnyis zhal lce gcod pa'i sna chen po la gtogs pa'i drung du song nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis zhal lce gcod pa'i sna chen po la gtogs
381b7(1): pa rnams la don de rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras/ gzho nus kun dga'i ra ba'i rin bcad zin gyis gser dang dbyig longs shig/ kun dga' ra ba ni khyim bdag gi yin// de cing mi smra bar
381b8(1): 'dug go// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis shing rta dang khrur dang skye dang / gzeb dang rnga mo dang / glang dang bung bu rnams la gser mang po bkal te 'ongs nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad bye
382a1(1): mus bshibs par brtsams pa dang / sa phyogs 'ga' zhig ma g.yogs pas ma bkram pa nyid du 'dug// de na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin don de sems shing yud tsam zhig
382a2(1): cad mi smra ba 'dug ste/ gang gi ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs bkram nas slar sba bar bya mi gos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ngu yang ma yin/ ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam pa dang gzho nu rgyal byed kyis
382a3(1): bsams pa/ gdan mi 'bang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni ci'i phyir kun dga' ra ba'i ched du 'di snyed kyi nor gyi phung po ba tang zhes 'gyod ba skyes// sngam du bsams nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas
382a4(1): sbyin la 'di skad ces smra so// khyim bdag khyod gal te 'gyod pa skyes na/ gseng dang dbyig khyer cig/ kun dga' ra ba ni nga nyid kyi yin// gzho nu bdag ni 'gyod pa ma skyes te/ 'on kyang don 'di ni sems
382a5(1): shing yud tsam cang mi smra bar 'dug pa ni gang gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkram nas slar yang sba bar bya mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ba yang ma yin ha cang mang po yang ma yin snyam du sems so// / 
382a6(1): de nas gzhon rgyal byed 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin la/ chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ de la nga ltar khyim bdag 'di kun das
382a7(1): ra ba'i ched du 'di snyed kyi nor gyi phung po chen po yongasu gtong ngo snyam du bsams nas/ khyim bdag megon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smraso// khyim bdag ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs kho bo la byin
382a8(1): cig/ der kho bos bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang brtsig par bya'o// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs de byin nas/ der gzhonu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi
382b1(1): phyir sgo khang brtsig du bcug go// de nas mgon zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig pa bsam pa dang / mu stegs can zhe sdang drag pos kun nas glongs pa'i yid can rnams
382b2(1): 'dus nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis dge slong go'u ta ma'i phyir gtsug lag khang ma brtsig shig/ ci'i phyir kho bo cag gis grong
382b3(1): zer rnams bskos te/ dge slong go'u ta ma ni rgyal po'i khab yi no// des smras pa/ khyed cag gis grong khyer rnams bgos kyi bdag gi nor ma bgos pas bdag gang la mngon par dga' ba de'i chos kyi phung po brtsig
382b4(1): go// de rnams rgyal po'i drung du dong ba dang / der yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis pham par byas pa dang / mu stegs spyi rdol can mu cor smra ba rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim pa dag khyod 'dod dgur byed du
382b5(1): mi 'jug ste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'ongs nas gal te de'i shags kyis kho bos cag pham par gyur na/ gtsug lag khang brtsigs shig/ des smras pa/ rung gis re shig 'phags pa sha
382b6(1): ri'i bu kho na la brtag go de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der dong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// 
382b7(1): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis tshe dang ldan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa shA ri'i bu mu stegs can rnams 'di skad ces khyod 'dod dgur byed du mi 'jug ste/ 
382b8(1): dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'ongs nas/ gal te de'i shigs kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na gtsug lag khang brtsegs shig ces mchin/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
383a1(1): bsams pa/ ci 'di rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam 'on te med ces bsams pa yod par mthong ngo // sra zhig la rag las par 'gyur snyam na/ bdag kho na la rag las par mad
383a2(1): ngo // yang bsams pa 'di snyed cig kho na bdag la rag las pa'i tshig gis 'dul bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te gzhan yang tshig gis 'dul ba yod snyam pa las yod par mthong ngo // dus ji srid cig gis chog
383a3(1): par 'gyur snyam na zhag bdun lon nas so// bsams nas smras pa/ khyim bdag de bzhin du bya ste/ 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dga' ba mgu ba
383a4(1): skyes te/ mu stegs can rnams gang na ba der song nas byin pa dang / mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smraso// shes ldan dag shA ri'i bu na re rung gis de bzhin du bya'o// 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin pa
383a5(1): bya'o zhes zer ro// de rnams kyi bsams pa 'di la ni rgyu gnyis yod par 'gyur te// yang na ni de zos 'dod do// yang na ni de phyogs 'tshal bar 'dod do// de ma yin na dus der gdab ci dgos/ bdag cag kyang
383a6(1): phyogs btsal lo zhes de rnams phyogs btsal bar brtsams te/ de rnams kyis phyogs btsal ba dang / kun tu rgyu mig dmar mthong nas/ de rnams kyis de la smras pa/ khyod dang bdag cag ni tshangs pa tshungs
383a7(1): par spyod pa yin gyis/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog bdag cag gis brtsad pa'i phyir bkum na/ de phyogs 'chol gyis khyed kyang bdag cag gi grogs gyis shig/ dus ji tsam zhig na/ 'di nas
383a8(1): zhag bdun gyi nyin par ro// rung gis de shin du bya ste/ gang gi tshe khyer cag 'dus par 'gyur ba de'i tshe kho bo la sbron cig/ mu stegs can rnams bag tsha ba dang / sems khral skyes nas/ nyin re zhing phyogs cho/ 
383b1(1): ba dang / tsam bgrang bar byed do// dzangs nanag bdud pa dang chom padag mgon med pas skyon gyis blag pa med pa'i sa gas yangs par man bsham du bcug na/ tshe dang ldan dang na ra'i bu'i tshed du yang mang
383b2(1): mamatshal mams// ma chags dmanas pa'i grasegs pa rnams cad 'dus te/ gtan mngon gdas pam gyub chags dang / ram 'a 'ar gnas pa'i grus chags brgyamar thags
383b3(1): ma ngag kyang kha jig ni nga mchang sdes/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul nas 'dus par 'gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med pas sbyin 'khor dang bcas mdun du bdang
383b4(1): nas/ rtsod pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs te/ 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams la bltas nas/ dran pa sngon du btang ste/ spyod lam zhi bas seng ge khri la 'jigs nas 'dug pa dang / 'khor thams cad sems mi g.yeng ba
383b5(1): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la rtog cing 'dug/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus mu stegs can rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag re shig byed dam/ 'on te 'jig/ de rnams kyi smras pa/ kho bo cag gis byas khyod
383b6(1): kyis bgyis shig tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis byas nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang mi nus na/ kun tu rgyu mig dmar gyi la smos kyang ci dgos snyam du bsams nas/ 
383b7(1): kun tu rgyu mig dmar la 'di skad ces smra so// khyod kyis byos shig ngas bshig go// de mig 'phrul la byang bas/ des shing sa ha kar shin tu me tog gis rgyas pa zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rlung dang
383b8(1): char dgra po bab ste/ des de rtsa ba nas phyung nas/ phun tshun rnam sar gtor te/ rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis yul du yang ma gyur to// de nas des pad+ma'i rdzing zhig sprul pa dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus glang po che
384a1(1): tham pana' nas ma zhenamamams can mnas// dab sngal mapo bdun pazhig snga dngas maldan pa na tsus rnamamal dzad kyi sgyum to/ depe rdzam/ dam ma 'ang mi sa pa 'ad/ 
384a2(1): bzang zazhig sprul to des tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsngags kyi phur bas btab pa las nyes pa spyad pa ni/ ro langs ni bdag nyid la gsod par byed pas des de cod khams bas
384a3(1): pa dang / de nas de 'jigs bsgag 'bongs shing ba spu zing zhes byed nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la gtug nas 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la skyabasu mchi lags kyis yongasu skyab tu
384a4(1): gsol lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsngags kyi phur pa phyung ba dang / ro langs de zhi bar gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de la chos bshad de/ de dad pa skyes nas smras pa/ 'phags pa shA
384a5(1): ri'i bus legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dgos pa thob pa lta na/ bdag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad
384a6(1): bar bgyi'o// de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rab tu phyung ba dang bsten pa rdzogs par byas nas/ gdams ngag byin pa dang / nges brtson pa dang 'bad pa dang btsal ba byas pas/ nyon mongs thams
384a7(1): cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon du byas nas/ dam bcom par gyur te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa dang / nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs
384a8(1): pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ can den dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas mi rig pa'i sgra nga'i sbubs 'dral cing / rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa// sring ba dang
384a9(1): rnyed pa la chags pa/ bkur bstog rgyab kyis phyags pa/ dbang pa dang brda'i dbang pa'i lha dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang brjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra par bya bar thus/ 
384b1(1): de nas de'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar gyi mig dgrang nas tshe dang ldan shA ri'i bul mngon par dad par gyur te smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bus ni smra ba'i khyu mchog chen po cher bcad do snyam du rig nas/ 
384b2(1): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du blta bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang rang bzhin shes nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis
384b3(1): sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par byaso// de thos nas sems can brgya phrag du mas khyad par chen po tho ba ste/ kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed/ 
384b4(1): kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu'o// kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o// kha cig ni skyab su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs s+ho// / 
384b5(1): kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byaso// kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong 'bras bu'o// kha gcig ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams
384b6(1): cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byaso// 'khor de phal tsher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la 'bab par bkod do// mu sngags can rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'di bdag
384b7(1): gi shogs kyis tshar bcad par mi nus kyi/ thabs cig bsham par bya ste/ gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du grwa mi'i las byas la/ de nas glags bsnyen na 'di gegs la bsad par bya'o snyam nas/ thams
384b8(1): cad 'dus te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyi drung du song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis bdag cag gis 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad gcad de/ de bas snying brtse bar gyis shig dang / khyod kyi gtsug
385a1(1): lag khang du bla ma'i las byaso// kho bo cag 'di ni ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bong ngan mi rung ngo // de nas khyim bdag med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ re shig 'phags pa shA ri'i du
385a2(1): la btag par bya'o zhes de tshe dang ldan pa shA ro'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa mu sngags can rnams kyis mchis nas/ bdag cag gi
385a3(1): 'che ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad de/ de bas na snying brtse bar gyis shig dang / khyod kyis gtsug lag khang du bla ma'i las bya'o// kho bo cag 'di ni ring zhig du gnas gnas gnas rnaM pas yul
385a4(1): bor na mi rung ngo zhes mchi'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ci 'di rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam 'on te med ces bsam pa la zhugs na yod par mthong ngo // su zhig la rag las
385a5(1): snyam bdag kho na la'o snyam nas/ des bsams te smras pa/ khyim bdag de la 'gal ba ci yod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ de rnams gtsug lag khang der bla ma'i las bya bar bsams pa na/ 
385a6(1): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lcag thogs kyi mi gtum za zhig tu sprul nas de rnams las byed bcug par brtsams// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyis gdul ba'i 'du shes nas de dang nye ba'i
385a7(1): shing drung zhis na 'chag cing 'dug pa las/ de rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/ dben pa 'dug pas 'di bsad pa'i dus ni 'di yin snyam nas/ de rnams kyis de'i drung du
385a8(1): ja nas bskor te 'dug// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ 'di rnams sems ci 'dra bas bdag gi drung du lpags sam na/ ji tsam na gsang pa'i sems kyis yin par mthong na
385b1(1): de nas kyis lcags thogs sprul pa de skad nas/ des de rnams las byos deng zhes thag bcag pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu srubasu gsol// des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
385b2(1): re shig song la mi dral song chug shig/ de rnams kyis bsams pa 'di ni 'di lta bur be dag nyid che ba yin te/ bdag cag gis ni 'di bsad par bsams na/ 'di ni bdag cag la byams par sems
385b3(1): so snyam du rig nas dad par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin shes nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs
385b4(1): par 'gyur ba'i de lta bu'i chos bshad par bya ste/ de thos nas de rnams kyi 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri bo'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon
385b5(1): sum du byas te/ de rnams kyis ma mthong ste smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu bgra cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa
385b6(1): lhan bdag cag btsun pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs sma par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// de rnams tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rab tu byang zhing bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas nas/ gdams drug byin te/ 
385b7(1): de rnam sa kyis brtson pa dang 'bad pa dang brtsal ba byas pas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang rnam
385b8(1): par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis gnan te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas te/ dgra bcom par gyur nas/ khams gsum
386a1(1): gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba sor du mnyam pa nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs
386a2(1): dral cing / rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so sor yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang / bkur bsnyil rgyab kyis phyogs pa Sharda dang / dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang
386a3(1): po'i lha bring bcas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to// de nas rnams tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gtsug lag khang thig spyad kyi mtha' cig nas
386a4(1): bzung / mtha' cig nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bzung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dzum pa brtsam so// khyim bdag mgon med pas sprin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shar
386a5(1): bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni/ rgyu me rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad/ khyim
386a6(1): bdag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum mi mdzad de/ khyod kyis 'dir thig skud bzung ba na// 
386a7(1): dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su yang gser gyi khang pa grub par gyur to// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ngo mtshar skyes pa'i mig dgrad de smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu gal te de lta na de'i slad du thig
386a8(1): skud bsnang ba dang / lhag par sems mngon par bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang thig srud de bzung ba dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lhag par dad pa dag po'i shugs kyis sems mtshan
386b1(1): bar dad par byas te/ dad pa de'i 'jug thogs kho nar gser gyi khang pa rin po che sna bzhi las byas par gyur nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang de la go bar byas// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
386b2(1): gong nas gong du bsod nams rab tu 'phel ba'i rgyud kyis gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang bran drug cu brtsigs te/ des gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang khang phran drug bcu brtsigs nas/ 
386b3(1): 'byod thams cad kyis rgyas par byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das gshegs na/ 
386b4(1): gdugs chod ci tsam na byon par 'gyur/ khyim pa dag dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po tsam mo// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mchi ba'i tshad ji tsam/ khyim bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni nyi ma
386b5(1): gcig gis rgyang grags bcu'iri lam du 'gro'o// de nas khyim bdag med zas sbyin gyis gang yang mnyan yod nas/ rgyal po'i khab de'i bar gyi gshegs dgongs brtsis nas zhes sa dag bye du bcug sbyin gtong
386b6(1): gi khang pa bya rtsig tu bcug/ dus tshod gsol ba'i mi dag bkod gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi brgyan/ can dran gyi chus chag chag btab shin tu dri zhim pa'i pog phor dag nye bar bkod// rta babs dag
386b7(1): byed du bcug dus kyi dang thun chod kyi sman ngag kyang 'jog tu bcugo/ de ltar tshegs btsags nas mi zhig la bsgo ba/ kye nang rje tshun khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la phyin pa dang / kho bo'i tshig
386b8(1): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/ gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang bde ba la reg pa gnas sam/ zhes zhus la 'di skad ces bcom ldan
388a1(1): ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi chu la khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun tu brgyan cing / dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 
388a2(1): 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku/ nyi ma'i 'od zer stong pas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
388a3(1): gsum dang / blugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yon na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang lha brgya stong phrag du mas zhabs byas
388a4(1): nas mnyan yang kye grong khyer du gshegaso// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs nas/ mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ grong khyer gyi sgo 'thim pa la zhabs g.yas pas gnan pa de'i tshe/ sa nas
388a5(1): pa drug du g.yos/ rab tu g.yos// kun rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho' na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ 
388a6(1): byang brags mtha' na lnga grags dma'/ mtha' mthon dbus dma' dbus mtho na mtha' dma' bar srung nas/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas te/ snang ba chen pas khyab par gyung to// bar ldab
388a7(1): yang lha'i rnga brdung zhing nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lhas ni bcom ldan 'das kyi/ steng nas lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud ta dang pad+ma dkar po dang / a ga ru'i phye ma dang / tsan dan gyi phye mu dang / gur kum
388a8(1): kyi bye ma dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lha'i me tog man da ra ba rnams 'thor zhing / lha'i gos blangs kyang 'thor ro// bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na/ 'di dag dang gzhan yang la mtshan 'di lta bu dag byung bar
388b1(1): gyur to// gzhan yang dog pa rnams ni yangs par zur tso dma' ba rnams mthon por gyur to// mthun po rnams ni mnyam par gyur to// glab che yang skad 'byin te yang sang 'byin/ khru mchog rnams kyang ma na
388b2(1): to// khang pa na yod pa'i rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pa rnams kying rang sgra 'byin te/ long ba rnams kyis mig thob bo// 'on pa rnams kyis sgra thos so// lhag pa rnams kyis ni sgra nus par gyur to// dbang po mtshang ba/ 
388b3(1): rnams kyis ni dbang po rnams tshang ba thob po chang gis myos pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to// dug 'thungs pa rnams ni dug zhi bar gyur to// phan tshun kho na byung ba rnams ni byams pa thob par gyur to// sbrum
388b4(1): pa rnams ni bde bar bcas sder gyur to btson du bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las thar to// nor med pa rnams ni nor rnyed de/ 'di dag dang gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na/ ngo mtshar
388b5(1): stong dag byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das bkur bsti chen po de lta bus mnyan yod du gshegs par gyur to// gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// 
388b6(1): de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang gnyen gyi skye bos yongasu bskor nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/ chu sbeng bar bsams pa las/ de 'dzag tu ma btu banas de nas khyim bdag
388b7(1): mgon med zas sbyin yid mi bde ste bsams pa/ bdag gis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad byas par ma gyur grang snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis las nyes pa
388b8(1): dang bcas pa cung zad kyang byas pa med de 'on kyang khyod kyis phyogs 'dir 'dug nas/ sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/ phyogs 'di phul ba yin gyis phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug la
389a1(1): steng shig/ de phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug te sbrengs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad de/ rgyal
389a2(1): byed kyi tshal brjod pa mdzad pa na/ gzho ru rgyal byed kyis bams pa/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gis thog mar spros kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhoru rgyal byed
389a3(1): kyi bsams pa/ thugs su chud nas/ dge slong dga'adi ni rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yin zhes der ming thog mar spros par mdzad do// gzhoru rgyal byed kyis bcom
389a4(1): ldan 'das rjes der bdag gi ming thog zlar smos pa mdzad pa thos nas/ shin tu dga' bar gyur te/ dga' ba dang rab tu dga' skyes pa der nor rigs thams cad kyis bco ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che
389a5(1): sna bzhi'i sgo khang byed du bcug go// de bzhin du sdud par byed pa rnams kying mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs/ 
389a6(1): zhes rags par byas// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcon pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa khyim bdag mgon maud zas sbyin gyis// sngon gyi yang
389a7(1): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las phyogs 'di sngon nam phul lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig la yang dag
389a8(1): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
389b1(1): ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas de 'khor dge slong drug khri nyis stong dang phyogs 'dir gsheg so// de'i tshe mthun yod 'dir khyim bdag rgyal zhes bya ba byung ste/ des sa
389b2(1): phyogs 'dir rgyang grags drug gser dang dbyig bshibs pas/ rgyal bu gno ru las nyos nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phul te/ de nyid kyi spyan sngar rab tu byung mas
389b3(1): nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byaso// khyim bdag rgyal gyi gtso bo zhig des bsten pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la shin tu dad pa skyes nas/ de yang dag
389b4(1): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten brtsig tu bcug ste/ des bsams pa/ gang gis na bdag gis 'di nyid mtshan du sgrib pa med par mthong bar 'gru ba'i
389b5(1): thabs de ci yod snyam pa dang / de la brten pa rgya mtsho'i 'gram na 'dug pa zhig gi/ nor bu rin po che 'bar ba zhig skye su bskur na/ des de mchod rten de la brtags pa dang de'i mthus des dbu skra dang sen
389b6(1): mo'i mtshon rten de nyin mtshan du sgrib pa med par mthong ngo // de nas dad pa skyes te smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar sa phyogs 'di bdag gi zha bo rgyal bu gzhon las gser dang dbyig bshibs nas nyos
389b7(1): nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la 'phul ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis sa phyogs 'di gser dang dbyig bshibs pa rgyal bus
389b8(1): las nyos nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun la 'bul bar 'gyur zhing / de rnams kyi phyi ma shos gang yin pa de'i spyan sngar bdag rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
390a1(1): te dgra bcom par mngon sum du byas par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag rgyal gyi gtso bo gang yin pa
390a2(1): de ni khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no// de tshun chad bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig pa la/ ston pa gtsug tor can zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig
390a3(1): rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor dge slong drug khri dang sa phyogs 'dir gsheg so// de'i tshe khyim bdag rgyas pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ des sa phyogs 'di dpag chad
390a4(1): phyed dang gsum/ nor bu bshibs pas rgyal bu gzhonu las nyos nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas btsug gtor can nyan thos kyi 'khor dang bcas pa la du lo// dge slong dag de'i tshe dus kyi khyim
390a5(1): bdag rgyas pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyama'am/ khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no// ne'i 'og tu bskal pa
390a6(1): sum cu rtsa gcig pa 'di nyid la ston pa thams cad skyob ces bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo // zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor dge slong drug khri dang
390a7(1): sa phyogs 'dir gsheg so// de'i tshe khyim bdag chu zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i sa phyogs 'di rgyang grags gnyis mu tig bshibs pa gzhonu las nyos nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
390a8(1): thams cad skyob nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phulo// dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag chu zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyed kyis de ltar mi lta ste 'on kyang de'i tshe
390b1(1): de'i dus kyi khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di cid man// de'i 'og tu bskal pa bdang po 'di la ston pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba nas/ sang+yas rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung
390b2(1): khya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du bya ste/ de 'khor dge slong bzhi khri dang phyogs 'dir gshegs// de'i tshe grim bdag srid sbyin zhes bya ba byung ste/ des phyogs 'di ba lang gis bkang ba gno ru las
390b3(1): nyos te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phu'o// dge slong dag de'i tshe des dus kyi khyim bdag srid sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa/ 
390b4(1): gzhan zhig yin snyam pa khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no// de'i 'og tu bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo suma'i
390b5(1): thub pa na/ ston pa gser thub ces bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor dge slong sum khri dang phyogs 'dir gshegaso// de'i tshe
390b6(1): khyim bdag phul bu zhes bya ba byung ste/ des phyogs 'di gos bting bas gzho ru las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pal phul lo// dge slong ngas
390b7(1): de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag pu bu zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yino// de'i 'og tu
390b8(1): bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu tshe le nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes bya ba'i
391a1(1): bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de'i 'khor dge slong nyi khri dang phyogs der gshegaso// de'i tshe khyim bdag chu stod ces bya ba zhig byung ste/ des sa phyogs 'di rgyang grags phyed gser gyi bkram pas
391a2(1): las nyos te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phu lo// dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag chu snod ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyed kyis
391a3(1): de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yino// dge slong dag da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhog su
391a4(1): ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ston pa gang 'jig rten du byung nas ngas 'khor stong nyes
391a5(1): brgya bcu dang / phyogs 'dir gshegs pa na/ de ltar yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smon pa dor bcu drug gis smos pa'i khyon dbyig dang gser gyi phye ma bshibs pas/ gzho nu rgyal byed las nyos te/ 
391a6(1): da nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phulo// dge slong dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ ston pa byams pa zhes bya ba 'khor dgra bcom pa khrag khrig phrag dgu dang / ther 'bum
391a7(1): chen po phrag drug phyogs 'dir gshegaso// de'i tshe khyim bad gnor bzangs zhes bya ba byung bar gyur te/ des phyogs 'dir dpag tshad gsum gser dang dbyig bshibs pas gzhonu las nyos nas/ byams pa nyan
391a8(1): thos kyi dge 'dun med ces pa la 'bul bar 'gyur zhing de nyid kyis bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim
391b1(1): bdag nor bzangs zhes bya ba byung bar 'gyur ba de gzhan zhim yin snyam na/ khyim gyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid khyim bdag nor bzangs zhes bya ba yin par 'gyur ro// 
391b2(1): khyim bdag mgon med ngas sbyin gyi gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / tshul yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa yang mthong bas/ 
391b3(1): kun tu khyim bdag mgon med pas sbyin gyis gter bdag po dang / bdag dang bcas pa dang / bdag med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chun yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag pa na yod pa
391b4(1): yang mthong ngo zhes sgra grags pa'o// de'i tshe mu stegs can gyi dge sbyong dang bram ze dang spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu sna tshogs rtog khang du 'dus te/ 'khod pa rnams 'di lta bu'i skabs kyi gtam dag gleng bar byed de/ 
391b5(1): shes ldan dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dang ldan pa dang / gter bdag dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu la yod pa dang gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag
391b6(1): thag nye ba na yod pa mthong bar 'gyuraro// de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'i'u phyugs rten zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du tshogs shing 'dug par gyur nas/ des spros pa shes ldan dag khyod cag sems las chu dus khyod cag dang / kha bos
391b7(1): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dang ldan na/ gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chun yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang snying po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod
391b8(1): pa mthong bar 'gyur ba btags la smra bar bya'o zhes de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa la brtag par lngar len cing rjes bzhin 'brang ngo // ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas/ 
392a1(1): @#/ sbyin chu bo a dzi ra ba tir khrus byas nas byung ba la/ des de'i rgyab tu thal mos brgyab pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mthong bzhin du cang mi smra bar 'dug/ des smras pa khyim bdag khyod
392a2(1): ni mkhas pa yin zhes bzod pa dang / nges pa dang ldan pa yin pas/ des na gtor bdag po dang bcas pa dang bdag po med pa dang thang la yod pa dang / chun yod pa dang gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag ce
392a3(1): ban yod pa mthong ngo // des mu segs can rnams la go bar byas pa dang / mu stegs can lang ma can rnams kyis kyang kun tu sbas pa/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bzod pa dang nges pa dang ldan pa des na
392a4(1): gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chun yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo zhes kun du sgra grags pa'i skabs de/ 
392a5(1): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mu stegs can brgya stong phrag bye bas kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dang
392a6(1): ldan na gter mthong bar 'gyur shes pa sra ba ma yin no// 'on kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mig gi 'bras bu rin po che bltar bkra ba dang / dbyig gi skad yod de des na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang
392a7(1): bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chun yod pa gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo // // 'dul ba gzhi/ dum bu gsum pa// / bam po bdun cu
392a8(1): drug pa/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis las ci zhig bgyis mkhas/ 
392b1(1): de'i rnam par smin pas mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing dbrig gi skad dang ldan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyim bdag megron med zas sbyin 'di nyid kyis/ 
392b2(1): las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongasu bsgyur ba/ yod pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin nyid kyis las
392b3(1): shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gos so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mo 'gyur/ me'i khams
392b4(1): mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsasmras pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mchod rnams kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bas
392b5(1): par brgyar yang ni/ chud mi za gA'ang tshogs dang dus/ rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ dge slong dag sngon byang ba ri bor cig na khyim bdag phyag cing nor mngal long spyod che ba yongasu
392b6(1): gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas te/ de ko sA la'i dus la bab pa'i tshe me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing ngang pa dang / klung krung
392b7(1): dang rma bya dang ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang de'i rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags tshal stug po'i bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir na mi dang lhan cig dong // sangs rgyas rnams byung ba med pa na/ 
392b8(1): rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang / nad pa la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba dang / 'jig rten rnams kyi yon gnas gcig 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ ci tsam na rang sangs rgyas
393a1(1): shing ljongs rgyu zhing song na/ ri bor der phyin na/ de bskyed mos tshal de'i phyogs zhig na 'dug/ bskyed mos tshal srung ba'i mis khyim bdag de la smras pa/ dpon po phyogs 'di
393a2(1): na rab tu byang ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid can zhig bzhugaso// des thos nas/ de yid dga' bar gyur cing dad pa skyes te/ gang gi bskyed mos tshal na 'di 'dra ba'i rab tu byung ba gnas pa ni bdag bskal
393a3(1): pa can no snya mo// bdag nyid chen po yang phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu zhugs te/ yongasu mya ngan las 'daso// de nas khyim bdag des 'dza' bshes dang / nye du dang
393a4(1): gnyen dang nang mi rnams dang lhag cig tu bkur bsti chen po byas nas bsregs te/ me de 'o mas bsad nas rus pa de rnams shel las byas pa'i bum pa'i nang du rin po che dang bsres te blugs/ 
393a5(1): ba dang / rus pa de rnams 'od dang ldan zhing sgra 'byin par 'gyuraro// de nas de drung du gtugs nas smon lam btab pa ji ltar rus pa 'di rnams rin po che dang bsres na/ shin tu 'od dang ldan zhing sgra
393a6(1): 'byin pa de bzhin du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gi skad dang ldan par gyur cig ces byaso// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ dri'i tshe de'i dus
393a7(1): kyi khyim bdag gang yin de ni khyim bdag mgon med zlas sbyin 'di cing yin te/ 'di rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas nas/ smon lam btab pa gang yin pa dang / khyim bdag rgyal gyi cha bor gyur pa na
393a8(1): des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la nor bu 'bar ba btags pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ mig gi 'bras bu
393b1(1): rin po che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gi skad dang ldan par 'gyuraro// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la gcig tu dkang ba dang / 'dzin
393b2(1): ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin te/ de lta bas nas dge slong dag 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ las gnag pa dang / 'dren ma gang yin pa rnams ni spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal/ 
393b3(1): bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// bar sdom ni/ rgyal dang rgyas pa mchu dang ni/ srin sbyin dang ni phur bu dang / chu stod dang ni bzang sbyin dang / phyim pa ni nor bzangs min/ 
393b4(1): dbyig rnams dang ni gser dang // gsum pa nor bu mu tig yin// ba dang gos dang nas dang ni// bye ba dbyig gis bsdus pa yin// gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis dbyig dang gser gyi
393b5(1): bye ma'i bshibs pas bshibs nas/ gzhonu rgyal byed las nyos te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul ba de'i tshe/ yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dang pa can mchod rten la phyag
393b6(1): 'chal ba dag mnyan yod du lhags nas de rnams las kha cig mngon par dad par gyur nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag cag gis kyang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi srang du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gzhi
393b7(1): cung zad brjigo// dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ de rin gyi chos la brtsigs shig/ 'phags pa rin ci tsam 'tshal lags/ dbyig 'di rnyed do// 'phags pa re shig gi 'di rnyed kyi 'byor blta bdag cag
393b8(1): la mchis/ de lta mod kyi gal te phyogs 'ad thob na bajig go// zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag
394a1(1): la rtogs la gal te byon na brtsigs shig/ dge slong rnams kyis khyim bdagra mgon med zas sbyin la brtags pa dang / des smras pa gal te bdag la rten te bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa
394a2(1): ba rnams dge 'dun gyi bsod nams kyi ba'i dngos po bgyid na stsal to// gang zag gi phyir bgyid na ma bstsal to// zhes bya ba'i skabs te/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
394a3(1): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas rje su gnang ste/ dge 'dun gyi phyir brtsig par bya'o// gang zag phyir ni yon bdag la btags te byin na brtsig par bya'o// ma byin na brtsig par mi bya'o// glo bur
394a4(1): ba'i dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag mnyan yod du lhags pa na/ de rnams smos 'drin ci lta ba bzhin dge slong rnams kyi drung du dong ba dang / gzhan dag la sgos 'dri na med pa de dag phongs par gyur nas/ 
394a5(1): byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glo bur ba rnams kyi phyir ma bgos pa'i gnas gzhag par bya'o// ri bor zhig na gtsug lag khang zhig pa der dge slong rnams dbyar gnas par dam btsas
394a6(1): bai las/ ci tsam ri bor der dbyar gyi nang log su 'jigs pa byung nas de na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams skrag nas dgag dbye ma byas par mnyan yod du lpags pa dang / de rnams dge slong rnams kyis lam gyi dub pa la
394a7(1): ngal sor bcug ste/ lam gyis dub pa nga la sos nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan drug gnas mal skes shig/ de rnams kyis dbyer gyi nang logs yin snyam nas ma bskos pa dang / glo bur ba'i dge slong
394a8(1): rnams spang bar byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khre dang ltar ston pa nyid bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed dam ci/ gal te khyed la bskos pa yod na rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin
394b1(1): gnas mal byin cig/ de rnams kyis 'on kyang ma bsgos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gan
394b2(1): ste/ 'jigs pas ral pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir/ dbyar gnyis pa gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zla ba gsum pa'i dag
394b3(1): dbye bya zhing dbyar zla tha chung la dbyar gyi phyir gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jigs pas ral pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o// 
394b4(1): zhes gsungs pa dang / ji tsam na 'jigs pas ral pa'i dge slong dag kyang mnyan yod du lhags pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
394b5(1): pa/ dge slong dgangs 'jigs pa ral pa'i dge slong rnams la rten nas dbyar gnyis par dam bca' ba bcas kyi// gsum pa ni ma yin// 'jigs pas ral pa'i dge slong rnams kyang smos 'drin ci lta ba
394b6(1): bzhin du ngal sor bzhug par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis de rnams las su spro bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams las su bso bar mi bya'o// dge slong rje rnams kyis de rnam
394b7(1): la rnyed pa byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de rnams la rnyed pa mi sbyin no// dge slong rnams kyis kha zas kyi rnyed pa sing mi byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams
394b8(1): la kha zas kyi rnyed pa byin gyis/ chos kyi rnyed pa ni ma yin no// dad pa can rnams kyis gtsug lag khang mang du brtsig pa las mnyan yod na/ dge slong nyung ngu zhig dbyar nas par dam bcas te/ de rnams stong pa
395a1(1): 'dug pas/ sbyin bdag rnams kyi longs spyod las byung ba bsod nams med cing nal 'brug rnams kyi gnas su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad bgo bar
395a2(1): bya ste/ re res kyang sa ser gnyis mam/ gsum 'am bzhi ci dran par thams cad la longs spyad par bya ste/ la lar ni snga dro 'dug par bya'o// la lar ni nyi ma'i gung la'o// la lang ni phyi dro'o/ la lar nr-i nub
395a3(1): mo gnas par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis lag gi las ma byas pas de rnams 'drums par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bdag la spro ba bskyed par bya'o// gal te grub
395a4(1): mdo lda na legs/ gal te ma grub par gyur pa na dge 'dun gyis phyir bcos par bya'o// gal te mi rus par na ji tsam nus pa de tsam bcos par bya ste/ gzhan ni gtang snyom su gzhag par bya'o// 
395a5(1): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ dge slong mang po mnyan yod du lpags pa dang / de rnams gnas khang gis 'bongs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
395a6(1): sbal pa/ gnyis dang gsum gyi bsgo bar bya ste chu snad gzhag pa dang / bdag chal dang sman dang so shing gzhag pa dang / phan tshun gyi themasas ma gtogs par chang mi 'dug pa'i tshad tsam yang thams
395a7(1): cad kyis 'dra bar go bar bya ste snod ni spyi'i yin pas bdag nyid kyis go bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag dgon pa dang / shing drung pa dang / khang stong pa dang / r-i sul dang / brag
395a8(1): phrag dang / rtsa'i stan dang / bla gab med pa dang / dur khrod dang nags mtha'i gnas mal 'di rnams su bsam gtan gyis shog/ phyis yid la bcags par mi 'gyur bar bag yod par gyis shig
395b1(1): ces dgon pa'i bsngags pa mang du gsungs pa de'i tshe/ dge slong kha cig gon pa par dam bcas nas/ dgon pa na gnas pa las de rnams den chos dran pa rnams kyis gtogs par gyur to// gtoms nas
395b2(1): bram ze dang khyim bdag gi/ khyim rnams su chos gos tshol ba'i phyir brtson par gyur pas/ lung nod pa dang / klag pa dang / gdon pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la bya ba nyams par 'gyur ba'i skabs de/ dge
395b3(1): slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyis phyir gnas gzhag par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dam
395b4(1): pa pa rnams kyi phyir gnas gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis mi gsal ba zhig tu gzhag pa dang / dge slong pi pa zhig gis lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas sgo ba cad/ lde mig
395b5(1): blangs nas song ba dang / dge slong dgon pa pas gzhan dag phongs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gsulta bar dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyis gnas gzhag par bya'o// 
395b6(1): rags khyim bdag gtsug lag khang brtsig tu gtsug nas de'i mi de na mi gnas par dge slong glo bur ba gang zhig 'ongs pa de la gnas rnyed pa de ni bdag nyid kyis khyero// ci tsam na dge slong chos gos gsum pa
395b7(1): zhig 'ongs pa dang / des gtsug lag khang de stong blang mthong nas des dris pa/ 'di su'i gtsug lag khang yin/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ dge slong nyer dga'i yino// de de'i drung du song nas bcas pa dang
395b8(1): des smras pa/ gtsug lag khang 'dir 'dug la/ rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni kho bo'i yin// de der gnas te/ des gtsug lag khang de len 'ga' yang phyag dar ma byas/ ba'i lci ba sar zas ma byug so// de rje
396a1(1): tsam zhig na gtsug lag khang de nas song ngo // dge sbyong gzhin zhig 'ongs te des kyang ther dga' la brnyas nas/ gtsug lag khang der gnas pa na gtsug lag khang der phyag dar gyi phung pos
396a2(1): gang bar mthong nas de phyag nas phyag dang bor te/ phyags ma 'dzin bzhin du phyag dar gyi phung po'i drung na 'greng ba dang ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig gis de mthong nas/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod phyag ma
396a3(1): lag pa na thogs bzhin du de nyid na 'greng ngam ci/ phyag ma de mi gzhag gam/ des smras pa/ 'di na lag pa bsrung ba 'ga' zhig gnas pa ste/ des na phyags ma'i rjes kyang med do// des smras pa 'dis na
396a4(1): dge slong chos gos gsum pa che ge mo zhig gnas so// ji tsam na des de bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mthong nas ma nongs so// des smras pa rnyed na nyer dgas khyer la/ de'i gtsug lag khang kho bos phyag dar bya 'am zhes
396a5(1): bya ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed pa su khyer ba des gtsug lag khang phyag dar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyin
396a6(1): bdag shi ba rnams kyi ming gis yon bsngo bar bya'o// zhes gsungs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis shi ba rnams kyi phyir tshig su bcad pa 'don pa na/ khyim bdag cig gtsug lag khang du 'ongs na/ 
396a7(1): des de yon bsngo ba thos nas/ de de'i drung du song ste/ smras pa 'phags pa gal te bdag gis gtsug lag khang brtsig ni/ bdag gi ming gis kyang yon bshad pa mdzad dam/ des smras pa/ rtsig shig dang legs
396a8(1): bar bsngo'o// ji tsam na khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang bzhi partsig tu bcug nas/ des der ci yang ma gzhag/ de stong pa nyid 'dug pa/ ji tsam na de khyim bdag des mthong nas/ de gtsug lag khang du 'angs/ 
396b1(1): nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis gtsug lag khang stong bar mchis na/ de na su yang mi bzhugs sam/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag bsdum paso// khyim bdag de
396b2(1): smras pa/ 'phags pa tshar rgo can dgon dung la brtsegs pa lag la snum par 'gyur/ khyim bdag de la bsams nas khu ba smra ba yin te 'on kyang de na rnyed pa med do// des smras pa 'phags pa do na sa
396b3(1): gi gtsug lag khang du su bzhugs pa la ras yug cig bson no// cer dgas rnyed pa thob bo snyam nas gral rims bab pa na rang gis skal bar blangs nas de ni gzhon nyid gnas te/ de ni stong pa 'dug/ 
396b4(1): ji tsam na bsod snyoms mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs pa de gtsug lag khang stong pa de mthong nas des dge slong dag la dris pa/ gtsug lag khang 'di su'i yin/ de dag gi smras
396b5(1): ba/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang yin mod kyi dge slong nye dga'i dbang ngo de nyer dga'i drung du song nas/ khyod kyis skal ba'i gtsug lag khang 'dir 'dug/ des smras pa de bzhin byos shig/ de de na gnas
396b6(1): pa nas bstod snyoms pa de mkhas pa de snyoms las med pa zhig yin pas/ des de nyi ma re re byug pa dang / phyag dang byaso// phyag dang byed pa la ni phan yon lnga yod de/ 'di lta ste bdag nyid sems dang / 
396b7(1): bar gyur pa dang / gzhan sems dang bar gyur pa dang / lha rnams yid dga' bar gyur pa dang / mdzes par 'gyur ba'i rtsa ba stsogs pa dang / lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams
396b8(1): su skye bar 'gyur ro// gang dag gtsug lag khang de byug pa dang phyag dar byas pa mthong ba de dag gis khyim bdag de dag gi song ste smras pa/ des thos nas mchog tu dka' ba skyeso// ji tsam dus zhig
397a1(1): gzhan zhig na rang nyid der song nas/ gtsug lag khang de de bzhin du byug pa dang phyag dar byas pa mthong nas de dad pa skyes te/ des bsod snyoms la ras yug can bskon pa de nyer dga' de la thos nas
397a2(1): rings par song te smras pa/ bsod snyoms pa gtsug lag khang 'di kha ba'i skal pa yin gyis ras yug chen byin cig/ bsod snyoms pas bsam pa/ chags pa'i bdag nyid can 'di la gal te bdag gis ma byin
397a3(1): yang 'on kyang 'dis mthus khyer nas/ bdag cag kyang gtsug lag khang nas bskrad par 'gyur// snyam nas des de la sbyin pa'i skabs te/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la
397a4(1): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la dad pas lhag par bya ba byas pa de ni de kho na'i yino// dbyar gyi rnyed pa ni nyer dga'i yin// 'jig rten yon pas/ bdag nyid dang bu dang chung ma bsdug bsngal bar gyur kyang / 
397a5(1): yon tan dang ldan pa sbyin pa byin par byed do// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams/ dge slong dgon pa pa rnams zas la 'gron du 'bod par byed// dge slong dgon pa pa rnams zas la khyim rnamasu dong ba dang / 
397a6(1): ma byin par len pa rnams kyis gtsug lag khang nas bskus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo bcad la lde mig blangs 'dong bar bya'o// ma byin par len pa rnams kyis kyang lte mig byas
397a7(1): te bskus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i stsal pa/ bsrung ba'i dge slong gzhag la 'dong bar bya ste/ de la bsod snyoms kyi brel ba med par bya'o// ma byin par len pa rnams kyis dge slong gzhan khrid de 'ongs/ 
397a8(1): nas des sgo bya zhes smras nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rims dang bcas sam/ rims med ces brda' bya'o// gal te rims dang bcas pa'o zhes zer ma mi dbye'o// 'on kyang rims med
397b1(1): chom ldan dbye bar byar// gzhan yang dge slong dgon pa pas lo ma yar mngon pa gzhag par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dgon pa pas so ma snang mnyen pa banan par bya'o// zhes gsungs pa dang / 
397b2(1): dge slong rnams kyis lom ltar mnyen pa ci 'dri ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sgom lngar mnyen pa ni khyi yin te/ de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par bya'o// dges
397b3(1): dgon pa pa rnams kyis khyi bcangs pa las mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang gtsug lag khang sder mos brud cing gsheng ba dang gcibs ma rung bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
397b4(1): ngas dge slong khyi bsrel pa'i kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong khyi bsrel bas nang par langs la mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang gtsug lag khang byul bar bya ste/ sder mos brud pa gang yin pa de
397b5(1): bsgom par bya bshad pa dang brtse ba yang phyag par bya'o// dge slong khyi bsrel ba'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos ci ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te/ 'jig par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 
397b6(1): de'i tshe che dang ldan pa nye dga' gtsug la ga khang nig gi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du zur ba dang / tsaM tsam na gnas brtan der dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gzhan nag 'angs nas ger dag zha ba sams pa/ 
397b7(1): bdag gtsug lag khang 'di'i dge 'dun la gnas brtan byed byed pa las gnas brtan gnyis par bya'am/ bdag gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'gro'o snyam ste/ gtsug lag khang de las byung ste/ de gtsug
397b8(1): lag khang gzhan zhig tu song ba dang / de'i gnas brtan gnyis pa'i gnas rnyed gang yin pa de de'i dge 'dun gyi gnas btan yin nas/ des bsams pa bdag gi rnyed pa 'di na yang der zad la
398a1(1): bdag gi rnyed pa de na yang der zar na/ spobs pa med par dge 'dun gyis gartan gyis ci zhig bya zhes de slar rings par rings gtsug lag khang de nyid du song ba dang / gnas mal bye bskos tsam
398a2(1): na gtsug lag khang du phyin nas/ nges smras pa/ rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gtsug lag khang bskor shig/ dge slong rnams kyis 'das zin to zhes te ma bskos pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dag ston pa bzhugs bzhin du
398a3(1): bstan pa nub par byed dam ci/ rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gtsug lag khang bsres shig ces pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
398a4(1): gang zhig dge 'dun gyi 'am mchod rten gyi bya ba la song ba zhig yin na de'i gnas mal rgan rims ji la ba bzhin du bsko bar bya'o// gzhan gyi na gar bab pa bzhin du'o// nyer dga' lhags par chags pa dang / 
398a5(1): gtsug lag khang rnyed pa thob par 'gyu ro snyam nas/ gtsug lag khang gnyis su dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ nges dbyar 'das nas rnyed pa nos pa dang / gcig nas kyang ma thob nas/ cig shog nas kyang / 
398a6(1): mthob nas/ gnas mal 'gyed pa'o dge slong rnams la kha zer ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nges dbyar gnas par khas
398a7(1): blangs pas de rnyed pa byin cig dge slong rnams kyis gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas sbyin par mi bya'o// gcig nas/ 
398a8(1): byin pa dang dge slong gzhan rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ gtsug lag khang gnyis kar dbyar gnas na ci'i phyir gcig nas sbyin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
398b1(1): pa/ gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas phyed sbyin par bya ste/ dge slong gis gtsug lag khang gnyis na 'dug par ngam mi bcu'o// dam bca' bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// khyim bdag
398b2(1): gis gtsug lag khang gnyis rtsig tu bcug ste/ gcig ni dgon pa pa rnams kyis yino// gcig shos grong mtha' pa rnams kyis yino// khyim bdag de'i kun du spyod pa ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi
398b3(1): dge slong re re la ras yug re re skon pa yin pas/ de ras yug chen rnams khyer te/ dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ba dang / nyer dges dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du rnyed pa 'bulo zhes thos
398b4(1): nas/ des dga' bo la springs pa/ gal te 'dir rnyed pa 'bul lo zhes thos na skal ba nos shig ces smras pa/ de rings par dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ba/ khyim bdag des mthong nas bsams
398b5(1): pa'o ni'i gom stabs dang sbyar na/ dgon pa pa'i gtsug lag khang der song gis/ nga ji ltar byas na rung snyam pa las/ re shig grong mtha'i gtsug lag khang du phul la phyis 'dir 'bulo snyam nas/ de phyir log
398b6(1): nas/ ras yug po ches sgrim par brtsams pa na/ dga' bos lag pa bzed pa dang / khyim bdag gis ras yug po che cig byin no// yang bzed ba dang / khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod la
398b7(1): ras yug po che phul lags na/ ci yang bzhed dam/ des smras pa khyim bdag khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du nyer dgas dbyar gnas pas de'i skal ba nod do// khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa bcom ldan
398b8(1): 'das kyis rang rang gi la gnas byin pal bsngags pa mdzad do// rang gi lag khron nas 'bu'o// de skyengs nas cang mi slu bar 'dug// nyer dgas bsams pa khyim bdag de ring zhig thogs nas grong gi mthar ma/ 
399a1(1): @/ song grang snyam du bsams nas grong mtha' ba'i gtsug lag khang du song nas dga' bo la dris pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag gi ras yug po che nos sam/ de la ji ltar gyur pa smras so// 
399a2(1): khyim bdag gi sa lam gzhan nas dgon pa'i gtsug lag khang du stong ste/ ras yug po che brim nas bzhag nyor dag su yang srar dgon pa pa'i gtsug lag khang du rmugs nas/ ji tsam nas ras yug po che
399a3(1): rnams brims zin pa dang / de gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi rnyed pa la lhag par chags pa las/ rnyed pa las nyams nas/ mya ngan byed cing yi mug nas smre sngags 'don to// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ 
399a4(1): the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nyer dga' lhag par chags pas ras yug po che las nyams pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
399a5(1): slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na/ lhag par chags pas zas chad par byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'bab chu'i dogs gnyis na gtsug lag
399a6(1): gnyis shig yod de/ gcig ni dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa'o// gcig shos ni bsod snyoms pa rnams kyi'o// ji tsam na khyi ga ne'i skra shes pa zhig yod do// de gan+d+ha'i sgra thos nas dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa yod pa'i
399a7(1): gtsug lag khang du sbed nas/ de la dge slong kha cig gis lhung bzed kyi lhag ma byin pa dang / de de zos nas bsnyed snyoms pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ste/ der yang lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zos nas
399a8(1): dga' mgur 'gro'o// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bsod snyoms pa rnams la glo bur gyi rnyed pa zhig byung nas/ de rnams kyis sngar gan+d+he brdungs pa dang / khyi des gan+d+he'i sgra thos nas chu la rgal bar byas te/ 
399b1(1): dbus phyin pa dang / dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa'i gtsug lag khang gi gan yang brdungs nas/ de slob med nas slar bzlog par brtsams pa las chu'i rgyun gyis ring du khyer nas/ gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to/ 
399b2(1): dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyi gan+d+he'i sgra shes pa gang yin pa de ni nyer dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang lhag par chags pas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to// da lta yang lhag par chags pas gnyis
399b3(1): ka las nyams par gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong dag gis lhags par chags par mi bya'o// byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuro// sdom la/ 'thab dang nang pa rdzogs pa dang / nub mo'i dus dang ka shi dang / 
399b4(1): shing bdag sing ma dang gnas dang / cha rnams dang ni bsgo ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis nus pa/ da ltar dge slong rnams kyi dge slong 'thab krol bgyid du 'tshang 'bru
399b5(1): bar bgyid brtsod par bgyid par bgyed par bgyid partsod par bgyid pa rnams mchi zhing / de dag ngo tsha mchis pas mtho 'tshams pa'i slad du bdag cag la gleng bar bgyid dran par bgyid do// zhes thos
399b6(1): nas de rnams kyis de dag la ri ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de nye bar 'khor dge slong gzugs mar gnas pa rnams kyis/ dge slong 'thab krol byed pa rnams 'ong ngo zhes thos pa dang / gnas mal bsgobasasum
399b7(1): dang / gnas mal bzung ba drug bya'o// gnas la bsgo ba gsum gang zhe na/ dgun gyi dang dpyid kyi dang dbyar gyi'o// gnas mal gzung ba drug gang zhe na/ gtsug lag khang gi nyen kor thams cad dang / 
399b8(1): khang phran thams cad dang / khang phran gyi nyen bkor thams cad dang / kun dga' ra ba'i nyen bkor thams cad bsko bar bya'o// gal te gtsug lag khang skas shig ces zer na/ 'di bskos zin no
400a1(1): zhes brjod par bya zhing / gtsug lag khang gi nyen 'khor bskos shig zhe na 'di yang bskos zin no// khang phran bskos shig ce na 'di yang bskos zin no// khang phran gyi nyen 'khor bskos
400a2(1): shig ce na 'di yang bskos zino// kun dga' ra ba bskos shig ce na 'di yang bsgos pa no// kun dga' ra ba'i nye kor bskos shig ce na/ 'di yang bskos zi no// zhes brjod par bya'o// de rnams gnas
400a3(1): med de mi gnas na gang la nyes pa bskyed par 'gyur/ de nas bdo ba rnams med/ phyir rgol rnams med/ mi mdza' ba rnams med nas de'i 'og tu rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal bsko bar bya'o// 
400a4(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal bsgo bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / ci tsam na dge slong nad pa gcig yod pas de de bas rgan pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas rgan rims
400a5(1): ci lta ba bzhin du de'i gnas khang bskos te/ de ni thams cad las gzhon pas des gnas khang gzhan ni ma thob po/ dge slong des de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas khang 'di kho bos yin par bskos
400a6(1): kyis byung shig/ des smras pa/ bdag zo 'tshal bas nam longs pa na'o// dge slong de gtum pa zhig pas des phyung nas/ dang rang bzhag go// ji tsam na bram ze dang khyim bdag gtsug lag khang pa
400a7(1): bar 'dod pa lpags pa rnams kyis/ dge slong de mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci dge slong 'di 'gum lags sam/ bzhin bzhangs ngag 'di shi ba ni ma yin// ci'i bring na
400a8(1): na/ 'di bas ches rgan pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs nas/ 'di'i gnas khang de de'i yin la bskos pa dang / des 'di byung nas 'dir bzhag go/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag khyim pa lags kyang nang pa
